original: Through the way they controlled Aria,[p/] they were creative and skilled at using magic.
translation: 通过签约人控制阿莉亚的方式，[p/]能看出他们精通法术且技巧纯熟。

original: They must've been constantly exposed to creative uses of magic.
translation: 新颖性也代表签约人一直能接触各种法术的不同用法。

original: Not to mention,[p/] they somehow personally handed a Blood Contract to Aria and had her sign it.
translation: 更不必提，[p/]签约人还能用某种手段让阿莉亚签约血契。

original: Going by what you know,[p/] Aria was either threatened or tricked into signing that Blood Contract.
translation: 根据已知事实，[p/]阿莉亚签约是因为被威胁或被骗。

original: So whoever did this must've had the strength to threaten her.[p/] Or they were deeply trusted by her.
translation: 签约人要么实力强大到能威胁阿莉亚。[p/]要么深受她的信任。

original: In addition to that,[p/] they must've been close to the Prayer Room when the attack happened.
translation: 除此之外，[p/]签约人在袭击发生时必须离祷告室很近。

original: And lastly...
translation: 最后……

original: They must've had an emotional grudge against Garrick Pierce.
translation: 签约人对加里克·皮尔斯恨意滔天。

original: Tyrion: ...What?[p/]
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？[p/]

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/][s/] That's not-!
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不……[p/][s/]不应该——！

original: It's the most logical conclusion with what you know thus far.
translation: 这是目前最合理的结论。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No!
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不！

original: Tyrion: It can't be-...![p/][s/] That's not-!
translation: Tyrion: 不可能……！[p/][s/]不应该——！

original: Eris wanted to make you suffer,[p/] but you can't run away from this.
translation: 厄莉斯想让你痛苦，[p/]但你不能逃避。

original: You owe it to Aria...
translation: 就算是为了阿莉亚……

original: No...[p/] You owe it to [i]everyone[/i] within Wyverngarde to see this through.
translation: 不……[p/]是为了维文加德的<u>所有人</u>。

original: You need to follow through...[p/] No matter how painful it is.
translation: 你一定要坚持到最后……[p/]不论有多痛苦。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Stop it!
translation: Tyrion: 不行！

original: Tyrion: It [i]has[/i] to be someone else!
translation: Tyrion: <u>一定</u>是其他人！

original: Tyrion: She would never-!
translation: Tyrion: 她绝不会——！

original: Can [i]you[/i] think of anyone else?[p/] Who else could Eris have chosen?
translation: <u>你</u>还想得出其他人吗？[p/]厄莉斯还能选谁？

original: Who else could she have chosen that would make you feel like this?
translation: 还有谁能让你有这种感受？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Damn it...
translation: Tyrion: 可恶……

original: Tyrion: Damn it!
translation: Tyrion: 可恶啊！

original: Tyrion: AGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGH!
translation: Tyrion: <size=1.5em>啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！</size>

original: Your scream of anguish echoes throughout the ruins.
translation: 你痛苦的嚎叫响彻废墟。

original: Everyone is caught off guard and stares at you in confusion.
translation: 大家都没预料到这一幕，困惑地看着你。

original: Lucio: ...What?[p/] What is it?
translation: Lucio: ……什么？[p/][s/]怎么回事？

original: Rath: ...Is everything okay, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Rath: ……你没事吧，卡斯伯特先生？

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] Are you-?
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]你——？

original: You can feel your eyes well up as you look at her.
translation: 你看向她，眼里渐渐噙满泪水。

original: One look at your expression tells her everything she needs to know.
translation: 只消看你一眼，她就已经尽数了解。

original: Eris: [i]There[/i] it is![p/][s/] You've realized it, haven't you?!
translation: Eris: <u>终于</u>等到了！[p/][s/]你明白了吧，对不对？！

original: Eris: I've been waiting for this moment for [i]so[/i] long!
translation: Eris: 我等这一刻<u>好久</u>了！

original: Lucio: What are you talking about?![p/][s/] I demand an explanation!
translation: Lucio: 你在说什么？！[p/][s/]我要你解释！

original: Rath: ...Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] What have you discovered?
translation: Rath: ……卡斯伯特先生。[p/]你明白了什么？

original: Eris: Tell them, Tyrion![p/][s/] Tell them who did this!
translation: Eris: 说啊，提利昂！[p/][s/]告诉他们是谁干的！

original: Eris: Issue your Divine Edict, right now!
translation: Eris: 发出神谕啊！现在，马上！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You [i]want[/i] to be wrong.[p/] You've never wanted anything more in your entire life.
translation: 你<u>渴望</u>自己是错的，这是你一生至今最渴望的事。

original: Nothing would make you happier than having this Edict fail,[p/] even if it were to cost you your life...
translation: 神谕失败会是你最开心的事，[p/]即使你要为此付出性命……

original: ...But you know the truth.
translation: ……但你已经知道真相。

original: Tyrion: Eris Illmater...[p/] Empress of Discord.
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯·伊尔马特……[p/]无序女皇。

original: Eris: Tyrion Cuthbert...[p/] Attorney of the Arcane.
translation: Eris: 提利昂·卡斯伯特……[p/]奥术律师。

original: Tyrion: By the Eye of Horus,[p/][s/] I issue upon you a Divine Edict.
translation: Tyrion: 借荷鲁斯之眼之力，[p/][s/]我对你发出神谕。

original: Tyrion: Release thy guards and manifest your Blood Contract with...
translation: Tyrion: 放下防备，展示你和这个人的血契……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Eris: Say it![p/][s/] Say her name so that [i]everyone[/i] can hear it!
translation: Eris: 说啊！[p/][s/]让<u>大家</u>都听听她的名字！

original: Tyrion: ...Release thy guards and manifest your Blood Contract with...
translation: Tyrion: ……放下防备，展示你和这个人的血契……

original: Tyrion: ...Celeste McCoy.
translation: Tyrion: ……塞莱斯特·麦考伊。

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] [i]died[/i]?
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]<u>死了</u>？

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/][s/] I'm sorry I-!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/][s/]对不起——！

original: Rath: ...What the [i]hell[/i] is going on?!
translation: Rath: ……怎么回事？！

original: Lucio: Demon![p/][s/] What is the meaning of this?!
translation: Lucio: 恶魔！[p/][s/]你是何居心？！

original: Eris: It's exactly what it looks like.
translation: Eris: 如你所见。

original: Eris: The Patron you've been looking for has been right in front of you the entire time!
translation: Eris: 你们苦苦寻找的签约人一直近在眼前！

original: Rath: ...Ms. McCoy.
translation: Rath: ……麦考伊女士。

original: Rath: Did you sign a Blood Contract with the Empress of Discord?
translation: Rath: 你和无序女皇签了血契？

original: Celeste: ...I did.
translation: Celeste: ……是的。

original: Celeste: It was the only thing that would save Tyrion.
translation: Celeste: 只有这样才能救提利昂。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: I never fought Aria.[p/] I fought Beatrice and Eris.
translation: Celeste: 和我搏斗的不是阿莉亚。[p/]是比亚特丽丝和厄莉斯。

original: Celeste: They broke past me and ran into the Prayer Room.
translation: Celeste: 是她们越过我进了祷告室。

original: Celeste: But the person they killed wasn't Pierce...[p/] It was you.
translation: Celeste: 她们杀掉的人不是皮尔斯……[p/]是你。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] You...
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]你……

original: She can't even bring herself to say it.
translation: 她甚至没法亲口说出来。

original: Eris: Do you realize now, Tyrion?
translation: Eris: 现在懂了吧，提利昂？

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]Stop it...
translation: Tyrion: 闭、[p/][s/]闭嘴……

original: Eris: Celeste McCoy is the most important person in your life.
translation: Eris: 塞莱斯特·麦考伊是你最重要的人。

original: Eris: She was the last person you had that hadn't betrayed you.
translation: Eris: 也是你最想不到会背叛自己的人。

original: Eris: And she signed away [i]her[/i] soul to [i]me[/i]...[p/] All so that she could save [i]you[/i].
translation: Eris: <u>她</u>把灵魂交给了<u>我</u>……[p/]都是为了救<u>你</u>。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Eris: Why the somber look, Lucio?
translation: Eris: 别一脸阴沉呀，卢西奥。

original: Eris: Weren't you going to "execute" the Patron the [i]moment[/i] you knew who they were?
translation: Eris: 你不是说找到签约人就要<u>立刻</u>“处决”吗？

original: Lucio: ...McCoy.[p/] Does this mean what I think it means?
translation: Lucio: ……麦考伊。[p/]是我想的那个意思吗？

original: Celeste: ...Yes.
translation: Celeste: ……是的。

original: Celeste: [i]I'm[/i] the one who tricked Aria into signing that Blood Contract.
translation: Celeste: 就是<u>我</u>骗阿莉亚签了血契。

original: Tyrion: What?![p/][s/] How [i]could[/i] you?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！[p/][s/]你怎么<u>能</u>？！

original: Celeste: I was so stupid...[p/] When I made that deal with her,[p/] I didn't expect her to-
translation: Celeste: 我太蠢了……[p/]和她签约的时候，[p/]我不知道她会——

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Tyrion: ...She used that Contract to make you act against your will.
translation: Tyrion: ……她利用契约操控了你。

original: Rath: So it wasn't just Ms. Steelwind and Ms. Frega who were controlled that day...
translation: Rath: 所以那天被控制的不光是斯蒂尔文德女士和弗雷加女士……

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Eris: You realize it.[p/] Don't you, Lucio?
translation: Eris: 你也明白吧，[p/]卢西奥？

original: Eris: As long as the Contract with the Patron exists,[p/] your daughter will always be vulnerable to my influence.
translation: Eris: 只要与签约人的血契还在，[p/]你的女儿就一直可能被我控制。

original: Eris: You can't [i]kill[/i] me.[p/] So there's only one solution to free your daughter.
translation: Eris: 你没法<u>杀</u>我。[p/]就只剩一种解救女儿的方法了。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: I must execute Celeste McCoy.
translation: Lucio: 我必须处决塞莱斯特·麦考伊。

original: Tyrion: What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: Lucio: Understand one thing, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Lucio: 我只要你明白一点，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Lucio: After what you've done for my daughter,[p/] I have nothing but the utmost respect for you.
translation: Lucio: 你为我女儿尽心尽力，[p/]我现在对你只有无上尊敬。

original: Lucio: ...But I [i]will[/i] do whatever is necessary to protect her!
translation: Lucio: ……但我也<u>会</u>为了保护她不择手段！

original: Rath: Lucio![p/][s/] We can't act rashly!
translation: Rath: 卢西奥！[p/][s/]不能冲动！

original: Eris: I'll let you all in on a little demonic secret.
translation: Eris: 再给你们分享一个恶魔小秘密吧。

original: Eris: It doesn't matter if you confine her within a prison.
translation: Eris: 把她关在监狱里也没用。

original: Eris: The Patron will be able to take control of Aria,[p/] no matter where she is.
translation: Eris: 签约人依然可以控制阿莉亚，[p/]不管她人在何处。

original: Eris: But if you kill her,[p/] Aria will finally be free from my control.
translation: Eris: 只有杀了签约人，[p/]阿莉亚才能摆脱我的控制。

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Celeste: ...Do it.
translation: Celeste: ……动手吧。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Tyrion: What are you saying?!
translation: Tyrion: 你胡说什么？！

original: Celeste: I should have done this from the beginning...
translation: Celeste: 我最开始就该这么做……

original: Celeste: When I realized what happened,[p/] I should have just come forward and admitted to what I did.
translation: Celeste: 意识到发生什么之后，[p/]我就该投案自首，承认自己的所作所为。

original: Celeste: But I kept holding onto the hope that it was all some kind of trick.
translation: Celeste: 但我一直抱有一线希望，希望这都是什么骗局。

original: Celeste: I prayed and prayed for the Patron to be someone else.
translation: Celeste: 我一直在祈祷签约人另有其人。

original: Celeste: Tyrion.[p/] I was hoping [i]you'd[/i] find something that would prove that all of this [i]wasn't[/i] my fault.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂。[p/]我曾希望<u>你</u>能找出证据证明这些<u>不是</u>我的错。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: ...You've finally found the culprit you've been looking for.[p/] And it absolutely breaks your heart.
translation: ……你终于找到了苦苦寻找的幕后黑手。[p/]也因此心碎。

original: That nagging feeling you've been experiencing...[p/]
translation: 一直令你如芒在背的感觉……[p/]

original: It's because you subconsciously refused to believe that she would betray you like this.
translation: 就是因为你不愿相信她会这样背叛你。

original: Actually,[p/] it still hasn't gone away.
translation: 这么一说，[p/]那种感觉还没消失。

original: That uneasiness is still there.[p/] Are you still in denial...?
translation: 不安依然存在。[p/]难道只是你不愿承认事实……？

original: No...[p/] This is different.
translation: 不对……[p/]这不一样。

original: Lucio: ...I suppose there's no reason to continue with this.
translation: Lucio: ……没有理由继续审理了。

original: Tyrion: ...W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Tyrion: ……什、[p/][s/]什么？

original: Lucio: I sympathize with your position, Cuthbert.
translation: Lucio: 我同情你的处境，卡斯伯特。

original: Lucio: But even McCoy recognizes what must be done.
translation: Lucio: 但麦考伊自己也知道必须怎么做。

original: Lucio: ...It's over.[p/] And I will not allow this [i]demon[/i] to control my daughter any longer.
translation: Lucio: ……结束了。[p/]我不会允许这<u>恶魔</u>继续控制我的女儿。

original: Tyrion: Y-[p/][s/]You can't just-!
translation: Tyrion: 你、[p/][s/]你不能——！

original: Lucio: Kingsguard...[p/] Restrain him.
translation: Lucio: 国王卫队……[p/]控制住他。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Wait-!
translation: Tyrion: 等、[p/][s/]等等——！

original: Rath: Lucio!
translation: Rath: 卢西奥！

original: Aria: That's enough!
translation: Aria: 闹够了没有！

original: Aria: ...What kind of "court" is this?
translation: Aria: ……这算什么“法庭”？

original: To everyone's surprise,[p/] Aria leaped from the platforms above and landed right on the witness stand.
translation: 出乎所有人意料，[p/]阿莉亚一跃跳上了证人席。

original: She forcibly pushed Eris out of the way.[p/] Something that catches even [i]her[/i] off guard.
translation: 她强行把厄莉斯推开了。[p/]甚至出乎<u>恶魔</u>的意料。

original: Celeste: Aria...?
translation: Celeste: 阿莉亚……？

original: Celeste: I-[p/][s/]I'm so sorry,[p/] I-
translation: Celeste: ……我、[p/][s/]我很抱歉。[p/]我——

original: Aria: Celeste![p/] You are [i]innocent[/i] until you are proven guilty!
translation: Aria: 塞莱斯特！[p/]被证明有罪之前你都是<u>无辜</u>的！

original: Aria: I won't let anyone pass judgment on you until [i]that[/i] is unequivocally proven!
translation: Aria: 明确证实<u>这一点</u>之前，[p/]我不会让任何人对你下达判决！

original: Celeste: But...[p/] I-
translation: Celeste: 可是……[p/]我——

original: Celeste: Aria...[p/] I did this!
translation: Celeste: 阿莉亚……[p/]是我干的！

original: Lucio: Aria![p/][s/] What are you doing?!
translation: Lucio: 阿莉亚！[p/]你干什么？！

original: Aria: ...How [i]dare[/i] you, father?!
translation: Aria: ……父亲，你怎么<u>敢</u>？！

original: Lucio: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Lucio: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Aria: How could you possibly think that [i]you[/i] have the right to decide who lives and who dies?!
translation: Aria: 你凭什么觉得<u>自己</u>有生杀予夺的权力？！

original: Aria: If you were [i]actually[/i] a prosecutor,[p/][s/] I would file for your immediate disbarment!
translation: Aria: 如果你<u>是</u>个检察官，[p/][s/]我早就提交文件剥夺你的资格了！

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Aria: And [i]you[/i], Mr. Cuthbert![p/] How can you just stand there?!
translation: Aria: 还有<u>你</u>，卡斯伯特先生！[p/]怎么光傻站在那儿？！

original: Tyrion: ...M-[p/][s/]Me?!
translation: Tyrion: ……我、[p/][s/]我？！

original: Aria: You're Celeste's attorney![p/][s/] Isn't it [i]your[/i] job to defend her until her last breath?!
translation: Aria: 你是她的律师！[p/][s/]为她辩护到最后一刻是<u>你的</u>工作！

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Tyrion: ...I didn't see the truth because I didn't want to believe it.
translation: Tyrion: ……我因为不愿承认而逃避了真相。

original: Tyrion: I almost let it slip away because of my own personal feelings.[p/] I almost put you at risk.
translation: Tyrion: 我差点就因个人情感而与真相失之交臂。[p/]我让你也陷入危险。

original: Tyrion: ...As much as it pains me to do so,[p/] I need to approach this objectively.
translation: Tyrion: ……虽然让我痛苦，[p/]但我必须客观看待。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……

original: Aria: To [i]hell[/i] with that!
translation: Aria: 放屁！

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……啥？

original: Aria: Justice may be blind,[p/] but it's [i]not[/i] heartless!
translation: Aria: 正义可能是盲目的，[p/]但<u>不是</u>无情的！

original: Aria: I see it in her eyes whenever she's with you, Tyrion!
translation: Aria: 提利昂，她和你一起时的眼神不要太明显！

original: Aria: You mean the world to her![p/][s/] She consigned her very [i]soul[/i] to hell to protect you!
translation: Aria: 你就是她的全世界！[p/]她为了保护你能把<u>灵魂</u>献给地狱！

original: Aria: If you abandon her when she needs you most,[p/][s/] I will [i]never[/i] forgive you!
translation: Aria: 你要敢在她最需要你的时候撒手不管，[p/][s/]我<u>永远</u>不会原谅你！

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] I-
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]我——

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Celeste...[p/] Can you testify about what happened?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……[p/]能不能就发生的事情作证？

original: Celeste: What...?[p/] But-
translation: Celeste: 什么……？[p/]但是——

original: Tyrion: ...Aria is right.
translation: Tyrion: ……阿莉亚说得对。

original: Tyrion: We need to do this properly.
translation: Tyrion: 我们得按程序行事。

original: Rath: ...I agree.[p/] And I will [i]not[/i] pass judgment until we have determined exactly what happened.
translation: Rath: ……我同意。[p/]在弄清楚来龙去脉之前，我都<u>不会</u>下达判决。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: It's obvious he wants to be done with this as soon as possible.
translation: 卢西奥明显想要速战速决。

original: But even if he controls the Kingsguard,[p/] the rest of the room is clearly against him.
translation: 但即使他能控制国王卫队，[p/]其他人也明显不会同意。

original: Lucio: ...Fine.[p/] Do as you wish.
translation: Lucio: ……好吧。[p/]随你便。

original: Lucio: But the moment we're certain of the truth,[p/] I [i]will[/i] do what is necessary.
translation: Lucio: 但确定真相时，我<u>会</u>采取必要的行动。

original: Rath: ...Very well.
translation: Rath: ……很好。

original: Rath: Ms. McCoy.[p/] Please take the stand.
translation: Rath: 麦考伊女士。[p/]请上证人席。

original: Tyrion: Celeste...
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……

original: Celeste: Tyrion, I-
translation: Celeste: 提利昂，我——

original: Tyrion: ...Can you testify about what you did that day?
translation: Tyrion: ……能不能就你那天做的事作证？

original: Celeste: ...Y-[p/][s/]Yeah.
translation: Celeste: ……好、[p/][s/]好的。

original: Celeste: The truth is that Eris rewrote your memories, Tyrion.[p/] You were actually knocked out at 1:45 PM.
translation: Celeste: 真相是厄莉斯修改了你的记忆，提利昂。[p/]你实际上在下午 1:45 昏迷。

original: Celeste: We went to the Prayer Room a lot earlier for our meeting,[p/] and that commotion we heard was actually Beatrice and Eris attacking the guards at 1:40 PM.
translation: Celeste: 我们进祷告室的时间远比会面早，[p/]听到的骚乱声其实是下午 1:40 比亚特丽丝和厄莉斯在攻击卫兵。

original: Celeste: They tricked me and slipped into the Prayer Room...[p/] After that,[p/] Beatrice...[p/] killed you.
translation: Celeste: 她们骗过我进了祷告室……[p/]这之后，[p/]比亚特丽丝……[p/]杀害了你。

original: Celeste: I didn't know what to do.[p/] That's when Eris told me she would resurrect you in exchange for killing Pierce.
translation: Celeste: 我不知道怎么办。[p/]这时厄莉斯跟我说，她能复活你，但我要杀掉皮尔斯。

original: Celeste: I know I shouldn't have done it.[p/] But I just wanted you back...[p/] I didn't care about what happened to me.
translation: Celeste: 我知道自己不应该这么做。[p/]但我只想让你回来……[p/]我不在乎自己会变成什么样。

original: Celeste: I didn't realize that she'd use "my eternal servitude" to take control of my body.[p/] She used me to trick Aria into signing [i]another[/i] Blood Contract.
translation: Celeste: 我没想到她会利用“永世服从”这点来操控我。[p/]她利用我骗阿莉亚签了<u>另一份</u>血契。

original: Celeste: After that...[p/] I followed through with [i]my[/i] end of the deal.[p/] I killed Pierce so that she would bring Tyrion back.
translation: Celeste: 在这之后……[p/]我按照契约里对<u>我</u>的要求行动。[p/]为了让提利昂复活，我杀了皮尔斯。

original: That nagging feeling is still there.
translation: 那种如芒在背的感觉还在。

original: There's something off about her testimony.
translation: 她的证言里有什么不对劲。

original: Lucio: Well?[p/] On with it, then.
translation: Lucio: 好了吧？[p/]赶紧的。

original: Lucio: Begin your cross-examination, Cuthbert.
translation: Lucio: 开始交叉询问吧，卡斯伯特。

original: Tyrion: ...Gladly.
translation: Tyrion: ……乐意之至。

original: Tyrion: ...She [i]rewrote[/i] my memories?
translation: Tyrion: ……她<u>修改</u>了我的记忆？

original: Celeste: I didn't realize it until [i]after[/i] you woke up and gave your statement to the Inquisition.
translation: Celeste: 你醒来并对裁判所提供证言<u>以后</u>，我才意识到这一点。

original: Celeste: She must've changed your memories when she resurrected you.
translation: Celeste: 她肯定在复活你时修改了你的记忆。

original: Eris has the power to take control of people against their will.
translation: 厄莉斯确实有能力操控别人。

original: And she clearly has the power to bring people back from the dead...
translation: 也有让人死而复生的力量……

original: But if that's true,[p/] you can't even trust your [i]own[/i] memories.
translation: 但如果这是真的，[p/]那你连<u>自己的</u>记忆都不能信。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] I suppose you didn't have control of Aria until then.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]看来你直到那时都不能操控阿莉亚。

original: Tyrion: Does that mean you never even fought her?
translation: Tyrion: 所以你根本没和她打过？

original: Celeste: I'm sorry for lying...[p/] But I had to create an alibi.
translation: Celeste: 说了谎很抱歉……[p/]但我必须有不在场证明。

original: Tyrion: Celeste![p/][s/] The Inquisition arrested her because of [i]your[/i] testimony!
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特！[p/][s/]裁判所是因为<u>你的</u>证言才逮捕了她！

original: Rath: ...The testimonies of Prince Alaric and the High Speaker also implicated her.
translation: Rath: ……阿拉里克王子和大主教的证言也都指向她。

original: Rath: Ms. Steelwind also already knew she was compromised due to finding the Purple Mark in her pocket.
translation: Rath: 斯蒂尔文德女士也知道自己口袋里发现的紫色标记很可疑。

original: Rath: I'm sure things would have ended the same,[p/] regardless of her testimony.
translation: Rath: 不管有没有麦考伊的证言，[p/]事情走向都不会变。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: What did Frega and that demon do when you found them, McCoy?
translation: Lucio: 麦考伊，你发现她们的时候，弗雷加和恶魔在干什么？

original: Tyrion: How did they trick you so easily?
translation: Tyrion: 她们怎么能这么轻易骗过你？

original: Celeste: When I went to see what was going on,[p/] I only saw Eris and Beatrice standing over the guards' bodies.
translation: Celeste: 我出去看怎么回事的时候，[p/]只看到比亚特丽丝和厄莉斯站在倒下的卫兵旁边。

original: Celeste: They acted like someone [i]else[/i] had killed them.
translation: Celeste: 她们表现得像是凶手<u>另有其人</u>。

original: Celeste: Then they lied to me and said that they wanted to go into the Prayer Room for protection.
translation: Celeste: 然后他们谎称进祷告室是要保护里面的人。

original: Celeste: That's when Beatrice...[p/] She...
translation: Celeste: 比亚特丽丝……[p/]就是这时……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: How did Beatrice kill me?
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝怎么杀的我？

original: Celeste: She hit you with some kind of [b]necromancy[/b] spell,[p/] but it didn't visibly wound you.
translation: Celeste: 她对你用了某种[b]死灵术[/b]，[p/]但没有造成外伤。

original: Celeste: When I checked your body,[p/] it was already cold...[p/] Your heart was stopped.
translation: Celeste: 我检查时，[p/]你的尸体已经变冷……[p/]心跳也停止了。

original: Celeste: I think she used [b]Necrotic Blight[/b].
translation: Celeste: 我认为她用了[b]索命咒[/b]。

original: Tyrion: So [i]that's[/i] why Lord Asclepius said that I had traces of [b]necromancy[/b] on me.
translation: Tyrion: <u>所以</u>阿斯克勒庇俄斯勋爵会说我身上有[b]死灵术[/b]的痕迹。

original: She must have lied about trying to heal you as well.
translation: 她说尝试治疗你肯定也是撒谎。

original: Tyrion: ...What did you do after I died?
translation: Tyrion: ……我死后你做了什么？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: ...I'm sure that was her goal from the very beginning.
translation: Tyrion: ……我不觉得她一开始就是这个目的。

original: Tyrion: She wanted you to make a deal with her.[p/] It was all so she could make [i]me[/i] suffer.
translation: Tyrion: 她想让你和她签约。[p/]这一切都是为了让<u>我</u>痛苦。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] I'm so-!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]我真的——！

original: Tyrion: Stop.
translation: Tyrion: 别说了。

original: Tyrion: Just...[p/] Don't.
translation: Tyrion: 不要……[p/]说了。

original: Celeste: I...
translation: Celeste: 我……

original: Tyrion: How could you [i]possibly[/i] think that was okay?!
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么<u>能</u>觉得这样没问题？！

original: Celeste: I knew it was wrong...[p/] But I just couldn't...
translation: Celeste: 我知道自己不对……[p/]但我没办法……

original: Celeste: I'm sorry.[p/] I didn't know what to do.
translation: Celeste: 对不起。[p/]我不知道怎么办。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Rath: There's no sense in admonishing her now, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Rath: 现在不是谴责她的时候，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Rath: ...There will be plenty of time for that later.
translation: Rath: ……之后还有很多时间。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] That part [i]was[/i] written in a slightly misleading way.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]这一部分<u>确实</u>写得有点让人误会。

original: Lucio: She must've thought that the Empress would whisk her away to serve her in hell.
translation: Lucio: 她肯定以为女皇会把她召入地狱当仆从。

original: Lucio: But instead she took control of her immediately after.
translation: Lucio: 但恶魔却选择立刻操控麦考伊。

original: Lucio: ...You should have known better than to trust a demon.
translation: Lucio: ……你不该相信恶魔的。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Anyways,[p/] how did you trick Aria into signing that Blood Contract?
translation: Tyrion: ……总之，[p/]你是怎么骗阿莉亚签约血契的？

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] I didn't have full control of my actions.[p/] But I remember what happened.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]我没法控制自己的行动。[p/]但我记得发生了什么。

original: Celeste: She probably [i]wanted[/i] me to watch what she was using me to do.
translation: Celeste: 她可能<u>想</u>让我亲眼看到自己做了什么。

original: Celeste: I-[p/][s/]I'm...[p/][s/] I'm so sorry...
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/][s/]我真的……[p/][s/]真的很抱歉……

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Celeste: I told Aria that Pierce was demanding a plea deal in exchange for telling me who my parents were.
translation: Celeste: 我对阿莉亚说皮尔斯愿意用我父母的信息换取减刑。

original: Celeste: Eris made Beatrice put an [b]illusion[/b] over the Contract to make it look like a request for an appeal.
translation: Celeste: 厄莉斯让比亚特丽丝对契约施加了[b]幻象术[/b]，让内容看起来像是要求上诉。

original: Celeste: ...And since Pierce was convicted for killing my father,[p/] she respected my wishes.
translation: Celeste: ……由于皮尔斯被控杀害我的父亲，[p/]她尊重我的意愿。

original: ...Wait.[p/] Something about what she said sounds fundamentally wrong.
translation: ……等等。[p/]她刚才说的有什么根本上的错误。

original: Tyrion: That's not...
translation: Tyrion: 这不是……

original: Tyrion: How could you think I'd [i]ever[/i] want that, Celeste?!
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么能觉得我<u>会</u>接受这种事，塞莱斯特？！

original: Celeste: I knew you wouldn't want this.[p/][s/] But it just wasn't fair!
translation: Celeste: 我知道你不会。[p/][s/]但这不公平！

original: Celeste: Why should a person like [i]him[/i] get to live instead of you?
translation: Celeste: 为什么<u>那种人</u>可以活着而你非死不可？

original: Celeste: ...It was an easy choice.
translation: Celeste: ……并不是什么艰难抉择。

original: Tyrion: That...[p/] goes against [i]everything[/i] I stand for!
translation: Tyrion: 这……[p/]这和我的<u>原则</u>相悖啊！

original: Celeste: I know...[p/] And I don't care if you hate me after this!
translation: Celeste: 我知道……[p/]我不在乎之后你会多么恨我！

original: Celeste: But even now...[p/][s/] I would [i]still[/i] make that same choice!
translation: Celeste: 但即使现在……[p/][s/]我<u>还是</u>会做出一样的选择！

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I don't hate...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/]我不恨……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Rath: ...Perhaps we should stay focused on what happened for now.
translation: Rath: ……也许我们应该专注于现在讨论的内容。

original: She's clearly sincere.[p/] She wouldn't intentionally lie about something like this.
translation: 她的话没有掺假。[p/]她不会在这方面撒谎的。

original: But why do you feel like something she said doesn't match up with the evidence you have?
translation: 但你为什么总觉得她的话与证据不一致？

original: You'll need to examine her statements more closely.
translation: 最好仔细检查她的证言。

original: Tyrion: Celeste![p/][s/] Your testimony contradicts the evidence and [i]this[/i] proves it!
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特！[p/][s/]你的证言和<u>这项</u>证据不符！

original: Celeste: ...I'm sorry,[p/] but I don't really see how that proves anything.
translation: Celeste: ……对不起，[p/]但我看不出哪里不符。

original: Tyrion: Oh...[p/] I suppose you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 噢……[p/]你说得没错。

original: Your conflicting emotions must be throwing you off.
translation: 矛盾的情感让你慌乱了。

original: Tyrion: Celeste.[p/] According to you,[p/] we heard a commotion at 1:40PM.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特。[p/]据你所言，[p/]我们是在下午 1:40 听到骚乱。

original: Tyrion: You went out to investigate,[p/] and [i]that's[/i] when you saw Eris and Beatrice.
translation: Tyrion: 你出门察看，[p/]也是在<u>此时</u>见到比亚特丽丝和厄莉斯。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] I lied all about my fight against Aria.
translation: Celeste: 没错……[p/]与阿莉亚搏斗是我撒的谎。

original: Celeste: I never even fought her.
translation: Celeste: 我们根本没打过。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: If that's true,[p/] how do you explain that discrepancy?
translation: 如果此言非虚，[p/]该怎么解释这个矛盾？

original: You can't trust your own memories...[p/] But Laefe shouldn't have been affected.
translation: 你不能相信自己的记忆……[p/]但拉菲不应该被影响。

original: Tyrion: The thing is, Celeste,[p/] something about your timeline doesn't match the evidence.
translation: Tyrion: 是这样的，塞莱斯特。[p/]你所述时间线某一部分与证据不一致。

original: Celeste: Really?[p/] But I was pretty sure of the time.
translation: Celeste: 真的？[p/]可我还挺确定时间点的。

original: Celeste: We were supposed to be at the meeting at 1:45 PM.
translation: Celeste: 我们理应下午 1:45 去会面。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/][s/] What did you just say?!
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/][s/]你刚说什么？！

original: Celeste: Our meeting with Pierce was scheduled for 1:45 PM, right?
translation: Celeste: 我们要在下午 1:45 和皮尔斯会面，不是吗？

original: Rath: ...What's wrong, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Rath: ……怎么了，卡斯伯特先生？

original: Tyrion: Celeste...[p/] There's something fundamentally off about your testimony.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……[p/]你的证言在根本上有奇怪的地方。

original: Celeste: What?![p/][s/] But I swear I'm not lying!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！[p/][s/]但我发誓没有说谎！

original: Tyrion: Your timeline of what happened is completely off.
translation: Tyrion: 你证言里的时间线完全错位了。

original: Tyrion: A lot of your testimony doesn't match with what we've learned thus far.
translation: Tyrion: 很多证言都和我们目前了解到的不一致。

original: Tyrion: Firstly,[p/] it's about the exact time you saw Eris and Beatrice.
translation: Tyrion: 首先，[p/]关于你遇见比亚特丽丝和厄莉斯的具体时间。

original: Tyrion: According to you,[p/] you saw them at 1:40 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 据你所说，[p/]你看到她们是在下午 1:40。

original: Tyrion: But Laefe,[p/] Miriam,[p/] and Asclepius didn't lose track of them until 2:00 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 但是拉菲，[p/]米莉亚姆，[p/]阿斯克勒庇俄斯下午 2:00 之前都和她们在一起。

original: Celeste: What...?[p/] When did they say that?
translation: Celeste: 什么……？[p/]她们什么时候说的？

original: Tyrion: What are you talking about?
translation: Tyrion: 你在说什么？

original: Tyrion: You were [i]there[/i] with me when we spoke to them.
translation: Tyrion: 我和她们交谈时你也<u>在场</u>。

original: Celeste: I know![p/] I was paying really close attention!
translation: Celeste: 我知道！[p/]我注意听了！

original: Celeste: I needed to see how close you were to finding me out...
translation: Celeste: 我得注意你有多接近关于我的真相……

original: Celeste: So, why can't I remember...?
translation: Celeste: 那我为什么记不起来……？

original: She "[i]can't[/i] remember"?
translation: 她“记<u>不</u>起来”？

original: Lucio: Cuthbert.[p/] Judging by what happened to you,[p/] Eris Illmater clearly doesn't need a Contract to affect people's memories.
translation: Lucio: 卡斯伯特。[p/]根据你的经历来看，[p/]厄莉斯·伊尔马特不需要契约也能修改别人的记忆。

original: Lucio: It's possible she changed the memories of Laefe Frega and her entourage.
translation: Lucio: 拉菲·弗雷加和同伴的记忆可能也会遭殃。

original: Tyrion: It's not just that, Lucio.
translation: Tyrion: 不只这个问题，卢西奥。

original: Tyrion: There's something else that Celeste is clearly remembering differently that contradicts a [i]physical[/i] piece of evidence.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特的记忆里还有明显与某件<u>物证</u>不一致的地方。

original: No...[p/] Celeste said something earlier.
translation: 不对……[p/]塞莱斯特之前说了什么。

original: She said that you arrived at the meeting much earlier than you remember.
translation: 她口中你到达现场的时间比你记忆中的早。

original: And that contradicts a [i]physical[/i] piece of evidence that you have.
translation: 这和你手里某件<u>物证</u>不符。

original: Tyrion: Celeste![p/][s/] This letter from Garrick Pierce told us to meet him in the Prayer Room at [i]2:00[/i]PM.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特！[p/][s/]这封信里提到，加里克·皮尔斯要我们和他下午 <u>2:00</u> 在祷告室见面。

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: Eris may have changed [i]my[/i] memories,[p/][s/] but changing a physical piece of evidence is a different thing entirely!
translation: Tyrion: 可能厄莉斯改变过<u>我的</u>记忆，[p/][s/]但这跟改变一件物证可不一样！

original: Lucio: But we don't know the full extent of her capabilities.[p/] Can we really rule that out?
translation: Lucio: 可我们还不清楚她的所有能力。[p/]真的能排除这个可能性吗？

original: Lucio: You were unconscious.[p/] Illmater had plenty of time to access your body [i]and[/i] your belongings.
translation: Lucio: 你当时失去了意识。[p/]伊尔马特有充足的时间修改记忆<u>并</u>浏览你的随身物品。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: At this point,[p/] [i]anything[/i] is possible.[p/] And Eris is far too unpredictable to say for sure.
translation: 到了这个时候，<u>一切</u>都有可能。[p/]厄莉斯更是难以揣测。

original: But if Lucio is right,[p/] Eris could have gone around doing whatever she wanted.
translation: 但如果卢西奥是对的，[p/]那厄莉斯当时明明可以为所欲为。

original: She could've wiped the memories of every witness who saw the crimes.[p/] And she could've manipulated the crime scenes however she wished.
translation: 她本可以消除所有目击证人的记忆，[p/]随心所欲改变犯罪现场。

original: But if she had done so,[p/] there would've been logical inconsistencies.
translation: 但如果她这么做了，[p/]就会留下自相矛盾的地方。

original: Until Celeste was revealed as the Patron,[p/] every piece of evidence you've found or deduced has been logically consistent.
translation: 直到签约人的身份揭晓是塞莱斯特之前，[p/]你找到或推断出的证据都是逻辑自洽的。

original: The contradictions in what Celeste is saying could be explained by Eris changing several elements of the crime.
translation: 塞莱斯特证言中的矛盾也许可以被解释为厄莉斯动的手脚。

original: ...But there's a far simpler explanation.
translation: ……但还有更简单的答案。

original: No...[p/] It's possible that Eris is some kind of omnipresent being that can actually change details on a whim.
translation: 不对……虽然厄莉斯或许会无所不能到吹口气就能改变世界。

original: But there's a far simpler explanation.
translation: 但还有更简单的解释。

original: Tyrion: Celeste.[p/] Eris currently has your "eternal servitude".
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特。[p/]你目前“永世服从”于厄莉斯。

original: Tyrion: If she could manipulate my memories,[p/] what's to say that she's not manipulating [i]your[/i] memories right now?!
translation: Tyrion: 如果她能改变我的记忆，[p/]那<u>你的</u>记忆也不保证安然无恙吧？！

original: Celeste: I...[p/] [i]guess[/i] that's possible.
translation: Celeste: 我……[p/]<u>猜</u>有可能。

original: Celeste: But why would she even bother doing that?
translation: Celeste: 但她有什么必要这么做？

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Tyrion: ...She wouldn't [i]need[/i] to do that unless she still had something to hide.
translation: Tyrion: ……除非是想隐藏什么，不然她没有<u>必要</u>这么做。

original: Lucio: Are you serious?![p/][s/] What more is there left for her [i]to[/i] hide?!
translation: Lucio: 你认真的？！[p/][s/]还能有什么她<u>要</u>隐藏的事？！

original: Tyrion: ...Whatever it is,[p/] it was important enough to make drastic changes to Celeste's memories.
translation: Tyrion: ……不管是什么，[p/]都是重要到值得她大幅改变塞莱斯特记忆的事。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/]
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]

original: Tyrion: If [i]that's[/i] true,[p/] that means Celeste's [i]true[/i] memories will tell us exactly what we need to know.
translation: Tyrion: 如果真的是<u>这样</u>，塞莱斯特<u>真正</u>的记忆里一定有我们需要的东西。

original: Celeste: B-[p/][s/]But,[p/] even if you're right...
translation: Celeste: 但、[p/][s/]但是，[p/]就算你说得没错……

original: Celeste: I can't remember what really happened.[p/] She has full control of my mind.
translation: Celeste: 我也想不起来真正发生的事。[p/]她能完全控制我的意识。

original: Tyrion: That doesn't matter.[p/] It's just like [i]every[/i] cross-examination we've ever done.
translation: Tyrion: 这没关系。[p/]就和之前我们经历的<u>每次</u>交叉询问一样。

original: Tyrion: If you keep testifying,[p/] she'll keep changing your memories to tell more lies.
translation: Tyrion: 如果你继续作证，[p/]她就不得不修改你的记忆，编造更多谎言。

original: Tyrion: If we keep pointing them out,[p/] we'll eventually arrive at the truth.
translation: Tyrion: 只要继续指出谎言，[p/]我们最终一定能到达真相。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: ……塞莱斯特？

original: Celeste: *sigh*[p/] It's really obnoxious how resilient you are.
translation: Celeste: *叹气* [p/]你这种坚韧真是让人恶心。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Celeste: Why can't you all just give up already?
translation: Celeste: 你们为什么就不放弃呢？

original: Tyrion: Eris?![p/][s/] Is that you?!
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯？！[p/][s/]是你在说话？！

original: Tyrion: What are you-?!
translation: Tyrion: 你想干什——？！

original: Celeste: Unfortunately,[p/] your little interrogation ends here.
translation: Celeste: 很不幸，[p/]你的询问环节到此为止。

original: Lucio: Kingsguard![p/][s/] What are you doing?!
translation: Lucio: 国王卫队！[p/][s/]还等什么？！

original: Lucio: Destroy Illmater's body!
translation: Lucio: 摧毁伊尔马特的身体！

original: Celeste: Too late, Lucio.
translation: Celeste: 太晚了，卢西奥。

original: Celeste: I win.
translation: Celeste: 我赢了。

original: Tyrion: C-[p/][s/]Celeste?!
translation: Tyrion: 塞、[p/][s/]塞莱斯特？！

original: Lucio: ...Damn it!
translation: Lucio: ……该死！

original: Tyrion: Eris![p/][s/] What did you do to her?!
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯！[p/][s/]你把她怎么了？！

original: Eris: I put her to sleep.[p/] Just as I did with Beatrice.
translation: Eris: 我让她睡着了。[p/]就像对比亚特丽丝那样。

original: Tyrion: You...!
translation: Tyrion: 你……！

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: ...Why would you do such a thing, Illmater?
translation: Lucio: ……为什么这么做，伊尔马特？

original: Eris: What do you mean?!
translation: Eris: 什么意思？！

original: Eris: I did it for the same reason I do anything!
translation: Eris: 当然和我做其他事一个理由！

original: Eris: What would make Tyrion suffer more than putting his love in an eternal sleep?
translation: Eris: 有什么比所爱陷入永眠更能让提利昂痛苦的事？

original: Tyrion: ...If you wanted that,[p/] you would have just done that from the beginning.
translation: Tyrion: ……如果这就是你的目的，[p/]一开始你就会这么干了。

original: Tyrion: You're [i]hiding[/i] something![p/][s/] I know it!
translation: Tyrion: 你在<u>隐藏</u>什么事！[p/][s/]我知道！

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Lucio: Damn it![p/][s/] We can't extract any information from her like this!
translation: Lucio: 该死！[p/][s/]这样我们根本没法从她那里获取信息！

original: Lucio: The only person who can tell us what we need to know...
translation: Lucio: 唯一能给出我们需要的证言的人……

original: Tyrion: ...Is Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: ……就是塞莱斯特。

original: Eris: Well...[p/] Good luck getting [i]anything[/i] out of her like this.
translation: Eris: 那么……[p/]希望你们运气好到能从现在的她那里获得<u>证言</u>。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ever since you discovered the truth about what she did,[p/] one possibility has been floating around your mind.
translation: 自从你发现她实际做了什么之后，[p/]一种可能性就一直徘徊在你脑海中。

original: But is it even possible?
translation: 但这真的可能吗？

original: No...[p/] It doesn't matter if it's possible.
translation: 不……[p/]可不可能都无所谓。

original: Tyrion: ...Eris Illmater.
translation: Tyrion: ……厄莉斯·伊尔马特。

original: Eris: What is it?
translation: Eris: 什么事？

original: Tyrion: What would happen if I nullified Celeste's Blood Contract?
translation: Tyrion: 如果我让塞莱斯特的血契无效化会怎么样？

original: Eris: ...Assuming there's [i]anything[/i] to even dispute,[p/] [i]everything[/i] granted by the Contract would be reversed.
translation: Eris: ……假设这里还有提出异议的<u>余地</u>，[p/]契约里的一切保证都会被撤销。

original: Eris: And I don't think you fully [i]understand[/i] what that means.
translation: Eris: 我觉得你没有<u>明白</u>这代表什么。

original: Tyrion: Lucio...
translation: Tyrion: 卢西奥……

original: Lucio: ...What is it?
translation: Lucio: ……什么事？

original: Tyrion: Your men know where Ruby Tymora's law office is, right?
translation: Tyrion: 你的人知道鲁比·泰摩拉法律事务所在哪里吧？

original: Lucio: They [i]do[/i]...
translation: Lucio: 他们<u>知道</u>……

original: Lucio: Where are you going with this...?
translation: Lucio: 你什么打算……？

original: Tyrion: You'll need an attorney to cross-examine Celeste's testimony.
translation: Tyrion: 你需要一个律师来交叉询问塞莱斯特。

original: Tyrion: She owes me...[p/] And she'll be able to finish this on my behalf.
translation: Tyrion: 她欠我的……[p/]她也能代表我结束这些。

original: Eris: Wait...
translation: Eris: 等等……

original: Tyrion: And tell her...[p/] I'm sorry I couldn't keep my promise.
translation: Tyrion: 告诉她……[p/]抱歉我没法信守承诺。

original: Eris: You're not...[p/] [i]serious[/i], are you?!
translation: Eris: 你不是……[p/]<u>认真的</u>吧？！

original: Eris: I am one of the eldest evils that's ever lived.[p/] I-[p/][s/]I would [i]never[/i] create a faulty contract!
translation: Eris: 我可是至今最古老的恶魔之一。[p/]我、[p/][s/]我<u>绝对</u>不会创造有漏洞的契约！

original: Tyrion: Eris Illmater![p/][s/] Empress of Discord!
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯·伊尔马特！[p/][s/]无序女皇！

original: Eris: W-[p/][s/]Wait...[p/] You know I can't speak lies, correct?!
translation: Eris: 等、[p/][s/]等等……[p/]你知道我不会说谎的吧？！

original: Tyrion: By the Eye of Horus,[p/][s/] I demand the opportunity to dispute Celeste McCoy's Blood Contract!
translation: Tyrion: 借荷鲁斯之眼之力，[p/][s/]我要求机会对塞莱斯特·麦考伊的血契提出异议！

original: Eris: I-[p/][s/]I'll state it plainly, then![p/][s/] There will be no room for doubt!
translation: Eris: 我、[p/][s/]我坦白跟你讲吧！[p/][s/]没有质疑的余地！

original: Tyrion: ...I don't care.
translation: Tyrion: ……我不在乎。

original: Eris: What?!
translation: Eris: 什么？！

original: Tyrion: Celeste sacrificed her life to save mine.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特可以为了救我牺牲自己。

original: Tyrion: How could I ever face her again if I didn't do the same for her?
translation: Tyrion: 如果做不到一样的事，我还有脸见她吗？

original: Eris: You're insane!
translation: Eris: 你疯了吧！

original: Eris: You're just risking [i]death[/i] for nothing!
translation: Eris: 你的<u>死亡</u>会毫无意义！

original: Rath: ...Why are you so nervous?
translation: Rath: ……你为什么这么紧张？

original: Tyrion: Maybe this [i]is[/i] pointless...[p/] But I will [i]never[/i] stop fighting for her.
translation: Tyrion: 也许<u>确实</u>毫无意义……[p/]但我<u>不会</u>停止为她而战。

original: Eris: ...S-[p/][s/]Stop this!
translation: Eris: ……停、[p/][s/]停下！

original: Tyrion: I can't help myself.
translation: Tyrion: 我不停。

original: Tyrion: I'm only human, after all.
translation: Tyrion: 毕竟我只是个人类。

original: Once you pass this point,[p/] you will not be able to SAVE your game for a while.
translation: 在这之后，[p/]你会有一段时间无法保存游戏。

original: It is recommended that you make a SAVE FILE now.
translation: 推荐现在保存游戏。

original: Rath: Ms. McCoy,[p/] could you try to remember what happened during your...[p/] [i]business[/i] with the Empress of Discord?
translation: Rath: 麦考伊女士，[p/]能不能回忆一下，你和无序女皇……[p/]<u>交易</u>时发生的事？

original: Celeste: ...I'll try my best.
translation: Celeste: ……我会尽力的。

original: Celeste: I think I remember now.[p/] We went to meet with Pierce at 1:50 PM.[p/] And we heard that commotion outside at 2:20 PM.
translation: Celeste: 现在我想起来了。[p/]我们下午 1:50 去和皮尔斯见面。[p/]下午 2:20 听到外面的骚乱。

original: Celeste: I saw Aria attacking the guards there.[p/] And I fought her for about fifteen minutes before she broke past me.
translation: Celeste: 我看见阿莉亚在攻击卫兵。[p/]我和她打了大概 15 分钟，才被她逃走。

original: Celeste: When I followed her into the Prayer Room,[p/] I found her there with Beatrice and Eris.[p/] They knocked Aria,[p/] Tyrion,[p/] and Pierce unconscious.
translation: Celeste: 跟着她进入祷告室后，[p/]我发现比亚特丽丝和厄莉斯也在屋内。[p/]她们使阿莉亚、[p/]提利昂，[p/]还有皮尔斯失去了意识。

original: Celeste: ...I checked Tyrion's body and thought he was dead.[p/] But I realize now that Beatrice just cast [b]Feign Death[/b] on him.
translation: Celeste: ……我检查了提利昂，认为他死了。[p/]但现在想想，比亚特丽丝可能对他用了[b]假死[/b]。

original: Celeste: Anyways,[p/] Eris offered her deal to me.[p/] But I couldn't go through with killing Pierce...[p/] I think you know the rest.
translation: Celeste: 总之，[p/]厄莉斯向我提出交易。[p/]但我没法下手杀皮尔斯……[p/]后面的你们都知道了。

original: Celeste: A few minutes after Pierce died,[p/] Aster,[p/] the Inquisition,[p/] and the Kingsguard showed up to arrest Aria.
translation: Celeste: 皮尔斯死亡几分钟后，[p/]阿斯特、[p/]裁判所和国王卫队到场逮捕阿莉亚。

original: Lucio: Aside from your conversation with Illmater...[p/] That seems to match up with what we already knew.
translation: Lucio: 除开你和伊尔马特的对话……[p/]似乎都和我们已知的事情一致。

original: Rath: Hm...[p/] It appears we'll simply need to wait for Celeste's memories to return.
translation: Rath: 唔……[p/]看起来我们只需等待塞莱斯特恢复记忆。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: He's clearly not okay with leaving his daughter vulnerable until then.
translation: 他明显不愿意继续让自己的女儿陷身险境。

original: Tyrion: Even if there's nothing [i]apparently[/i] significant,[p/] I'd still like to cross-examine her.
translation: Tyrion: 即使<u>看起来</u>没什么重要的事，[p/]我还是希望进行交叉询问。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] Go ahead, then.
translation: Lucio: 唔……[p/]那你开始吧。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] We now know for certain that the meeting [i]was[/i] at 2:00 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 没错……[p/]我们已经确认会面时间<u>是</u>下午 2:00。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] She only changed my memories so she could trick all of us.
translation: Celeste: 对……[p/]她只改变了我的记忆，借此骗过所有人。

original: Tyrion: Considering that [i]my[/i] memories were intact,[p/] she must have not had the power to change them.
translation: Tyrion: 考虑到<u>我的</u>记忆完好无缺，[p/]她的力量肯定无法改变别人的记忆。

original: Lucio: Yes...[p/] She never actually used her demonic powers to revive you.
translation: Lucio: 是的……[p/]她也没有用自己的恶魔之力复活你。

original: Lucio: She merely had Beatrice release the [b]Feign Death[/b] spell that [i]she[/i] originally cast.
translation: Lucio: 她只是操控比亚特丽丝用了[b]假死[/b]法术。

original: Celeste: ...I still can't believe I fell for that.
translation: Celeste: ……不敢相信我会被这骗了。

original: Tyrion: Anyways...[p/] Who did you see attacking the guards?[p/] Was it Aria or Beatrice?
translation: Tyrion: 总之……[p/]你看到谁在攻击卫兵？[p/]是阿莉亚还是比亚特丽丝？

original: Tyrion: Originally,[p/] you said that you fought her for a [i]lot[/i] longer.
translation: Tyrion: 一开始，[p/]你口中自己和她搏斗的时间长得<u>多</u>。

original: Celeste: Yeah.[p/] I had to account for the time I spent speaking to Eris.
translation: Celeste: 是的。[p/]我必须把自己和厄莉斯交谈的时间也算在内。

original: Lucio: I had a [i]feeling[/i] something was off about that.
translation: Lucio: 我就<u>感觉</u>哪里不对。

original: Celeste: I knew Tyrion would be really meticulous about the timeline of the murder.
translation: Celeste: 我知道提利昂会很关注谋杀时间线的细节。

original: Celeste: So I had to make my testimony match up with the time of Pierce's death.
translation: Celeste: 所以我必须让自己的证言和皮尔斯死亡时间一致。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Celeste: ...I'm [i]really[/i] sorry.
translation: Celeste: ……我<u>真的</u>很抱歉。

original: Tyrion: ...We'll talk about this later.
translation: Tyrion: ……这个我们之后谈。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: So we [i]weren't[/i] wrong about Beatrice sneaking past you during your fight.
translation: Tyrion: 所以比亚特丽丝在你们搏斗时偷偷溜进去这点<u>没错</u>。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] Now that I look back on it,[p/] it was probably a distraction so Beatrice could sneak past me.
translation: Celeste: 对……[p/]现在想想，[p/]可能就是为了转移我的注意，方便比亚特丽丝潜入。

original: Tyrion: Hm...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……

original: Lucio: What is it, Cuthbert?
translation: Lucio: 怎么了，卡斯伯特？

original: Tyrion: If the Patron was working [i]together[/i] with Eris,[p/] why would Eris use Beatrice to knock out Aria?
translation: Tyrion: 如果签约人在和厄莉斯<u>合作</u>，为什么不让厄莉斯操控比亚特丽丝使阿莉亚昏迷？

original: Celeste: I never thought of that...
translation: Celeste: 我没考虑过这点……

original: Lucio: ...Frankly,[p/] I find it hard to believe that the Patron willingly went along with the Empress's convoluted plan.
translation: Lucio: ……说实话，[p/]我很难相信签约人会乐意遵照女皇复杂的计划。

original: Lucio: They clearly [i]needed[/i] Pierce to die.[p/] And relying on McCoy to do it seems foolhardy.
translation: Lucio: 签约人明显<u>需要</u>皮尔斯去死。[p/]只靠麦考伊有点太蠢了。

original: Right...[p/] Is it possible that Eris went off-script then?
translation: 确实……[p/]有没有可能是厄莉斯不照计划行事？

original: She definitely doesn't seem like the type of demon to take orders from a human.
translation: 她确实不像那种会乖乖听人类指示的恶魔。

original: Tyrion: ...Anyways,[p/] what happened after you saw me unconscious?
translation: Tyrion: ……总之，[p/]你看到失去意识的我之后发生了什么？

original: Lucio: ...I can't believe you fell for such an obvious deception.
translation: Lucio: ……你会中这么明显的骗术真令我难以置信。

original: Celeste: I know...[p/] I was just so scared.
translation: Celeste: 我知道……[p/]我当时太害怕了。

original: Celeste: I thought Tyrion was dead.[p/] I wasn't thinking clearly.
translation: Celeste: 我以为提利昂死了。[p/]我脑袋不清醒。

original: Tyrion: ...I'm glad that you care about me that much.
translation: Tyrion: ……很高兴你这么在乎我。

original: Tyrion: ...But what you did almost destroyed Aria's future.
translation: Tyrion: ……但你也几乎毁掉了阿莉亚的前程。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Rath: ...Perhaps it's best to stick to the facts for now.
translation: Rath: ……也许现在还是要专注于事实。

original: Lucio: ...To think one Blood Contract could have such an effect on the investigation.
translation: Lucio: ……一份血契竟然能对调查有这么大影响。

original: Celeste: I should have known she was up to something...[p/] But I was too desperate to realize it.
translation: Celeste: 我早该知道她有其他打算……[p/]但我当时太急迫了，意识不到。

original: Rath: ...You were put in a difficult situation.
translation: Rath: ……你当时也是进退两难。

original: Rath: Take solace in the fact that you stuck to your ideals despite that.
translation: Rath: 幸好你除此之外依然坚守自己的信念。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: The Scaled Lord is being surprisingly sympathetic towards her...
translation: 鳞甲领主对她一直很温柔……

original: Lucio: This must have been after they went to investigate the fire in the Common Room.
translation: Lucio: 一定是在他们去调查公共休息室火势之后。

original: Tyrion: I'm surprised Aster went to the Prayer Room as well.[p/] I'd have thought the Kingsguard would have kept him in a secure location.
translation: Tyrion: 我没想到阿斯特也去了祷告室。[p/]我还以为国王卫队会让他留在某个安全地点。

original: Lucio: ...Those [i]were[/i] my orders.
translation: Lucio: ……我的命令<u>确实</u>如此。

original: Lucio: But His Majesty demanded that they secure the Cathedral for the safety of everyone there.
translation: Lucio: 但为了在场的所有人，国王陛下要求他们确保大教堂安全。

original: Rath: Hm...[p/] He's always been an altruist.
translation: Rath: 唔……[p/]他确实一直心系他人。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Her testimony doesn't appear to add any new information.
translation: 她的证言似乎没什么新信息。

original: But between the multiple murders and Eris changing people's memories,[p/] there might be something you've missed.
translation: 但在这几起谋杀案和被厄莉斯改变的记忆之间，[p/]可能藏着什么你错过的事。

original: Remember each piece of evidence you have and the time of each event that day.
translation: 回顾一下你手里的证据和当天每件事的时间点。

original: There might be something there you can use.
translation: 或许还有用得上的东西。

original: Tyrion: Your Grace![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 巨龙殿下！[p/][s/]证人的证言明显存在矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Rath: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Rath: Я не особо понимаю, как [i]это[/i] что-либо доказывает, мистер Катберт...

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/]好像是这样的。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/][s/] What?!
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Lucio: What is it, Cuthbert?
translation: Lucio: 怎么了，卡斯伯特？

original: Tyrion: Celeste.[p/] Are you [i]sure[/i] Aster showed up only a [i]few[/i] minutes after Pierce died?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特。[p/]你<u>确定</u>阿斯特在皮尔斯死后<u>几分钟</u>就到场了？

original: Celeste: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...[p/] I remember [i]that[/i] part pretty well.
translation: Celeste: 是、[p/][s/]是的……[p/]<u>这个</u>部分我记得很清楚。

original: Celeste: Eris seemed really worried about being seen by them.
translation: Celeste: 厄莉斯好像很担心被他们发现。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Rath: Have you figured something out, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Rath: 卡斯伯特先生，你搞清楚什么了吗？

original: Tyrion: It's just that...
translation: Tyrion: 只是……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Lucio: May I remind you that we are [i]extremely[/i] pressed for time?
translation: Lucio: 需要我提醒你时间<u>所剩无几</u>吗？

original: Lucio: Stop wasting our time and just say what you want to say!
translation: Lucio: 不要浪费时间了，有话就说！

original: Tyrion: ...Celeste.[p/] Garrick Pierce died at 2:45 PM and [i]Aster[/i] showed up in the Prayer Room only a few minutes after.
translation: Tyrion: ……塞莱斯特。[p/]加里克·皮尔斯在下午 2:45 身亡，<u>阿斯特</u>几分钟后就现身祷告室。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] Where are you-?
translation: Celeste: 对……[p/]你想说什——？

original: Celeste: Wait...
translation: Celeste: 等等……

original: Tyrion: That raises a big question.
translation: Tyrion: 这就产生一个大问题。

original: Tyrion: How did Aster enter the Prayer Room around 2:45 PM?
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特怎么能在下午 2:45 前后进祷告室的？

original: Tyrion: ...When he [i]should[/i] have been trapped in a [b]Force Cage[/b] until [i]3:00 PM[/i]!
translation: Tyrion: ……明明他直到<u>下午三点</u> 都<u>应该</u>被困在[b]坚牢术[/b]里！

original: Lucio: ...!
translation: Lucio: ……！

original: Celeste: W-[p/][s/]Wait...[p/][s/] You're not serious, are you?!
translation: Celeste: 等、[p/][s/]等等……[p/][s/]你在说笑吧？！

original: Lucio: M-[p/][s/]McCoy's memories are clearly unreliable!
translation: Lucio: 麦、[p/][s/]麦考伊的记忆明显不可靠！

original: Lucio: My men [i]all[/i] reported that His Majesty led them to the Prayer Room [i]after[/i] he exited the [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Lucio: 我的人<u>一致</u>报告说，国王陛下在[b]坚牢术[/b]解除<u>之后</u>才带他们去了祷告室。

original: Tyrion: Normally...[p/] That [i]would[/i] be more concrete when compared to Celeste's testimony.
translation: Tyrion: 一般而言……[p/]这<u>会</u>比塞莱斯特的证言更可靠。

original: Tyrion: But we can't trust their testimony.
translation: Tyrion: 但我们不能相信他们的证言。

original: Lucio: What are you talking about?!
translation: Lucio: 你在说什么？！

original: Tyrion: While I was disputing Celeste's Contract,[p/] Eris declared that she made Contracts with multiple members of the Kingsguard.
translation: Tyrion: 在我对塞莱斯特的契约提出异议时，[p/]厄莉斯表示她和多名卫队成员也签了契约。

original: Lucio: What?!
translation: Lucio: 什么？！

original: Tyrion: They were working together with her.
translation: Tyrion: 他们也与她同流合污。

original: Tyrion: And if these Contracts were structured similarly to Celeste's,[p/] she must have had the ability to manipulate their memories.
translation: Tyrion: 如果这些契约和塞莱斯特的契约内容相似，[p/]她肯定也能改变这些人的记忆。

original: Tyrion: This means they could've intentionally [i]or[/i] unintentionally lied during questioning.
translation: Tyrion: 也就意味着他们被询问时可能有意<u>或</u>无意撒谎。

original: Rath: To think...[p/] even the [i]Kingsguard[/i] have been compromised...
translation: Rath: 竟然……[p/]就连<u>国王卫队</u>也遭毒手了……

original: Rath: How could I have let this happen...?
translation: Rath: 我怎么会让这种事发生……？

original: Tyrion: And even if we assume that he somehow escaped an [i]inescapable[/i] [b]Force Cage[/b],[p/] how did Aster [i]know[/i] to head to the Prayer Room?
translation: Tyrion: 即使我们假定他能逃出<u>无法逃脱的</u>[b]坚牢术[/b]，[p/]阿斯特又是怎么<u>知道</u>要去祷告室的？

original: Lucio: I-[p/][s/]I understand your point...
translation: Lucio: 我、[p/][s/]我明白你的论点……

original: Lucio: But do you [i]understand[/i] what you're implying?!
translation: Lucio: 但你<u>明白</u>自己在暗示什么吗？！

original: Tyrion: I'm not trying to imply anything.[p/] I'm just stating the facts that we know.
translation: Tyrion: 我不是想暗示什么。[p/]我只是在陈述已知事实。

original: Tyrion: We know that a human,[p/] whether willingly or otherwise,[p/] worked with the Empress of Discord to orchestrate this massacre.
translation: Tyrion: 我们知道一个人类，[p/]不论是自愿还是其他原因，[p/]与无序女皇一起谋划了这场屠杀。

original: Tyrion: He was deeply trusted by Aria Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 他深得阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德信任。

original: Tyrion: So much so that she didn't even think [i]twice[/i] about signing a Contract that he gave her.
translation: Tyrion: 信任到她甚至不<u>多想</u>就签了他递过来的契约。

original: Tyrion: There's only one person who meets those criteria...
translation: Tyrion: 只有一个满足这些条件的人……

original: Tyrion: ...Aster de Wyverngarde:[p/][s/] the reigning king of our kingdom!
translation: Tyrion: ……阿斯特·维文加德，[p/][s/]我们的现任国王！

original: Rath: Order![p/][s/] I [i]will[/i] have order!
translation: Rath: 肃静！[p/][s/]我<u>让</u>你们肃静！

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Rath: Mr. Cuthbert...[p/] Do you understand the weight of this accusation?
translation: Rath: 卡斯伯特先生……[p/]你明白这一指控的重大意义吗？

original: Rath: To claim that the king collaborated with a demon in any capacity,[p/] is no small thing.
translation: Rath: 指控国王和恶魔同谋，[p/]无论罪状都不是小事。

original: Tyrion: I do.[p/] But I'm [i]hoping[/i] this is all a misunderstanding.
translation: Tyrion: 我明白。[p/]但我<u>希望</u>这只是个误会。

original: Tyrion: After all,[p/] Eris’s goal seemed to be nothing beyond sowing as much discord as possible.
translation: Tyrion: 毕竟，[p/]厄莉斯的目的似乎只是尽可能收获混乱无序。

original: Tyrion: She made us believe that Celeste and Aria were [i]both[/i] murderers.
translation: Tyrion: 她骗我们相信塞莱斯特和阿莉亚<u>都是</u>杀人犯。

original: Tyrion: I want to save Aria.[p/] But I also want to believe in the people who've believed in me.
translation: Tyrion: 我想救阿莉亚。[p/]但我也想相信愿意信任我的人们。

original: Tyrion: If Aster has information that can save Aria,[p/] we have to find it.
translation: Tyrion: 如果阿斯特有什么能救阿莉亚的情报，[p/]我们就必须找出来。

original: Rath: ...Very well, then.
translation: Rath: ……那好吧。

original: Rath: I suppose it's only right then,[p/] with everything that has transpired,[p/] that the king should make his truth known.
translation: Rath: 看来只有这么做了，[p/]事已至此，[p/]国王也必须分享他的真相。

original: Tyrion: I agree.[p/] And I wouldn't have it any other way.
translation: Tyrion: 我同意。[p/]这一点我也不会让步。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: Kingsguard![p/][s/] Please escort His Majesty to the stand!
translation: Lucio: 国王卫队！[p/][s/]护送国王陛下上证人席！

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Thank you for cooperating, Aster.
translation: Tyrion: ……感谢你的合作，阿斯特。

original: Aster: Of course.[p/] I understand your position, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aster: 当然。[p/]我明白你的处境，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: I am hoping you can shed some light on how Aria came to be under the Blood Contract in the first place.
translation: Tyrion: 我希望你能就阿莉亚一开始怎么会签约血契做出说明。

original: Tyrion: It's possible Eris tricked you somehow and made [i]you[/i] carry out the massacre.
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯有可能骗了你，导致<u>你</u>实施屠杀。

original: Tyrion: There has to be something we're not seeing,[p/] despite what the evidence points to.
translation: Tyrion: 尽管证据指向这里，[p/]但一定有什么我们还没发现的东西。

original: Aster: Evidence?[p/] You're referring to Celeste's testimony.[p/] Am I correct?
translation: Aster: 证据？[p/]你说的是塞莱斯特的证言。[p/]我没说错吧？

original: Aster: I'm sorry to say this,[p/] but...
translation: Aster: 很抱歉这么说，[p/]但是……

original: Aster: Are you sure we can trust her testimony?
translation: Aster: 你确定我们能相信她的证言？

original: Tyrion: We can trust her now.
translation: Tyrion: 我们现在可以相信她。

original: Tyrion: She's no longer under the effects of a Blood Contract.
translation: Tyrion: 她已经不受血契影响了。

original: Aster: Which [i]you[/i] claim no longer exists.
translation: Aster: <u>你</u>号称不受影响。

original: Aster: ...But only [i]you[/i] have the power to manifest them in the first place.
translation: Aster: ……但本来也只有<u>你</u>有昭示血契的力量。

original: Tyrion: ...What are you getting at?
translation: Tyrion: ……你想说什么？

original: Aster: I'm sorry, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] But I suppose what I mean is...
translation: Aster: 对不起，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]我想说的是……

original: Aster: After everything that just happened,[p/] how can we trust you?
translation: Aster: 发生这些事后，[p/]我们怎么能相信你？

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Aster: You disappeared for quite some time,[p/] to [i]who knows[/i] where.
translation: Aster: 你消失了好一阵子，[p/]去了<u>谁都不知道</u>的地方。

original: Aster: And the only person who was there with you was Celeste and a [i]demon[/i] who can clearly alter people's memories.
translation: Aster: 与你同行的只有塞莱斯特和一个能改变别人记忆的<u>恶魔</u>。

original: Aster: Isn’t it a [i]little[/i] convenient she was burnt to a crisp almost [i]immediately[/i] after your return?
translation: Aster: 你一回来，这个恶魔<u>马上</u>就燃烧殆尽，对你不是<u>有点</u>太便利了？

original: Aster: She said it multiple times.[p/] That didn't [i]actually[/i] kill her.
translation: Aster: 她也说过好几次。[p/]这样做不能<u>真的</u>杀掉她。

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Aster: And [i]now[/i]...[p/] You're singling me out as The Patron,[p/] the one ultimately responsible for the murders of von Sanctus and Sibyl.
translation: Aster: <u>现在</u>……[p/]你又要指控我是签约人，[p/]那个要对谋杀冯·桑克图斯和希比尔负责的人。

original: Aster: If that demon made you into her puppet,[p/] wouldn't this be [i]exactly[/i] what she wanted?
translation: Aster: 如果恶魔把你也控制了，[p/]这不就<u>正中</u>她的下怀？

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Gallery: ...That's right!
translation: Gallery: ……说得对啊！

original: Gallery: How do we know this "heavensborn" can be trusted?!
translation: Gallery: 我们怎么知道“天诞之物”值得信任？！

original: Gallery: We've all heard the stories![p/][s/] He's practically a dissident!
translation: Gallery: 我们都听说过那些故事！[p/][s/]他明显是个异见人士！

original: Gallery: For all we know,[p/] he could be an agent of the Theocracy!
translation: Gallery: 就我们所知，[p/]他有可能是神权特工！

original: You can feel the room turning against you...
translation: 你能感到周围传来的敌意……

original: Even the Scaled Lord looks wary...
translation: 就连鳞甲领主都有些警惕……

original: Aster: S-[p/][s/]Sorry![p/][s/] I didn't mean to insult you after everything you've done.
translation: Aster: 对、[p/][s/]对不起！[p/][s/]我不是要攻击做了这么多的你。

original: Aster: But I suppose there's [i]one[/i] way to confirm your theory.
translation: Aster: 不过我想还有<u>一种</u>方法能确认你的理论。

original: Tyrion: ...And what's that?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么方法？

original: Aster: Use your Divine Edict on me.[p/] Just like you've done several times before.
translation: Aster: 对我使用神谕。[p/]就像你之前做的那样。

original: Aster: If I truly [i]was[/i] in league with that demon,[p/] shouldn't I have a Contract with her?
translation: Aster: 如果我真的和那个恶魔<u>是</u>一伙的，[p/]我不应该和她签个契约吗？

original: Aster: It will appear.[p/] Even if I was made to forget about it.
translation: Aster: 就算我被改变记忆，[p/]契约也会出现。

original: Tyrion: ...?!
translation: Tyrion: ……？！

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/] That's right!
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/]对了！

original: Celeste: We already tried that before and it didn't work!
translation: Celeste: 我们之前就试过了，但是契约没出现！

original: Tyrion: ...Which means that he definitely [i]doesn't[/i] have a Contract with her.
translation: Tyrion: ……这说明他们肯定<u>没有</u>签契约。

original: Aster: ...Why aren't you doing it?
translation: Aster: ……你还愣在那里干什么？

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] can't.[p/] I already tried and nothing appeared.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]不能这么做。[p/]我之前试过了，但是什么也没发生。

original: Aster: I see...
translation: Aster: 原来如此……

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: Aster: I'm sorry, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] I know you care deeply for her.
translation: Aster: 我很抱歉，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]我知道你很在乎她。

original: Aster: But we all saw Celeste's Blood Contract [i]and[/i] we heard her earlier confession.
translation: Aster: 但我们都看过了塞莱斯特的血契，<u>也</u>听了她之前的忏悔。

original: Aster: Not to mention,[p/] we have no way of knowing whether Celeste is [i]truly[/i] free from Eris's influence.
translation: Aster: 更不用说，[p/]我们没法知道塞莱斯特是否<u>真的</u>不再受厄莉斯影响。

original: Aster: If Ms. Steelwind is to be saved,[p/] we all must accept what needs to be done.
translation: Aster: 如果要救斯蒂尔文德女士，[p/]我们就必须接受不得不做的事。

original: Aster: I don't like saying this.[p/] But I think it's time this trial came to its conclusion.[p/] Don't you, Your Grace?
translation: Aster: 我不想这么说。[p/]但我认为是时候结束这场审理了。[p/]你认为呢，巨龙殿下？

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Damn it...[p/] He's even got the Scaled Lord on his side.
translation: 该死……[p/]就连鳞甲领主也站在他那边。

original: Even if it's against you,[p/] he raised a lot of good points.
translation: 虽然对你不利，[p/]但他的论述逻辑自洽。

original: But is he acting with malice?[p/] Or is he just being careful?
translation: 但他是基于恶意这么做吗？[p/]还是他只是太过谨慎？

original: Celeste: Come on![p/][s/] Think, Tyrion!
translation: Celeste: 拜托！[p/][s/]快想想办法，提利昂！

original: Celeste: We just proved my Blood Contract wasn’t valid.
translation: Celeste: 我们刚刚证明了我的血契无效。

original: Celeste: But the one who made Aria commit those murders is still out there.
translation: Celeste: 但那个利用阿莉亚杀人的真凶还站在那。

original: Maybe you’ve been thinking about this the wrong way.
translation: 也许你的思路是错的。

original: Eris found ways to trick people into signing Blood Contracts before.
translation: 厄莉斯之前也有方法骗人签下血契。

original: So she wouldn’t necessarily [i]need[/i] a Blood Contract to trick Aster into accidentally helping her.
translation: 她不一定<u>需要</u>血契骗阿斯特帮她。

original: The question isn't whether Aster knowingly did this or not.
translation: 问题不在于阿斯特是否知情。

original: The question is...
translation: 问题在于……

original: There had to have been [i]some[/i] sort of physical involvement on his part.
translation: 这其中肯定会有<u>某些</u>需要阿斯特本人介入的地方。

original: And [i]that[/i] might've left behind evidence that proves it.
translation: <u>这种地方</u>可能会留下证据。

original: No...[p/] If Aster really [i]is[/i] the Patron,[p/] he could've committed the murders through Aria.
translation: 不……[p/]如果阿斯特真的<u>是</u>签约人，[p/]他可以利用阿莉亚杀人。

original: He wouldn't have needed to be involved in any of that personally.
translation: 他不需要亲自参与。

original: But there [i]is[/i] one thing that he definitely needed to do himself.
translation: 但有一件事<u>是</u>他必须自己做的。

original: Tyrion: He needed to trick Aria into signing the Contract somehow...
translation: Tyrion: 他得想办法骗阿莉亚签契约……

original: Celeste: ...But you've seen how she is around him.
translation: Celeste: ……但你也看到了她在他身边的时候是什么表现。

original: Celeste: That wouldn't have been very hard to do.
translation: Celeste: 这并不难做到。

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] Aria may be extremely lovesick around him,[p/] but she's still an attorney.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]阿莉亚可能是个十足的恋爱脑，[p/]但她依然是个检察官。

original: Tyrion: She would be careful to read [i]any[/i] contract she signed.
translation: Tyrion: 她会仔细阅读<u>所有</u>要签订的合同。

original: Tyrion: We deduced earlier that her Blood Contract was disguised as a normal legal document.
translation: Tyrion: 我们之前推测她的血契被伪装成一份普通的法律文件。

original: Tyrion: And I remember something.[p/] When you caught a glimpse of it,[p/] you immediately started teasing her.
translation: Tyrion: 但我想起来一件事。[p/]你瞥到契约内容的时候，[p/]立刻开始逗阿莉亚。

original: Celeste: I'm really trying,[p/] but I just can't remember what I saw...
translation: Celeste: 我在努力想了，[p/]但还是记不起来我当时看到的是什么……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: If I was [i]teasing[/i] her about it,[p/] it might have been related to her relationship with Aster.
translation: Celeste: 如果我会因为内容<u>逗</u>她，[p/]那这契约可能与她和阿斯特的关系有关。

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Celeste: I'm sorry...[p/] I know that doesn't really narrow it down.
translation: Celeste: 抱歉……[p/]这话好像没什么用。

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] That's [i]exactly[/i] the clue that I needed.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]这<u>正是</u>我需要的线索。

original: Celeste: Really...?
translation: Celeste: 真的……？

original: No...[p/] When Celeste caught a glimpse of the Contract,[p/] she immediately started teasing her.
translation: 不……[p/]当塞莱斯特瞥到那份契约时，[p/]她立刻开始逗阿莉亚。

original: She always had a habit of poking fun at her crush on Aster.
translation: 塞莱斯特很喜欢拿阿莉亚对阿斯特的爱恋逗她。

original: So what kind of document could Celeste have seen?
translation: 所以塞莱斯特看到的是什么文件？

original: Tyrion: Aster![p/][s/] There is [i]one[/i] piece of physical evidence that proves you were involved in this.
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特！[p/][s/]这里有<u>一件</u>证物能证明你参与过此事。

original: Aster: ...Really?
translation: Aster: ……真的？

original: Tyrion: ...The Patron controlled Aria and committed each of the murders without having to do [i]anything[/i] personally.
translation: Tyrion: ……签约人控制阿莉亚，不弄脏自己的手就完成了谋杀。

original: Tyrion: But this was all contingent on tricking her into [i]signing[/i] that Contract in the first place.
translation: Tyrion: 但这些都需要以骗她<u>签订</u>契约为前提。

original: Tyrion: I recall that you went to a meeting with the High Speaker right [i]before[/i] the massacre started.
translation: Tyrion: 我记得你们在屠杀开始<u>前不久</u>去和大主教会面。

original: Tyrion: It was to discuss your marriage to Aria, wasn't it?
translation: Tyrion: 是为了要讨论你和阿莉亚结婚的事，对吧？

original: Aster: ...Yes.[p/] That's correct.
translation: Aster: ……是的。[p/]说得没错。

original: Tyrion: Aster,[p/] the Blood Contract that Aria signed needed to [i]look[/i] like a normal legal document.
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特，[p/]阿莉亚签约的血契必须<u>看起来像</u>普通法律文件。

original: Tyrion: But I just realized something while reading it.
translation: Tyrion: 我刚阅读内容时意识到了一些事。

original: Tyrion: The language used would've made sense under a [i]different[/i] context.
translation: Tyrion: 正文里的内容在某种<u>不同</u>情况下也可以使用。

original: Tyrion: In that Contract,[p/] Aria gave you her "mind,[p/] body,[p/] and soul".
translation: Tyrion: 这份契约里，[p/]阿莉亚将献出自己的“意识，[p/]躯体，[p/]灵魂”。

original: Tyrion: It would bind her to you so long as you [i]both[/i] live.
translation: Tyrion: <u>双方</u>生存期间都会被一直联系在一起。

original: Lucio: Wait...[p/][s/] Are you saying-?!
translation: Lucio: 等等……[p/][s/]你是在说——？！

original: Rath: No...
translation: Rath: 不……

original: Tyrion: In other words,[p/] "Till death do you part"!
translation: Tyrion: 换句话说，[p/]“直至死亡将你们分开”！

original: Aster: I...
translation: Aster: 我……

original: Lucio: That's a big leap in logic,[p/] even for you.
translation: Lucio: 就算是你，[p/]这逻辑也太跳跃了。

original: Lucio: [i]Whoever[/i] tricked my daughter would've surely destroyed the evidence by now.
translation: Lucio: 骗了我女儿的<u>那个人</u>肯定已经把证据销毁了。

original: Lucio: That demon went out of her way to destroy her memories of signing it.
translation: Lucio: 恶魔还不辞辛苦把她的记忆也修改了。

original: Lucio: I doubt they would've left any copies of the marriage license to be found.
translation: Lucio: 我不觉得会留下任何有关婚约的证据。

original: Rath: Indeed.[p/] Bringing such heavy accusations against the High Speaker [i]or[/i] the King will require more than just speculation.
translation: Rath: 确实如此。[p/]不能只靠猜测就对大主教<u>或</u>国王进行这么严重的指控。

original: Gallery: First he [i]dares[/i] call the King to testify...[p/][s/] And [i]now[/i] he's trying to indict the High Speaker?!
translation: Gallery: 他先是<u>胆敢</u>让国王作证……[p/][s/]<u>现在</u>又要指控大主教？！

original: Gallery: He's a traitor to the nation!
translation: Gallery: 他是个叛国者！

original: Tyrion: I have more than just speculation, Your Grace.
translation: Tyrion: 巨龙殿下，我不是只靠猜测。

original: Tyrion: ...I have a copy of it.
translation: Tyrion: ……我有婚约的副本。

original: Aster: B-[p/]But your Divine Edict only recreates the terms of the Blood Contract,[p/] not the material that it was written on.
translation: Aster: 但、[p/]但是你的神谕只能复现血契的条款，[p/]不能复现载体。

original: Aster: The original document wouldn't be visible on your copy.
translation: Aster: 原始文件在你的副本上是看不见的。

original: Tyrion: ...That wasn't the [s/]"copy" I was talking about, Aster.
translation: Tyrion: ……阿斯特，我说的不是那份[s/]“副本”。

original: Aster: ...W-[p/][s/]What?
translation: Aster: ……什、[p/][s/]什么？

original: Tyrion: Don't you wonder [s/][i]how[/i] I knew about that Blood Contract?
translation: Tyrion: 你就不好奇我是[s/]<u>怎么</u>知道血契的？

original: Tyrion: Every attorney has a magical runestone.
translation: Tyrion: 每个律师和检察官都有自己的魔法符石。

original: Tyrion: They let us take pictures of crime scenes and write down notes magically.
translation: Tyrion: 符石可以用魔力拍摄现场照片，记录笔记。

original: Aster: Y-[p/]Yes...[p/] I'm well aware of them...
translation: Aster: 是、[p/]是的……[p/]我了解这些……

original: Tyrion: ...And did you know Aria took a picture of the marriage license she signed?
translation: Tyrion: ……那你知道阿莉亚对自己签的婚约拍了照吗？

original: Aster: ...What?
translation: Aster: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: She was so happy to finally have your union codified,[p/] that she took a picture of your "marriage license".
translation: Tyrion: 终于能和你结为夫妻让她十分开心，[p/]开心到要拍照纪念这份“婚约”。

original: Tyrion: ...Even though it was [i]technically[/i] illegal to do so.
translation: Tyrion: ……即使这<u>照理来说</u>是违法的。

original: Aster: ...S-[p/][s/]She-![p/][s/] Why would she-?!
Tyrion: The moment she regained consciousness,[p/] she thought she was a danger to others.
translation: Tyrion: 意识恢复的瞬间，[p/]她以为自己会对别人造成威胁。

original: Tyrion: She had [i]no[/i] memories of what she did that day,[p/] but she knew something was wrong.
translation: Tyrion: 她<u>没有</u>自己那天做了什么的记忆，[p/]但她清楚有哪里不对。

original: Tyrion: That's why she locked herself in a cell with an [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 所以她才把自己关在有[b]抗魔力场[/b]的牢房里。

original: Tyrion: She was being [i]rightfully[/i] cautious.
translation: Tyrion: 她的小心谨慎<u>合乎情理</u>。

original: Tyrion: But had she simply left any of those [b]Anti-Magic Fields[/b] and checked her runestone...
translation: Tyrion: 但如果她能暂时离开[b]抗魔力场[/b]的范围，检查一下自己的符石……

original: Tyrion: ...She would have found a picture of a marriage license with the exact same words as her Blood Contract!
translation: Tyrion: ……她就会发现一张照片，照片里的婚约内容和自己的血契完全一致！

original: Tyrion: So I'll ask you this, Aster.
translation: Tyrion: 让我问问你，阿斯特。

original: Tyrion: Who gave that marriage license to her?
translation: Tyrion: 这份婚约是谁给她的？

original: Tyrion: Was it you or the High Speaker?
translation: Tyrion: 你还是大主教？

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: Tyrion: If you don't want to answer,[p/] we can drag the truth out of both of you.
translation: Tyrion: 如果你不想回答，[p/]我们也可以让大主教来作证。

original: Aster: *sigh*[p/] Don't bother.
translation: Aster: *叹气* [p/]不用麻烦了。

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] So it really [i]was[/i] you.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]所以真的<u>是</u>你。

original: Aster: ...Tell me, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] Do you know what the best kind of lie is?
translation: Aster: ……卡斯伯特先生，告诉我。[p/]你知道最好的谎言是什么样子吗？

original: Tyrion: The kind that's hardest to disprove.
translation: Tyrion: 最难被证伪的。

original: Aster: No...[p/] Not quite.
translation: Aster: 不……[p/]不太对。

original: Aster: It's the kind where you won’t even try.
translation: Aster: 是你都不会尝试证伪的。

original: Aster: The best kind of lie is the one you [i]want[/i] to believe in.
translation: Aster: 最好的是让你<u>想要</u>相信的谎言。

original: Aster: The truth can be right in front of you,[p/] but it will make you look away.
translation: Aster: 真相可能就摆在你眼前，[p/]但这谎言会让你看向别处。

original: Aster: If I recall correctly,[p/] McCoy made you experience that firsthand today.
translation: Aster: 如果我记得没错，[p/]麦考伊今天就给了你这种体验。

original: Rath: Your Majesty.[p/] What are you-?
translation: Rath: 国王殿下。[p/]您这是——？

original: Aster: I'm done with this farce.
translation: Aster: 我受够这出闹剧了。

original: Aster: I'm sure if we brought the High Speaker to the stand,[p/] Cuthbert would just [i]deduce[/i] what happened anyways.
translation: Aster: 如果让大主教上证人席，[p/]卡斯伯特先生也会<u>推理</u>出相同结论。

original: Aster: It was always going to end this way, I suppose.
translation: Aster: 我看，早晚都要变成这样的。

original: Aster: Perhaps I was just lying to myself.
translation: Aster: 也许我只是在骗自己。

original: Lucio: Y-[p/][s/]You-!
translation: Lucio: 你、[p/][s/]你——！

original: Lucio: Your High-...[p/] No...
translation: Lucio: 国王陛……[p/]不……

original: Lucio: Aster, you whelp!
translation: Lucio: 阿斯特，你这个畜生！

original: Lucio: Are you saying that it [i]was[/i] you?
translation: Lucio: 你在说<u>是你</u>干的？

original: Lucio: You [i]used[/i] my daughter to commit mass murder?!
translation: Lucio: 你<u>利用</u>我女儿实施屠杀？！

original: Aster: I did, Lucio.[p/] What of it?
translation: Aster: 是我，卢西奥。[p/]这又怎样？

original: Rath: ...How [i]could[/i] you?!
translation: Rath: ……你怎么<u>能</u>？！

original: Aster: And what right do [i]you[/i] have to judge my actions,[p/] oh [i]Great[/i] Scaled Lord?!
translation: Aster: 而<u>你</u>又有什么权力对我评头论足，[p/]<u>伟大</u>的鳞甲领主？！

original: Aster: I was only cleaning up the mess [i]you[/i] created!
translation: Aster: 我只不过是在打扫<u>你的</u>烂摊子罢了！

original: Aster: ...And if it weren't for Eris's little games,[p/] I would have done it in a much [i]cleaner[/i] manner.
translation: Aster: ……要不是厄莉斯要玩她的小游戏，[p/]我干得还会更<u>干净利落</u>。

original: Rath: Pardon me?
translation: Rath: 恕我没有听清？

original: Aster: No...[p/] I think I'll be pardoning myself.
translation: Aster: 不……[p/]我会饶恕我自己。

original: Lucio: You can't be serious?!
translation: Lucio: 你跟我开玩笑吧？！

original: Aster: I [i]am[/i] the King of Wyverngarde, am I not?
translation: Aster: 我可<u>是</u>维文加德国王，对吧？

original: Aster: Is that not my right?
translation: Aster: 赦免不是我的权力吗？

original: Tyrion: ...You're insane.
translation: Tyrion: ……你疯了。

original: Aster: Tell me.[p/] Does this terrify you all?
translation: Aster: 告诉我。[p/]你们是不是都吓坏了？

original: Aster: To know that I can do whatever I please,[p/] with no one who can stop me?
translation: Aster: 被我可以为所欲为，[p/]没有任何人能阻止这一点？

original: Aster: Is this not what [i]you’ve[/i] all been doing to the rest of this country?
translation: Aster: 这不正是<u>你们</u>对这个国家其他人所做的事？

original: Tyrion: Do you seriously expect to get away with this?!
translation: Tyrion: 你真的指望这样脱罪？！

original: Aster: I do.[p/] Who has the power to stop me?
translation: Aster: 我确实这么指望。[p/]谁有阻止我的力量？

original: Aster: The Scaled Lord?
translation: Aster: 鳞甲领主？

original: Tyrion: Um... [i]yes[/i].[p/] [i]Exactly[/i] him.
translation: Tyrion: 呃……<u>对</u>。[p/]<u>正是</u>他。

original: Tyrion: That's why he hosted this trial in the first place.[p/] His authority [i]is[/i] above yours.
translation: Tyrion: 所以庭审才会由他主持。[p/]他的权威性<u>在</u>你之上。

original: Aster: I didn’t ask who could stop me, Tyrion.[p/] I asked who was [i]going[/i] to.
translation: Aster: 提利昂，我问的不是谁能阻止我。[p/]而是谁<u>会</u>阻止我。

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Tyrion: What...?
translation: Tyrion: 什么……？

original: Tyrion: Why aren't either of you saying anything?!
translation: Tyrion: 你们怎么都不说话了？！

original: Aster: Yes.[p/] Rathallion.[p/] Have me arrested.
translation: Aster: 没错。[p/]拉萨利昂。[p/]逮捕我吧。

original: Aster: Put my [i] seven-year-old [/i] brother on the throne.
translation: Aster: 让我<u>七岁的</u>弟弟来继承王位。

original: Aster: I'm sure history will tell you [i]exactly[/i] how a kingdom fares when a child sits on the throne.
translation: Aster: 你肯定从历史中学到了孩童执政会给王国带来<u>什么</u>后果。

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Aster: Or would you take the throne for yourself?
translation: Aster: 不然你也可以自己称王？

original: Aster: You spent all those centuries huddled away in this ruined city.
translation: Aster: 你数百年都蜷缩在这座城市遗迹里。

original: Aster: I am certain you know [i]exactly[/i] what problems this nation is facing and what it needs to right itself.
translation: Aster: 我敢肯定你<u>了解</u>这个国家的问题，<u>了解</u>该怎么重回正轨。

original: Tyrion: Rathallion!
translation: Tyrion: 拉萨利昂！

original: Rath: ...I'm sorry, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Rath: ……对不起，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Rath: I came here to do what was best for my people.
translation: Rath: 我来此是为了做对我的子民最好的事。

original: Rath: I may not know the best course before me...
translation: Rath: 我可能不知道目前怎么做最好……

original: Rath: But I know with painful certainty that it is [i]not[/i] to seize control of this nation.
translation: Rath: 但我知道如果国家<u>失控</u>的惨痛影响。

original: Rath: I will not take that responsibility again.
translation: Rath: 我不会再承担这个责任了。

original: Rath: ...Nor will I thrust that responsibility onto those who would [i]not[/i] have it.
translation: Rath: ……我也不会让<u>不应</u>承受这一责任的人上任。

original: Aster: Not really surprising...
translation: Aster: 意料之中……

original: Aster: From everything I’ve seen,[p/] negligence has been your [i]one[/i] consistent trait.
translation: Aster: 就我看到的事而言，[p/]疏忽大意一直是你的一贯特点<u>之一</u>。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Aster: And what about you, Lucio?
translation: Aster: 那你呢，卢西奥？

original: Aster: Are you going to try to depose me?
translation: Aster: 你想尝试废黜我吗？

original: Aster: The beloved prince,[p/] now King of Wyverngarde.
translation: Aster: 被人民所爱的前王子，[p/]现任维文加德国王。

original: Aster: Or did you forget?[p/] The people of this nation [i]love[/i] me and [i]hate[/i] you.
translation: Aster: 还是说你忘了？[p/]国民们<u>爱戴</u>我，<u>痛恨</u>你。

original: Lucio: ...!
translation: Lucio: ……！

original: Aster: I hear you're very skilled at ARGUING, Tyrion.
translation: Aster: 我听说你很擅长 <size=1.5em>辩论</size>，提利昂。

original: Aster: But I doubt even [i]you[/i] could make the public see [i]that[/i] as anything other than a military coup.
translation: Aster: 但我想就连<u>你</u>也不能让群众相信<u>这</u>不是军事政变。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Aster: Can you imagine?
translation: Aster: 你能想象吗？

original: Aster: Grand General Lucio,[p/] deposing the new King of Wyverngarde,[p/] before the previous king’s body is even interred.
