translation: Aster: 卢西奥大将军，[p/]在先王尸骨未寒之时，[p/]废黜维文加德新王。

original: Aster: I wonder just how [i]bloody[/i] of a civil war that would plunge this nation into.
translation: Aster: 我很好奇这会引起多么<u>血腥</u>的内战。

original: Aster: And even [i]if[/i] Lucio doesn't have much difficulty crushing the commoners...
translation: Aster: 再者，<u>就算</u>卢西奥轻易镇压了平民……

original: Aster: I am sure you can imagine just how tempting a weakened Wyverngarde would look to the other nations.
translation: Aster: 你肯定也能想象弱化的维文加德在他国眼里多么诱人。

original: Damn it![p/][s/] By killing Sibyl and von Sanctus,[p/] he left a power vacuum that only [i]he[/i] could fill.
translation: 该死！[p/][s/]杀掉希比尔和冯·桑克图斯以后，[p/]他留下了只有<u>他自己</u>能填补的权力空缺。

original: Tyrion: Aster![p/][s/] You're holding the [i]entire[/i] kingdom hostage!
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特！[p/][s/]你这是以<u>整个</u>王国要挟！

original: Aster: I am merely consolidating power where it belongs.
translation: Aster: 我不过是在巩固权力而已。

original: Aster: In the hands of a kind and [i]benevolent[/i] ruler,[p/] who is finally going to [i]fix[/i] this nation.
translation: Aster: 把权力集中在一个善良<u>仁慈</u>的统治者手里，[p/]由他之手来<u>治愈</u>这个国家。

original: Tyrion: You [i]murdered[/i] several people,[p/][s/] consorted with demons,[p/][s/] and [i]enslaved[/i] your own fiancée!
translation: Tyrion: 你<u>谋杀</u>了好几个人，[p/][s/]与恶魔同流合污，[p/][s/]还让你自己的未婚妻<u>沦为仆从</u>！

original: Aster: I'm sure that to [i]you[/i],[p/] my actions may seem evil and unforgivable.
translation: Aster: 我很确定在<u>你</u>眼里，[p/]我的行为天理不容，难以原谅。

original: Aster: But to those in the Wyverngarde nobility,[p/] I doubt that I’m even the first to do such a thing.
translation: Aster: 但对于维文加德贵族来说，[p/]类似的作为应该不少见。

original: Aster: This is just...[p/] politics.
translation: Aster: 这就是……[p/]政治。

original: Aster: And I think [i]that[/i] makes Checkmate, Cuthbert.
translation: Aster: <u>这样</u>就将军了，卡斯伯特。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Aster: I can't believe it.[p/] I've always [i]wanted[/i] to say that.
translation: Aster: 真不敢信。[p/]我一直<u>想</u>这么说说看。

original: Celeste: What are you all doing?!
translation: Celeste: 你们都在干什么？！

original: Celeste: Are you just going to let him get away?!
translation: Celeste: 就这么让他溜走了？！

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Celeste: Lucio![p/][s/] She's your [i]daughter[/i]!
translation: Celeste: 卢西奥！[p/][s/]她可是你<u>女儿</u>！

original: Celeste: Are you just going to let him keep control over her?!
translation: Celeste: 你就要让他这么继续控制她？！

original: Lucio: ...My daughter would not sacrifice the stability of Wyverngarde for her freedom.
translation: Lucio: ……我的女儿不会为了自由牺牲维文加德的平稳。

original: Lucio: You know that to be true...
translation: Lucio: 你也知道这是真的……

original: Celeste: That's-!
translation: Celeste: 这是——！

original: Celeste: He killed so many people [i]and[/i] he enslaved Aria...
translation: Celeste: 他杀了这么多人，<u>还</u>奴役了阿莉亚……

original: Celeste: He almost killed you and he [i]tried[/i] to kill me...
translation: Celeste: 他差点就杀了你，还<u>试图</u>杀掉我……

original: Wait a minute...[p/][s/] That's right!
translation: 等一下……[p/][s/]对了！

original: Tyrion: Why [i]did[/i] he try to kill you?
translation: Tyrion: 他为什么要<u>试图</u>杀掉你？

original: Celeste: ...What do you mean?
translation: Celeste: ……这是什么意思？

original: Tyrion: If Aster is the Patron,[p/] that means that Pierce [i]originally[/i] sent that letter to [i]him[/i].
translation: Tyrion: 如果阿斯特就是签约人，[p/]那皮尔斯<u>原本</u>就把信寄给了<u>他</u>。

original: Tyrion: ...King de Wyverngarde just recently died.
translation: Tyrion: ……维文加德先王最近离世。

original: Tyrion: If Aster thought she was a threat,[p/] could that mean that Celeste has royal blood?
translation: Tyrion: 如果阿斯特觉得她有威胁，[p/]是否代表塞莱斯特也有皇室血统？

original: Lucio: That wouldn't make much sense.
translation: Lucio: 这样说不通。

original: Lucio: Even if McCoy was of royal blood,[p/] Aster is the King's eldest child and he's of [i]pure[/i] royal blood.
translation: Lucio: 即使麦考伊有皇室血统，[p/]阿斯特也是国王血统<u>纯正</u>的长子。

original: Lucio: McCoy would have no claim to the throne under these circumstances.
translation: Lucio: 麦考伊甚至都摸不着王座的边。

original: Tyrion: If you [i]were[/i] his half-sister,[p/] you wouldn't have a claim to the throne.
translation: Tyrion: 如果你<u>是</u>他同父异母的妹妹，[p/]那确实没有继承权。

original: Tyrion: So why would he go to so much trouble to kill Pierce [i]and[/i] you?
translation: Tyrion: 那他又为什么要费这么大功夫杀害皮尔斯<u>和</u>你？

original: Celeste: ...Maybe he just wanted to make sure?
translation: Celeste: ……可能他只是想确保万无一失？

original: Tyrion: But he wouldn't have had Eris kill Pierce personally if it wasn't important...
translation: Tyrion: 但如果重要性不大，他也不会让厄莉斯亲自杀掉皮尔斯……

original: Tyrion: He needed both you [i]and[/i] Pierce to die during the massacre.
translation: Tyrion: 他需要你<u>和</u>皮尔斯都在屠杀中死亡。

original: Tyrion: Which means you two were [i]just[/i] as important targets as von Sanctus and Sibyl.
translation: Tyrion: 这也代表你们的重要性<u>不比</u>冯·桑克图斯与希比尔低。

original: Celeste: Okay...?[p/] But my potential claim to the throne would be the only reason why he'd be scared of me.
translation: Celeste: 好吧……？[p/]但他害怕我的原因只可能是我会继承王座。

original: Celeste: If [i]that[/i] wasn't a problem,[p/] why would he be so scared of Pierce's blackmail?
translation: Celeste: 如果<u>这</u>都不是问题，[p/]为什么他还会那么害怕皮尔斯的恐吓信？

original: Would the line of succession be the [i]only[/i] reason why he'd be scared of Celeste's parentage?
translation: 王位继承权会是他害怕塞莱斯特血统的<u>唯一</u>理由吗？

original: Recall what you remember about Wyverngarde's laws regarding the royal throne.
translation: 回忆一下你知道的维文加德皇权相关法律。

original: Wasn't there something someone mentioned about that?
translation: 是不是有什么人提过什么事？

original: The Church of Bahamut
translation: 巴哈姆特教会

original: You recall a conversation you had with Theon Archeus.
translation: 你想起了自己和希恩·阿契厄斯的一段对话。

original: Theon: The Church of Bahamut is important not only to Wyverngarde's culture but to its civil stability.
translation: Theon: 巴哈姆特教会对维文加德的文化和社会秩序同等重要。

original: Theon: Faith is a powerful and unifying force.
translation: Theon: 信仰是一种强大且有凝聚性的力量。

original: Tyrion: ...Is that why you revise Wyverngarde's history and keep heavensborn outside the country?
translation: Tyrion: ……这就是你修改维文加德历史，不让天诞之物入国的原因？

original: Theon: I don't know [i]what[/i] you're trying to insinuate. [mind="Hmph... Dissidents like him will be the end of our culture."/]
translation: Theon: 我不知道你在影射<u>什么</u>。[mind="唔……他这样的异见人士会毁掉我们的文化。"/]

original: Aster didn't murder the High Speaker when he had the chance.
translation: 即使有过机会，阿斯特也没有杀掉大主教。

original: So it's possible that the Church of Bahamut plays a role in his future plans.
translation: 巴哈姆特教会可能是他未来计划的一部分。

original: But that wouldn't explain why he needed Pierce to die.
translation: 但这解释不了他为什么要杀皮尔斯。

original: The Theocracy of Lumina
translation: 卢米那的神权

original: You recall a conversation you had with Beatrice Frega.
translation: 你想起了自己和比亚特丽丝·弗雷加的一段对话。

original: Beatrice: It's probably because of Wyverngarde's bloody history with the Theocracy of Lumina.
translation: Beatrice: 可能是因为维文加德与卢米那神权的血腥历史。

original: Tyrion: The theocracy?[p/] Aren't they the nation east of us?
translation: Tyrion: 神权？[p/]你说我们东边那个国家？

original: Beatrice: Yes.[p/] The luminites worship the celestial gods,[p/] while [i]our[/i] people worship the ancient dragons.
translation: Beatrice: 是的。[p/]卢米那人崇拜天界神祇，[p/]<u>我们</u>则是崇拜古龙。

original: Beatrice: A few centuries ago,[p/] our nation was locked in a bitter war with the luminites.
translation: Beatrice: 几个世纪之前，[p/]我国和卢米那国打过仗。

original: Beatrice: Even now,[p/] the crown sees the celestial religions as a threat to our draconic culture.
translation: Beatrice: 即使至今，[p/]皇家依然认为天界宗教对我们的龙族信仰是个威胁。

original: Beatrice: The church has done its best to wipe out any religions that worship the Celestials.
translation: Beatrice: 教会竭尽全力抹杀了任何崇拜天界的宗教。

original: Hm...[p/] If Aster's actions had anything to do with the Theocracy,[p/] he would've targeted you,[p/] not Celeste.
translation: 唔……[p/]如果阿斯特的行动和神权相关，[p/]他针对的就该是<u>你</u>而非塞莱斯特。

original: And that also wouldn't explain why he needed Pierce to die.
translation: 这也解释不了他为什么要杀皮尔斯。

original: The Scaled Lord
translation: 鳞甲领主

original: ...You recall a conversation you had with Eris Illmater.
translation: ……你想起了自己和厄莉斯·伊尔马特的一段对话。

original: Eris: Despite everything,[p/] our kingdom’s constitution still includes the Scaled Lord in our government.
translation: Eris: 抛开别的不谈，[p/]我国宪法依然把鳞甲领主纳入了政府之中。

original: TYRION: Wait…[p/] Really?
translation: TYRION: 不是……[p/]说真的？

original: ERIS: As the savior of our kingdom,[p/] he and his kin were given an honorary position on our political hierarchy.
translation: ERIS: 作为王国的救世主，[p/]他和自己的血亲在政界有个荣誉职位。

original: ERIS: The ancient dragons' authority technically rivals that of the king.
translation: ERIS: 古龙的威权能匹敌国王。

original: TYRION: Wow…[p/] I had no idea.
translation: TYRION: 哇……[p/]我根本不知道。

original: TYRION: How have I never heard of this before?
translation: TYRION: 怎么我之前都没听说过？

original: ERIS: To be honest,[p/] that law is just a way to revere him and appease the church.
translation: ERIS: 老实讲，[p/]这条法律只是为了讨好教会，显示对他的尊敬罢了。

original: Wait...[p/] The Scaled Lord [i]and[/i] his kin can override the King's rule...?
translation: 等等……[p/]鳞甲领主<u>和</u>他的血亲可以凌驾于国王之上……？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Wait...
translation: Tyrion: 等等……

original: Pacts with Demons
translation: 与恶魔的契约

original: You recall a conversation you had with Harold Haroldson.
translation: 你想起了自己和哈罗德·哈罗德森的一段对话。

original: Tyrion: Oh, right.[p/] The Sword of Spell Eating is said to have been forged from a pact between a demon and a mage.
translation: Tyrion: 噢，对了。[p/]噬法之剑传说是通过恶魔和法师的契约打造而成。

original: Celeste: Isn't making a pact with a demon just [i]asking[/i] for trouble?
translation: Celeste: 和恶魔签约不是<u>自找</u>麻烦？

original: Celeste: They'd definitely betray you the first chance they got.
translation: Celeste: 他们肯定会第一时间背叛你的。

original: Harold: Well, legends say that demons often drafted Blood Contracts for this reason.
translation: Harold: 这个嘛，传说里也说恶魔会起草血契来消除后顾之忧。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Do you mean like a [i]legally binding[/i] contract?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]你是说一份具有<u>法律约束力</u>的契约？

original: Harold: The concept is similar.[p/] But once you sign a Blood Contract,[p/] both you and the demon are magically compelled to fulfill its terms.
translation: Harold: 差不多的意思。[p/]但一旦签约血契，[p/]你和恶魔都会被魔力约束，必须服从其中条款。

original: Harold: It's said that violating its terms will result in instant death for the offender...[p/] No matter who it is.
translation: Harold: 据传一旦违反其中款项，不管是恶魔还是人……[p/]都会立即死亡。

original: Tyrion: So I guess there's [i]some[/i] protection...
translation: Tyrion: 那看来还是<u>有点</u>保护……

original: Harold: Well...[p/] As an attorney,[p/] I'm sure you understand that it's possible to exploit and use loopholes in [i]any[/i] contract.
translation: Harold: 嗯……[p/]作为律师，[p/]你肯定清楚<u>任何</u>契约里的漏洞都可能被利用。

original: Harold: And according to the legends,[p/] demons take great pride in their ability to deceive and corrupt people.
translation: Harold: 根据传说，[p/]恶魔也对自己欺骗、堕落人类的能力引以为荣。

original: Hm...[p/] Aster [i]did[/i] make a deal with the Empress of Discord.
translation: 嗯……[p/]阿斯特<u>确实</u>和无序女皇做了交易。

original: But they never actually made it official with a Blood Contract.
translation: 但他们没有签约过血契。

original: They were probably using each other to accomplish their goals.
translation: 只是在利用彼此达成自己的目标。

original: But that still doesn't explain why he needed to kill Celeste or Pierce.
translation: 但这还是解释不了他为什么需要杀掉塞莱斯特或者皮尔斯。

original: The Four Pillar Families
translation: 四大支柱家族

original: You recall a conversation you had with Coraline Sibyl.
translation: 你想起了自己和卡洛琳·希比尔的一段对话。

original: Coraline: Each of the "Four Pillars",[p/] as you commoners call them,[p/] control different branches of Wyverngarde's government.
translation: Coraline: 平民称我们为“四大支柱”，[p/]每个成员家族都控制着王国政府的不同分支。

original: Coraline: House Steelwind oversees national defense and law enforcement.
translation: Coraline: 斯蒂尔文德家掌管国防与执法机关。

original: Coraline: House Frega oversees economic development and finances.
translation: Coraline: 弗雷加家负责金融与经济发展。

original: Coraline: House von Sanctus handles commerce,[p/] both local and international.
translation: Coraline: 冯·桑克图斯家负责商业，[p/]本地和国际均有。

original: Coraline: And finally,[p/] there's House Sibyl.
translation: Coraline: 最后，[p/]就是希比尔家。

original: Coraline: We handle the kingdom's legislative and judicial branches.
translation: Coraline: 我们负责王国的立法与司法机关。

original: Tyrion: ...That would also mean you're responsible for our kingdom's justice system.
translation: Tyrion: ……所以我国的司法体系是你负责的。

original: Coraline: That is correct.
translation: Coraline: 正确。

original: Hm...[p/] With three of the Four Pillar House leaders dead,[p/] very few people will be able to challenge Aster.
translation: 嗯……[p/]现在四大支柱家族三家领主已死，[p/]基本没人能挑战阿斯特。

original: And since Aria was framed for it,[p/] House Steelwind will probably lose its influence as well.
translation: 如果阿莉亚被栽赃，[p/]斯蒂尔文德家也会因此失势。

original: Aster probably did all this to weaken the nobility's ability to challenge his rule.
translation: 阿斯特做这一切可能都是为了削弱贵族对他的威胁。

original: But that [i]still[/i] doesn't explain how Pierce and Celeste's biological parents fit into this.
translation: 但这<u>还是</u>不能解释塞莱斯特的血统以及皮尔斯与此有什么关系。

original: No...[p/] The Scaled Lord and his [i]kin[/i] have the authority to override the will of Wyverngarde's King.
translation: 不……[p/]鳞甲领主和他的<u>血亲</u>可以凌驾于国王的意愿之上。

original: And if Aster was worried about Celeste's parentage...[p/][s/] that can only mean...!
translation: 如果阿斯特会担心塞莱斯特的血统……[p/][s/]这只能意味着……！

original: A flood of memories comes back to you.
translation: 海量的记忆浮现于脑海之中。

original: ORYM: Celeste McCoy![p/][s/] By the authority of the Wyverngarde crown,[p/][s/] you’re under arrest!
translation: ORYM: 塞莱斯特·麦考伊！[p/][s/]我以维文加德皇室的名义逮捕你！

original: Noticing the commotion,[p/] three other knights rush to grab her and begin dragging her away.
translation: 意识到骚乱后，[p/]立刻有三位骑士上前抓住她，把她拖开。

original: She kicks and screams against them,[p/] desperately trying to break free.
translation: 她又踢又喊，[p/]拼命地想要挣脱。

original: Even between the three knights,[p/] it's taking all of their strength to subdue her.
translation: 甚至需要三位骑士使出全力才能制服她。

original: CELESTE: But I know more than one spell now.[p/] I actually just learned a few new spells today.
translation: CELESTE: 但我现在不只会那一种法术了，[p/]其实我今天新学会了好几种。

original: Aria: I’m sorry…[p/] “spells”?[p/] As in plural?
translation: Aria: 不好意思……[p/]“好几种”？[p/]复数个？

original: Aria: How long did it take you to learn these spells?
translation: Aria: 你学这些新法术用了多久？

original: CELESTE: A few hours, I think.
translation: CELESTE: 几个小时吧，大概。

original: ARIA: … [mind="She learned multiple spell formulas within a few [i]hours[/i]?!"/]
translation: ARIA: …… [mind="她几小时就学会了好几种新法术？！" /]

original: Mosourika: Ah![p/] So you come from the same humble beginnings that I do.
translation: Mosourika: 啊！[p/]就是说你和我一样出身平凡。

original: Mosourika: Which spells have you mastered?
translation: Mosourika: 你现在掌握了什么法术？

original: Celeste: Hm...[p/] I haven't really [i]mastered[/i] any of them.
translation: Celeste: 唔……[p/]我还没有<u>掌握</u>任何法术。

original: Celeste: I know about seven spells, though.
translation: Celeste: 不过我能用的有七种。

original: Mosourika: S-[p/][s/]Seven?! [mind="That's almost four times the amount that I know..."/]
translation: Mosourika: 七、[p/][s/]七种？！ [mind="快是我的四倍了……"/]

original: She's learned even more spells?
translation: 她还学了更多法术？

original: She's been picking them up rather quickly.
translation: 她的学习速度也太快了。

original: Rath: Make no mistake...[p/] Even in my human form,[p/] I have [i]always[/i] had the strength of an ancient dragon.
translation: Rath: 但不要误会……[p/]即使是人类形态，[p/]我也<u>一直</u>拥有古龙的力量。

original: Tyrion: This...[p/] can't be real.
translation: Tyrion: 这……[p/]不可能吧。

original: Celeste: What?[p/] What is it, Tyrion?
translation: Celeste: 什么？[p/]怎么了，提利昂？

original: It's absolutely crazy...[p/] But it [i]also[/i] makes a lot of sense.
translation: 这实在太疯狂……[p/]但这<u>也</u>能解释很多。

original: Her ridiculous strength.[p/] Her natural talent for learning magic.
translation: 她离谱的力量。[p/]她学习魔法的天赋。

original: She inherited [i]all[/i] of it from [i]him[/i]!
translation: <u>全部</u>都是她从<u>他</u>那里继承的！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Celeste: Are you okay?[p/] You got really pale all of a sudden.
translation: Celeste: 你没事吧？[p/]突然就脸色惨白。

original: Tyrion: I...
translation: Tyrion: 我……

original: Once you reveal this,[p/] there's no going back for her...
translation: 一旦揭晓这个事实，[p/]她就没有回头路了……

original: ...Do you even have any right to do this to her?
translation: ……你真的有权替她这么做吗？

original: No...[p/] Aria's freedom rides on this.
translation: 不……[p/]这关系到阿莉亚的自由。

original: And as much as it pains you,[p/] [i]this[/i] is the only way to save her [i]and[/i] Wyverngarde.
translation: 虽然让你很痛苦，[p/]但<u>这</u>是唯一能救她<u>和</u>维文加德的方法。

original: Tyrion: ...I'm sorry, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: ……对不起，塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: What?[p/][s/] Why are you apologizing?
translation: Celeste: 什么？[p/][s/]你道什么歉？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Tyrion: What I'm about to do could change your entire life...[p/] possibly in a way you don't want it to...
translation: Tyrion: 我接下来要做的事可能改变你的一生……[p/]可能不是你想要的……

original: Tyrion: It will place an unimaginable responsibility on your shoulders.[p/] But it's the only way to save Aria and stop him.
translation: Tyrion: 这会让你肩上承担庞大的责任。[p/]但这是唯一能阻止他并救出阿莉亚的方法。

original: Tyrion: So I'm sorry...[p/] Please forgive me for doing this.
translation: Tyrion: 所以我很抱歉……[p/]请原谅我这么做。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...Do you think one little life-changing event could ever change how I feel about you?
translation: Celeste: ……你以为一件“改变人生”的小事就能改变我对你的感情？

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Tyrion: ...Are you sure?
translation: Tyrion: ……你确定吗？

original: Celeste: I owe you [i]and[/i] Aria for what I did...
translation: Celeste: 是我欠你<u>和</u>阿莉亚的……

original: Tyrion: ...But [i]this[/i] is-
translation: Tyrion: ……但<u>这</u>可是——

original: Celeste: We need to do this to save Aria, right?
translation: Celeste: 我们只有这么做才能救阿莉亚，对吧？

original: Celeste: ...It's partly [i]my[/i] fault she's in this situation.
translation: Celeste: ……她会陷入这种境地也有一部分是<u>我的错</u>。

original: Celeste: But if my life is [i]really[/i] going to change because of this,[p/] just promise me something.
translation: Celeste: 但如果我的人生<u>真的</u>会因此改变，[p/]答应我一件事。

original: Celeste: ...U-[p/][s/]Um.
translation: Celeste: ……唔、[p/][s/]唔呃。

original: Tyrion: ...What is it?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么事？

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Take responsibility for what you're about to do.
translation: Celeste: 你、[p/][s/]你要对我负责。

original: Tyrion: Of course.[p/] I was [i]always[/i] going to do that,[p/] regardless of what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 当然。[p/]不管发生什么，[p/]我<u>一直</u>都是这么打算的。

original: Celeste: G-[p/][s/]Good...
translation: Celeste: 那、[p/][s/]那就好……

original: Aster: Hmph...[p/] Are you two done [i]flirting[/i] with each other?
translation: Aster: 哼……[p/]你们两个<u>调情</u>够了没有？

original: Aster: If you have nothing else to say,[p/] stop wasting all of our time.
translation: Aster: 如果没有其他要说的，[p/]就不要浪费我们的时间了。

original: Tyrion: Aster...
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特……

original: Tyrion: I [i]know[/i] who Celeste's father is.
translation: Tyrion: 我<u>知道</u>塞莱斯特的父亲是谁。

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/][s/] Really?!
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/][s/]真的？！

original: Aster: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Aster: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Aster: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] You're bluffing...[p/] You [i]have[/i] to be.
translation: Aster: 不、[p/][s/]不……[p/]虚张声势……[p/]你<u>肯定</u>是虚张声势。

original: Tyrion: Why don't we test that theory, then?
translation: Tyrion: 那干嘛不验证一下我的论点？

original: Tyrion: You said that no one could contest your rule of Wyverngarde aside from the Scaled Lord.
translation: Tyrion: 你说除了鳞甲领主，没人能换下你治理维文加德。

original: Tyrion: ...But there's [i]one[/i] more person, isn't there?
translation: Tyrion: ……但其实还有<u>一个</u>人，不是吗？

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: Lucio: What are you talking about...?
translation: Lucio: 你在说什么……？

original: Lucio: Only [i]the Scaled Lord[/i] has the political power to override the will of the king.
translation: Lucio: 只有<u>鳞甲领主</u>才有凌驾于国王意愿之上的政治权力。

original: Tyrion: ...And his kin, Lucio.
translation: Tyrion: ……还有他的血亲，卢西奥。

original: Lucio: Yes...[p/] I suppose that's-
translation: Lucio: 对……[p/]大概是——

original: Lucio: ...!
translation: Lucio: ……！

original: Tyrion: Aster de Wyverngarde,[p/] you [i]needed[/i] Celeste to die during the massacre.
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特·维文加德，[p/]你<u>需要</u>塞莱斯特在屠杀期间死亡。

original: Tyrion: It's because her existence would [i]always[/i] pose a threat to your rule.
translation: Tyrion: 因为她的存在会<u>一直</u>给你的统治造成威胁。

original: Celeste: ...Are you serious?!
translation: Celeste: ……你是认真的？！

original: Tyrion: People of the Wyverngarde nobility!
translation: Tyrion: 维文加德的贵族们！

original: Tyrion: Your current king was fearful of my bodyguard's parentage![p/][s/] And [i]now[/i] we know why!
translation: Tyrion: 你们的现任国王害怕我贴身护卫的血统！[p/][s/]<u>现在</u>我们知道了原因！

original: Tyrion: Celeste McCoy is the daughter of the Scaled Lord Rathallion:[p/][s/] Ancient Dragon and creator of all Arcane Magic!
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特·麦考伊的父亲是创造一切奥术的古龙，[p/][s/]鳞甲领主拉萨利昂！

original: Tyrion: ...Judging from your reaction,[p/] I'm right, aren't I?
translation: Tyrion: ……根据你的反应判断，[p/]我说中了，是不是？

original: Celeste: I'm...[p/][s/] half-dragon?!
translation: Celeste: 我是……[p/][s/]半龙人？！

original: Tyrion: Well, [i]I'm[/i] apparently part-angel.[p/] So you're in good company.
translation: Tyrion: 哎呀，<u>我</u>还有一半天使血统呢。[p/]你有伴了。

original: Rath: So that demon [i]was[/i] speaking the truth...
translation: Rath: 所以恶魔说的<u>是</u>真的……

original: Tyrion: Aster de Wyverngarde!
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特·维文加德！

original: Tyrion: As the Scaled Lord's kin,[p/] Celeste has the authority to pass judgment on you [i]and[/i] override your rule!
translation: Tyrion: 作为鳞甲领主的血亲，[p/]塞莱斯特有权凌驾于你的意愿之上，<u>并</u>对你下达判决！

original: Tyrion: And when you're gone,[p/] [i]she[/i] will take your place as the ruler of Wyverngarde!
translation: Tyrion: 你下台以后，[p/]<u>她</u>将会接管你的位置，统领维文加德！

original: Aster: Ms. McCoy...![p/] Think about this...
translation: Aster: 麦考伊女士……！[p/]仔细想想……

original: Aster: Can you even begin to [i]grasp[/i] what it takes to lead a nation, much less this broken one?
translation: Aster: 你<u>想象得出</u>带领一个国家，一个坏掉的国家有多费力吗？

original: Aster: You’ll find this crown no less binding than [i]any[/i] Blood Contract!
translation: Aster: 王座的拘束也<u>不比</u>血契好多少！

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Just tell me one thing, Aster...
translation: Celeste: 阿斯特，告诉我一件事……

original: Celeste: ...Why did you do this to Aria?
translation: Celeste: ……为什么要这么对阿莉亚？

original: Celeste: She trusted you...[p/][s/] She [i]loved[/i] you!
translation: Celeste: 她信任你……[p/][s/]她<u>爱着</u>你！

original: Celeste: You could have changed Wyverngarde [i]together[/i] with her.
translation: Celeste: 你原本可以和她<u>一起</u>改变维文加德。

original: Celeste: And you could have done it all [i]without[/i] having to do any of this!
translation: Celeste: 你原本<u>不需要</u>做这些事！

original: Aster: Is [i]that[/i] what you really think?
translation: Aster: 你真是<u>这么</u>想的？

original: Aster: ...I suppose you would.
translation: Aster: ……是你的风格。

original: Aster: You probably also think Tyrion is the first person to try to change this nation,[p/] while still working within its laws.
translation: Aster: 你可能以为提利昂是第一个尝试改变国家的法律工作者。

original: Celeste: There’s nothing wrong with having ideals and working within the law!
translation: Celeste: 有理想和做法律工作并不冲突！

original: Aster: My father was like that too.
translation: Aster: 我父亲也是这样。

original: Aster: He was a man of ideals...[p/] once.
translation: Aster: 他是一个很理想化的男人……[p/]曾经是。

original: Aster: But I watched for my whole life as he was forced to compromise on [i]everything[/i] he believed in,[p/] one ideal after another.
translation: Aster: 但我一生都在看着他被迫妥协，[p/]理想一个接一个消失。

original: Aster: "It was to keep the peace."
translation: Aster: “都是为了和平”。

original: Aster: "We [i]must[/i] maintain the stability between the noble houses to uphold law and order."
translation: Aster: “我们<u>必须</u>维护贵族之间的稳定，才能守住法律与秩序”。

original: Aster: And do you know [i]who[/i] paid the price every time?
translation: Aster: 你知道每次付出代价的是<u>谁</u>吗？

original: Aster: Not him,[p/] not me,[p/] not [s/][i]any[/i] of the nobles gathered here.
translation: Aster: 不是他，[p/]不是我，[p/]更不是<u>任何</u>聚在那里的贵族。

original: Aster: No...[p/] The people who paid the price were the commonfolk.
translation: Aster: 不……[p/]付出代价的是平民。

original: Aster: The kind of people [i]you[/i] two are always trying to save.
translation: Aster: 是<u>你们</u>一直尝试拯救的平民。

original: Aster: I would have honestly thought you'd understand by now...
translation: Aster: 我真的以为事到如今你也该理解了……

original: Aster: A gulf exists between what is just and what is lawful in this kingdom...
translation: Aster: 这个国家的正义与合法之间隔着一条鸿沟……

original: Aster: I'd have thought that you two,[p/] out of [s/][i]everyone[/i],[p/] could have understood why I did this.
translation: Aster: 我以为<u>这么多人</u>里，[p/]至少你们两个，[p/]能理解我这么做的原因。

original: Tyrion: We [i]know[/i] it's not fair!
translation: Tyrion: 我们<u>知道</u>这不公平！

original: Tyrion: But we're capable of [i]changing[/i] it![p/][s/] And you [i]had[/i] the power to do just that!
translation: Tyrion: 但我们有能力<u>改变</u>这些！[p/][s/]你<u>本来也有</u>能力这么做！

original: Aster: I [i]AM[/i] changing it!
translation: Aster: 我<size=1.5em><u>正在</u></size>做出改变！

original: Aster: You worked [i]so[/i] hard to find the truth behind von Sanctus and Sibyl’s murders!
translation: Aster: 你<u>辛苦</u>找出了冯·桑克图斯与希比尔谋杀案的真相！

original: Aster: But here’s a little bit of "truth" that's evident to [i]everyone[/i] in this room [s/][i]except[/i] you two!
translation: Aster: 但还有一点[s/]<u>除了</u>你们两个，这里的<u>所有人</u>都知道的“真相”！

original: Aster: Half of the people present here today are [i]glad[/i] that they’re gone!
translation: Aster: 今天在场有一半人都为他们的死感到<u>高兴</u>！

original: Aster: And the [i]other[/i] half wants to be the ones to replace them!
translation: Aster: <u>另一半</u>则想取而代之！

original: Aster: The blood I shed in a single hour did more good for this kingdom than you two would have done in years!
translation: Aster: 对王国而言，我一小时内夺取的性命带来的好处比你们俩数年努力能做的都要多！

original: Tyrion: So [i]that’s[/i] how you plan on fixing this country’s problems?!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这</u>就是你修复王国现存问题的计划？！

original: Tyrion: By working with demons and [i]killing[/i] your way to a "brighter" future?!
translation: Tyrion: 就通过与恶魔合作，<u>杀</u>出一条通向“明朗”未来的血路？！

original: Aster: If I [i]have[/i] to,[p/] why not?!
translation: Aster: 如果我<u>必须</u>这么做，我会的！

original: Aster: Every day,[p/][s/] [i]across[/i] this nation,[p/][s/] commoners are killed and oppressed at the hands of the very nobles gathered here!
translation: Aster: 每一天，[p/][s/]这个王国里，[p/]都有平民被杀害，被压迫。[p/]罪魁祸首就是聚集在这里的贵族们！

original: Aster: They [i]bleed[/i] this country dry,[p/] and feed on its people like carrion!
translation: Aster: 他们把王国的<u>血</u>都吸干了，[p/]还要接着剥削人民！

original: Aster: ...I am merely returning a much-needed sense of equality.
translation: Aster: ……我只是在让王国恢复早该拥有的平等状态。

original: Aster: Do you really think [i]any[/i] of you are in a position to judge me?!
translation: Aster: 你真的觉得你们中<u>任何一个人</u>有权力评价我？！

original: Aster: All of you,[p/] who came running at the news of my father’s death?!
translation: Aster: 你们所有人，[p/]所有因为我父亲离世蜂拥而至的人？！

original: Aster: All so you could be the [i]first[/i] to fill my ears with your sycophantic praises!
translation: Aster: 你们都只是为了能<u>第一个</u>用阿谀奉承讨好我！

original: Aster: Do you know what the difference between the Empress of Discord and all of [i]you[/i] is?![p/][s/] That demon was just a [i]bit[/i] more honest!
translation: Aster: 知道无序女皇和<u>你们</u>所有人的区别是什么吗？！[p/][s/]恶魔都要比你们<u>诚实</u>一点！

original: Tyrion: Aria [i]wanted[/i] to change that![p/][s/] She would have helped you!
translation: Tyrion: 阿莉亚<u>想要</u>改变这些！[p/][s/]她本可以帮你！

original: Aster: Aria is too [i]stupid[/i] and too [i]naive[/i] to do [i]anything[/i]!
translation: Aster: 阿莉亚<u>做不到</u>！她太过<u>愚蠢</u>也太过<u>天真</u>！

original: Celeste: She loved you!
translation: Celeste: 她爱过你！

original: Celeste: How could you-?!
translation: Celeste: 你怎么能——？！

original: Aster: She loved her [i]idea[/i] of me!
translation: Aster: 她爱的是她<u>认为的</u>我！

original: Aster: She loved a [i]weak[/i] and [i]ineffectual[/i] prince,[p/] who would have borne watching his kingdom rot,[p/] with a damned [i]smile[/i]!
translation: Aster: 她爱的是那个<u>弱小</u>又<u>乏力</u>的王子，[p/]那个只会<u>傻笑着</u>看王国渐渐腐败的王子！

original: Celeste: S-[p/][s/]She loved your kindness, Aster.
translation: Celeste: 她、[p/][s/]她爱的是你的善良，阿斯特。

original: Aster: [i]THIS[/i] is kindness!
translation: Aster: <size=1.5em><u>这</u></size>就是善良！

original: Aster: The blood I will spill will be the greatest [i]kindness[/i] this kingdom has ever known!
translation: Aster: 我即将带来的腥风血雨就是这个王国有史以来最伟大的<u>善良</u>！

original: Aster: And once I am done,[p/] Wyverngarde will be better and stronger for it!
translation: Aster: 一旦我成功了，[p/]维文加德就会更加繁荣富强！

original: Celeste: Aster...
translation: Celeste: 阿斯特……

original: Aster: McCoy![p/][s/] I don’t care [i]what[/i] you are!
translation: Aster: 麦考伊！[p/][s/]我不管你是<u>什么</u>身份！

original: Aster: The Scaled Lord’s daughter?![p/][s/] The rightful heir?![p/][s/] [i]None[/i] of that matters to me!
translation: Aster: 鳞甲领主的女儿？！[p/][s/]合法继承者？！[p/][s/]<u>什么</u>都对我没用！

original: Aster: I will [i]save[/i] my kingdom and its people![p/][s/] And I will carve the rot out of its heart, piece by bloody piece!
translation: Aster: 我会<u>拯救</u>我的国家与子民！[p/][s/]我会从鲜血淋漓的核心处把腐肉一块一块挖出来！

original: Aster: Nothing will stand in my way!
translation: Aster: 没有什么能阻止我！

original: Aster: I am Aster de Wyverngarde![p/][s/] King of Wyverngarde,[p/][s/] and consort to the Lord of the Sixth!
translation: Aster: 我是阿斯特·维文加德！[p/][s/]维文加德的国王，[p/][s/]地狱第六层领主的伙伴！

original: Aster: I am-!
translation: Aster: 我是——！

original: Lucio: ...nothing but a dead man.
translation: Lucio: ……死人一个而已。

original: Lucio: [b]Vulnus[/b].
translation: Lucio: [b]Vulnus[/b].

original: Aster: Lu...[p/]cio...
translation: Aster: 卢……[p/]西奥……

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]No...!
translation: Celeste: 不、[p/][s/]不……！

original: Rath: ...Lucio.[p/] What have you done?
translation: Rath: ……卢西奥。[p/]你都干了什么？

original: Lucio: The Blood Contract, Cuthbert.
translation: Lucio: 卡斯伯特，血契。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Lucio: My daughter's Blood Contract![p/][s/] Does it still exist?!
translation: Lucio: 我女儿的血契！[p/][s/]还存在吗？！

original: You check your satchel...[p/] And sure enough,[p/] Aria's Blood Contract has completely disintegrated.
translation: 你检查了自己的包……[p/]理所应当的，[p/]阿莉亚的血契已经完全解体。

original: Tyrion: ...Its conditions have been fulfilled, haven't they?
translation: Tyrion: ……条件满足了，对吧？

original: Tyrion: Because they no longer [i]both[/i] live.
translation: Tyrion: 已经不是<u>双方</u>都生存的情况了。

original: Lucio: Excellent...
translation: Lucio: 好极了……

original: Rath: Lucio...[p/] This is...
translation: Rath: 卢西奥……[p/]这……

original: Rath: This is [i]not[/i] what we discussed!
translation: Rath: 这和我们说好的<u>不一样</u>！

original: Lucio: My daughter would never be free as long as that wretch lived.
translation: Lucio: 只要这个混球还活着，我女儿就无法自由。

original: Lucio: McCoy agreed to take his place.[p/] This was [i]always[/i] how it was going to end.
translation: Lucio: 麦考伊也同意登上王座。[p/]横竖都<u>只有</u>这种结局。

original: Tyrion: Lucio...[p/] You can't seriously expect to-
translation: Tyrion: 卢西奥……[p/]你不会觉得——

original: Lucio: Save your breath, Cuthbert.[p/] I already know.
translation: Lucio: 别费口舌了，卡斯伯特。[p/]我已经知道了。

original: Lucio: Kingsguard![p/][s/] What are you standing around for?!
translation: Lucio: 国王卫队！[p/][s/]都站在那儿干什么？！

original: Lucio: The Grand General has just committed regicide![p/][s/] Arrest him at once!
translation: Lucio: 大将军弑君了！[p/][s/]立刻逮捕他！

original: Tyrion: ...I suppose that's that, then.
translation: Tyrion: ……我想只能这样了。

original: Celeste: This doesn't really feel like something to celebrate...
translation: Celeste: 感觉不是什么值得庆祝的事……

original: Rath: I'm compelled to agree.
translation: Rath: 我也有同感。

original: Rath: ...To think that His Majesty was so far gone that he'd consort with a [i]demon[/i].
translation: Rath: ……没想到国王殿下会不惜与<u>恶魔</u>勾结。

original: Tyrion: ...All so he could "save" the commonfolk.
translation: Tyrion: ……都是为了“拯救”平民。

original: Regardless of his actions,[p/] he [i]did[/i] have the same goals as you.
translation: 行为暂且不提，[p/]他<u>确实</u>和你有一样的目标。

original: He truly wanted to make things better for the commonfolk.
translation: 他真心想要让平民过得更好。

original: Even with the Eye of Horus,[p/] you never caught a hint of the pain he must've been feeling.
translation: 即使有荷鲁斯之眼，[p/]你也没有感受到一丁点他内心无疑存在的痛苦。

original: He closely guarded his true emotions from everyone,[p/] including Aria.
translation: 对包括阿莉亚在内的所有人，[p/]他都严防死守，不感情外露。

original: No wonder Eris was able to manipulate him.
translation: 难怪厄莉斯能够把他玩弄于股掌之间。

original: You,[p/] of all people,[p/] know exactly how easily she can exploit that kind of weakness.
translation: 所有人里，[p/]你最清楚她能多么轻易地利用别人的弱点。

original: Rath: Nevertheless,[p/] it's apparent that there's no need to continue this trial.
translation: Rath: 不管怎样，[p/]很显然没有必要继续审理了。

original: Rath: Although,[p/] it's clear our work is only just beginning.
translation: Rath: 虽然，[p/]我们的工作也明显刚刚开始。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Rath: Court is adjourned for the time being.
translation: Rath: 现时间点休庭。

original: Rath: You are all free to return to your homes.
translation: Rath: 你们都可以回家了。

original: Rath: However,[p/] I'm sure there's still much for each of us to discuss.
translation: Rath: 但是，[p/]你们每个人肯定都还有要讨论的事。

original: Rath: Many things have changed here today,[p/] and I'm sure many of us will need to make arrangements to adapt.
translation: Rath: 今天很多事情都变了，[p/]很多人都要因此做出调整。

original: Rath: Until then,[p/] please refrain from discussing the events of today outside of these halls.
translation: Rath: 调整完毕之前，[p/]请不要对外透露今天发生在这里的任何事。

original: Rath: This goes without saying,[p/] but we must keep today's events a secret from the public.[p/] At least, for now.
translation: Rath: 自不必说，[p/]今天的事情必须对公众保密。[p/]至少现在如此。

original: You all exit the Scaled Lord's lair.
translation: 你们都离开了鳞甲领主的巢穴。

original: Considering everything that's happened,[p/] this [i]should[/i] feel like a victory.
translation: 考虑到发生了什么，[p/]这<u>理应</u>是一场胜利。

original: Aria was saved.[p/] Eris was vanquished...[p/] Temporarily, at least.
translation: 阿莉亚得救了。[p/]厄莉斯消失了……[p/]至少暂时消失了。

original: ...And the Patron no longer lives.
translation: ……签约人也已经死了。

original: Celeste: ...Hey.
translation: Celeste: ……嘿。

original: Tyrion: ...Hi.
translation: Tyrion: ……嗨。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: We won, didn't we?[p/] So why does this feel so...?
translation: Celeste: 我们不是赢了吗？[p/]为什么感觉会这么……？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I feel the same way.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]我也有同感。

original: Celeste: He was a terrible person.[p/] He [i]killed[/i] people.
translation: Celeste: 他是个烂人。[p/]他<u>杀了</u>人。

original: Celeste: He tried to kill us,[p/] and he used Aria like a puppet.
translation: Celeste: 他想杀了我们，[p/]他还利用阿莉亚当傀儡。

original: Celeste: But I really wish we could have-
translation: Celeste: 但我真的希望我们可以——

original: Tyrion: ...Changed his mind?
translation: Tyrion: ……改变他的想法？

original: Celeste: Yeah...
translation: Celeste: 是的……

original: Tyrion: ...Sometimes people are [i]beyond[/i] saving.
translation: Tyrion: ……有时候人们病入膏肓，已经<u>救不回来</u>了。

original: Tyrion: And I think he made up his mind a [i]long[/i] time ago.
translation: Tyrion: 我觉得他<u>很早</u>就下定了决心。

original: Tyrion: He [i]knew[/i] what he was doing to Aria,[p/] and [i]I[/i] can't think of any other way we could've truly freed her.
translation: Tyrion: 他<u>知道</u>自己在对阿莉亚做什么，[p/]<u>我</u>也想不出其他能让阿莉亚真正解脱的方法。

original: Celeste: I know...[p/] I just hope she's-
translation: Celeste: 我知道……[p/]我只是希望她——

original: Aria: Hello.[p/] I'm glad I found you before you left.
translation: Aria: 你们好。[p/]很高兴赶在你们离开之前遇上了。

original: You freeze up when you look at her.
translation: 你看向她的瞬间就呆住了。

original: More specifically,[p/] you're a little disturbed by what the Eye of Horus is showing you.
translation: 更确切地说，[p/]荷鲁斯之眼展示的东西让你有点不安。

original: Celeste: O-[p/][s/]Oh...[p/] Aria!
translation: Celeste: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……[p/]阿莉亚！

original: Celeste: I-[p/][s/]I'm so sorry, I-
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/][s/]我很抱歉，我——

original: Aria: ...Why are you apologizing?
translation: Aria: ……为什么你要道歉？

original: Celeste: What...?
translation: Celeste: 什么……？

original: Aria: If it's about your testimony,[p/] I'm afraid I [i]will[/i] need to charge you with perjury.
translation: Aria: 如果是因为你的证言，[p/]那我可能确实<u>会</u>指控你犯伪证罪。

original: Celeste: Ah,[p/] right...
translation: Celeste: 啊，[p/]这个……

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/][s/] Seriously?!
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/][s/]真假的？！

original: Celeste: Come on![p/][s/] I'm [i]basically[/i] your boss now!
translation: Celeste: 拜托！[p/][s/]我现在<u>基本</u>等同于你的老大！

original: Aria: No one is above the law.[p/] That was made apparent when-
translation: Aria: 没有人凌驾法律之上。[p/]这一点能从——

original: She suddenly stops talking before she mentions his name.
translation: 她在提及他的名字之前顿住了。

original: She doesn't trail off.[p/] Her voice doesn't even break.
translation: 没有声音渐弱，[p/]也没有颤抖。

original: She simply...[p/] stops.[p/] It's as if she were a machine that ceased functioning.
translation: 只是单纯……[p/]戛然而止。[p/]仿佛她是台因故障停止的机器。

original: Celeste: Um...[p/] Aria?
translation: Celeste: 呃……[p/]阿莉亚？

original: Aria: ...Anyways,[p/] I'm sure it's nothing to worry about.
translation: Aria: ……总之，[p/]我敢肯定没什么好担心的。

original: Aria: You [i]do[/i] have a talented defense counsel after all.
translation: Aria: 毕竟你<u>确实</u>有一个天赋异禀的辩护人相伴。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: R-[p/][s/]Right...
translation: Tyrion: 呃、[p/][s/]是啊……

original: You really want to say something back,[p/] but you're too off-put to say anything.
translation: 你很想回复些什么，[p/]但强烈的违和感让你不知怎么应答。

original: Aria: Anyways,[p/] I wanted to thank you for the work you've done, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 总之，[p/]我想感谢你所做的工作，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: I truly mean it when I say you have my gratitude.
translation: Aria: 我由衷地表示感谢。

original: Tyrion: U-[p/][s/]Um...[p/] Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...[p/] Of course.
translation: Tyrion: 呃、[p/][s/]嗯……[p/]当、[p/][s/]当然了……[p/]我应该做的。

original: Aria: Anyways,[p/] I have much work to get done now that my-...
translation: Aria: 总之，[p/]我还有更多工作要做，因为我的——

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: ...Now that the Grand General is in custody.
translation: Aria: ……我的父亲，大将军被关押了。

original: Aria: I'll be taking my leave.
translation: Aria: 我就先告辞了。

original: Tyrion: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...
translation: Tyrion: 好、[p/][s/]好的……

original: Celeste: What was [i]that[/i] all about?
translation: Celeste: <u>这</u>是演的哪一出啊？

original: Celeste: Why didn't you say anything to her?
translation: Celeste: 你怎么什么都没说啊？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...[p/] I didn't see [i]anything[/i] through the Eye...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……[p/]我的荷鲁斯之眼<u>什么</u>都没看到……

original: Celeste: ...She must be subconsciously guarding her emotions.
translation: Celeste: ……她一定是在无意识地保护自己的感情。

original: Celeste: I guess I don't really blame her.
translation: Celeste: 我觉得这不能怪她。

original: Tyrion: No, Celeste...[p/] I didn't see [i]anything[/i].
translation: Tyrion: 不是的，塞莱斯特……[p/]我<u>什么</u>都没看到。

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: I looked at her with the Eye.[p/] She wasn't holding anything back.
translation: Tyrion: 我用荷鲁斯之眼看了。[p/]她没在抑制情感。

original: Tyrion: ...And even with that,[p/] I saw...[p/] nothing.
translation: Tyrion: ……即使如此，[p/]我也……[p/]什么都没看到。

original: Tyrion: There was no anger,[p/] no sadness,[p/] no fear,[p/] no joy...
translation: Tyrion: 没有愤怒，[p/]没有伤心，[p/]没有恐惧，[p/]没有喜悦……

original: Tyrion: I've used the Eye to see the emotions of a [i]countless[/i] amount of people.
translation: Tyrion: 我对<u>数不清的</u>人用过荷鲁斯之眼来窥测感情。

original: Tyrion: But I've [i]never[/i] seen that before...
translation: Tyrion: 但我<u>从没</u>见过这种情况……

original: Tyrion: It was like I was looking at a machine.
translation: Tyrion: 就好像是在看一台机器。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: B-[p/][s/]But you're right...[p/] I should have said something...
translation: Tyrion: 但、[p/][s/]但你说得对……[p/]我应该说点什么的……

original: Tyrion: I'm going to-
translation: Tyrion: 我会去——

original: As you're about to chase after her,[p/] Celeste stops you.
translation: 你正打算追赶她之前，[p/]塞莱斯特阻止了你。

original: Celeste: ...Do you mind if [i]I[/i] talk to her?
translation: Celeste: ……能不能让<u>我</u>和她聊聊？

original: Tyrion: What?[p/] ...Are you sure?
translation: Tyrion: 什么？[p/]……你确定？

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] We actually hang out a lot outside of the trials...
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]我们庭审以外也经常一起玩……

original: Celeste: I think she might respond better to me.
translation: Celeste: 感觉她对我应该更能敞开心扉。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You remember the comforting feeling of her hand in yours.
translation: 你想起了握着她手时获得的安心感。

original: Tyrion: ...Alright,[p/] I suppose I'll let you handle it.
translation: Tyrion: ……好的，[p/]就交给你了。

original: Once again,[p/] you remember the comforting feeling of her hand in yours.
translation: 你再次想起了握着她手时获得的安心感。

original: Tyrion: Just...[p/] you know...[p/] keep it verbal.
translation: Tyrion: 但是……[p/]你懂……[p/]只用口头方法。

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]Never mind...[p/] I don't know what I'm saying...
translation: Tyrion: 别、[p/][s/]别管我……[p/]我不知道自己胡说什么……

original: Tyrion: ...Just go.
translation: Tyrion: ……快去吧。

original: Celeste: Alright, you weirdo.
translation: Celeste: 好吧，小怪胎。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: It looks like you've gotten the acquittal of yet another client,[p/] but it didn't tie up [i]quite[/i] so neatly as you'd hoped.
translation: 结果而言，你又为一名委托人获得了无罪判决。[p/]但结局没有你预想的<u>那么</u>圆满。

original: Celeste: What do you mean, she's gone?!
translation: Celeste: 你说她走了是什么意思？！

original: Celeste: She was [i]just[/i] here!
translation: Celeste: 她<u>刚刚</u>还在这儿！

original: Knight: I-[p/][s/]I'm sorry, Your...[p/] Grace?
translation: Knight: 我、[p/][s/]我很抱歉，殿……[p/]殿下？

original: You may not know what the future has in store for the two of you.[p/] But perhaps that's okay.
translation: 虽然还不知道未来有什么等着你们俩，[p/]但也许没什么大不了的。

original: You have a feeling that as long as you have her...
translation: 感觉只要她在你身边……

original: No...[p/] As long as you have [i]everyone[/i],[p/] you can begin forging your own path.
translation: 不……[p/]只要<u>大家</u>都在你身边，[p/]你就能开始走出自己的路。

original: A path that is completely chosen by you this time.
translation: 一条完全由你自己决定的路。

original: Celeste: Damn it, Aria...[p/] Where are you?
translation: Celeste: 该死，阿莉亚……[p/]你去哪儿了？

original: Remus: ...!
translation: Remus: ……！

original: Celeste: O-[p/][s/]Oh...![p/] H-[p/][s/]Hello.
translation: Celeste: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……！[p/]你、[p/][s/]你好。

original: Remus: Ah...[p/] My apologies.
translation: Remus: 啊……[p/]失礼了。

original: Remus: I didn't mean to frighten you.
translation: Remus: 我不是要故意吓你。

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] It's fine.
translation: Celeste: 不、[p/][s/]不用……[p/]没事的。

original: Remus: ...
translation: Remus: ……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Remus: ...You're looking for Ms. Steelwind, aren't you?
translation: Remus: ……你在找斯蒂尔文德女士，对吧？

original: Celeste: Yeah![p/][s/] How'd you know?
translation: Celeste: 对！[p/][s/]你怎么知道？

original: Remus: ...She's been sitting outside my lair for a while.
translation: Remus: ……她在我的巢穴外面坐了有一会儿了。

original: Remus: I...[p/] [i]tried[/i] speaking to her,[p/] but...
translation: Remus: 我……[p/]<u>试着</u>和她交谈，[p/]但是……

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] I get it.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]我明白。

original: Celeste: I'm going to try talking to her.
translation: Celeste: 我会试着和她聊聊。

original: Remus: O-[p/][s/]Of course...
translation: Remus: 当、[p/][s/]当然了……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Rathallion.
translation: Celeste: 拉萨利昂。

original: Remus: Yes...?
translation: Remus: 我在……？

original: Celeste: I'm not mad at you, you know?
translation: Celeste: 我并不生你的气，明白吧？

original: Remus: What...?
translation: Remus: 什么……？

original: Celeste: I'm not sure [i]why[/i] you left me at the McCoy Tavern...
translation: Celeste: 我不知道你<u>为什么</u>把我留在麦考伊酒馆……

original: Celeste: But because of that,[p/] I got to be raised by my mom and dad.
translation: Celeste: 但也正因此，[p/]我才能被自己现在的父母抚养长大。

original: Celeste: And if I didn't live there,[p/] I would've never met Tyrion or Aria.
translation: Celeste: 如果没有住在那里，[p/]我也永远不会遇见提利昂或阿莉亚。

original: Celeste: I could never be mad about you giving me a life like that.
translation: Celeste: 我不会因为你给我这种人生而责怪你。

original: Celeste: Plus![p/][s/] Now I know that I'm half-[i]dragon[/i]!
translation: Celeste: 再说了！[p/][s/]我现在知道自己是半<u>龙</u>人！

original: Celeste: That's pretty cool, isn't it?
translation: Celeste: 这也太酷炫了不是？

original: Remus: Ms. McCoy...
translation: Remus: 麦考伊女士……

original: Celeste: Don't be so formal![p/] I'm technically your daughter, aren't I?
translation: Celeste: 别这么见外呀！[p/]我不是你的女儿吗？

original: Remus: ...!
translation: Remus: ……！

original: Remus: R-[p/][s/]Right...[p/] Celeste.
translation: Remus: 对、[p/][s/]对的……[p/]塞莱斯特。

original: Remus: ...
translation: Remus: ……

original: Remus: So...[p/] I've been meaning to ask...
translation: Remus: 所以……[p/]我一直想问……

original: Remus: About you and Mr. Cuthbert...[p/] Are you two-?
translation: Remus: 你和卡斯伯特先生……[p/]是不是在——？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Oh, wow![p/] [i]Look[/i] at how late it is!
translation: Celeste: 噢，哇噻！[p/]怎么<u>这么</u>晚啦！

original: Celeste: I'd better go talk to Aria, [i]right now[/i]!
translation: Celeste: 我<u>现在</u>！就得去找阿莉亚！

original: Celeste: I'll see you later, Scaled Dad![p/][s/] I-[p/][s/]I mean,[p/][s/] Scaled-!
translation: Celeste: 之后见，鳞甲老爸！[p/][s/]我、[p/][s/]我是说！[p/][s/]鳞甲——！

original: Celeste: Agh![p/][s/] Just-![p/][s/] Bye!
translation: Celeste: 哎呀！[p/][s/]不是——！[p/][s/]拜拜！

original: Remus: ...
translation: Remus: ……

original: Remus: She called herself my "daughter"...
translation: Remus: 她说自己是我的“女儿”……

original: Remus: Hmph...[p/] I suppose I understand how you feel now, Lucio.
translation: Remus: 唔……[p/]我现在理解你的感受了，卢西奥。

original: Celeste: ...Hey, Aria.
translation: Celeste: ……嘿，阿莉亚。

original: Aria: Oh, Celeste.[p/] What are you doing here?
translation: Aria: 噢，塞莱斯特。[p/]你来这儿干嘛？

original: Celeste: Just making sure you're doing okay...
translation: Celeste: 就是想看看你有没有事……

original: Celeste: You [i]are[/i] doing okay, right?
translation: Celeste: 你<u>真的</u>没事吧？

original: Aria: I am.[p/] There's no need to worry about me.
translation: Aria: 我没事。[p/]没有必要担心我。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: You're looking up at the sky.[p/] Are you looking at the stars?
translation: Celeste: 你在抬头看天。[p/]是在看星星吗？

original: Aria: I was looking at the moon.[p/] It's full tonight.
translation: Aria: 我在看月亮。[p/]今晚是满月。

original: Celeste: ...Do you mind if I watch it with you?
translation: Celeste: ……我能和你一起看吗？

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: Do what you want.[p/] I technically take orders from you now.
translation: Aria: 请便。[p/]我现在理论上要听你指挥。

original: Celeste: ...You know.[p/] It was also a full moon outside on the night my parents found me in their inn.
translation: Celeste: ……你知道吗。[p/]我的父母在酒馆里捡到我时也是满月之夜。

original: Celeste: That's why they named me "Celeste".[p/] It's the word for "heavenly bodies" in the draconic language.
translation: Celeste: 所以他们才给我起名“塞莱斯特”。[p/]龙语里的意思是“天上的星星”。

original: Aria: ...Is that so?
translation: Aria: ……是这样吗？

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] They told me they thought I was a gift from the Scaled Lord.
translation: Celeste: 对……[p/]他们说，当时觉得我是来自鳞甲领主的礼物。

original: Celeste: In a roundabout way,[p/] they were actually kind of right.
translation: Celeste: 绕了这么一大圈，[p/]他们反而说到点上了。

original: Celeste: It's a little funny when you think about it.
translation: Celeste: 想想还挺好玩儿呢。

original: Celeste: ...By the way,[p/] I never got to thank you for sticking up for me before.
translation: Celeste: ……顺便一提，[p/]我一直没机会感谢你为我挺身而出。

original: Aria: ...What?
translation: Aria: ……什么？

original: Celeste: Remember?[p/] You [i]jumped[/i] onto the stand when Tyrion manifested my Blood Contract.
translation: Celeste: 记得吗？[p/]你在提利昂展示我的血契时<u>跳上</u>了证人席。

original: Celeste: Not that I blame him,[p/] but I don't think even [i]he[/i] believed in me at that point.
translation: Celeste: 我不怪他，[p/]但我觉得那时就连<u>他</u>都不相信我。

original: Celeste: If you'd never done that,[p/] who [i]knows[/i] how this could have ended up?
translation: Celeste: 如果不是你，[p/]谁<u>知道</u>事情会怎么收场？

original: Celeste: I really appreciated you doing that.
translation: Celeste: 我真的很感谢你这么做。

original: Celeste: You're...[p/] a [i]really[/i] good person, Aria.
translation: Celeste: 你是……[p/]一个<u>很好</u>的人，阿莉亚。

original: Aria: I was merely doing what I thought was right...
translation: Aria: 我只是在做我认为正确的事情……

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] I guess that's what you've always done.
translation: Celeste: 是的……[p/]你一直是这么做的。

original: Celeste: You're...[p/] not [i]really[/i] going to charge me with perjury, are you?
translation: Celeste: 你……[p/]不会<u>真的</u>要起诉我伪证罪吧？

original: Aria: Of course I am.[p/] I was serious about that.
translation: Aria: 我当然会。[p/]我很严肃的。

original: Celeste: Damn it...
translation: Celeste: 该死……

original: Aria: But we [i]do[/i] require your help to hold the structure of our kingdom together.
translation: Aria: 但我们也<u>的确</u>需要你的帮助来让王国不会分崩离析。

original: Aria: We won't sentence you to prison,[p/] but I might have you do some community service.
translation: Aria: 我们不会让你服刑，[p/]但你可能要做点社区服务。

original: Celeste: Ugh...[p/] Fine...[p/] I guess I can live with that.
translation: Celeste: 呜呜……[p/]好吧……[p/]这我还是能做到的。

original: Aria: My father told me I was being too lenient.
translation: Aria: 父亲说我太仁慈了。

original: Aria: But I can understand the position you were put in.
translation: Aria: 但我能理解你的处境。

original: Aria: We all do stupid things for love, after all.
translation: Aria: 毕竟我们都为爱做了愚蠢的事。

original: Aria: ...........stupid.
translation: Aria: ………………愚蠢。

original: Celeste: Aria...?
translation: Celeste: 阿莉亚……？

original: Aria: H-[p/][s/]How...
translation: Aria: 我、[p/][s/]我怎么……

original: Aria: ...How could I be so [i]stupid[/i]?!
translation: Aria: ……我怎么会这么<u>愚蠢</u>？！

original: Celeste: H-[p/][s/]Hey...[p/][s/] You're not-!
translation: Celeste: 喂、[p/][s/]喂……[p/][s/]你并不——！

original: Aria: I am![p/][s/] I'm a complete and utter fool!
translation: Aria: 我蠢！[p/][s/]我就是个彻头彻尾的大笨蛋！

original: Aria: I [i]knew[/i] about Blood Contracts after what happened to Beatrice!
translation: Aria: 比亚特丽丝的事情之后，我是<u>知道</u>血契存在的！

original: Aria: I'm an [i]attorney[/i], for Lord's sake!
translation: Aria: 我是个<u>检察官</u>，巨龙在上！

original: Aria:  I've read [i]countless[/i] legal documents!
translation: Aria: 我读过<u>无数</u>法律文件！

original: Aria: And when I signed that Contract,[p/] I [i]knew[/i] something was wrong!
translation: Aria: 签订契约的时候，[p/]我<u>知道</u>哪里不对！

original: Aria: But I was just so [i]stupidly[/i] happy!
translation: Aria: 但我开心到<u>犯蠢</u>！

original: Celeste: That's not fair.
translation: Celeste: 这么说对你不公平。

original: Celeste: No [i]one[/i] could have expected him to do something like that.
translation: Celeste: <u>没有人</u>能预料到他会做这种事。

original: Aria: Now my father...[p/] h-[p/][s/]he's going to pay for my [i]stupid[/i] mistakes!
translation: Aria: 现在我的父亲……[p/]他、[p/][s/]他要为了我的<u>愚蠢</u>而献身！

original: Celeste: ...I'm sorry.
translation: Celeste: ……我很抱歉。

original: Aria: Celeste.[p/] Why did I trust him so much?
translation: Aria: 塞莱斯特。[p/]我怎么会这么信任他？

original: Aria: He used me like a puppet...[p/] With [i]my[/i] hands and [i]my[/i] magic,[p/] he made me-[p/][s/]...
translation: Aria: 他把我当成一个傀儡……[p/]用<u>我的</u>魔法和<u>我的</u>双手，[p/]他操控我——[p/][s/]……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: I'm sorry, Aria.[p/] I...
translation: Celeste: 我很抱歉，阿莉亚。[p/]我……

original: Celeste: What he did to you was horrible,[p/] and I don't know how to make it better.
translation: Celeste: 他对你做的事糟糕透顶，[p/]我也不知道该怎么办。

original: Celeste: But you're not alone, okay?
translation: Celeste: 但你不是一个人，明白吗？

original: Celeste: It's not just me.
translation: Celeste: 不光是我。

original: Celeste: Tyrion,[p/] your father,[p/] we're all here for you.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂，[p/]你的父亲，[p/]我们都会陪着你。

original: Celeste: So please don't shut off your emotions from us.
translation: Celeste: 求求你不要对我们封闭自己的心。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: ...Thank you.
translation: Aria: ……谢谢你。

original: Aria: Celeste...[p/] I think I've made a decision.
translation: Aria: 塞莱斯特……[p/]我决定好了。

original: Celeste: What's that...?
translation: Celeste: 是指……？

original: Aria: ...I'm going to drop the charges of perjury against you.
translation: Aria: ……我不会起诉你的伪证罪。

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/] Are we still on that?
translation: Celeste: 不是……[p/]还在说这个？

original: Remus: Mr. Cuthbert,[p/] I've spoken with my associates in the press.
translation: Remus: 卡斯伯特先生，[p/]我和负责新闻报道的联系人谈过了。

original: Remus: The story we created should be printed as we speak.
translation: Remus: 和你交谈的同时，他们应该也在印刷我们编造的故事。

original: Celeste: ...I don't like this.
translation: Celeste: ……我不喜欢这样。

original: Celeste: We're lying to the people of Wyverngarde about what [i]really[/i] happened.
translation: Celeste: 我们是在欺骗维文加德人民，隐瞒<u>真正</u>发生的事。

original: Celeste: Not to mention,[p/] this story paints me like I'm some kind of god.
translation: Celeste: 更不用说，[p/]这故事把我描绘的像个神。

original: Tyrion: I understand your reservations,[p/] but Aster [i]was[/i] right about how the commonfolk felt about him.
translation: Tyrion: 我理解你的顾虑，[p/]但阿斯特对于平民的印象这一点没说错。

original: Tyrion: If we told the people what [i]actually[/i] happened-
translation: Tyrion: 即使我们把<u>真正</u>发生的事公之于众——

original: Aria: They would never believe it.
translation: Aria: 他们也绝对不会相信的。

original: Aria: They'd think that his death was a part of some sort of political conspiracy.
translation: Aria: 他们只会觉得阿斯特的死是什么政治阴谋的一部分。

original: Aria: And even [i]with[/i] this cover story,[p/] we can't be certain that they [i]still[/i] won't suspect that.
translation: Aria: 即使<u>有</u>这个故事作掩护，[p/]我们也不敢说他们<u>就会</u>毫无疑心。

original: Tyrion: A-[p/][s/]Aria?!
translation: Tyrion: 阿、[p/][s/]阿莉亚？！

original: Celeste: Shouldn't you be resting?!
translation: Celeste: 你不是该歇着吗？！

original: Aria: Nonsense,[p/] I'm not going to sit around feeling sorry for myself while everyone else fixes my mistakes.
translation: Aria: 无稽之谈，[p/]在别人为了修正我犯的错忙里忙外时，[p/]我可不会只坐在旁边黯然神伤。

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: She may be hiding her pain behind a smile,[p/] but she's not shutting down her emotions like before.
translation: 也许她在用笑容隐藏自己的痛，[p/]但她确实不像之前那样封闭感情了。

original: ...Was Celeste able to get through to her?
translation: ……是塞莱斯特成功说服了她吗？

original: Aria: As much as it pains me,[p/] we should strive to carry forth the virtues that His-...[p/] that [i]Aster[/i] represented to the commonfolk.
translation: Aria: 虽然让我痛苦，[p/]但我们应该继续发扬他的……[p/]<u>阿斯特</u>在平民心中代表的美德。

original: Aria: Wyverngarde will gain more from those false virtues than from the person that he truly was.
translation: Aria: 比起真实的他，伪装的他身上有更多让维文加德受益的美德。

original: Aria: The stability of our nation must be maintained if we're to move forward,[p/] and if we must use the people's piety to do that,[p/] then so be it.
translation: Aria: 若想继续前进，[p/]维护我国秩序稳定必不可少。[p/]如果不得不利用人们的虔诚，[p/]那也无所谓。

original: Celeste: Aria...
translation: Celeste: 阿莉亚……

original: Aria: And as the newly appointed head of House Steelwind,[p/] I will also do my part to support your rule.
translation: Aria: 作为斯蒂尔文德家最新就任的首领，[p/]我也会尽我的本分协助你治理国家。

original: Remus: As will the Scaled Lord.
translation: Remus: 鳞甲领主也会。

original: Celeste smiles in gratitude to their words,[p/] but she meekly glances at you expectantly.
translation: 塞莱斯特对他们露出了感激的笑容，[p/]但她又轻轻用期许的眼神看着你。

original: Tyrion: ...Do you even have to ask?
translation: Tyrion: ……这还用问吗？

original: Tyrion: I made a promise to you,[p/] didn't I?
translation: Tyrion: 我对你保证过，[p/]不是吗？

original: Celeste: Hehe...
translation: Celeste: 嘻嘻……

original: Tyrion: And it's not just us.[p/] I'll do my best to make sure that the rest of Wyverngarde supports you too.
translation: Tyrion: 也不只是我们。[p/]我会尽可能确保维文加德其他人也都支持你。

original: Celeste: Oh, yeah.[p/] Since you two patched things up,[p/] we could also ask for Ruby's help.
translation: Celeste: 噢，对。[p/]既然你们俩和好了，[p/]我们也可以找鲁比帮忙。

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Tyrion: Ah, right![p/] I forgot that I was supposed to meet with her this morning.
translation: Tyrion: 啊，对！[p/]我都忘了今早本应和她见面。

original: Tyrion: ...I'll need to apologize to her about that.
translation: Tyrion: ……这一点我得对她道歉。

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/][s/] Have you [i]still[/i] not told her about what happened yet?!
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/][s/]你到现在<u>还</u>没告诉她发生了什么？！

original: Tyrion: We had more important things to worry about.[p/] I'm sure that she'll understand.
translation: Tyrion: 当时我们有更重要的事要操心。[p/]我相信她会理解的。

original: Celeste: Tyrion,[p/] the last time you saw her,[p/] you manifested a Blood Contract without explaining anything.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂，[p/]上一次见到她时，[p/]你什么都不解释就展示了一份血契。

original: Celeste: [i]Then[/i] you vaguely said something about helping Aria.
translation: Celeste: <u>然后</u>你含糊不清地说了帮助阿莉亚之类的话。

original: Tyrion: Don't worry.[p/] I'll explain everything to her once things quiet down.
translation: Tyrion: 别担心。[p/]一旦局势冷静下来，我会对她解释一切的。

original: Celeste: Tyrion![p/][s/] That story we fabricated is being printed right [i]now[/i]!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂！[p/][s/]我们编的故事<u>现在</u>就在印刷！

original: Celeste: [i]Everyone[/i] in Wyverngarde is going to read about it in the paper,[p/] [i]including[/i] her!
translation: Celeste: <u>包括</u>她在内，维文加德的<u>所有人</u>都会在读新闻时知道的！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 哦……

original: Ruby: ...What's all of this noise about?
translation: Ruby: ……怎么这么吵？

original: Merchant: What?![p/][s/] Have you been living under a rock, lady?!
translation: Merchant: 什么？！[p/][s/]大姐你是什么隐世仙人吗？！

original: Merchant: Read the morning paper![p/][s/] The Scaled Lord has returned!
translation: Merchant: 读读晨报吧！[p/][s/]鳞甲领主回来了！

original: Ruby: What...?
translation: Ruby: 什么……？

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: ..."Demonic Attack Claims Lives of Prominent Figures"?
translation: Ruby: ……“恶魔的袭击夺走多位知名人物性命”？

original: "Chaos broke out yesterday during the private wedding between Aria Steelwind and Crown Prince Aster de Wyverngarde."
translation: “阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德与王储阿斯特·维文加德的婚礼于昨日举办，席间爆发了混乱”。

original: "In a surprise attack orchestrated by a malevolent demon,[p/] a devastating loss was inflicted upon our kingdom,[p/] shattering the very foundations of our power and stability."
translation: “在歹毒恶魔谋划的突然袭击中，[p/]王国承受了惨痛损失，[p/]影响了我国国力与秩序的根基”。

original: "The carnage left in the wake of this abyssal assault was nothing short of catastrophic."
translation: “来自深渊的袭击造成了腥风血雨，留下的也都是灾难级后果”。

original: "Among the fallen were Lady Coraline Sibyl,[p/] Lord Lloyd von Sanctus,[p/] and Lord Lucio Steelwind."
translation: “伤亡人员中包括卡洛琳·希比尔小姐，[p/]洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯勋爵，[p/]还有卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德勋爵”。

original: "Both King Olivier and Crown Prince Aster made a heroic attempt to repel the foul monster."
translation: “奥利维尔王和王储阿斯特为了驱逐恶魔英勇斗争”。

original: "And while the profane demon was felled and defeated,[p/] the King and the Crown Prince tragically lost their lives in the ensuing battle."
translation: “肮脏的恶魔被打倒了，[p/]国王与王储也在战斗时不幸失去了性命”。

original: "However,[p/] amidst the chaos and despair,[p/] a glimmer of hope emerged to prevent the kingdom from descending into further disarray."
translation: “但是，[p/]混乱与绝望之间，[p/]还是有一线希望阻止王国陷入泥沼”。

original: "The Scaled Lord himself descended from the heavens,[p/] restoring order,[p/] and making a profound proclamation."
translation: “鳞甲领主亲自从天堂下凡，[p/]恢复秩序，并且庄严宣告”。

original: "In a [i]selfless[/i] act to maintain the integrity and unity of Wyverngarde,[p/] the Scaled Lord anointed his holy daughter as the new Queen of Wyverngarde."
translation: “为了维护维文加德的团结与稳定，[p/]鳞甲领主<u>无私</u>地任命自己的女儿为维文加德新女皇”。

original: Ruby: ...What?
translation: Ruby: ……什么？

original: Ruby: Ugh...[p/] [i]Again[/i] with this Scaled Lord nonsense...
translation: Ruby: 呃……[p/]<u>又是</u>这套鳞甲领主的胡说八道……

original: Ruby: This [i]reeks[/i] of a violent political coup.
translation: Ruby: <u>感觉</u>像是什么暴力政变。

original: Ruby: Whoever this new queen is,[p/] I bet she's just [i]another[/i] rotten noble.
translation: Ruby: 不管这新女皇是谁，[p/]我都敢打包票是<u>又一个</u>恶臭贵族。

original: Ruby: Hmph...[p/] It says there's a picture of her on the next page.
translation: Ruby: 唔……[p/]上面说下一页有她的照片。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: ...!
translation: Ruby: ……！

original: Ruby: Wait...[p/][s/] WHAT THE [i]FU[/i][p/]
translation: Ruby: 等等……[p/][s/]<size=1.5em>这什么<u>狗屁</u></size>[p/]

original: Rhys: After hearing about what happened to my former Lord,[p/] I've thought a lot about my actions.
translation: Rhys: 听说前主人发生了什么之后，[p/]我也针对自己的行为想了很多。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Rhys: I won't ask you to forgive me, Your Majesty.
translation: Rhys: 我不会奢求你原谅我，女皇陛下。

original: Rhys: But I want to continue to atone for all the harm I've caused.
translation: Rhys: 我只是想来赎清我造成的罪过。

original: Miriam: I will continue my studies in the field of [b]conjuration[/b].
translation: Miriam: 我会继续在[b]召唤术[/b]领域深造。

original: Miriam: With the kingdom in such disarray,[p/] it falls onto people like [i]me[/i] to maintain order.
translation: Miriam: 王国这么混乱的情况下，[p/]维护秩序的责任就落在了<u>我</u>这种人身上。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Miriam: Why are you looking at me like that?!
translation: Miriam: 干嘛这么看着我？！

original: Valerie: We'd never be able to do this if it weren't for [i]your[/i] investment in our cafe.
translation: Valerie: 如果不是<u>你的</u>投资，我们的咖啡馆是做不到这些的。

original: Aria: I feel partially responsible for what happened at the Imperial Academy.
translation: Aria: 我感觉自己对帝国学院的事要负一部分责任。

original: Aria: I'd like to make amends however I can.
translation: Aria: 我会尽可能将功补过的。

original: Valentina: Don't worry about [i]that[/i]!
translation: Valentina: <u>这个</u>不用担心！

original: Valentina: Business has been [i]booming[/i] ever since we set up shop in Ratholme!
translation: Valentina: 在搬到瑞思霍姆以后，生意一直好到<u>爆棚</u>！

original: Jan: Ugh...[p/] But more customers just means more work for me.
translation: Jan: 唉……[p/]更多顾客也意味着我要干更多活。

original: Wallace: I've been developing my necromancy ever since I began working under Lord Asclepius.
translation: Wallace: 开始为阿斯克勒庇俄斯勋爵工作后，我一直在继续钻研死灵术。

original: Wallace: I think I've grown quite good at it.
translation: Wallace: 感觉我已经成长得很优秀了。

original: Lazarick: Don't get ahead of yourself.[p/] You've grown [i]competent[/i] at it.
translation: Lazarick: 不要骄傲自满。[p/]你的成长只能说<u>合格</u>了。

original: Wallace: ...
translation: Wallace: ……

original: Lazarick: T-[p/][s/]That was a joke.
translation: Lazarick: 我、[p/][s/]我开玩笑呢。

original: Lazarick: [i]You're[/i] probably the best necromancer I know.
translation: Lazarick: <u>你是</u>我所知最优秀的死灵法师。

original: Lazarick: ...Aside from [i]me[/i],[p/] of course.
translation: Lazarick: ……当然是除<u>我</u>以外。

original: Theodore: ...I'm sorry,[p/] but I still can't remember anything.
translation: Theodore: ……很抱歉，[p/]但我还是什么都回忆不起来。

original: Theodore: ...But from what I've read in my record,[p/] perhaps that's a [i]good[/i] thing.
translation: Theodore: ……但看了我自己的记录后，[p/]可能还是不知道比较<u>好</u>。

original: Aria: Even if your memories are gone,[p/] your crimes can't be changed.
translation: Aria: 虽然你的记忆不见了，[p/]犯下的罪还是不会改变。

original: Aria: You still have to serve your sentence,[p/] but I [i]do[/i] hope you can live out the rest of your life in peace.
translation: Aria: 你还是需要服刑，[p/]但我<u>希望</u>你能安稳度过余生。

original: Gavin: ...What [i]you[/i] lookin' at, punk?
translation: Gavin: ……小崽子，<u>你</u>瞅啥？

original: Gavin: Wait...
translation: Gavin: 等下……

original: Wyatt: Oh no...[p/] It's [i]you[/i].
translation: Wyatt: 哦不……[p/]是<u>你</u>。

original: Gavin: That crazy chick isn't with you,[p/][s/] is she?!
translation: Gavin: 那个疯娘们没和你在一起吧？！

original: Tyrion: Um...
translation: Tyrion: 呃……

original: Wyatt: ...Why you lookin' behind me, man?
translation: Wyatt: ……你怎么在看我身后啊，哥们？

original: Celeste: ...Did you just call me "crazy"?
translation: Celeste: ……你说谁是“疯娘们”？

original: Wyatt: Oh, Lord![p/][s/] Run for it, Gavin!
translation: Wyatt: 主啊！[p/][s/]快跑啊加文！

original: Stefanic: Good to see you, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Stefanic: 很高兴见到你，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Stefanic: From what I hear,[p/] you've certainly moved up in the world.
translation: Stefanic: 据我所知，[p/]你算是一飞冲天了。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] A [i]lot[/i] has happened.
translation: Tyrion: 对啊……[p/]发生了<u>很多</u>事。

original: Tyrion: I don't even know where to begin.
translation: Tyrion: 我都不知道从哪儿说起。

original: Tyrion: I'm glad to see the Refinery is doing well.
translation: Tyrion: 很高兴看到精炼厂如日中天。

original: Stefanic: Well, I suppose I have [i]you[/i] to thank for that.
translation: Stefanic: 这个嘛，我猜得感谢<u>你</u>。

original: Stefanic: You're quite the...[p/] What did Her Majesty call you?
translation: Stefanic: 你真是个……[p/]女皇殿下怎么说的来着？

original: Tyrion: *sigh*[p/] An angel investor...
translation: Tyrion: *叹气* [p/]天使投资人……

original: Stefanic: Yes![p/][s/] That's it.
translation: Stefanic: 对对！[p/][s/]就是这个。

original: Tyrion: Actually,[p/] I'm here on behalf of Her Majesty.
translation: Tyrion: 事实上，[p/]我就是代表女皇殿下前来。

original: Tyrion: We both had an idea for a business venture.
translation: Tyrion: 我们有一个创业的点子。

original: Tyrion: ...And we think it would set a good precedent if we employed a company with your business practices.
translation: Tyrion: ……我们也认为雇佣你所管理的公司可以开个好头。

original: Stefanic: Oh...[p/] I think I [i]like[/i] the sound of that.
translation: Stefanic: 噢……[p/]这话我很<u>喜欢</u>。

original: Liafal: I still have much to learn about leading a noble house.
translation: Liafal: 领导贵族这方面我还有很多要学。

original: Liafal: But I hope I can bring House Frega and Wyverngarde to a brighter future.
translation: Liafal: 但我希望自己能带领弗雷加家和维文加德走向光明的未来。

original: Aria: I think it's about time we ended the constant feuding between the Steelwinds and the Fregas.
translation: Aria: 我认为也是时候停止斯蒂尔文德与弗雷加之间的无尽争端了。

original: Aria: And I'd like for us to work together.
translation: Aria: 我希望双方能够合作。

original: Liafal: I may not know much,[p/] but that certainly sounds like a step in the right direction.
translation: Liafal: 我可能不算博学多识，[p/]但这在我听起来是正确的一步。

original: Tracker: Tracker will do best to help Queen.
translation: Tracker: 追追会尽心尽力帮助女皇。

original: Liafal: I appreciate the gesture, Tracker,[p/] but I don't think-
translation: Liafal: 我很感激你的好意，追追，[p/]但我不觉得——

original: Tracker: Banks need gold, right?
translation: Tracker: 银行需要金子，对吧？

original: Tracker: Tracker can dig for gold.
translation: Tracker: 追追能挖金子。

original: Eugene: ...
translation: Eugene: ……

original: Eugene: And that makes Checkmate, Cuthbert.
translation: Eugene: 这样就将军了，卡斯伯特。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...What?!
translation: Tyrion: ……搞什么？！

original: Celeste: Did you just [i]lose[/i]?!
translation: Celeste: 你这是<u>输了</u>？！

original: Tyrion: No![p/][s/] I [i]demand[/i] a rematch!
translation: Tyrion: 不行！[p/][s/]我<u>要求</u>重赛！

original: Eugene: ...Learn to lose with dignity, for Lord's sake.
translation: Eugene: ……巨龙在上，学学怎么输得体面吧。

original: Harold: ...I'm glad I let him keep those Armbands.
translation: Harold: ……很高兴我让他继续戴着臂章。

original: Theon: To think the Scaled Lord would [i]sacrifice[/i] his daughter for the good of our kingdom.
translation: Theon: 鳞甲领主竟然愿意为了我国而<u>牺牲</u>自己的女儿。

original: Celeste: Theon...[p/] I [i]want[/i] this job.
translation: Celeste: 希恩……[p/]我是<u>自愿</u>的。

original: Theon: Such humility...[p/] Such self-sacrifice.
translation: Theon: 多么谦虚……[p/]多么无私奉献。

original: Celeste: I'm [i]literally[/i] a queen!
translation: Celeste: 我可是个<u>女皇</u>！

original: Celeste: Who [i]wouldn't[/i] want this mantle?!
translation: Celeste: 谁会<u>不想</u>披这斗篷？！

original: Celeste: ...Actually,[p/] this job [i]is[/i] kind of annoying.
translation: Celeste: ……话说回来，[p/]这工作<u>确实</u>有点烦人。

original: Tyrion: ...Sorry.
translation: Tyrion: ……抱歉。

original: Celeste: Nah.[p/] As long as I have you with me,[p/] I'm happy.
translation: Celeste: 没事啦。[p/]只要你还和我在一起，[p/]我就很开心。

original: Orym: You may have everyone [i]else[/i] fooled,[p/] but I know how this story goes.
translation: Orym: 你能骗过<u>其他</u>人，[p/]但我知道怎么回事。

original: Orym: A mage is still a mage,[p/] and a noble is still a noble.
translation: Orym: 法师还是法师，[p/]贵族还是贵族。

original: Celeste: Come on.[p/] Don't be like that.
translation: Celeste: 拜托。[p/]别这样嘛。

original: Orym: Hey...[p/] If you want to prove me wrong,[p/] by all means...
translation: Orym: 喂……[p/]想证明我说得不对，[p/]就尽管试试……

original: Orym: But I ain't holding my breath.
translation: Orym: 我可不会抱什么期待。

original: Tyrion: I suppose you have every reason not to trust those in power.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道你有一万个理由不相信目前执政的人们。

original: Tyrion: But we [i]are[/i] going to fix this kingdom,[p/] and we're going to do it within the confines of the law.
translation: Tyrion: 但我们<u>会</u>修复这个国家的，[p/]我们也会遵守法律。

original: Alaric: ...
translation: Alaric: ……

original: Celeste: I really wish he would talk to us.
translation: Celeste: 我真希望他会和我们说话。

original: Aria: He needs time to process everything that happened.
translation: Aria: 他需要时间来消化发生的事。

original: Aria: And I don't think he'll be very receptive to us.
translation: Aria: 我不觉得他愿意搭理我们。

original: Aria: At least,[p/] not right now.
translation: Aria: 至少，[p/]现在不愿意。

original: Celeste: ...We should [i]probably[/i] hire a therapist.
translation: Celeste: ……我们<u>可能</u>应该请个心理咨询师。

original: Celeste: ...Are you okay?
translation: Celeste: ……你没事吧？

original: Aria: Yes...[p/] I really appreciate you coming here with me.
translation: Aria: 没事……[p/]很感谢你陪我来这儿。

original: Aria: His actions were absolutely deplorable...
translation: Aria: 他的行为令人发指……

original: Aria: I was hoping coming here would give me closure...[p/] But...
translation: Aria: 我以为来到这里就能解脱……[p/]但是……

original: Aria: With von Sanctus and Sibyl gone,[p/] we [i]have[/i] had a much easier time repairing our kingdom.
translation: Aria: 没了冯·桑克图斯和希比尔，[p/]修复王国<u>确实</u>容易许多。

original: Aria: I feel uneasy about all this...
translation: Aria: 这一切都让我不太好受……

original: Celeste: ...No.[p/] I also see what you mean.
translation: Celeste: ……没事。[p/]我也能理解你的话。

original: Celeste: He may have had good intentions,[p/] but he refused to let anyone work with him.
translation: Celeste: 可能他出发点是好的，[p/]但他拒绝和其他人合作。

original: Celeste: Even with Eris,[p/] they were just using each other.
translation: Celeste: 即使是厄莉斯，[p/]这两人也不过是相互利用。

original: Celeste: I do think he really wanted to change Wyverngarde.[p/] But he would [i]only[/i] do it on his own terms.
translation: Celeste: 我相信他是真心想要改变维文加德。但他<u>只愿</u>依自己的原则行事。

original: Celeste: Even if he [i]did[/i] end up achieving his goals,[p/] the legacy he'd leave behind would be one of blood.
translation: Celeste: 即使他最后<u>确实</u>达成了目标，留下的成果也会沾满鲜血。

original: Celeste: No lasting peace or justice could have that at its foundation.
translation: Celeste: 这样打下的基础没法拥有长久的和平公正。

original: Aria: That's...[p/] [i]surprisingly[/i] mature for you.
translation: Aria: 这话……[p/]成熟到<u>不像是</u>你会说的。

original: Celeste: Hey![p/][s/] I'm [i]always[/i] mature.
translation: Celeste: 喂！[p/][s/]我<u>一直</u>很成熟。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: Goodbye...[p/] Aster.
translation: Aria: 再见了……[p/]阿斯特。

original: Tyrion: Are you kidding me, Ruby?!
translation: Tyrion: 你逗我玩呢吗鲁比？！

original: Tyrion: What kind of ridiculous case [i]was[/i] that?!
translation: Tyrion: 这案子<u>是</u>什么天方夜谭？！

original: Ruby: Weren't [i]you[/i] the one who called a monkey to the stand during Beatrice's trial?
translation: Ruby: 审理比亚特丽丝时让猴子上台作证的不是<u>你</u>吗？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I suppose you have a point.
translation: Tyrion: 这……[p/]你说得有理。

original: Ruby: Truth is often stranger than fiction.
translation: Ruby: 真相总是比虚构更荒诞。

original: Ruby: [i]You[/i] should know that better than anyone.
translation: Ruby: <u>你</u>应该最清楚这一点。

original: Tyrion: Oh my god...[p/] I just realized...
translation: Tyrion: 老天爷啊……[p/]我刚意识到……

original: Tyrion: Is [i]this[/i] what I've been doing to Aria?
translation: Tyrion: 我就是一直<u>这么</u>对阿莉亚的？

original: Ruby: Hey.[p/] [i]You're[/i] the one that wanted to be lead prosecutor.
translation: Ruby: 嘿。[p/]是<u>你</u>自愿要当主席检察官的。

original: Tyrion: I'm only filling in for her until we can find a qualified replacement...
translation: Tyrion: 我只是在找到可靠代理者前暂时替代她而已……

original: Ruby: Well,[p/] if you ever get bored of life as a royal,[p/] there's always a spot open at my office.
translation: Ruby: 哎呀，[p/]要是皇家生活无聊了，[p/]我的事务所永远有你的位置。

original: Aria: ...I see they allowed you to keep your axe.
translation: Aria: ……看来他们允许你留下这把斧头。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: I thought I asked you to stop visiting me.
translation: Lucio: 我不是说过让你别来看我了吗。

original: Aria: You did...[p/] I merely chose to ignore you.
translation: Aria: 是说了……[p/]我只是选择无视你罢了。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] McCoy's impertinence is rubbing off on you.
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]麦考伊的无礼也传染给你了。

original: Aria: I'll take that as a compliment.
translation: Aria: 我就当是在夸我。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: I [i]am[/i] glad to see you in such good spirits.
translation: Lucio: 我<u>确实</u>很高兴看到你精神不错。

original: Lucio: I suppose I underestimated you.
translation: Lucio: 看来是我低估了你。

original: Beatrice: I'm surprised you're not sentencing me to death.
translation: Beatrice: 很惊讶你没判我死刑。

original: Beatrice: I [i]suppose[/i] I should be grateful.
translation: Beatrice: 我<u>可能</u>该感激你。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] We kind of need you alive so we know when Eris is back.
translation: Celeste: 这个……[p/]我们需要活着的你来判断厄莉斯有没有回归。

original: Beatrice: You're...[p/] [i]using[/i] me like a canary in a coal mine?!
translation: Beatrice: 你这是……[p/]<u>利用</u>我当警钟？！

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ……

original: Beatrice: I'm almost [i]proud[/i] of you two.
translation: Beatrice: 我都快要为你们两个<u>骄傲</u>了。

original: Beatrice: Although...[p/] I [i]am[/i] curious as to why she hasn't returned yet.
translation: Beatrice: 不过……[p/]我<u>确实</u>很好奇她怎么还没卷土重来。

original: Eris: What the [i]hell[/i] is this?!
translation: Eris: 搞什么<u>鬼</u>？！

original: Eris: Why are you preventing me from leaving?!
translation: Eris: 你为什么不让我离开？！

original: Asmodeus: ...Well, I can't very well let you make a fool of yourself a [i]second[/i] time.
translation: Asmodeus: ……哎，我不能让你<u>第二次</u>出洋相了。

original: Asmodeus: You are not to leave the Sixth Circle until I tell you otherwise.
translation: Asmodeus: 除非我下了命令，否则你不能离开地狱第六层。

original: Asmodeus: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: Asmodeus: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Eris: Are you...[p/] [i]grounding[/i] me?!
translation: Eris: 你要让我……[p/]<u>禁足</u>？！

original: Asmodeus: If you want to behave like a petulant child,[p/] I'll treat you like one.
translation: Asmodeus: 如果你想表现得像个不听话的小孩，[p/]那我就用对小孩的法子对付你。

original: Eris: I swear...[p/] When I get out of here...
translation: Eris: 我发誓……[p/]等我出去了……

original: Asmodeus: ...What have I told you about speaking in [i]future[/i] tense?
translation: Asmodeus: ……我不是跟你说不要乱讲<u>未来</u>的事？

original: Celeste: Are you sure you don't want to move into the castle with us, Mom?
translation: Celeste: 妈，你真的不想和我们一起搬到城堡里吗？

original: Jolene: No...[p/] I've grown attached to this place.
translation: Jolene: 不用了……[p/]我对这个地方有感情。

original: Jolene: It was your father's,[p/] and it doesn't seem right to abandon it.
translation: Jolene: 毕竟是你爸开的店，[p/]就这么抛弃它不合适。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] I get what you mean.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]我懂你的意思。

original: Jolene: Anyways,[p/] I want to give [i]you[/i] two some privacy.
translation: Jolene: 总之，[p/]我也想给<u>你们</u>一点二人空间。

original: Celeste: Mom...
translation: Celeste: 妈……

original: Jolene: So stop dragging your feet, Tyrion.
translation: Jolene: 别拖拖拉拉的了，提利昂。

original: Jolene: I want to live to see my grandkids.
translation: Jolene:  我还想抱孙子孙女呢。

original: Celeste: ...Mom!
translation: Celeste: ……妈！

original: Celeste: So...[p/] I was wondering.
translation: Celeste: 所以……[p/]我在想。

original: Celeste: You've lived for a [i]really[/i] long time, right?
translation: Celeste: 你活了<u>非常久</u>，对吧？

original: Remus: ...I have.
translation: Remus: ……对。

original: Celeste: Do I have any siblings?
translation: Celeste: 那我有兄弟姐妹吗？

original: Remus: No...[p/] I’m sorry.[p/] There was... [i]one[/i] many centuries ago,[p/] but I lost her.
translation: Remus: 没有……[p/]我很抱歉……[p/]很多世纪前有……<u>一个</u>，[p/]但我失去了她。

original: Remus: It was rare,[p/] even across the centuries,[p/] when I’ve sought...[p/] companionship.
translation: Remus: 即使这么多世纪过去，[p/]我会寻找……伴侣……的情况，[p/]也很少见。

original: Remus: Dragons are magical beings and the creation of offspring is rare.
translation: Remus: 龙族是魔法生物，罕有后代。

original: Remus: So much so,[p/] that it's a miracle that [i]you[/i] were born.
translation: Remus: 罕见到，[p/]<u>你</u>的诞生算是个奇迹。

original: Remus: I'm sorry,[p/] but you are alone.
translation: Remus: 我很抱歉，[p/]但你是独生子女。

original: Celeste: Hm...[p/] I don't really feel that way.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]我不这么觉得。

original: Celeste: I think I spend so much time with Aria,[p/] that she's basically my sister.
translation: Celeste: 我和阿莉亚太常一起玩了，[p/]她基本就是我妹妹。

original: Celeste: A-[p/][s/]And Tyrion...[p/] Well...
translation: Celeste: 还、[p/][s/]还有提利昂……[p/]呃……

original: Remus: ...
translation: Remus: ……

original: Remus: ...Perhaps I should have some words with Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Remus: ……不然我去跟卡斯伯特先生谈谈吧。

original: Celeste: Don't you [i]dare[/i].
translation: Celeste: 你<u>不准</u>去。

original: Mosourika: So we meet again, Crimson Demon!
translation: Mosourika: 绯红恶魔，我们又见面了！

original: Celeste: Who keeps [i]telling[/i] people about that nickname?!
translation: Celeste: 谁一直在<u>传播</u>这个外号啊？！

original: Tyrion: ...Who knows?[p/] It could have been anyone.
translation: Tyrion: ……谁知道呢？[p/]什么人都有可能。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……

original: Mosourika: ...You don't like it?
translation: Mosourika: ……你不喜欢？

original: Mosourika: I could help you come up with a new one.
translation: Mosourika: 我可以帮你想个新外号。

original: Celeste: I'm good.[p/] Thanks.
translation: Celeste: 不用了。[p/]谢谢。

original: Mosourika: How about...[p/] "Scaled Empress".
translation: Mosourika: 不如就……[p/]“鳞甲女皇”。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Okay...[p/] I actually [i]really[/i] like that.
translation: Celeste: 好吧……[p/]我还<u>挺</u>喜欢的。

original: Noah: Oh![p/] Ahoy, Cuthbert.
translation: Noah: 噢！[p/]早啊卡斯伯特。

original: Noah: I have everything ready for tonight.
translation: Noah: 今晚的东西我都准备好了。

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: ...I-[p/][s/]It's nothing!
translation: Tyrion: ……没、[p/][s/]没什么！

original: Tyrion: *whisper* Pretend like you don't know anything.
translation: Tyrion: *小声* 装作你什么都不知道。

original: Noah: ...What?
translation: Noah: ……啥？

original: Noah: Oh...[p/] I see.[p/] So it's for [i]her[/i].
translation: Noah: 喔……[p/]我懂了。[p/]是为了<u>她</u>啊。

original: Celeste: ...What are you doing?
