translation: Celeste: ……你们干嘛呢？

original: Tyrion: It's...[p/] a surprise.
translation: Tyrion: 是个……[p/]惊喜。

original: Celeste: ...Alright, whatever you say.
translation: Celeste: ……好吧，随你怎么说。

original: Celeste: Hey...[p/] Why'd you bring me out here?
translation: Celeste: 喂……[p/]你带我来这里干嘛？

original: Celeste: You're not usually this secretive.
translation: Celeste: 一般你可不会这么鬼鬼祟祟的。

original: Tyrion: Come on.[p/] It's a surprise.
translation: Tyrion: 哎呀，[p/]毕竟是个惊喜嘛。

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/] Is that a boat?
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/]一艘船？

original: Celeste: ...Are you going to be okay?[p/] I thought you were really prone to motion sickness.
translation: Celeste: ……你没问题吗？[p/]我以为你很容易晕船呢。

original: Tyrion: Don't worry.[p/] I've done this plenty of times before.
translation: Tyrion: 别担心。[p/]我之前练习过好几次了。

original: Celeste: Alright...[p/] If you say so.
translation: Celeste: 好吧……[p/]如果你坚持。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] It's really dark...[p/] Are you sure this is safe?
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]这里好黑……[p/]你确定安全？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] There will be plenty of light soon.
translation: Tyrion: 确定……[p/]马上就会有光了。

original: Celeste: "Soon"?
translation: Celeste: “马上”？

original: Tyrion: In about...
translation: Tyrion: 大概还有……

original: Celeste: ...Wow.
translation: Celeste: ……哇。

original: Tyrion: ...Right on schedule.
translation: Tyrion: ……分秒不差。

original: Celeste: You knew this would happen?
translation: Celeste: 你早就知道？

original: Tyrion: During certain times of the year,[p/] the leylines around Aurinax become extremely potent.
translation: Tyrion: 每年的特定时间里，[p/]欧奥耐克斯附近的地脉会活化。

original: Tyrion: A lot of the businesses here take advantage of this to charge the Arcane Power Cells in their homes.
translation: Tyrion: 很多做生意的都利用这一机会来给奥术储能单元充能。

original: Tyrion: And those effects are amplified when they do it simultaneously.
translation: Tyrion: 同时进行的话会强化这一效果。

original: Tyrion: [i]This[/i] is what happens when they synchronize with each other.[p/] It lights up the entire city.
translation: Tyrion: <u>这</u>就是他们彼此同步时的现象。[p/]整座城都会亮起来。

original: Celeste: ...You're such a nerd.
translation: Celeste: ……你这个技术宅。

original: Tyrion: But it's beautiful, right?
translation: Tyrion: 很漂亮啊，不是吗？

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] It is.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]是的，

original: Tyrion: ...My mom used to bring me out here before everything happened.
translation: Tyrion: ……一切发生之前，我妈妈会带我来这里。

original: Tyrion: You're the only other person I've ever shown this to.
translation: Tyrion: 除了她，你是唯一一个我带来这里的人。

original: Celeste: O-[p/][s/]Oh...
translation: Celeste: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: *sigh*[p/] I've really missed being able to spend time with you like this.
translation: Celeste: *叹气* [p/]我真的很想念能和你这么悠闲共度的日子。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] Me too.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]我也一样。

original: Celeste: It was so much simpler when you were just an attorney and I was your bodyguard.
translation: Celeste: 你当律师，我当护卫的日子要简单多了。

original: Celeste: But now I'm the Scaled Lord's daughter and [i]you're[/i] the lead prosecutor.
translation: Celeste: 可现在我是鳞甲领主的女儿，<u>你是</u>主席检察官。

original: Celeste: We barely get to see each other...
translation: Celeste: 我们几乎都见不到面……

original: Tyrion: But at least we're together now.
translation: Tyrion: 至少现在我们在一起。

original: Tyrion: And you have something to remember whenever we're apart.
translation: Tyrion: 分离时你也有能回忆的东西。

original: Celeste: ...Yeah. [mind="This is so sweet... I love him so much..."/]
translation: Celeste: ……是啊。 [mind="这也太甜蜜了……我好爱他……"/]

original: Tyrion: Um...
translation: Tyrion: 呃……

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……怎么了？

original: Tyrion: ...Y-[p/][s/]Your thoughts are leaking, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: ……你、[p/][s/]你的想法流露出来了，塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: What do you-?
translation: Celeste: 你说什——？

original: Celeste: ...?!
translation: Celeste: ……？！

original: Celeste: Agh![p/][s/] It's been so long, I forgot to-!
translation: Celeste: 啊啊！[p/][s/]分开太久了，我都忘了——！

original: Tyrion: ...Is something wrong?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么了吗？

original: She's always had a habit of teasing you.
translation: 她一直喜欢逗你。

original: So you can't help but enjoy putting her on the other end for once.
translation: 终于有反将一军的机会了，可不能错过。

original: Celeste: U-[p/][s/]Um...[p/][s/] I didn't really mean-
translation: Celeste: 呃、[p/][s/]呃……[p/][s/]我不是那个——

original: Celeste: W-[p/][s/]Wait![p/][s/] N-[p/][s/]No![p/][s/] I-[p/][s/]I [i]did[/i] mean it, but-
translation: Celeste: 等、[p/][s/]等下！[p/][s/]不、[p/][s/]不对！[p/][s/]我、[p/][s/]我<u>确实</u>是那个意思，但是——

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: *sigh*[p/] ...I know this is a really rude thing to say.
translation: Celeste: *叹气* [p/]……我知道这么说很无礼。

original: Celeste: ...But I kind of [i]hate[/i] the Eye of Horus sometimes.
translation: Celeste: ……但我有时候真有点<u>讨厌</u>荷鲁斯之眼。

original: Tyrion: *chuckles*[p/] ...I love you too, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: *笑着* [p/]……我也爱你，塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: O-[p/][s/]Oh...![p/][s/] Um...[p/][s/] Okay!
translation: Celeste: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……！[p/][s/]呃……[p/][s/]好的！

original: You try to inch closer to her.[p/] But she's trying her hardest to avoid eye contact with you.
translation: 你尝试离她近一点。[p/]但她拼尽全力在避免和你对视。

original: ...But there is [i]one[/i] way to make her meet your gaze.
translation: ……不过还有<u>一种</u>方法让她和你相视。

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion...[p/] I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Celeste: 提、[p/][s/]提利昂……[p/]我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Tyrion: ...Do you not want this?
translation: Tyrion: ……你不想吗？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...Of course I do.
translation: Celeste: ……我当然想。

original: Celeste: I've wanted this for a long time.
translation: Celeste: 我想好久了。

original: Celeste: I always find myself smiling like an idiot whenever we're together.
translation: Celeste: 和你在一起我总是笑得像个白痴。

original: Celeste: I...[p/] don't think I've ever felt this happy before.
translation: Celeste: 我……[p/]我不觉得自己之前这么开心过。

original: Your faces inch closer to each other.
translation: 你们的脸距离彼此只有几厘米。

original: You two may never be able to go back to your old lives.
translation: 你们两个可能都回不到以前的生活了。

original: But moments like [i]this[/i] make everything worth it.
translation: 但<u>现在</u>这种时刻让一切都值得。

original: Celeste: Y-[p/][s/]You'll always keep your promise, right?
translation: Celeste: 你、[p/][s/]你一直信守承诺，对吧？

original: Tyrion: No matter what happens...[p/] No matter where each of us goes,[p/] we'll go there together.
translation: Tyrion: 不管发生什么……[p/]不管我们要去哪里，[p/]都会一同前行。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...Good.
translation: Celeste: ……很好。

original: Celeste: S-[p/][s/]Sorry...[p/] This is all a little too much.
translation: Celeste: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉……[p/]一下发展太快了。

original: Celeste: I'm feeling a little lightheaded.
translation: Celeste: 我有点头晕。

original: Tyrion: Take all the time you need.
translation: Tyrion: 那就好好休息一下。

original: Tyrion: Right now,[p/] we have all the time in the world.
translation: Tyrion: 现在，[p/]我们的时间非常充裕。

original: Miles: ...Have you heard about what happened in Wyverngarde?
translation: Miles: ……你听说维文加德的事了吗？

original: Illia: Is [i]that[/i] why you've called me here?
translation: Illia: 你就是为了<u>这个</u>叫我来的？

original: Illia: This could've been in an email, Archsentinel.
translation: Illia: 发个邮件不就行了，哨兵长。

original: Miles: This is serious!
translation: Miles: 这很严肃！

original: Miles: How did we not know about this "Tyrion Cuthbert"?!
translation: Miles: 我们怎么会不知道这个“提利昂·卡斯伯特”？！

original: Miles: Keeping records of the heavensborn is [i]Lumina's[/i] responsibility, High Inquisitor!
translation: Miles: 天诞之物的记录是<u>卢米那</u>负责的，最高裁判官！

original: Illia: Frey Cuthbert was always a slippery one.[p/] Even [i]you[/i] couldn't track her.
translation: Illia: 芙雷·卡斯伯特一直很狡猾，[p/]就连<u>你</u>都没法追踪她。

original: Illia: And he's just [i]one[/i] heavensborn.
translation: Illia: 他也不过是<u>一个</u>天诞之物。

original: Miles: Illia![p/][s/] He brought the Lord of the Sixth to the Court of [i]bloody[/i] Azathoth!
translation: Miles: 伊利亚！[p/][s/]他把第六层领主拖上了阿萨索斯法庭！

original: Miles: Do you have [i]any[/i] idea the amount of damage they could have done to the multiverse there?!
translation: Miles: 你知道他们可能对多元宇宙造成多少破坏吗？！

original: Illia: You're worrying too much.[p/] We're still here, aren't we?
translation: Illia: 你担心太多了。[p/]我们这不是还在？

original: Illia: The multiverse is [i]intact[/i] and [i]everything[/i] is fine...
translation: Illia: 多元宇宙<u>完好无损</u>，<u>一切</u>都没事……

original: Miles: ...
translation: Miles: ……

original: Miles: Illia...[p/] He has the Eye of Odin.
translation: Miles: 伊利亚……[p/]他有奥丁之眼。

original: Illia: ...What?
translation: Illia: ……什么？

original: Miles: I checked the data my drones collected.
translation: Miles: 我查看过无人机收集的数据。

original: Miles: These readings...[p/] They are [i]exactly[/i] the same as the ones we gathered during our experiment with Frey.
translation: Miles: 这些读数……[p/]与我们从芙雷实验里收集到的<u>完全</u>一致。

original: Miles: He awakened its power...[p/] albeit briefly.
translation: Miles: 虽然很短暂……[p/]但他确实唤醒过奥丁之眼的力量。

original: Miles: ...And he did it [i]in front[/i] of the Lord of the Sixth.
translation: Miles: ……还是在地狱第六层领主的<u>面前</u>。

original: Miles: We must assume that the Lord of the [i]Ninth[/i] knows about it as well.
translation: Miles: 我们必须确保<u>第九层</u>领主也知晓此事。

original: Illia: Come on...[p/] That's not possible...
translation: Illia: 拜托……[p/]这不可能……

original: Illia: Even [i]you[/i] said it was impossible to manifest Odin's power on the Mortal Plane...
translation: Illia: 即使是<u>你</u>也不可能在凡人位面使用奥丁的力量……

original: Miles: ...The Lord of the Ninth has begun moving his forces.
translation: Miles: ……第九层领主开始移动自己的军力了。

original: Miles: He [i]knows[/i], Illia.
translation: Miles: 他<u>知道了</u>，伊利亚。

original: Illia: ...
translation: Illia: ……

original: Miles: You know better than anyone else.
translation: Miles: 你比其他任何人都清楚。

original: Miles: [i]Nothing[/i] is impossible when the House of Horus is involved.
translation: Miles: 涉及荷鲁斯家时<u>一切</u>皆有可能。

original: Illia: ...Alright, alright.[p/] You win.
translation: Illia: ……好吧，好吧。[p/]你赢了。

original: Illia: I'll look into this.
translation: Illia: 我会调查此事。

original: Miles: Exercise discretion...[p/] If they [i]ever[/i] find out about what we did with Frey-.
translation: Miles: 小心行事……[p/]如果他们<u>发现</u>我们对芙雷做了什么——

original: Illia: I [i]know[/i].[p/] It could mean war with Wyverngarde.
translation: Illia: 我<u>知道</u>。[p/]可能会引发与维文加德的战争。

original: Miles: Illia...
translation: Miles: 伊利亚……

original: Miles: It could mean war with the [i]entire[/i] Outer Planes.
translation: Miles: 这可能会引发与<u>整个</u>外层位面的战争。

original: There's only one locked door that leads into the cell.
translation: 仅有一扇门通向牢房。

original: The door seems to be locked by some kind of magical mechanism.
translation: 门锁看起来是某种魔法装置。

original: Lit torches are hanging on the wall of the cell.
translation: 牢房墙上挂着点燃的火把。

original: Seems a bit irresponsible to put a potentially harmful item in here with the prisoners.
translation: 把这种可能有害的东西放在囚犯触手可及的地方，好像不太安全。

original: ...But perhaps the Inquisition doesn't care.
translation: ……也许裁判所根本不在乎。

original: The cell has a barred window.
translation: 牢房有扇铁栅窗。

original: Even if a prisoner somehow broke through the bars,[p/] there's a three-story drop to freedom.
translation: 就算囚犯能打破铁栏，[p/]离自由也隔着一个三层楼的自由落体。

original: Celeste: There's traces of [b]abjuration[/b] all over the cell.
translation: Celeste: 牢房里到处都是[b]防护术[/b]的痕迹。

original: Aria: ...This cell is specifically designed to suppress the magic of mages within it.
translation: Aria: ……这间牢房是专门设计出来抑制法师魔力的。

original: Aria: It's covered in an [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b].
translation: Aria: 这里被一个[b]抗魔力场[/b]包围。

original: She's clearly being very careful about this.
translation: 她显然非常谨慎。

original: Tyrion: We heard that you don't have any memories of what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 我们听说你不记得发生了什么。

original: Tyrion: Is that true?
translation: Tyrion: 这是真的吗？

original: Aria: It is...
translation: Aria: 没错……

original: Aria: No matter how much I try,[p/] I can't recall anything.
translation: Aria: 不管我多努力，[p/]也想不起任何事。

original: Tyrion: What is the last thing you remember?
translation: Tyrion: 你能想起来的最后一件事是什么？

original: Aria: I believe I was leaving my meeting with the High Speaker and His Majesty.
translation: Aria: 我记得我刚离开与大主教和国王陛下的谈话。

original: Aria: After the meeting,[p/] I was planning to return to the Nave to speak with my father.
translation: Aria: 在这之后，[p/]我打算回中殿和父亲谈谈。

original: Aria: But I suddenly felt extremely nauseous.
translation: Aria: 但我突然感到很恶心。

original: Aria: I thought some fresh air might help me feel better.[p/] So I went to the balcony.
translation: Aria: 我想新鲜空气能让我好受点。[p/]所以就去了阳台。

original: Remus: The one over Lake Galakrond?
translation: Remus: 靠近迦拉克隆湖那个？

original: Aria: Yes.[p/] That one.
translation: Aria: 对。[p/]就是那个。

original: Aria: The last thing I remember was losing consciousness as I looked at the lake.
translation: Aria: 我最后记得的事就是在看湖的时候晕了过去。

original: Tyrion: And did you cast any magic before this happened?
translation: Tyrion: 这之前你有施过什么魔法吗？

original: Aria: No...[p/] I didn't.
translation: Aria: 没……[p/]没有。

original: Tyrion: Hm...[p/] Are you sure you don't remember anything after that?
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]你确定之后的事什么也想不起来？

original: Aria: I don't...[p/] All I remember is waking up to the sound of someone sobbing.
translation: Aria: 想不起来……[p/]我只记得醒来时有人在哭。

original: Aria: ...It was Celeste.[p/] She was...[p/] crying over your unconscious body, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: ……是塞莱斯特。[p/]她趴在……[p/]失去意识的你身上哭，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: I feel like we've completely ruled out Mageblight...
translation: Tyrion: 感觉我们已经完全排除了法师之疫的可能性……

original: Tyrion: So I doubt [i]that's[/i] why you can't remember anything.
translation: Tyrion: 所以我不觉得是<u>法师之疫</u>导致你失忆。

original: Tyrion: Are there any spells that can specifically modify or destroy people's memories?
translation: Tyrion: 有没有什么法术能改变或消除人的记忆？

original: Tyrion: It would certainly explain a lot of this.
translation: Tyrion: 这就能解释很多事了。

original: Aria: No...[p/] Arcane spells can only affect the physical world.
translation: Aria: 不……[p/]奥术只能影响物质世界。

original: Aria: But throughout history,[p/] mages have [i]attempted[/i] to develop spells that can affect the mind.
translation: Aria: 虽然从古至今，[p/]法师们一直<u>致力于</u>开发能影响精神的法术。

original: Aria: There's no recorded history of any of them succeeding.
translation: Aria: 但是没有任何成功的记录。

original: Remus: ...But you're assuming that arcane spells are the only type of magic that exists.
translation: Remus: ……但你的假设前提是只有奥术这一种魔法。

original: Aria: ...What?
translation: Aria: ……什么？

original: Remus: I think you've observed it already.[p/] There are magical creatures in this world that don't use [i]arcane[/i] magic.
translation: Remus: 你应该已经发现了。[p/]这个世界的一些魔法生物使用的不是<u>奥术</u>魔法。

original: Remus: ...Isn't that right, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Remus: ……是不是，卡斯伯特先生？

original: Tyrion: What...?
translation: Tyrion: 什么……？

original: Does...[p/] he [i]know[/i] about the Eye of Horus?
translation: 难道……[p/]他<u>知道</u>荷鲁斯之眼？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: I'm not sure what you're trying to imply.
translation: Tyrion: 我不知道你在说什么。

original: Remus: Don't take me for a fool.[p/] Several of my associates attended Frega's trial.
translation: Remus: 别把我当傻子。[p/]我有几个联系人出席了弗雷加的庭审。

original: Remus: And they [i]all[/i] heard what that demon referred to you as.
translation: Remus: 他们<u>全都</u>听到了那个恶魔怎么称呼你的。

original: Celeste: ...Heavensborn.
translation: Celeste: ……天诞之物。

original: Remus: If I learn that Lumina had [i]anything[/i] to do with this-
translation: Remus: 要是我发现卢米那跟这有<u>什么</u>关系——

original: Tyrion: Your Grace.[p/] I'm [i]not[/i] an agent of the Theocracy.
translation: Tyrion: 公爵殿下。[p/]我<u>不是</u>神权的特工。

original: Tyrion: And even if what you're saying is true,[p/] [i]I[/i] wasn't the one who manipulated Steelwind's memories.
translation: Tyrion: 而且就算您说的是真的，[p/]操纵斯蒂尔文德记忆的人也不是<u>我</u>。

original: Remus: ...
translation: Remus: ……

original: Tyrion: ...But I suppose you raise a good point.
translation: Tyrion: ……但您提出了一个很好的论点。

original: Tyrion: If something affected Steelwind's memories,[p/] it wasn't necessarily an arcane spell.
translation: Tyrion: 如果是什么影响了斯蒂尔文德的记忆，[p/]那东西也不一定是奥术法术。

original: Tyrion: In fact,[p/] it [i]couldn't[/i] have been an arcane spell.[p/] It was definitely something else.
translation: Tyrion: 事实上，[p/]它<u>不可能</u>是奥术法术。[p/]肯定是别的什么东西。

original: Aria: ...You're probably right.
translation: Aria: ……你大概是对的。

original: Aria: Which proves that I'm responsible for the murders...
translation: Aria: 这证明我要对那些谋杀负责……

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: You just said that you don't have any memories of what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 你才说过你对发生了什么没有任何记忆。

original: Tyrion: Why are you so convinced that you're responsible for this?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么会这么确信你要负责？

original: Tyrion: I told the Inquisition already.[p/] I [i]saw[/i] Beatrice before I passed out.
translation: Tyrion: 我已经和裁判所说过了。[p/]我在晕过去之前<u>看见了</u>比亚特丽丝。

original: Tyrion: [i]She's[/i] clearly involved in this somehow.
translation: Tyrion: <u>她</u>肯定跟这事有关。

original: Aria: There's more to this than you realize, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 此事远比你想的要复杂，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: ...For the past few months,[p/] the Inquisition and I have been investigating a string of seemingly unrelated murders.
translation: Aria: ……在过去的几个月里，[p/]裁判所和我一直在调查一系列看似无关的谋杀案。

original: Aria: During each of those cases,[p/] we were able to apprehend the perpetrator without issue.
translation: Aria: 在这些案件中，[p/]我们都能轻松逮捕犯人。

original: Aria: But there was always something...[p/] off about them during questioning.
translation: Aria: 但在询问过程中总有些……[p/]不对劲。

original: Aria: The murders were always abnormally gruesome and passionate.[p/] And each of the perpetrators said the same thing.
translation: Aria: 谋杀手段都惨无人道。[p/]但犯人都说了同样的话。

original: Aria: They all said that they "had no choice".
translation: Aria: 犯人都说他们“别无选择”。

original: Tyrion: ..."No choice"?
translation: Tyrion: ……“别无选择”？

original: Aria: Cases like this have been occurring throughout Wyverngarde.[p/] And very little connects the perpetrators to each other.
translation: Aria: 像这样的案子在整个维文加德都有发生。[p/]犯人之间也没什么联系。

original: Aria: All except one thing.[p/] Each of them acted as if someone had controlled them against their will.
translation: Aria: 只有一点除外。[p/]他们都表现的好像是自己被操控了。

original: Tyrion: They were probably just desperate...
translation: Tyrion: 犯人可能只是绝望了……

original: Tyrion: Most murderers try to make excuses after they're caught.
translation: Tyrion: 大多数杀人犯被逮捕后都会找借口。

original: Tyrion: They could even just be in complete denial.
translation: Tyrion: 他们甚至会完全否认事实。

original: Aria: Orym said the same thing.[p/] But these cases were far too similar for me to ignore.
translation: Aria: 奥蒙也是这么说的。[p/]但这些案例太相似了，我没法忽略。

original: Aria: I wondered if they were telling the truth.[p/] Perhaps each of these murders [i]was[/i] committed by an unknown party.
translation: Aria: 我在想他们可能没撒谎。[p/]可能每起谋杀<u>都是</u>幕后黑手犯下的。

original: Aria: I didn't have any concrete evidence...[p/] But I knew I was getting closer to...[p/] something.
translation: Aria: 我没有确凿的证据……[p/]但我知道自己很接近……[p/]什么事了。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Steelwind...[p/] I don't mean to be rude,[p/] but this sounds...
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德……[p/]我无意冒犯，[p/]但这听起来……

original: Aria: Completely insane?
translation: Aria: 像是我疯了？

original: Tyrion: You don't even have any physical evidence to prove these murders are connected.
translation: Tyrion: 你甚至没有任何物证证明这些谋杀案有关联。

original: Aria: ...There's [i]one[/i] piece of evidence,[p/] but it's hardly concrete.
translation: Aria: ……还是有<u>一件</u>证据，[p/]但是很难说算确凿。

original: Aria: But it does tie each of these cases together.
translation: Aria: 但这证据确实把案件都联系起来了。

original: She takes out a small parchment from her pocket and shows it to you.
translation: 她从口袋里拿出一张小羊皮纸递给你。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: It's...[p/] a purple symbol.
translation: Tyrion: 这是……[p/]一个紫色符号。

original: Aria: Several of the people we arrested had an item with this symbol on it.
translation: Aria: 我们逮捕的人都有一个带此符号的物品。

original: Aria: None of them could remember where it came from,[p/] or even what it was.
translation: Aria: 没人说得出它是从哪来的，[p/]甚至都不知道它是什么。

original: Aria: But they all somehow knew that it was called the "Purple Mark".
translation: Aria: 但他们不知为何都知道这个符号叫“紫色标记”。

original: Tyrion: But there [i]has[/i] to be an explanation for this.
translation: Tyrion: 这<u>肯定</u>得有个解释。

original: Tyrion: It could just be some esoteric superstition that we don't know about...
translation: Tyrion: 可能只是些我们不知道的小众迷信……

original: Aria: If that's true,[p/] then ask yourself one thing.
translation: Aria: 如果真是迷信，[p/]那我问你。

original: Aria: Where did [i]I[/i] get this parchment from?
translation: Aria: <u>我</u>手里这张纸是哪来的？

original: Tyrion: You don't mean-...?
translation: Tyrion: 你不会想说——？

original: Aria: I found it in my pocket after I was properly confined.
translation: Aria: 这是我被关起来后在口袋里发现的。

original: Aria: Whoever I've been chasing must have left it there to taunt me.
translation: Aria: 一定是我在追查的人为了嘲讽才留下这张纸。

original: Aria: For all I know,[p/] they could have controlled my body and forced me to draw this symbol myself.
translation: Aria: 就我所知，[p/]他们也许可以操控我的身体，强迫我画出这个符号。

original: Aria: Either way,[p/] this all but [i]proves[/i] the massacre at the cathedral is related to it.
translation: Aria: 不管怎样，[p/]这都<u>证明</u>大教堂的屠杀与此有关。

original: Tyrion: I don't want to dismiss what you said but...
translation: Tyrion: 我不想反驳你说的，但是……

original: Tyrion: This definitely won't hold up in court.
translation: Tyrion: 这在法庭上绝对没有说服力。

original: Aria: Nor should it.
translation: Aria: 也不该有。

original: Aria: If my mind has been compromised,[p/] I can't take the risk of leaving this dungeon.
translation: Aria: 如果我的心智已经被操纵，[p/]就不该冒险离开地牢。

original: Aria: Otherwise,[p/] I could end up harming [i]more[/i] people.
translation: Aria: 否则，[p/]我可能会伤害<u>更多</u>人。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Are you [i]planning[/i] to spend the rest of your life in prison?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]你<u>打算</u>这辈子都呆在监狱里？

original: Aria: ...If that is what is necessary to keep everyone safe.
translation: Aria: ……如果这是保证所有人安全的必要条件。

original: Tyrion: But what about Aster?[p/] Weren't you two supposed to be married soon?
translation: Tyrion: 那阿斯特呢？[p/]你们不是马上要结婚了吗？

original: Tyrion: He's the king now.[p/] And you can't rule Wyverngarde alongside him from a holding cell.
translation: Tyrion: 他现在是国王了。[p/]你不可能在牢里和他一起统治维文加德。

original: Aria: ...You're correct.[p/] But he's always been a remarkable person.
translation: Aria: ……你说得对。[p/]但他一直是个非凡的人。

original: Aria: He should have no problem finding another suitress.
translation: Aria: 他应该很容易就能找到其他伴侣。

original: You feel an overwhelming sadness emanating from her as she says that.
translation: 说这话的时候，你能感受到她身上散发的强烈悲伤。

original: Celeste: Aria...
translation: Celeste: 阿莉亚……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: No.
translation: Tyrion: 不。

original: Aria: ...What?
translation: Aria: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: You're not going to sacrifice [i]everything[/i] for someone else's actions.
translation: Tyrion: 你不能为了别人做的事牺牲<u>一切</u>。

original: Aria: Mr. Cuthbert![p/][s/] I am not going to risk [i]more[/i] lives!
translation: Aria: 卡斯伯特先生！[p/][s/]我不会再冒伤害<u>更多</u>人的风险！

original: Aria: If I were to hurt His Majesty...[p/] I would never be able to forgive myself.
translation: Aria: 如果伤害了陛下……[p/]我永远都不会原谅我自己。

original: Aria: Please don't ask that of me...
translation: Aria: 请不要让我这么做……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Aria: I'm glad you were unharmed, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 我很高兴你没有受伤，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: I was worried when I saw you next to Pierce's corpse.
translation: Aria: 看到你在皮尔斯的尸体旁时我很担心。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] I definitely got the least of it.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧，[p/]我肯定是损失最少的。

original: Tyrion: I should consider myself lucky that whoever did this decided not to kill me.
translation: Tyrion: 我应该庆幸罪魁祸首没有杀我。

original: Aria: Celeste.[p/] I heard that you and I fought during the massacre.
translation: Aria: 塞莱斯特。[p/]我听说在屠杀时你和我战斗过。

original: Aria: I apologize if I hurt you in any way.
translation: Aria: 如果伤害了你，我很抱歉。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特？

original: Celeste: S-[p/][s/]Sorry.[p/] This is just a lot to take in.
translation: Celeste: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉。[p/]我只是有点没缓过来。

original: Celeste: A few hours ago,[p/] it really felt like you were trying to kill me.
translation: Celeste: 几个小时前，[p/]我真的感觉你要杀我。

original: Aria: I won't fault you for feeling that way.
translation: Aria: 我不怪你那么想。

original: Aria: I'm truly sorry.
translation: Aria: 我真的很抱歉。

original: Aria: Is Orym working with the Kingsguard to investigate what happened?
translation: Aria: 奥蒙是在和国王卫队一起调查吗？

original: Tyrion: He is.[p/] We actually got a lot of our information from him.
translation: Tyrion: 是的。[p/]我们实际上从他那里得到了很多有用的信息。

original: Aria: That's...[p/] reassuring to hear.
translation: Aria: 这样……[p/]那我就放心了。

original: Aria: I suppose this is a good opportunity to see how well he works without my guidance.
translation: Aria: 我想这也是个不错的机会，可以看看他自己调查效果如何。

original: Tyrion: ...Do you ever stop working?
translation: Tyrion: ……你真是满脑子工作的事啊。

original: Aria: I'm relieved His Majesty was unharmed during the massacre.
translation: Aria: 我很高兴国王陛下在大屠杀中没受伤。

original: Tyrion: Whoever orchestrated this trapped him in a [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 策划这一切的人用[b]坚牢术[/b]困住了他。

original: Tyrion: They must have used him as a distraction while they went after their true targets.
translation: Tyrion: 他们一定是把阿斯特当做障眼法，方便追杀真正的目标。

original: Aria: As callous as it is,[p/] I'm glad he wasn't their real target.
translation: Aria: 虽然这么说很无情，[p/]但我很高兴阿斯特不是犯人真正的目标。

original: Aria: I don't know what I would do if anything happened to him.
translation: Aria: 如果他出了什么事，我真不知道该怎么办。

original: Aria: I can't believe I was forced to attack Prince Alaric.
translation: Aria: 不敢相信我曾被迫去攻击阿拉里克王子。

original: Tyrion: Don't feel too guilty.
translation: Tyrion: 别这么内疚。

original: Tyrion: He doesn't seem to have any lasting injuries.
translation: Tyrion: 他好像没受到任何长期伤害。

original: Aria: Regardless,[p/] he's much too young to experience something like that.
translation: Aria: 不管怎么说，[p/]经历这种事对他来说还是太早了。

original: Aria: ...I'm sorry about what happened, Celeste.
translation: Aria: ……我对发生的事很抱歉，塞莱斯特。

original: Aria: I can't imagine the lack of closure you feel right now.
translation: Aria: 我很难想象你正在经历的痛苦不安。

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]No.[p/] I don't care about that anymore.
translation: Celeste: 没、[p/][s/]没事的。我已经不介意了。

original: Celeste: I'm just glad Tyrion is safe.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂没事我就很高兴了。

original: Aria: I can't believe we lost so many House leaders in the course of a few months.
translation: Aria: 不敢相信这几个月里我们失去了那么多家族的领主。

original: Aria: Now my father is the only head of the Four Pillars that still lives.
translation: Aria: 生还的四大支柱家族首领只有我的父亲。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Lord Steelwind is her father.[p/] So it would probably be best not to point out how suspicious that is.
translation: 斯蒂尔文德勋爵是她的父亲。[p/]也许还是不要指出她说的这一点有多可疑比较好。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about this, Ms. Steelwind?
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么看，斯蒂尔文德女士？

original: Aria: I'm sorry.[p/] But I'm afraid I can't say much about that.
translation: Aria: 抱歉。[p/]但我恐怕没什么能说的。

original: You arrive at the dungeon to speak with Steelwind.
translation: 你来到地牢与斯蒂尔文德交谈。

original: But you can't find her anywhere.
translation: 但哪里都找不到她。

original: Tyrion: The Inquisition and the Kingsguard must still be processing her.
translation: Tyrion: 裁判所和国王卫队一定还在盘问她。

original: Tyrion: We should come back later.
translation: Tyrion: 我们之后再来吧。

original: You arrive at the dungeon and see the prosecutor sitting in a holding cell.
translation: 你抵达地牢，看见检察官坐在牢房里。

original: She seems extremely stressed.[p/] It's as if she's trying to figure something out.
translation: 她看起来压力很大。[p/]就像是在尝试搞明白什么。

original: Aria: ...!
translation: Aria: ……！

original: Aria: Mr. Cuthbert...[p/] and Your Grace.
translation: Aria: 卡斯伯特先生……[p/]还有公爵殿下。

original: Steelwind gives a wary look to the archduke.
translation: 斯蒂尔文德警惕地看着大公爵。

original: Tyrion: ...How are you doing?
translation: Tyrion: ……你怎么样？

original: Aria: As best as I can...[p/] all things considered.
translation: Aria: 考虑到所有事……[p/]还好吧。

original: Aria: What brings you here?
translation: Aria: 你们有何贵干？

original: Tyrion: We're trying to investigate everything that happened.
translation: Tyrion: 我们在调查案件详情。

original: Aria: ...I see.
translation: Aria: ……这样啊。

original: Tyrion: ...I was wondering if you could answer some of our questions.
translation: Tyrion: ……我想问你几个问题。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: Steelwind.[p/] I know your situation is pretty grim right now.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德，[p/]我知道你这个情况相当棘手。

original: Tyrion: But you know you can trust me.
translation: Tyrion: 但你知道的，你可以相信我。

original: Aria: You're not the person I'm worried about.
translation: Aria: 我担心的人不是你。

original: Aria: At this moment,[p/] I don't even know if I can trust myself.
translation: Aria: 此时此刻，[p/]我甚至不知道能不能相信自己。

original: Tyrion: What...?
translation: Tyrion: 什么意思……？

original: Aria: I'm not going to debate this anymore, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 我不会再争辩这一点了，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: This is [i]my[/i] decision.[p/] And I won't risk anyone's life in the hopes of saving myself.
translation: Aria: 这是<u>我的</u>决定。[p/]我不会为了救自己而危及他人性命。

original: Aria: Please...[p/] Just leave me alone.
translation: Aria: 求你了……[p/]就别管我了。

original: OK
translation: OK

original: Steelwind is going to throw away everything she cares about for the greater good...
translation: 斯蒂尔文德要为了大义牺牲小我……

original: Even if she was the one who did all this,[p/] [i]she's[/i] not the one who's responsible.
translation: 即使是她做了这些事，[p/]需要负责任的也<u>另有其人</u>。

original: You can't let her resign herself to a fate like this...
translation: 你不能让她就这样决定自己的命运……

original: Yes
translation: 是

original: No
translation: 否

original: Tyrion: Steelwind![p/][s/] Are you seriously just going to throw your life away?!
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德！[p/][s/]你真的就要这样放弃自己的人生？！

original: Aria: ...If it were necessary,[p/] I would give my [i]life[/i] for this kingdom.
translation: Aria: ……如果有需要，[p/]我愿意为了王国付出<u>生命</u>。

original: Aria: If someone controlled my actions today,[p/] they can and [i]will[/i] do so again.
translation: Aria: 这个人今天能控制我的意识，[p/]也可以——也一定<u>会</u>——再继续控制我。

original: Aria: And as long as that possibility exists,[p/] I can't trust myself.
translation: Aria: 只要这个可能性还存在，[p/]我就不能相信自己。

original: Doubt [d="But that's assuming this person can continue to do so. We don't know how this mind control works. We can't just drop this without finding out what really happened."/]
translation: Doubt [d="但这是基于这个人可以继续控制你的前提。我们不知道意识操控的原理。不能在不清不楚的情况下就这么算了。"/]

original: Tyrion: But that's assuming this person can continue to do so.
translation: Tyrion: 但这是基于这个人可以继续控制你的前提。

original: Tyrion: You said so yourself.[p/] You haven't found any evidence to prove your theory.
translation: Tyrion: 你自己也说过。[p/]没有确凿证据来支撑你的理论。

original: Tyrion: We don't know how this "mind control" works.[p/] And we don't have enough information.
translation: Tyrion: 我们不知道“意识操控”的原理。[p/]也没有足够的情报。

original: Tyrion: We can't just drop this without finding out what really happened.
translation: Tyrion: 不能在不清不楚的情况下就这么算了。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Deflect [d="That's not the issue here. If someone else is responsible for what happened, then we need to find out who they are. They're still out there."/]
translation: Deflect [d="不是这个问题。如果罪魁祸首另有其人，我们就必须把他揪出来。元凶还在逍遥法外。"/]

original: Tyrion: That's not the issue here.
translation: Tyrion: 不是这个问题。

original: Tyrion: If someone else is responsible for what happened,[p/] then we need to find out who they are.
translation: Tyrion: 如果罪魁祸首另有其人，[p/]我们就必须把他揪出来。

original: Tyrion: They could still be out there.
translation: Tyrion: 元凶可能还在逍遥法外。

original: Aria: If that's true,[p/] you are fully capable of finding that out yourself.
translation: Aria: 即使此言非虚，[p/]你也有足够的能力自己找出元凶。

original: Aria: As I've said,[p/] I have no memories of what happened.
translation: Aria: 我说过，[p/]自己没有发生了什么的记忆。

original: Aria: I'm sure one day.[p/] You'll be able to find out what happened.
translation: Aria: 我相信总有一天，[p/]你会弄清楚事情的来龙去脉。

original: But she'll already have lost everything by then...
translation: 但等到那时她已经失去了一切……

original: Threaten [d="Do you even understand what you're saying?! You will lose [i]everything[/i] if you just let this happen!"/]
translation: Threaten [d="你明白自己在说什么吗？！就这么下去你会失去<u>一切</u>的！"/]

original: Tyrion: Do you even understand what you're saying?!
translation: Tyrion: 你明白自己在说什么吗？！

original: Tyrion: You will lose [i]everything[/i] if you just let this happen!
translation: Tyrion: 就这么下去你会失去<u>一切</u>的！

original: Tyrion: [i]Even[/i] if you aren't executed for these charges,[p/][s/] you'll spend the rest of your life in prison!
translation: Tyrion: <u>即使</u>你不会因这些罪名被处决，[p/][s/]余生也都要在监狱里度过！

original: Aria: If that is what my duty demands,[p/][s/] then so be it!
translation: Aria: 如果这就是我的职责所在，[p/][s/]那也没问题！

original: Aria: I [i]can't[/i] continue living my life if my mind is vulnerable like this!
translation: Aria: 我<u>不能</u>在意识这么容易被操控的情况下苟活！

original: Aria: I won't...[p/] endanger His Majesty like that.
translation: Aria: 我不会……[p/]让国王陛下面临这种危险。

original: Aria: I suppose you're right.
translation: Aria: 你说得也有道理。

original: Aria: ...But I doubt there was [i]any[/i] goal to this.
translation: Aria: ……但我不觉得犯人有<u>任何</u>目的。

original: Aria: I've been investigating these murders for months.
translation: Aria: 我调查这些案件好几个月了。

original: Aria: And I've never been able to find any personal clues as to who the perpetrator is.
translation: Aria: 从来都没有找到能指明幕后黑手的特定线索。

original: Aria: There's no way to connect them to this.
translation: Aria: 我们没有办法把幕后黑手与案件联系起来。

original: Aria: Whoever did this was a sadistic individual who wanted to cause as much suffering as possible.
translation: Aria: 做出这些的是个施虐狂，只想自己造成的痛苦越多越好。

original: Tyrion: That's not true, Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 不是这样的，斯蒂尔文德。

original: Tyrion: Whoever did this had very specific targets in mind.
translation: Tyrion: 犯人的目标很明确。

original: Tyrion: Both Prince Alaric and the High Speaker saw you when the murders were being committed.
translation: Tyrion: 阿拉里克王子和大主教都在谋杀发生时看到了你。

original: Tyrion: Not to mention,[p/] they set a trap for Aster.
translation: Tyrion: 更不要说，[p/]犯人还困住了阿斯特。

original: Aria: ...What?
translation: Aria: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: Let's assume that someone [i]was[/i] controlling you.
translation: Tyrion: 我们先假设当时有人<u>在</u>控制你。

original: Tyrion: They wouldn't have left Alaric, Archeus, or Aster alive if they were trying to kill as many people as possible.
translation: Tyrion: 如果只是想杀人，那阿拉里克，阿契厄斯，和阿斯特早都一命呜呼了。

original: Aria: ...I suppose you have a point there.
translation: Aria: ……你说得有道理。

original: Aria: ...What is this?
translation: Aria: ……这是什么？

original: Tyrion: The perpetrator wasn't as nearly as aimless as you think.
translation: Tyrion: 犯人并非你想的那样随机作案。

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] proves it.
translation: Tyrion: <u>这</u>就是证据。

original: Remus: My apologies, Mr. Cuthbert,[p/] but I don't really see how that proves your claim.
translation: Remus: 我很抱歉，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]但我没看出这能证明什么。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……

original: Aria: But even so,[p/] that hardly narrows things down.
translation: Aria: 但即使如此，[p/]嫌疑人的范围也没能缩小。

original: Aria: If someone was controlling me,[p/] they wouldn't need to enter the cathedral to use me.
translation: Aria: 如果有人在控制我，[p/]这个人也不需要特地进入大教堂。

original: Aria: Perhaps you're right,[p/] and the perpetrator only wanted to murder the three victims.
translation: Aria: 也许你说得对，[p/]犯人只想杀掉三名受害者。

original: Aria: There's plenty of people who might want to see those three dead.
translation: Aria: 想让他们三个去死的人多了去了。

original: Tyrion: There's one thing you're overlooking.
translation: Tyrion: 你忽略了一件事。

original: Tyrion: Before the murders started,[p/] someone trapped Aster within a [b]Force Cage[/b] using [b]Glyph of Contingency[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 谋杀开始之前，[p/]有人用内置于[b]有备无患[/b]内的[b]坚牢术[/b]困住了阿斯特。

original: Aria: But they didn't harm him.[p/] It was probably just a distraction.
translation: Aria: 但犯人没有伤害他。[p/]可能这只是调虎离山之计。

original: Tyrion: Even so,[p/] this gives us two very important clues.
translation: Tyrion: 即使如此，[p/]这也给了我们两条重要线索。

original: Tyrion: The first is that whoever did this is capable of casting those two spells.
translation: Tyrion: 第一是犯人能够施展这两个法术。

original: Tyrion: This means that the perpetrator was a mage.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说犯人是个法师。

original: Aria: That's true...
translation: Aria: 的确如此……

original: Tyrion: But the second clue is the most important one.
translation: Tyrion: 但第二条线索更为重要。

original: Tyrion: Whoever set that trap for Aster,[p/] they did so within twenty-four hours of it triggering.
translation: Tyrion: 无论是谁对阿斯特设下陷阱，[p/]设置时间都在触发 24 小时以内。

original: Tyrion: This means that the perpetrator must have been someone who attended the funeral.
translation: Tyrion: 意味着犯人肯定在参加葬礼的人之中。

original: Aria: ...So it was one of them?
translation: Aria: ……所以是那些人之一？

original: Aria: ...What is this?
translation: Aria: ……这是什么？

original: Tyrion: It's evidence that narrows down who's responsible for this.
translation: Tyrion: 是一件能帮我们缩小嫌犯范围的证据。

original: Aria: I'm sorry, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 抱歉，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: But I don't really follow your logic.
translation: Aria: 你的逻辑我听不懂。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……

original: Tyrion: That narrows down our list of suspects substantially.
translation: Tyrion: 这样就大幅缩小了嫌疑犯的范围。

original: Tyrion: There's a chance we can identify who did this.
translation: Tyrion: 我们完全有可能找出犯人的身份。

original: Tyrion: And if they really [i]did[/i] control your actions,[p/] we can find a way to prevent them from doing so again.
translation: Tyrion: 如果犯人<u>真的</u>控制了你的行动，[p/]我们也能找到阻止他故技重施的方法。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: Steelwind...[p/] You need to fight this.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德……[p/]你必须与之斗争。

original: Aria: I-[p/][s/]I...[p/] I can't.
translation: Aria: 我、[p/][s/]我……[p/]我不能。

original: Tyrion: What?![p/][s/] Why not?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！[p/][s/]为什么不能？！

original: Aria: If we pursue an individual like this,[p/] they might retaliate even more than they already have.
translation: Aria: 如果追查这样的犯人，[p/]可能会导致更激烈的报复。

original: Aria: They wanted to remove me from my position.
translation: Aria: 犯人想让我离开岗位。

original: Aria: ...How will they react if I try to resist?
translation: Aria: ……要是我反抗了，他们会怎么反应？

original: Aria: They might hurt even more people to send a message.[p/] It's far too dangerous.
translation: Aria: 他们可能会为了警告我而伤害更多人。[p/]这太危险了。

original: Threaten [d="Whoever did this had a goal far bigger than you. And you have no guarantee that they'll stop here. Who will they target next? Your father? ...The king?"/]
translation: Threaten [d="做这些的人目标不只是你。你也不能保证他们会就此停手。下一个目标会是谁？你的父亲？……国王？"/]

original: Tyrion: Whoever did this had a goal far bigger than you.[p/] And you have no guarantee that they'll stop here.
translation: Tyrion: 做这些的人目标不只是你。[p/]你也不能保证他们会就此停手。

original: Tyrion: Three nobles died today,[p/] and two of them were near the top of the political hierarchy.
translation: Tyrion: 今天三名贵族死了，[p/]其中两人还身处政界顶端。

original: Tyrion: What if they decide to go after more victims?
translation: Tyrion: 万一犯人还想杀害更多人呢？

original: Tyrion: Who will they target next?[p/][s/] Your father?[p/][s/] ...The king?
translation: Tyrion: 下一个目标会是谁？[p/][s/]你的父亲？[p/][s/]……国王？

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: We need to catch them before they can do more harm.
translation: Tyrion: 我们需要在造成更多伤害前抓住犯人。

original: Tyrion: I know you're frightened about what might happen to the people close to you.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道你害怕亲近的人可能遭遇不测。

original: Tyrion: But we can't let someone that dangerous get away with this.
translation: Tyrion: 但我们不能让这么危险的人溜走。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Doubt [d="I doubt someone like that would go that far. They might decide to lay low and wait for things to die down. "/]
translation: Doubt [d="我不觉得有人会这么极端。犯人可能决定先低调一段时间，等事态冷静下来。"/]

original: Tyrion: I doubt someone like that would go that far.
translation: Tyrion: 我不觉得有人会这么极端。

original: Tyrion: They might decide to lay low and wait for things to die down.
translation: Tyrion: 犯人可能决定先低调一段时间，等事态冷静下来。

original: Aria: Whoever did this is an unhinged murderer.
translation: Aria: 犯人是个神经质的杀手。

original: Aria: I can't risk everything I care about on the [i]possibility[/i] that they might do nothing in retaliation.
translation: Aria: 我不能因为犯人<u>可能</u>不会报复就赌上自己在乎的一切。

original: Tyrion: ...I suppose you have a point.
translation: Tyrion: ……你说得有道理。

original: You still have no idea who might have done this.
translation: 你还不知道犯人究竟是谁。

original: You can't make empty claims like that.
translation: 不能做出这么无凭无据的宣言。

original: Appeal [d="We can't back down in the face of injustice. If we let the perpetrator get away with this, we're letting them [i]know[/i] that their actions will go unanswered."/]
translation: Appeal [d="我们不能在不公正面前退缩。如果犯人逃之夭夭，等于我们让对方<u>认为</u>自己的行为不会受到惩罚。"/]

original: Tyrion: We can't back down in the face of injustice.
translation: Tyrion: 我们不能在不公正面前退缩。

original: Tyrion: If we let the perpetrator get away with this,[p/] we're letting them [i]know[/i] that their actions will go unanswered.
translation: Tyrion: 如果犯人逃之夭夭，等于我们让对方<u>认为</u>自己的行为不会受到惩罚。

original: Tyrion: You need to be strong and fight this, Steelwind![p/][s/] No matter the cost!
translation: Tyrion: 你得打起精神斗争，斯蒂尔文德！[p/][s/]不惜代价！

original: Aria: That's easy for you to say.
translation: Aria: 你说起来容易。

original: Aria: [i]You're[/i] not the one putting your loved ones in danger.
translation: Aria: 让自己爱的人身处险境的不是<u>你</u>。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Aria: *sigh*[p/] When you put it that way,[p/] I suppose I have no other choice, do I?
translation: Aria: *叹气* [p/]你都这么说了，[p/]我也没有别的选择了吧？

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: I never realized it before, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 卡斯伯特先生，我以前没有意识到。

original: Tyrion: What?
translation: Tyrion: 什么？

original: Aria: You really have a bad habit of butting your nose into other people's business, don't you?
translation: Aria: 你真的很喜欢多管闲事，是不是？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I suppose I do.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]可能是吧。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Aria: But you're right.[p/] We can't let this go.
translation: Aria: 但你说得对。[p/]不能就这么算了。

original: Aria: I'll find a way to dispute this...[p/] somehow.
translation: Aria: 我会找到异议方法的……[p/]大概。

original: Aria: ...Thank you, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: ……谢谢你，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: ...I think we've known each other long enough.
translation: Tyrion: ……我们认识彼此挺久了吧。

original: Tyrion: You don't need to be so formal.
translation: Tyrion: 不用这么客气。

original: You’ve successfully argued against Aria Steelwind.
translation: 你成功说服了阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德。

original: Remus: Hm...[p/] Perhaps I misjudged you.
translation: Remus: 唔……[p/]也许我错看你了。

original: Aria: I know I agreed to fight this...[p/] But...
translation: Aria: 我清楚自己已经同意抗争……[p/]但是……

original: Tyrion: What is it?
translation: Tyrion: 但是什么？

original: Tyrion: You're the most qualified attorney in the nobility.
translation: Tyrion: 你是贵族里最有资格的检察官。

original: Tyrion: You'll definitely be able to make a case for yourself.
translation: Tyrion: 你肯定能成功办理此案的。

original: Aria: As you probably know,[p/] House Sibyl controls the legislative [i]and[/i] judicial branches of our kingdom.
translation: Aria: 你应该也知道，[p/]希比尔家控制王国的立法<u>与</u>司法机关。

original: Aria: ...And they've nominated my [i]father[/i] as the prosecutor for my trial.
translation: Aria: ……他们指派我的<u>父亲</u>来当本次审理的检察官。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Aria: No one believes my theory of mind control.
translation: Aria: 没有其他人相信我的意识操控说。

original: Aria: Everyone believes that I overspent my magic and gave myself Mageblight.
translation: Aria: 所有人都认为是我使用魔力过度，得了法师之疫。

original: Aria: As a result,[p/] they blame House Steelwind for Coraline Sibyl's death.
translation: Aria: 基于此，[p/]他们把卡洛琳·希比尔的死怪在斯蒂尔文德家头上。

original: Aria: Now...[p/] The only way for him to redeem House Steelwind is to convict me and sentence me to death.
translation: Aria: 如今……[p/]唯一能让父亲挽救斯蒂尔文德家声誉的方法就是起诉我，判我死刑。

original: Celeste: B-[p/][s/]But,[p/] he's your [i]father[/i]!
translation: Celeste: 但、[p/][s/]但是，[p/]他是你的<u>父亲</u>！

original: Celeste: There's no way he would-!
translation: Celeste: 他不可能——！

original: Aria: ...This isn't the first time something like this has happened.
translation: Aria: ……这种事情不是第一次发生。

original: Aria: When I was a child,[p/] my mother accidentally overused her magic and induced Mageblight within herself.
translation: Aria: 我还小的时候，[p/]母亲意外使用魔力过度，感染了法师之疫。

original: Aria: ...In her resulting psychotic episode,[p/] she massacred an [i]entire[/i] village of commoners.
translation: Aria: ……疾病发作时，[p/]母亲屠杀了<u>一整个</u>村庄的平民。

original: Tyrion: No...
translation: Tyrion: 不……

original: Aria: House Steelwind almost lost everything after that.
translation: Aria: 斯蒂尔文德家几乎承受了灭顶之灾。

original: Aria: To redeem himself,[p/] my father personally oversaw my mother's trial...[p/] and her execution.
translation: Aria: 为了救赎自己，[p/]我父亲亲自监管了母亲的审理……[p/]以及处刑。

original: Celeste: That's-!
translation: Celeste: 这是——！

original: Aria: My father values his duty to Wyverngarde over everything else.
translation: Aria: 我父亲把自己对维文加德的职责看得比什么都重。

original: Aria: Nothing matters more to him than that,[p/] not even his family.
translation: Aria: 即使是家人，[p/]重要性也不会在此之上。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Aria: I [i]want[/i] to have confidence in myself...[p/] But I don't know if I can face him like this.
translation: Aria: 我也<u>想</u>对自己有信心……[p/]但我不知道自己能否这样面对他。

original: Remus: ...
translation: Remus: ……

original: Remus: Mr. Cuthbert...[p/] What is [i]your[/i] stake in all of this?
translation: Remus: 卡斯伯特先生……[p/]这么做对<u>你</u>有什么好处？

original: Tyrion: What?
translation: Tyrion: 什么？

original: Remus: You hate the nobility, don't you?
translation: Remus: 你不是痛恨贵族吗？

original: Remus: So why are you so intent on helping Ms. Steelwind?
translation: Remus: 为什么这么想帮助斯蒂尔文德女士？

original: Tyrion: Because she's innocent![p/][s/] I [i]know[/i] she is!
translation: Tyrion: 可她是无辜的！[p/][s/]我<u>知道</u>她是无辜的！

original: Tyrion: She would never be irresponsible enough to give herself Mageblight!
translation: Tyrion: 她绝不会对自己不负责任到感染法师之疫！

original: Aria: Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Aria: 卡斯伯特先生……

original: Tyrion: It doesn't matter if she's a noble or a commoner!
translation: Tyrion: 不管她是贵族还是平民都一样！

original: Tyrion: She's being oppressed by the system and she [i]deserves[/i] a fair trial!
translation: Tyrion: 她<u>值得</u>公平审理，不该这么被体系欺压！

original: Remus: ...
translation: Remus: ……

original: Remus: Well said.
translation: Remus: 说得好。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Remus: I,[p/] Remus Virgilae,[p/] hereby grant you the privilege to serve as Ms. Steelwind's counsel.
translation: Remus: 我，[p/]雷穆斯·维吉莱，[p/]在此授予你担任斯蒂尔文德女士律师的特权。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/][s/] Really?!
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/][s/]真的吗？！

original: Remus: I will be acting as the judge and arbiter of Ms. Steelwind's trial.
translation: Remus: 审理斯蒂尔文德女士的法官将由我担任。

original: Remus: It is within my right to grant such permissions.
translation: Remus: 我有授予这些的权力。

original: Tyrion: Um...[p/][s/] Thank you!
translation: Tyrion: 呃……[p/][s/]感谢您！

original: Tyrion: But why would you-?
translation: Tyrion: 可您为什么——？

original: Remus: ...Do you think I've made a mistake?
translation: Remus: ……你觉得我这么做不对？

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No![p/][s/] Of course not!
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不！[p/][s/]当然没错！

original: Tyrion: I'll serve as Steelwind's attorney.
translation: Tyrion: 我会担任斯蒂尔文德的律师。

original: Tyrion: ...If she will have me.
translation: Tyrion: ……如果她允许。

original: Aria: Of course.[p/] There's no one else I would trust more with this.
translation: Aria: 当然了。[p/]你是辩护方面我最信任的人。

original: Aria: ...And please,[p/] you've done a lot for me already.
translation: Aria: ……你为我做了很多了，[p/]我也拜托你。

original: Aria: You don't have to be so formal.[p/] Please call me by my first name.
translation: Aria: 不要这么客气了。[p/]用名字称呼我吧。

original: Aria: Celeste has already taken to doing that.
translation: Aria: 塞莱斯特已经这么做了。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Aria: ...But [i]since[/i] you'll be defending me,[p/] you'll probably need this.
translation: Aria: ……<u>既然</u>你要为我辩护，[p/]可能会需要这个。

original: Remus: Then it's settled.[p/] We will hold the trial at my home:[p/] the city of Ladon.
translation: Remus: 就这么定了。[p/]审理举办地就定在我的住处，[p/]雷登城。

original: Tyrion: "Ladon"...?[p/] I've never heard of that place.
translation: Tyrion: “雷登”……？[p/]我从没听说过这里。

original: Remus: Speak with Lucio.[p/] He knows the location well.
translation: Remus: 找卢西奥问问。[p/]他很了解这个地方。

original: Before you can ask any more questions,[p/] the Archduke leaves without a word.
translation: 在你来得及提问之前，[p/]大公爵一言不发离去。

original: Tyrion: ...He really has a bad habit of just walking away from conversations.
translation: Tyrion: ……什么都不说就跑真是他的坏习惯啊。

original: Tyrion: But I guess we should consider ourselves lucky.
translation: Tyrion: 但我们大概应该庆幸自己运气好。

original: Tyrion: Even if it's unorthodox,[p/] this situation will let us approach this like any other trial.
translation: Tyrion: 虽然和平常不同，[p/]但处理方法应该和其他审理差不多。

original: You had no idea what you were in for when you agreed to this.
translation: 你还不知道自己置身何种境地，做出了什么承诺。

original: And what proceeded next would be unlike any trial you've ever been in.
translation: 接下来要发生的事会和你经历过的任何审理都不一样。

original: But even so,[p/] you persevered as you've always done in the name of justice.
translation: 但即使如此，[p/]你也会一如往常为正义而战。

original: ...Regardless of what you'd have to sacrifice to do so.
translation: ……不管你需要牺牲什么。

original: Celeste: I've...[p/] killed people...
translation: Celeste: 我……[p/]杀过人……

original: Celeste: They were usually criminals or bandits.
translation: Celeste: 一般都是强盗劫匪。

original: Celeste: But it still frightened me how unaffected I was by their deaths.
translation: Celeste: 想起自己对死亡无动于衷，我还是会震惊一下。

original: Celeste: It always came so easily to me.[p/] I was good at it...[p/] a little [i]too[/i] good.
translation: Celeste: 杀人对我来说太容易了。[p/]我有点……[p/]优秀<u>过头</u>了。

original: Celeste: People told me that taking the lives of others would be hard.
translation: Celeste: 人们都说夺走他人性命会很难受。

original: Celeste: But I never felt that uneasiness...[p/] Not even once...
translation: Celeste: 但我从没觉得不适……[p/]一次都没有……

original: Celeste: It made me think that I was some kind of unfeeling monster...
translation: Celeste: 这让我觉得自己是什么无情的怪物……

original: Celeste: And...[p/] maybe I [i]am[/i].
translation: Celeste: 也许……[p/]我<u>就是</u>。

original: Celeste: But the time I spent with you,[p/] it filled me with more happiness than I could have ever dreamed of.
translation: Celeste: 我做梦都没想过，[p/]和你在一起时会有这么开心。

original: Celeste: Instead of taking lives,[p/] I could save them alongside you.
translation: Celeste: 和你一起我不用致人死地，[p/]反而可以救人性命。

original: Celeste: It felt good to protect you.[p/] I felt needed when I knew you were relying on me.
translation: Celeste: 保护你的感觉很好。[p/]被你依靠让我感觉自己还是被需要的。

original: Celeste: It made me feel like I was actually worth something to someone.
translation: Celeste: 让我觉得在有些人心里我还是重要的。

original: Celeste: And whenever I saw the light in your eyes,[p/] it filled my heart with a warm feeling that I've never felt before.
translation: Celeste: 看见你眼睛里的光，[p/]我的心里也涌现从未感受过的温暖。

original: Celeste: ...But it was too good to be true, wasn't it?
translation: Celeste: ……好到不真实了，对吧？

original: Celeste: In the end,[p/] I failed you.
translation: Celeste: 到了最后，[p/]我辜负了你。

original: Celeste: I couldn't protect you.[p/] Just like I couldn't protect my father.
translation: Celeste: 我保护不了你。[p/]就像我保护不了自己的父亲。

original: Celeste: I don't understand...[p/] What did you ever see in someone like me...?
translation: Celeste: 我不明白……[p/]你从我身上看到了什么……？

original: Celeste: I...[p/] I really [i]don't[/i] understand.
translation: Celeste: 我……[p/]我<u>真的</u>不明白。

original: Celeste: Why would you go this far for me?!
translation: Celeste: 为什么要为我做到这一步？！

original: Tyrion: ...It's good to see you too.
translation: Tyrion: ……我也很高兴遇见你。

original: Tyrion: Ow![p/][s/] What was that for?!
translation: Tyrion: 哎哟！[p/][s/]这是干什么？！

original: Celeste: You [i]know[/i] what it's for, you jerk!
translation: Celeste: 你自己<u>明白</u>！你个坏蛋！

original: Celeste: I literally had to sign my soul away to [i]hell[/i] to keep you alive!
translation: Celeste: 为了让你活下去，[p/]我把灵魂献给<u>地狱</u>！

original: Celeste: And you just [i]threw[/i] your life away?!
translation: Celeste: 你就又把这条命<u>丢掉</u>了？！

original: Tyrion: What else was I supposed to do?![p/][s/] Should I have just [i]let[/i] Lucio kill you?!
translation: Tyrion: 我还能怎么办？！[p/][s/]我就该<u>任由</u>卢西奥杀了你？！

original: Celeste: [i]Yes[/i]![p/][s/] That's [i]exactly[/i] what you should have done!
translation: Celeste: <u>对</u>！[p/][s/]你就应该<u>这么</u>做！

original: Celeste: It's a lot better than gambling away your life!
translation: Celeste: 比赌上你自己的命好多了！

original: Tyrion: I was never going to go along with that!
translation: Tyrion: 我绝对不会这么干！

original: Tyrion: Do you even [i]know[/i] me?!
translation: Tyrion: 你真的<u>了解</u>我？！

original: Celeste: Oh my god![p/][s/] [i]This[/i] is why I couldn't tell you the truth!
translation: Celeste: 老天爷啊！[p/][s/]<u>所以</u>我才没有跟你说实话！

original: Celeste: Because I knew you'd do something [i]stupid[/i] like this!
translation: Celeste: 因为我知道你会做这种<u>蠢事</u>！

original: Tyrion: You [i]know[/i] I always get to the truth in the end!
translation: Tyrion: 你<u>知道</u>我最后总能找出真相！

original: Tyrion: All you did was make that process [i]extremely[/i] frustrating!
translation: Tyrion: 你做的事只是让这个过程<u>极度</u>费力！

original: Celeste: ...I could've gotten away with it.
translation: Celeste: ……我本来可以脱身的。

original: Tyrion: You can't even beat me at chess.
translation: Tyrion: 你连国际象棋都下不赢我。

original: Tyrion: How are you going to hide a murder from me?
translation: Tyrion: 怎么可能瞒过我杀人？

original: Celeste: Oh,[p/][s/] you-!
translation: Celeste: 唉、[p/][s/]你——！

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] I killed Pierce.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]我杀了皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: I know.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道。

original: Celeste: At first,[p/] I tried to justify it by saying he would die in one month anyways...
translation: Celeste: 一开始，[p/]我以他还有一个月就要死了为理由，[p/]试图正当化自己的行为……

original: Celeste: And what's [i]his[/i] life when compared to yours, right?
translation: Celeste: 毕竟<u>他的</u>命怎么能和你比呢？

original: Celeste: ...But when I looked at him just [i]lying[/i] there unconscious,[p/] I just got so angry.
translation: Celeste: ……可当看向<u>躺</u>在地上失去意识的他，[p/]我突然愤怒至极。

original: Celeste: So I woke him up.
translation: Celeste: 我把他叫醒了。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: I wanted him to experience a [i]fraction[/i] of the pain that my dad felt...
translation: Celeste: 我想让他也品尝到我父亲体验过的<u>一部分</u>痛苦……

original: Celeste: Someone like him didn't deserve a peaceful death.
translation: Celeste: 他这种人不值得安详死去。

original: Celeste: So I...
translation: Celeste: 所以我……

original: Tyrion: Celeste...
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: You...[p/] hate me, don't you?
translation: Celeste: 你……[p/]恨我，对吧？

original: Celeste: This time,[p/][s/] [i]I'm[/i] the disgusting murderer you've been looking for.
translation: Celeste: 这次，[p/][s/]你要寻找的奸邪杀人犯就是<u>我</u>。

original: Celeste: ...So why couldn't you just let me die?
translation: Celeste: ……为什么不让我死？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Do you honestly think I care for you [i]that[/i] little?
translation: Tyrion: 你觉得自己在我心里就<u>那么</u>不重要？

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: You are,[p/] and always will be,[p/] extremely important to me.
translation: Tyrion: 你现在是，[p/]也永远会是我非常重要的人。

original: Tyrion: One betrayal won't change how I feel about you.
translation: Tyrion: 一次背叛不会改变我对你的感受。

original: Celeste: ...Tyrion, I-
translation: Celeste: ……提利昂，我——

original: Tyrion: ...So you're not getting rid of me that easily.
translation: Tyrion: ……你可不会这么轻松甩掉我。

original: Tyrion: I'll always be there when you need me.
translation: Tyrion: 你需要的时候我一直会在。

original: Tyrion: And no matter where you go,[p/] we're going there together.
translation: Tyrion: 不管你要去哪里，[p/]我们都会一同前行。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Well...[p/] I think we might be heading to a [i]pretty[/i] bad place.
translation: Celeste: 唉……[p/]这次来的地方看起来<u>相当</u>糟糕。

original: Eris: ...Well,[p/] I'm not one to celebrate a victory prematurely.
translation: Eris: ……哎呀，[p/]我可不是那种提前庆祝胜利的人。

original: Eris: But if you're [i]already[/i] admitting defeat,[p/] I won't look a gift horse in the mouth.
translation: Eris: 但如果你们<u>已经</u>承认失败，[p/]我也不会鸡蛋里挑骨头。

original: Celeste: Eris...
translation: Celeste: 厄莉斯……

original: Eris: ...I can't believe you brought me [i]here[/i].
translation: Eris: ……不敢相信你把我带到<u>这儿</u>来了。

original: Eris: I will never hear the end of this from my father.
translation: Eris: 父亲要念叨我很久了。

original: Tyrion: ...Where are we?
translation: Tyrion: ……我们在哪儿？

original: Eris: The "courtroom" of the gods...[p/] The place where truth and reality are determined.
translation: Eris: 诸神的“法庭”……[p/]决定事实与真相的地方。

original: Eris: The Court of Azathoth.
translation: Eris: 阿萨索斯法庭。

original: Eris: ...I'll give you one last chance, Tyrion.
translation: Eris: ……我最后给你一次机会，提利昂。

original: Eris: You made a...[p/] rash decision.[p/] But I can still send you back.
translation: Eris: 你做了个……[p/]急切的决定。[p/]但我还能送你回去。

original: ...Even now,[p/] she's still trying to dissuade you.
translation: ……即使现在，[p/]她还在尝试劝退你。

original: Why is she so intent on making you give up?
translation: 为什么她这么想让你放弃？

original: Tyrion: ...You're nervous, aren't you?
translation: Tyrion: ……你很紧张，是不是？

original: Eris: ...Is that so?
translation: Eris: ……是吗？

original: Tyrion: There's a [i]reason[/i] why you didn't want me to bring you here.
translation: Tyrion: 你不想让我带你来这里肯定有<u>理由</u>。

original: Tyrion: And I'm going to find out what.
translation: Tyrion: 我会把这个理由找出来的。

original: Eris: *sigh*[p/] Your persistence was endearing at first...[p/] But [i]now[/i], it's honestly really annoying.
translation: Eris: *叹气* [p/]你的顽固一开始有点可爱……[p/]但<u>现在</u>很烦人。

original: Eris: I suppose we'll have to do this the hard way then.
translation: Eris: 那只好硬着头皮上了。

original: Eris: ...Don't say I didn't warn you.
translation: Eris: ……别说我没警告过你。

original: Eris: Oh, is that the last of your CONFIDENCE?!
translation: Eris: 哦，这就是你最后的 <size=1.5em>自信</size>？！

original: Eris: Looks like I win!
translation: Eris: 看来我赢了！

original: Refuse
translation: 拒绝

original: Eris: You should have taken my offer when you had the chance.
translation: Eris: 你当时应该接受我的好意。

original: Eris: The only way to nullify my Contract is to unequivocally prove that its conditions weren't fulfilled.
translation: Eris: 让契约无效化的唯一方法，就是证明其中有没能满足的条件。

original: Eris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: Eris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Tyrion: ...Asmodeus?
translation: Tyrion: ……阿斯摩蒂斯？

original: Eris: By his Word,[p/] demons are incapable of speaking lies.
translation: Eris: 因他之言，[p/]恶魔无法说谎。

original: Eris: You're out of your element, Tyrion.
translation: Eris: 你黔驴技穷了，提利昂。

original: Eris: This is [i]my[/i] domain.
translation: Eris: 这里是<u>我的</u>领域。

original: Rationalize [d="If disputing a Blood Contract was truly impossible, there would be no need for this Court to exist. Demons are powerful but they aren't omniscient."/]
translation: Rationalize [d="如果真的不可能对血契提出异议，这个法庭也没有了存在的必要。恶魔很强大，但不是全知全能的。"/]

original: Tyrion: If disputing a Blood Contract was truly impossible,[p/] there would be no need for this Court to exist.
translation: Tyrion: 如果真的不可能对血契提出异议，[p/]这个法庭也没有了存在的必要。

original: Tyrion: Demons are powerful.[p/] But they aren't omniscient.
translation: Tyrion: 恶魔很强大，[p/]但不是全知全能的。

original: Tyrion: They can't possibly be aware of contradicting circumstances that may be created when they make a Contract.
translation: Tyrion: 他们不可能在起草契约时就料想到出现矛盾的情况。

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Agree [d="Your Contract may be without flaw. But that doesn't mean we can't negotiate its terms."/]
translation: Agree [d="你的契约可能没有漏洞。但这不代表我们不能针对内容进行谈判。"/]

original: Tyrion: Your Contract may be without flaw.[p/] But that doesn't mean we can't negotiate its terms.
translation: Tyrion: 你的契约可能没有漏洞。[p/]但这不代表我们不能针对内容进行谈判。

original: Eris: There's nothing [i]to[/i] negotiate, Tyrion.
translation: Eris: 没有<u>可以</u>谈判的，提利昂。

original: Eris: I have the soul of the woman you love.
translation: Eris: 你爱的女人灵魂在我手上。

original: Eris: And the only thing you have to offer [i]me[/i] is your despair.
translation: Eris: 你唯一能给<u>我</u>的就是你的绝望。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Deflect [d="It doesn't matter if your Contract is perfect. I am not leaving here until you relinquish Celeste's soul."/]
translation: Deflect [d="你的契约完不完美不重要。把塞莱斯特的灵魂交出来之前我都不会离开的。"/]

original: Tyrion: It doesn't matter if your Contract is perfect.
translation: Tyrion: 你的契约完不完美不重要。

original: Tyrion: I am not leaving here until you relinquish Celeste's soul.
translation: Tyrion: 把塞莱斯特的灵魂交出来之前我都不会离开的。

original: Eris: You are only [i]permitted[/i] to be here for the purpose of disputing the Contract.
translation: Eris: 你只有对契约提出异议时才<u>被允许</u>来到这里。

original: Eris: The moment you give up on [i]that[/i],[p/] your fate will be doomed along with hers.
translation: Eris: 放弃<u>这一点</u>的瞬间，[p/]你们两个人的命运就注定灭亡。

original: Eris: But if you want to [i]graciously[/i] forfeit,[p/] by all means.
translation: Eris: 但如果你想<u>慷慨就义</u>，[p/]那请便。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: You're hiding something.[p/] Something that you [i]desperately[/i] need to keep hidden.
translation: Tyrion: 你在隐瞒什么。[p/]有什么你<u>迫切</u>要隐瞒的事情。

original: Tyrion: You even went as far as to knock out Celeste before we could get that information from her.
translation: Tyrion: 你甚至不惜为此让塞莱斯特在透露这一点前失去意识。

original: Eris: ...Oh, really now?
translation: Eris: ……哎呀，来这套？

original: Tyrion: You tried to confound the investigation by manipulating Celeste's memories.
translation: Tyrion: 你试图改变塞莱斯特的记忆来扰乱搜查。

original: Tyrion: But the contradiction in her testimony proves one thing.
translation: Tyrion: 但她证言中的矛盾证实了一件事。

original: Tyrion: She didn't see you and Beatrice enter the Prayer Room until 2:00 PM at the earliest.
translation: Tyrion: 你和比亚特丽丝最早下午 2:00 才进入祷告室，而她并没有看见你们。

original: Eris: ...Your so-called contradiction is based on the testimony of Laefe Frega.
translation: Eris: ……你这所谓的矛盾基于拉菲·弗雷加的证言之上。

original: Eris: How are you so sure that her testimony is reliable?
translation: Eris: 你怎么确定她的证言可靠？

original: Tyrion: It's supported by the testimonies of Miriam and Lord Asclepius.
translation: Tyrion: 米莉亚姆和阿斯克勒庇俄斯勋爵也给出了相同的证言。

original: Tyrion: They were all together at the time.[p/] Their testimony is sound.
translation: Tyrion: 他们当时都在一起，[p/]证言不会有错。

original: Eris: Oh really?[p/] It looks [i]you've[/i] made a contradiction.
translation: Eris: 真的吗？[p/]看起来是<u>你</u>有矛盾。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Eris: And that illusion makes their testimonies unreliable.
translation: Eris: 幻觉导致他们的证言并不可靠。

original: Eris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: Eris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Celeste: What?!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！

original: Tyrion: An illusion?![p/][s/] What [i]kind[/i] of illusion?!
translation: Tyrion: 幻觉？！[p/][s/]什么<u>类型</u>的幻觉？！

original: Eris: ...Who knows?[p/] My statement still stands.
translation: Eris: ……谁知道呢？[p/]我的证言依然可靠。

original: Tyrion: You can't just expect us to accept your claims without any evidence!
translation: Tyrion: 我们怎么可能接受你毫无证据的言论！

original: Eris: I can't speak lies, Tyrion!
translation: Eris: 我说不了谎，提利昂！

original: Eris: Every statement that comes out of my mouth [i]has[/i] to be true!
translation: Eris: 从我口中说出的每一句话都<u>一定是</u>真的！

original: Eris: I don't [i]need[/i] any proof!
translation: Eris: 我<u>不需要</u>证据！

original: Eris: In this Court,[p/] the only thing that matters is what is true and what is false.
translation: Eris: 这个法庭里，[p/]唯一重要的就是真伪。

original: Eris: And the Word of Asmodeus says that Laefe's testimony is unreliable.
translation: Eris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言证明拉菲的证言不可靠。

original: Tyrion: Damn it...
translation: Tyrion: 该死……

original: She can just say whatever she wants without having to provide any context...
translation: 她可以不用解释背景，想说什么就说什么……

original: But she only said that Laefe was tricked.[p/] She didn't specify an exact time.
translation: 但她只说了拉菲被骗。[p/]没有提到具体时间。

original: :Is there something else that proves Laefe didn't begin her search until 2:00 PM?
translation: :有没有什么拉菲下午 2:00 之前都没有开始搜索的证据？

original: Tyrion: Regardless of [i]when[/i] it happened,[p/] Laefe and her party went to search for Beatrice after you two went missing.
translation: Tyrion: 先不管发生的<u>具体时间</u>，拉菲一行人在你们俩失踪后开始寻找比亚特丽丝。

original: Tyrion: Do you confirm or deny [i]that[/i]?
translation: Tyrion: 对<u>这一点</u>你是承认还是否认？

original: Eris: ...I won't deny it.
translation: Eris: ……我不否认。

original: Tyrion: Perfect.
translation: Tyrion: 完美。

original: Tyrion: [i]Whoever[/i] set that trap,[p/] they set it to trigger whenever Aster approached his father's body.
translation: Tyrion: <u>无论是谁</u>设下了陷阱，[p/]陷阱的触发条件都被设置为阿斯特接近其父遗体。

original: Tyrion: And it didn't trigger until 2:00 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 而陷阱直到下午 2:00 才触发。

original: Tyrion: Laefe and her party were about to search for Beatrice,[p/] when the Kingsguard informed them of what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 拉菲一行人正要去找比亚特丽丝时，[p/]国王卫队出现并通知她们这一事件。

original: Tyrion: And mind you,[p/] the Kingsguard did this [i]immediately[/i] after the trap was sprung.
translation: Tyrion: 提醒你一下，[p/]国王卫队在陷阱被触发之后<u>立刻</u>行动。

original: Tyrion: Since Laefe was about to begin her search when this happened,[p/] Beatrice [i]couldn't[/i] have gone missing until that time.
translation: Tyrion: 既然拉菲在此时刚要开始搜索，[p/]比亚特丽丝失踪<u>不可能</u>是在此之前。

original: Laefe's testimony [i]does[/i] contradict what she said.[p/] But she already declared that it's not reliable.
translation: 拉菲的证言<u>确实</u>和她说的冲突。[p/]但她已经宣称拉菲不可信。

original: However,[p/] that testimony also mentions something [i]else[/i] that happened.
translation: 然而，[p/]证言还提到了发生的<u>其他</u>事。

original: Perhaps you can use that event instead.
translation: 也许你可以利用这件事。

original: Eris: What's this...?
translation: Eris: 这是……？

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh, I-...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢，我……

original: Eris: You're going to have to do better than [i]that[/i] if you want to beat me.
translation: Eris: 想击败我的话<u>这样</u>可不够。

original: Eris: And once again,[p/] you're predicating that on [i]Aster's[/i] testimony.
translation: Eris: 你这次的推理也是基于<u>阿斯特</u>的证言。

original: Tyrion: Not just him, Eris.[p/] Several members of the Kingsguard witnessed this.
translation: Tyrion: 不只是他，厄莉斯。[p/]国王卫队多名成员也都看到了。

original: Eris: ...True.[p/] And that is why I'll respond with this.
translation: Eris: ……确实。[p/]所以我才要这样回答。

original: Eris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: Eris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Tyrion: B-[p/][s/]But how...?[p/] That testimony came from [i]multiple[/i] people.
translation: Tyrion: 但、[p/][s/]但怎么……？[p/]证言来自<u>不只一个</u>人。

original: Tyrion: Are you saying that the trap was sprung [i]earlier[/i] than that?!
translation: Tyrion: 你是说陷阱触发还要在那<u>之前</u>？！

original: Eris: Don't you remember, Tyrion?
translation: Eris: 提利昂，你不记得了？

original: Eris: I can manipulate the memories of people who have a Blood Contract with me.
translation: Eris: 我可以改变和我签约血契之人的记忆。

original: Eris: But I'll give you a little clue...
translation: Eris: 给你一条线索……

original: Eris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: Eris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What...?
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么……？

original: Eris: I tampered with their memories.
translation: Eris: 我改变了他们的记忆。

original: Eris: You can't trust their accounts of what happened.
translation: Eris: 你不能相信他们关于事件的话。

original: Tyrion: How many people did you make Contracts with?!
translation: Tyrion: 你和多少人签了契约？！

original: Eris: Little Lady Steelwind has been investigating my work for the last few months.
translation: Eris: 斯蒂尔文德小姑娘追查我几个月了。

original: Eris: But I've had my talons in Wyverngarde for [i]far[/i] longer than that.
translation: Eris: 但我的魔爪早在<u>很久之前</u>就伸到了维文加德。

original: Eris: I've been preparing for this for [i]quite[/i] some time.
translation: Eris: 我的准备工作已经进行<u>很久</u>了。

original: Tyrion: ...But even the Kingsguard.
translation: Tyrion: ……那可是国王卫队。

original: Eris: [i]No one[/i] is safe from temptation.[p/] [i]Everyone[/i] has a price.
translation: Eris: <u>没有人</u>能抵挡诱惑。[p/]<u>是个人</u>都有忍耐阈值。

original: Eris: Your little girlfriend should know that better than anyone!
translation: Eris: 你的小女友应该最清楚了！

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]Still...[p/] There [i]has[/i] to be something...
translation: Tyrion: 但、[p/][s/]但是……[p/]<u>肯定</u>有什么……

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I still have more evidence...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我还有证据……

original: Eris: Oh, really?[p/] Whose testimony will you be relying on [i]this[/i] time?
translation: Eris: 哎呀，真的？[p/]你<u>这次</u>要依靠谁的证言？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Eris: You can PRESENT all the evidence you want.
translation: Eris: 你可以尽管 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 证据。

original: Eris: Most of what you have is based on [i]eyewitness[/i] accounts.
translation: Eris: 但大部分都会是基于<u>目击者</u>证言。

original: Tyrion: Even so...[p/] Y-[p/][s/]You can't have possibly made a Contract with [i]everyone[/i] there.
translation: Tyrion: 即使如此……[p/]你、[p/][s/]你也不可能和<u>所有人</u>签约。

original: Eris: ...Let's check that again, shall we?
translation: Eris: ……不如再回顾一遍如何？

original: Eris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: Eris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Celeste: Are you kidding me?!
translation: Celeste: 你在逗我吧？！

original: Tyrion: B-[p/][s/]But you only said it's "possible"!
translation: Tyrion: 但、[p/][s/]但你说是“可能”！

original: Tyrion: You never said that it [i]actually[/i] happened!
translation: Tyrion: 你没说过是不是<u>确实</u>发生了！

original: Eris: [i]You're[/i] the one disputing my Contract, Tyrion!
translation: Eris: 是<u>你</u>在对我的契约提出异议，提利昂！

original: Eris: The burden of the proof is on [i]you[/i]!
translation: Eris: 证明的责任在<u>你</u>身上！

original: Tyrion: That's completely ridiculous!
translation: Tyrion: 这也太荒唐了！

original: Tyrion: How could I [i]possibly[/i] verify a statement like that?!
translation: Tyrion: 我<u>怎么可能</u>证实这种证言？！

original: Eris: It's simple.
translation: Eris: 很简单。

original: Eris: Issue a Divine Edict to each person who was at the Cathedral.
translation: Eris: 对大教堂里的所有人发出神谕。

original: Celeste: You [i]know[/i] he can't do that!
translation: Celeste: 你<u>知道</u>他不能这么做！

original: Celeste: If he gets it wrong even [i]once[/i],[p/] he'll die!
translation: Celeste: 就算只错了<u>一次</u>，[p/]他也会死！

original: Eris: That sounds more like [i]your[/i] problem than mine!
translation: Eris: 那也是<u>你们</u>来担心，不关我事！

original: Tyrion: Damn it...
translation: Tyrion: 该死……

original: Eris: Nothing to say, Tyrion?
translation: Eris: 没话说啦，提利昂？

original: Eris: Isn't this the part where you PRESENT some ground-breaking piece of evidence?
translation: Eris: 你这会儿不是该 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 什么惊天动地的证据吗？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: As long as her statement stands,[p/] you have to doubt [i]every[/i] piece of testimony you've gathered.
translation: 只要她的话还没被证伪，[p/]你就必须怀疑自己搜集的<u>每一条</u>证言。

original: [i]Everyone[/i] at the Cathedral could have been compromised...[p/] except-
translation: 大教堂里的<u>每个人</u>都可能有嫌疑……[p/]除了——

original: Tyrion: A-[p/][s/]Aster...![p/] I know [i]he[/i] doesn't have a Blood Contract with you.
translation: Tyrion: 阿、[p/][s/]阿斯特……！[p/]我知道<u>他</u>没和你签血契。

original: Eris: ...I suppose you're right.
translation: Eris: ……你说得没错。

original: Eris: So are you going to use [i]his[/i] testimony?
translation: Eris: 所以你要采用<u>他的</u>证言吗？

original: Eris: He couldn't observe [i]much[/i] from within that [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Eris: 在那个[b]坚牢术[/b]里，他看不到<u>多少</u>东西。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Eris: Do you understand now?
translation: Eris: 你现在明白了吗？

original: Eris: You were [i]never[/i] meant to win this game.
translation: Eris: 你根本<u>没</u>可能赢。

original: Eris: But I've got to give you points for entertaining me this long!
translation: Eris: 但看在你陪我玩了这么久的份上，还是夸夸你吧！

original: Eris: [i]This[/i] is the most fun I've ever had![p/][s/] And I [i]truly[/i] mean that!
translation: Eris: <u>这</u>真是我有过最大的乐子啦！[p/][s/]我<u>认真</u>的！

original: Celeste: Tyrion...
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……

original: Come on![p/][s/] There has to be [i]something[/i] you can use!
translation: 想想！[p/][s/]肯定有<u>什么</u>你能用的！

original: ...But all the clues you've gathered could potentially be lies created by her.
translation: ……但你搜集的所有线索都可能是她编造的谎言。

original: They're useless against her.
translation: 那些线索没法反驳她。

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion![p/][s/] You have to say something...
translation: Celeste: 提、[p/][s/]提利昂！[p/][s/]你得说点什么……

original: You can feel your strength fading...
translation: 你感到自己的力量在减弱……

original: It feels as if you're being pulled into an eternal sleep.
translation: 就像是被拖入永恒的睡眠。

original: Eris: This has [i]always[/i] been a contest of willpower.
translation: Eris: 这<u>一直</u>是场意志力的比拼。

original: Eris: And I think he's [i]finally[/i] run out.
translation: Eris: 我想他<u>终于</u>出局了。

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]No...
translation: Celeste: 不、[p/][s/]不……

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: You recall what happened during Beatrice's trial.
translation: 你回忆起在比亚特丽丝庭审时发生的事。

original: Your mother gave you the knowledge you needed to win.
translation: 母亲给予了你胜利所需的知识。

original: She did it before...[p/] Can she save you again?
translation: 她已经拯救你一次了……[p/]她还能再次拯救你吗？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Mom...[p/] Please.
translation: Tyrion: 妈妈……[p/]拜托。

original: Tyrion: I need your help...
translation: Tyrion: 帮帮我……

original: Tyrion: Please...[p/] Just tell me what to do...
translation: Tyrion: 拜托了……[p/]告诉我该怎么做……

original: You hear nothing back.
translation: 没有任何回应。

original: Tyrion: No...
translation: Tyrion: 不……

original: It appears you're truly alone now.
translation: 看来现在真的只能靠你自己了。

original: You knew this was a long shot...[p/] But you still held out hope...
translation: 你知道这机会渺茫……[p/]但你依然抱有希望……

original: ...You just wanted to protect Celeste.[p/] And you really thought you could do this.
translation: ……你只是想保护塞莱斯特，[p/]也真心认为你能做到。

original: But Eris is a being who wraps herself in layers upon layers of lies.
translation: 但厄莉斯是个用层层谎言包裹自身的人。

original: She has the power to make you doubt [i]everything[/i].
translation: 她有能力让你怀疑<u>一切</u>。

original: The witness testimonies,[p/] even your hard evidence could be a fabrication.
translation: 证人的证言，[p/]就连你确凿的证据都可能是伪造出来的。

original: How could you possibly argue against someone like that?
translation: 你怎么可能对付得了这样的人？

original: Tyrion: It's not fair...
translation: Tyrion: 这不公平……

original: Tyrion: It's not fair, Ms. Tymora!
translation: Tyrion: 这不公平，泰摩拉女士！

original: Tyrion: They're not even [i]bothering[/i] to investigate the crime properly!
translation: Tyrion: 他们甚至懒得<u>花时间</u>调查一下案子！

original: Ruby: Well...[p/] Of course, they're not.
translation: Ruby: 嗯哼……[p/]他们当然懒得调查。

original: Ruby: If they did,[p/] they'd be forced to admit that my client is innocent.
translation: Ruby: 如果他们进行调查，[p/]就要被迫承认我的委托人是无辜的。

original: Tyrion: How are you so calm right now...?
translation: Tyrion: 你现在怎么还能这么冷静……？

original: Tyrion: ...Is this what it's [i]always[/i] like?
translation: Tyrion: ……所以一直<u>都是</u>这样的？

original: Tyrion: How are you supposed to win like this?
translation: Tyrion: 这种情况你要怎么赢？

original: Tyrion: They can just keep changing the narrative however they want!
translation: Tyrion: 他们能随心所欲地改变说法！

original: Ruby: They can...[p/] And that's [i]exactly[/i] how I'll beat them.
translation: Ruby: 他们确实可以……[p/]这也<u>正是</u>我打败他们的关键。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Ruby: Look, Cuthbert.[p/] Almost every part of the system is against us.
translation: Ruby: 听好，卡斯伯特。[p/]司法体系几乎每一部分都和我们不对付。

original: Ruby: But there's [i]one[/i] advantage we have over the prosecution.
translation: Ruby: 但我们比检察官多<u>一项</u>优势。

original: Ruby: And that's pure and objective logic.
translation: Ruby: 就是纯粹客观的逻辑。

original: Tyrion: "Logic"...?
translation: Tyrion: “逻辑”……？

original: Ruby: Tyrion.[p/] The prosecutor does all sorts of things to validate their case.
translation: Ruby: 提利昂。[p/]检察官会为了成功指控而用尽手段。

original: Ruby: They PRESENT evidence,[p/] they call witnesses,[p/] and they use those things to create conclusions.
translation: Ruby: 他们会 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 证据，[p/]找来目击者，[p/]通过这些来创造结论。

original: Ruby: They create a box and throw a bunch of "facts" into it.
translation: Ruby: 他们相当于做了个箱子，[p/]往里面扔进一堆“事实”。

original: Ruby: They tell the court that everything within that box is the truth.
translation: Ruby: 他们告诉法庭，箱子里的一切都是真的。

original: Ruby: And conversely,[p/] that makes everything [i]outside[/i] of it a lie.
translation: Ruby: 反之亦然，[p/]箱子<u>外面</u>的一切都是谎言。

original: Tyrion: But how does that help [i]us[/i]?
translation: Tyrion: 这怎么能帮到<u>我们</u>？

original: Ruby: You point out contradictions in their case.
translation: Ruby: 你要指出他们的矛盾。

original: Ruby: That makes them throw more and more "facts" into that box to keep their case consistent.
translation: Ruby: 为了保证前后一致，他们就不得不往箱子里投入更多“事实”。

original: Ruby: But if even [i]one[/i] "fact" in the box is false,[p/] the entire thing falls apart.
translation: Ruby: 只要箱子里的<u>一个</u>“事实”有误，[p/]他们的整个理论就会崩塌。

original: Tyrion: But surely they'll realize what you're doing.
translation: Tyrion: 但他们肯定也明白你在做什么。

original: Tyrion: What if they play dumb and refuse to add [i]anything[/i] to this "box"?
translation: Tyrion: 他们要是装傻，拒绝往这个“箱子”里加入<u>任何东西</u>呢？

original: Ruby: Well...[p/] You can force them to.
translation: Ruby: 这个嘛……[p/]你可以逼他们这么做。

original: Tyrion: What...?
translation: Tyrion: 什么……？

original: Ruby: You can PRESENT your [i]own[/i] TRUTHS.
translation: Ruby: 你可以 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 你<u>自己的</u> <size=1.5em>真相</size>。

original: Ruby: And you force the prosecution to either accept or deny them.
translation: Ruby: 逼着检方承认或否认。

original: Ruby: By doing that,[p/] [i]you[/i] can control what goes into the box.
translation: Ruby: 这么做的话，[p/]<u>你</u>就能控制箱子里的内容。

original: Tyrion: This all sounds so complicated...[p/] I don't know if I'll ever get the hang of it.
translation: Tyrion: 听起来好复杂……[p/]我不知道自己能不能掌握。

original: Ruby: Don't worry...[p/] You've always been a sharp kid.
translation: Ruby: 不用担心……[p/]你一直是个聪明的孩子。

original: Ruby: I know you'll do great things.
translation: Ruby: 我知道你前途光明。

original: Ruby: So don't give up.
translation: Ruby: 不要放弃。

original: I can...[p/] PRESENT my own TRUTHS?
