translation: 我可以…… <size=1.5em>出示</size> 我自己的 <size=1.5em>真相</size>？

original: ...Eris's case hinges on when Beatrice disappeared.
translation: ……厄莉斯的理论基于比亚特丽丝的消失时间。

original: And she changed Celeste's memories to make her think [i]everything[/i] happened earlier.
translation: 她改变了塞莱斯特的记忆，让后者以为<u>一切</u>其实更早发生。

original: Which can only mean...
translation: 这只意味着……

original: Tyrion: ...Beatrice Frega did [i]not[/i] go missing before 2:00 PM.
translation: Tyrion: ……比亚特丽丝·弗雷加下午 2:00 之前<u>没有</u>失踪。

original: Eris: ...What was that?
translation: Eris: ……说什么呢？

original: Tyrion: I said...
translation: Tyrion: 我说……

original: Tyrion: ...So says the Word of Horus.
translation: Tyrion: ……荷鲁斯之言如是说。

original: Eris: ...What the [i]hell[/i]?!
translation: Eris: ……搞什么<u>鬼</u>？！

original: You feel yourself filled with the radiant power of the Eye of Horus.
translation: 你感到身体里充满荷鲁斯之眼的力量。

original: With its power fully unleashed,[p/] you feel the divine energy of the Upper Planes coursing through you.
translation: 随着它的力量完全释放，[p/]你能感到上层位面的神圣能量在你体内循环。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] You...
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]你……

original: Celeste: You have wings!
translation: Celeste: 你长翅膀了！

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Wait...[p/] Really?!
translation: Tyrion: 等、[p/][s/]等等……[p/]真的？！

original: You frantically turn around...[p/] only catching glimpses of the spectral wings on your back.
translation: 你慌忙转身……[p/]只能用余光瞟到你背上的光翼。

original: You spin around for a while until you realize that your feet aren't even touching the ground anymore.
translation: 你就这么在原地转了一会儿以后才意识到，自己的脚已经离开地面了。

original: Eris: You...?![p/][s/] What did you just do?!
translation: Eris: 你……？！[p/][s/]你刚刚干了什么？！

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] became a celestial...
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]我成了天界人士……

original: Tyrion: Which means...
translation: Tyrion: 也就代表……

original: Eris: No...
translation: Eris: 不……

original: Tyrion: ...I [p/][i]also[/i] can't tell lies.
translation: Tyrion: ……我[p/]<u>也</u>不能说谎。

original: Tyrion: In any other situation,[p/] that would be a handicap...
translation: Tyrion: 换成其他场合，[p/]这可不太妙……

original: Tyrion: But [i]here[/i]?![p/][s/] That finally puts me on equal footing with you!
translation: Tyrion: 但在<u>这里</u>？！[p/][s/]我终于能和你旗鼓相当了！

original: Eris: ...Why won't you just [i]die[/i] already?!
translation: Eris: ……你怎么就是<u>死</u>不了？！

original: Tyrion: You tried everything you could to break me.
translation: Tyrion: 你为了让我崩溃使尽浑身解数。

original: Tyrion: You drove a wedge between me and Ruby.
translation: Tyrion: 你挑拨离间我和鲁比。

original: Tyrion: You even manipulated Celeste into betraying me.
translation: Tyrion: 你还骗得塞莱斯特背叛我。

original: Tyrion: ...But I'm still standing, Eris.
translation: Tyrion: ……但我依然没有倒下，厄莉斯。

original: Tyrion: I think you [i]might[/i] be a little out of your depth, right now.
translation: Tyrion: 我认为现在是<u>你</u>黔驴技穷了。

original: Eris: ...!
translation: Eris: ……！

original: Eris: I have lived a [i]million[/i] of your pathetic lifetimes!
translation: Eris: 我比你这可悲的小子多活了<u>数百万</u>年！

original: Eris: And you think [i]I'm[/i] out of [i]my[/i] depth?!
translation: Eris: 你觉得<u>我</u>会<u>黔驴技穷</u>？！

original: Eris: I am the Empress of Discord![p/][s/] Ruler of the Sixth Circle of Hell!
translation: Eris: 我是无序女皇！[p/][s/]地狱第六层的统治者！

original: Eris: I am a [s/][i]GOD[/i]!
translation: Eris: 我是[s/] <size=1.5em><u>神</u></size>！

original: Celeste: *chuckles*[p/] She doesn't know, Tyrion.
translation: Celeste: *笑着* [p/]提利昂，她不懂了。

original: Eris: What the hell are [i]you[/i] laughing about?!
translation: Eris: <u>你们</u>笑个什么劲？！

original: Tyrion: Whoever you are,[p/] man,[p/] king,[p/] [i]or[/i] god...
translation: Tyrion: 不管你是人、[p/]王、[p/]<u>亦或</u>是神……

original: Tyrion: I won't let [i]anyone[/i] stop me from reaching the truth.
translation: Tyrion: <u>无人</u>能阻挡我追寻真相。

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Eris: Hahahahahaha...
translation: Eris: 哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈……

original: Eris: HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
translation: Eris: <size=1.5em>哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！</size>

original: Eris: Since you've so [i]graciously[/i] bared your soul to me,[p/] I guess I should do the same.
translation: Eris: 既然你这么<u>大方</u>地把灵魂袒露在我面前，[p/]我也该这么做。

original: Eris: I [i]wanted[/i] to break your spirit in this form...[p/] All so I could keep things [i]fair[/i] and interesting.
translation: Eris: 我<u>想要</u>以这种形态让你精神崩溃……[p/]这样才更<u>公平</u>有趣。

original: Eris: But you know what?
translation: Eris: 但你猜怎么着？

original: Eris: Right now...?[p/] I just want to see you die.
translation: Eris: 此时此刻……？[p/]我只想看你死。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What...?[p/][s/] What happened?
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么……？[p/][s/]发生了什么？

original: Tyrion: Celeste?!
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特？！

original: Celeste: I-[p/][s/]I'm here!
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/][s/]我在这里！

original: Eris: *chuckles*
translation: Eris: *笑出声*

original: Eris: I can't wait to tear you [i]both[/i] apart.
translation: Eris: 我等不及要把<u>你们两个</u>撕裂了。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Celeste: What [i]is[/i] that thing?!
translation: Celeste: 这<u>是</u>什么东西？！

original: FEris: HAHAHAHA![p/][s/] Did you two [i]honestly[/i] think my true form was that of a teenage girl?!
translation: FEris: <size=1.5em>哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！</size>[p/][s/]你们两个<u>真的</u>以为一个少女就是我的真实形态？！

original: FEris: No...[p/] I am an ancient one...[p/] I am older than time itself.
translation: FEris: 不……[p/]我自远古时期便存在……[p/]我比时间本身还要久远。

original: FEris: It feels liberating to break free from that weak mortal shell.
translation: FEris: 不用被困在弱小凡人躯壳之内真是舒服啊。

original: Tyrion: So...[p/] [i]This[/i] is what you really look like...
translation: Tyrion: 所以……[p/]<u>这</u>才是你的真实形态……

original: Tyrion: Well, it doesn't matter...
translation: Tyrion: 哎，不重要……

original: Tyrion: [i]Whatever[/i] you are,[p/][s/] I'm [i]taking[/i] Celeste's soul back!
translation: Tyrion: 不管你是<u>什么</u>，[p/][s/]我都会<u>取回</u>塞莱斯特的灵魂！

original: Celeste: Kick her ass, Tyrion!
translation: Celeste: 干掉她，提利昂！

original: FEris: HAHAHAHA![p/][s/] I'm going to carve out your souls and mount them in the fields of Malbolge!
translation: FEris: <size=1.5em>哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！</size>[p/][s/] 我会把你们的灵魂剜出来扔到玛尔博吉！

original: FEris: And so the story of Tyrion Cuthbert ends...
translation: FEris: 提利昂·卡斯伯特的故事就这样结束了……

original: FEris: I will enjoy bringing your flayed carcass back to Malboge.
translation: FEris: 我会高兴地带着你的碎尸回玛尔博吉。

original: Defy
translation: 违抗

original: You'll need to be careful.[p/] You're bound by the same rules as her now.
translation: 你需要小心。[p/]你和她现在被同样的规则约束。

original: You can't tell lies in this form,[p/] even accidentally.
translation: 你在这种形态下也不能说谎，[p/]口误也不行。

original: Tyrion: ...Why don't we pick up where we left off?
translation: Tyrion: ……我们从刚才中断的地方继续吧？

original: Tyrion: I've established that Beatrice didn't go missing until 2:00 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 我已经证实比亚特丽丝下午 2:00 之前没有失踪。

original: Tyrion: I wonder...[p/] Why would you go to so much trouble to make me doubt that?
translation: Tyrion: 我在想……[p/]为什么你要费尽九牛二虎之力让我怀疑这一点？

original: FEris: ...
translation: FEris: ……

original: :When she gave her testimony,[p/] Celeste said that Eris and Beatrice entered the Prayer Room at 1:40 PM.
translation: :在她给出证言时，塞莱斯特说厄莉斯和比亚特丽丝是下午 1:40 进入祷告室。

original: :But from the AXIOM you declared,[p/] you know Beatrice didn't disappear until 2:00PM.
translation: :但根据你刚刚陈述的 <size=1.5em>公理</size>，[p/]比亚特丽丝下午 2:00 之前没有失踪。

original: Eris clearly changed Celeste's memories,[p/] but for what purpose?
translation: 明显是厄莉斯修改了塞莱斯特的记忆，[p/]但目的是什么？

original: No...[p/] Eris may be unpredictable sometimes,[p/] but even [i]she[/i] acts with purpose.
translation: 不对……[p/]厄莉斯有时难以预测，[p/]但即使是<u>她</u>的行动也有目的。

original: There's a reason why she changed Celeste's memories.
translation: 她要修改塞莱斯特的记忆一定是有理由的。

original: It was to change the [i]time[/i] at which she remembered the events occurring.
translation: 是为了改变她记忆里事情发生的<u>时间</u>。

original: Tyrion: I believe you needed Celeste to think that the events happened much earlier.
translation: Tyrion: 在我看来，你需要让塞莱斯特相信案件其实更早发生。

original: FEris: ...
translation: FEris: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Staying quiet?[p/] That won't work this time.
translation: Tyrion: ……保持沉默？[p/]这次可不管用了。

original: Tyrion: ...So says the Word of Horus.
translation: Tyrion: ……荷鲁斯之言如是说。

original: FEris: ...
translation: FEris: ……

original: Tyrion: Nothing to say?[p/] You can't stay quiet forever.
translation: Tyrion: 还不说话？[p/]你可不能一直装哑巴。

original: FEris: Hmph...
translation: FEris: 哼……

original: FEris: I didn't [i]need[/i] her to think that specifically.
translation: FEris: 我<u>不需要</u>特地让她这么想。

original: FEris: I simply wanted to confound your ability to deduce what [i]actually[/i] happened.
translation: FEris: 我单纯是想让你无法轻松推断出<u>其实</u>发生了什么。

original: FEris: ...And is that not what happened?
translation: FEris: ……发生的事不正是如此？

original: Tyrion: That may be...[p/] But I think you had a specific reason to move her timeline back.
translation: Tyrion: 也许是吧……[p/]但我认为你只调整她的时间线是有特别理由的。

original: Tyrion: ...So says the Word of Horus.
translation: Tyrion: ……荷鲁斯之言如是说。

original: :No...[p/] Eris [i]wanted[/i] you to believe that Celeste signed the Contract with her at 1:40 PM.
translation: :不对……[p/]厄莉斯<u>想要</u>你相信，塞莱斯特与她签约是在下午 1:40。

original: She needed you to believe that to keep the narrative logically consistent.
translation: 为了让编的故事逻辑自洽，她需要你相信这一点。

original: :But you now know that Eris used Beatrice to attack the Prayer Room [i]no later[/i] than 2:00 PM.
translation: :但你现在知道，厄莉斯操控比亚特丽丝攻击祷告室的时间<u>不晚于</u>下午 2:00。

original: What followed shortly after that seems strange if the events happened much later.
translation: 如果事件其实发生得更晚，这一行动不久之后的事就会不大对劲。

original: Tyrion: It was the death of Lloyd von Sanctus.
translation: Tyrion: 是洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯之死。

original: Tyrion: You needed Celeste to think that she signed the Contract much earlier than 2:00 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 你需要让塞莱斯特相信，她签约时远早于下午 2:00。

original: Tyrion: That's because Lloyd von Sanctus's death occurred at 2:05 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 因为洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯在下午 2:05 死亡。

original: Tyrion: Which would imply that you killed me,[p/] convinced Celeste to sign a Contract,[p/] [i]and[/i] made Celeste trick Aria into signing [i]another[/i] Contract.
translation: Tyrion: 意味着你杀了我，[p/]说服塞莱斯特签约，[p/]<u>还</u>让塞莱斯特骗阿莉亚签了<u>另一份</u>契约……

original: Tyrion: ...All in the span of [i]five[/i] minutes.
translation: Tyrion: ……而这些行动都发生在<u>五分钟</u>之内。

original: FEris: ...
translation: FEris: ……

original: Tyrion: If that's true,[p/] could it be possible that Celeste [i]isn't[/i] the Patron?
translation: Tyrion: 如果这是真的，[p/]那塞莱斯特有没有可能<u>不是</u>签约人？

original: Celeste: What...?
translation: Celeste: 什么……？

original: Tyrion: It's the only logical conclusion.[p/] The timeline is far too short.
translation: Tyrion: 这是唯一合理的结论。[p/]不然的话时间线太短了。

original: Tyrion: Even if you [i]remember[/i] being tricked by her,[p/] we can't trust your memories.
translation: Tyrion: 即使你真的<u>记得</u>自己被她所骗，[p/]我们也不能相信你的记忆。

original: Tyrion: ...Isn't that right, Eris?
translation: Tyrion: ……不是吗，厄莉斯？

original: FEris: *sigh*[p/] Your desperation is almost pitiful.
translation: FEris: *叹气* [p/]你绝望到了凄惨的程度。

original: FEris: I should respond so that there's no room for doubt.
translation: FEris: 为了不留质疑空间，我将作出回应。

original: FEris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: FEris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Celeste: ...I knew it.
translation: Celeste: ……我就知道。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: FEris: ...Is something wrong?
translation: FEris: ……怎么了吗？

original: FEris: I know the truth is hard to accept sometimes.[p/] But Celeste [i]did[/i] betray Aria's trust.
translation: FEris: 我知道真相有时很难接受。[p/]但塞莱斯特<u>确实</u>背叛了阿莉亚的信任。

original: ...She always speaks in technicalities.[p/] So you can't take that claim at face value.
translation: ……她说话一直是拐弯抹角。[p/]你不能按照字面意思解读。

original: But this could also be a trick.
translation: 但这也可能是她的把戏。

original: You [i]could[/i] declare outright that Celeste is not the Patron.
translation: 你<u>可以</u>现在宣告塞莱斯特不是签约人。

original: But if you're wrong about that,[p/] you'll most definitely die.
translation: 但如果错了，[p/]你注定会死。

original: You need to be certain before you decide to declare it.
translation: 决定宣告前，你要先确定这一点。

original: ...Okay,[p/] let's assume that Celeste [i]isn't[/i] the Patron.
translation: ……好了，[p/]先假设塞莱斯特<u>不是</u>签约人。

original: If Celeste isn't the Patron,[p/] that Contract would've already been signed.
translation: 如果塞莱斯特不是签约人，[p/]当时契约就已经签订。

original: And you already concluded that the Blood Contract was disguised as a normal legal document.
translation: 你也已经知道血契被伪装成一份普通的法律文件。

original: You recall something happening...[p/] But it's still muddled.
translation: 你回忆起了什么事……[p/]但还是模糊不清。

original: What was it?
translation: 是什么？

original: No...[p/] You recall something that happened in front of the Prayer Room.
translation: 不对……[p/]你回忆起的是祷告室前发生的事。

original: It was brief.[p/] So you can't remember exactly what it was.
translation: 只有一瞬。[p/]所以你记不清准确时刻。

original: But there was a short exchange between Celeste and Aria.
translation: 但那是塞莱斯特与阿莉亚之间的互动。

original: As she awkwardly skitters away,[p/] you see something fall out of her pocket.
translation: 在她尴尬地试图溜之大吉时，[p/]你看到她口袋里掉了什么东西。

original: Celeste: Oh, Aria![p/][s/] You dropped your runestone.
translation: Celeste: 噢、阿莉亚！[p/][s/]你的符石掉了。

original: As Celeste picks up the runestone,[p/] she accidentally activates it.
translation: 塞莱斯特捡起符石时不小心将之激活。

original: An image of a piece of evidence appears for a brief moment,[p/] but Aria quickly hides it.
translation: 某件证据的图像出现了一瞬，[p/]但阿莉亚迅速把它隐藏了起来。

original: ...But not before Celeste sneaks a peek at it.
translation: ……但塞莱斯特已经看到内容了。

original: Aria: O-[p/][s/]Oh...
translation: Aria: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...Oh, I see.
translation: Celeste: ……噢，我懂了。

original: Tyrion: Celeste... Don't just invade her privacy like that.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……不要这么侵犯她的个人隐私。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Celeste: Don't be like that.[p/] I'm really happy for you.
translation: Celeste: 别这样嘛。[p/]我真的为你高兴。

original: She definitely handed that Contract to her after it was signed.
translation: 塞莱斯特交给阿莉亚的文件确实已经被签署。

original: ...But that doesn't necessarily mean she's [i]not[/i] the Patron either.
translation: ……但这也不等同于说她<u>不是</u>签约人。

original: FEris: Is something wrong?[p/] You look conflicted.
translation: FEris: 怎么了吗？[p/]你看起来很矛盾。

original: ...No.[p/] From the very beginning,[p/] she's been trying to get in your head.
translation: ……不对。[p/]从一开始，[p/]她就只是想打乱你的思绪。

original: She thrives on doubt and mistrust.
translation: 她从猜忌与怀疑中获取能量。

original: But you've always known from the very beginning.
translation: 但你早就知道了这一点。

original: Celeste would [i]never[/i] betray Aria like that.
translation: 塞莱斯特<u>绝对不会</u>像那样背叛阿莉亚。

original: Tyrion: ...So says the Word of Horus.
translation: Tyrion: ……荷鲁斯之言如是说。

original: FEris: Agh![p/][s/] Even [i]now[/i],[p/] you trust her [i]that[/i] much?!
translation: FEris: 啊！[p/][s/]即使到了<u>现在</u>，[p/]你还<u>那么</u>相信她？！

original: Celeste: W-[p/][s/]Wait...[p/] But, that means!
translation: Celeste: 等、[p/][s/]等等……[p/]但这就是说！

original: Tyrion: You didn't betray Aria, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，你没有背叛阿莉亚。

original: Tyrion: She only manipulated your memories after the fact.
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯只是在事后篡改了你的记忆。

original: Tyrion: She wanted to make you [i]think[/i] that you did.
translation: Tyrion: 她想让你<u>以为</u>是你干的。

original: Celeste: S-[p/][s/]So...[p/] It's not my fault?
translation: Celeste: 所、[p/][s/]所以……[p/]不是我的错吗？

original: Tyrion: ...It isn't.
translation: Tyrion: ……不是你的错。

original: But that has a far more unsettling implication...
translation: 但这也引出另一个让人不安的问题……

original: Someone [i]else[/i] is the Patron.[p/][s/] But who?!
translation: 签约人<u>另有其人</u>。[p/][s/]但究竟是谁？！

original: No...[p/] That's not important right now.
translation: 不对……[p/]这件事现在不重要。

original: You need to focus on saving Celeste for now.
translation: 你现在应该专注于救出塞莱斯特。

original: Tyrion: [i]Celeste[/i] wasn't the one who secured Aria's compliance and cooperation.
translation: Tyrion: <u>塞莱斯特</u>不是确保阿莉亚效忠无序女皇的人。

original: Tyrion: Doesn't that make your Contract flawed?
translation: Tyrion: 你的契约这不就有了漏洞？

original: FEris: Please.[p/] I thought you were an attorney.
translation: FEris: 拜托。[p/]你好歹是个律师。

original: FEris: The Contract states that Celeste would "engage in actions deemed [i]necessary[/i] to secure the compliance and cooperation of Aria Steelwind".
translation: FEris: 契约里明确写着塞莱斯特·麦考伊要“协助女皇<u>确保</u>阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德服从”。

original: FEris: No further actions were necessary.[p/] She was already under my influence by then.
translation: FEris: 不需要更多行动。[p/]她当时已经受我控制了。

original: Tyrion: But that means [i]none[/i] of this is her fault!
translation: Tyrion: 但这也意味着这些都<u>不是</u>她的错！

original: FEris: Oh, I wouldn't go that far.
translation: FEris: 哎呀，我可不会说到这种地步。

original: FEris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: FEris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] There's still the death of Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 确实……[p/]还有皮尔斯的死。

original: FEris: It doesn't matter who's "responsible" for the massacre as a whole.
translation: FEris: 谁该对整个屠杀事件“负责”并不重要。

original: FEris: All that matters is the validity of my Contract.
translation: FEris: 重要的只有契约的有效性。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: You [i]act[/i] like you're in control of this situation.
translation: Tyrion: 你<u>表现得</u>像是一切尽在掌握。

original: Tyrion: But you've been nervous ever since I began disputing your Contract.
translation: Tyrion: 但在我开始尝试对你的契约提出异议以后，你就一直很紧张。

original: Tyrion: You're hiding something, aren't you?!
translation: Tyrion: 你在隐瞒什么事，不是吗？！

original: FEris: ...Who can say for sure?
translation: FEris: ……谁敢打包票呢？

original: Tyrion: The second paragraph is vague.[p/] But what about the first and third paragraphs?
translation: Tyrion: 第二段内容修辞很含糊。[p/]但第一段和第三段呢？

original: FEris: ...
translation: FEris: ……

original: Tyrion: [i]Something[/i] is off here.
translation: Tyrion: <u>有什么</u>不对劲。

original: Tyrion: Wait...
translation: Tyrion: 等等……

original: Tyrion: Is it possible that I [i]didn't[/i] die?!
translation: Tyrion: 有没有可能我根本<u>没死</u>？！

original: FEris: HAHAHAHA![p/][s/] Are you still in denial?
translation: FEris: <size=1.5em>哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！</size> 还不愿承认事实？

original: FEris: I thought you were ready to [i]die[/i] to save your beloved Celeste?
translation: FEris: 你不是准备为了拯救深爱的塞莱斯特而<u>赴死</u>吗？

original: Tyrion: ...Answer the question, Eris.
translation: Tyrion: ……回答问题，厄莉斯。

original: Tyrion: We can't trust Celeste's memories.
translation: Tyrion: 我们不能相信塞莱斯特的记忆。

original: Tyrion: That memory where she confirmed my death could all be a fabrication.
translation: Tyrion: 她检查确定我已经死了的记忆可能都是伪造的。

original: FEris: Hmph...[p/] If you're still holding onto the hope that you'll survive this,[p/] let me state it plainly for you.
translation: FEris: 哼……[p/]如果你还觉得自己能侥幸生还，[p/]那我就明明白白说给你听。

original: FEris: I did [i]not[/i] alter that memory.
translation: FEris: 我<u>没有</u>改变那段记忆。

original: FEris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: FEris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Celeste: I'm sorry, Tyrion...
translation: Celeste: 对不起，提利昂……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: How [i]did[/i] you revive me, Eris?
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯，你是<u>如何</u>复活我的？

original: Tyrion: Do you even [i]have[/i] the power to resurrect people from the dead?
translation: Tyrion:  说到底你<u>有没有</u>让人死而复生的力量？

original: FEris: Who do you think you're talking to?[p/] Of course, I do.
translation: FEris: 你以为自己在跟谁说话？[p/]我当然有。

original: FEris: But if you doubt me,[p/] why don't you declare that "Tyrion Cuthbert never died"?
translation: FEris: 如果你怀疑我，[p/]为什么不宣告“提利昂·卡斯伯特从没死过”？

original: Knowing her,[p/] she could be baiting you into telling a lie.
translation: 她可能是在引导你说出谎言。

original: ...But it's equally likely that she's bluffing.
translation: ……但她也同样可能是在说谎。

original: FEris: If you still doubt that I resurrected you,[p/] I'll state this.
translation: FEris: 如果还是不信我复活了你，[p/]那我就这么说。

original: FEris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: FEris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Interpret [d="Why would you need to specify that beings of your power can do that? Is it possible that it's not a simple or easy feat to accomplish?"/]
translation: Interpret [d="为什么你要特别指出你这种存在可以？这会不会并非能轻易做到的事？"/]

original: Tyrion: ...Why would you need to specify that "beings of your power" can do that?
translation: Tyrion: ……为什么你要特别指出你“这种存在”可以？

original: Tyrion: Is it possible that it's not a simple or easy feat to accomplish?
translation: Tyrion: 这会不会并非能轻易做到的事？

original: FEris: ...
translation: FEris: ……

original: Tyrion: For example...[p/] Would [i]Marrunath[/i] be able to resurrect a person from the dead using a Contract?
translation: Tyrion: 举例来说……[p/]<u>马鲁纳斯</u>能否用契约让人死而复生？

original: FEris: I-...
translation: FEris: 我——

original: Tyrion: Let me save you some trouble.[p/] I'll say it for you.
translation: Tyrion: 我来给你省点功夫。[p/]我帮你说吧。

original: Agree [d="If [i]you're[/i] saying that, it must be true..."/]
translation: Agree [d="如果<u>你</u>这么说，一定是真的……"/]

original: Tyrion: If [i]you're[/i] saying that,[p/] it must be true...
translation: Tyrion: 如果<u>你</u>这么说，[p/]一定是真的……

original: FEris: Exactly.[p/] I could have resurrected you at that moment.
translation: FEris: 正是如此。[p/]我当时本来可以让你复活。

original: FEris: You can't deny that.
translation: FEris: 你不能否认这一点。

original: ...She's speaking in hypotheticals.[p/] Is she really being upfront with you?
translation: ……她说的是“本来可以”。[p/]真的在说实话吗？

original: You might want to change how you responded.
translation: 你也许该考虑改变回复方式。

original: Doubt [d="You're [i]clearly[/i] not acting in good faith. How can I trust what you're saying?"/]
translation: Doubt [d="你<u>明显</u>没安好心。我怎么能相信你说的话？"/]

original: Tyrion: You're [i]clearly[/i] not acting in good faith.
translation: Tyrion: 你<u>明显</u>没安好心。

original: Tyrion: How can I trust what you're saying?
translation: Tyrion: 我怎么能相信你说的话？

original: FEris: ...Did you forget?
translation: FEris: ……你忘了吗？

original: FEris: The entire [i]premise[/i] of this battle is that we can't lie to each other.
translation: FEris: 这场论战的<u>前提</u>是我们不能说谎。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/][s/]Right...
translation: Tyrion: 对、[p/][s/]对……

original: You need to accept that her claim is undoubtedly true.
translation: 你得接受她的话不会掺假这一点。

original: But the [i]meaning[/i] behind her words is a different thing entirely.
translation: 但她话里的<u>含义</u>可能完全不同。

original: Tyrion: So says the Word of Horus.
translation: Tyrion: 荷鲁斯之言如是说。

original: FEris: ...That's not the same as saying that it was [i]impossible[/i] for me to do it.
translation: FEris: ……这可不等于说我<u>不可能</u>这么做。

original: Tyrion: But it would require a large amount of effort on your part.
translation: Tyrion: 但你需要耗费大量精力。

original: FEris: Perhaps...
translation: FEris: 也许……

original: FEris: But recall my previous declaration.[p/] Celeste [i]was[/i] there.
translation: FEris: 但想想我之前的宣告内容。[p/]塞莱斯特<u>当时就在</u>那里。

original: FEris: And by all accounts,[p/] she concluded you were dead.
translation: FEris: 不论怎么说，[p/]都是她认为你已经死亡。

original: Tyrion: How thoroughly did you check me?
translation: Tyrion: 你检查得有多仔细？

original: Celeste: I have experience in first-aid.[p/] And it was pretty bad.
translation: Celeste: 我有急救经验。[p/]你的状况很糟。

original: Celeste: You weren't breathing and your heart was stopped.
translation: Celeste: 你没有呼吸，心跳也停止了。

original: FEris: She tried to resuscitate you for several minutes.[p/] But to no avail.
translation: FEris: 她花了几分钟想让你恢复生机。[p/]但徒劳无功。

original: Right...[p/] There's no way your body could survive that long without oxygen [i]and[/i] blood flow.
translation: 是啊……[p/]那么长时间没有氧气<u>和</u>血液循环，你的身体不可能存活。

original: And Eris just confirmed that Celeste spent several minutes trying to resuscitate you.
translation: 厄莉斯刚刚也确认塞莱斯特花了几分钟试图让你复苏。

original: But there has to be more to this than you're seeing.
translation: 但肯定还有你没发现的事情。

original: Tyrion: You may have been [i]able[/i] to resurrect me.
translation: Tyrion: 你也许确实<u>有能力</u>让我复活。

original: Tyrion: But you had a far easier way to create that scenario.
translation: Tyrion: 但还有更容易的方法来让你创造这种情况。

original: Tyrion: ...And luckily for you,[p/] Beatrice was there and under your control.
translation: Tyrion: ……你很幸运，[p/]被你控制的比亚特丽丝也在场。

original: FEris: ...
translation: FEris: ……

original: Celeste: Are you saying that [i]Beatrice[/i] can resurrect people from the dead?
translation: Celeste: 你的意思是<u>比亚特丽丝</u>可以让人死而复生？

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] The opposite is actually true.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]其实应该是反过来。

original: Tyrion: So says the Word of Horus.
translation: Tyrion: 荷鲁斯之言如是说。

original: No...[p/] Eris is probably capable of resurrecting you from the dead.
translation: 不对……[p/]厄莉斯大概率有能力让你死而复生。

original: But from how she phrased it,[p/] it must be difficult for her.
translation: 但从她的遣词造句来看，[p/]这一定很困难。

original: Is there a way she could have orchestrated that scenario with significantly less effort?
translation: 有没有什么让她更轻易创造这种情况的方法？

original: She must've had Beatrice with her when this was all happening.
translation: 发生一切时她肯定与比亚特丽丝在一起。

original: Celeste: What?!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry, Celeste...
translation: Tyrion: 对不起，塞莱斯特……

original: Tyrion: But I was never dead.[p/] She just used a spell to trick you.
translation: Tyrion: 但我根本没死。[p/]她只是用法术骗了你。

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]No...
translation: Celeste: 不、[p/][s/]不……

original: Celeste: So everything I did...
translation: Celeste: 那我做的一切……

original: FEris: It was for nothing!
translation: FEris: 都是白费力气！

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: But that means you never resurrected him!
translation: Celeste: 但这意味着你从没有复活过他！

original: Celeste: He was never dead in the first place!
translation: Celeste: 他一开始就没死！

original: FEris: The Contract only said that he was [i]apparently[/i] dead.
translation: FEris: 契约里只说他<u>形似</u>死亡。

original: FEris: All I did was "revive" him.
translation: FEris: 我做的只是“复活”他。

original: FEris: ...By making Beatrice release her spell,[p/] which allowed him to wake up.
translation: FEris: ……通过让比亚特丽丝解除法术，[p/]提利昂也得以苏醒。

original: Well...[p/] That eliminates the first paragraph as a possible weak point.
translation: 哎……[p/]这也排除了第一段是潜在弱点的可能性。

original: And that only leaves the death of Garrick Pierce at Celeste's hand.
translation: 这只能意味着加里克·皮尔斯的死是塞莱斯特一手造成。

original: Tyrion: Something happened with Pierce, didn't it?
translation: Tyrion: 皮尔斯身上发生了什么，不是吗？

original: Tyrion: What are you hiding...?
translation: Tyrion: 你在隐瞒什么……？

original: FEris: What [i]ever[/i] could you be talking about?
translation: FEris: 你<u>究竟</u>在说什么呢？

original: Tyrion: Your Contract says that Celeste must "bring about the demise of Garrick Pierce by her own hand".
translation: Tyrion: 你的契约说塞莱斯特必须“亲手了结加里克·皮尔斯”。

original: Tyrion: Since you wrote that Contract,[p/] that must have been your intent from the beginning.
translation: Tyrion: 既然是你起草的契约，[p/]那一开始你肯定就是这个意图。

original: Tyrion: ...So why are you so nervous?
translation: Tyrion: ……那你为什么这么紧张？

original: FEris: ...
translation: FEris: ……

original: Tyrion: Something went wrong, didn't it?
translation: Tyrion: 哪里出了问题，不是吗？

original: Tyrion: If you want to stay quiet,[p/] I'll just-
translation: Tyrion: 如果你想保持沉默，[p/]那我就——

original: FEris: ...
translation: FEris: ……

original: Tyrion: Hm...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……

original: All of this could be an elaborate trick to bait you into making a false statement.
translation: 这些都可能只是骗你进行错误发言而精心设计的把戏。

original: You need to be careful...[p/] You need to find out [i]exactly[/i] what went wrong.
translation: 你需要小心……[p/]你得找出<u>具体</u>是哪里出了问题。

original: Tyrion: Is it possible that Celeste [i]didn't[/i] kill Garrick Pierce?
translation: Tyrion: 有没有可能塞莱斯特<u>没有</u>杀害加里克·皮尔斯？

original: FEris: ...Are you serious?
translation: FEris: ……你认真的？

original: FEris: He's the man who killed her adoptive father.[p/] And he was slated to be executed next month.
translation: FEris: 那可是杀了她养父的人。[p/]下个月马上要被处决了。

original: FEris: She didn't have a rational reason [i]not[/i] to trade his life for yours.
translation: FEris: 根本没有<u>不</u>用他一命换一命的理由。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] As bad as it sounds,[p/] that wouldn't be a hard choice for me.
translation: Celeste: 是的……[p/]虽然说着不好听，[p/]但我几乎没有犹豫。

original: Celeste: There isn't a single reason why I [i]wouldn't[/i] take a deal like that.
translation: Celeste: 我没有任何理由<u>不接受</u>这个提案。

original: Tyrion: She may have [i]wanted[/i] to,[p/] but something else might have happened.
translation: Tyrion: 也许她确实<u>想过</u>这么做，[p/]但肯定还发生了其他事。

original: Tyrion: Perhaps Beatrice or Aria misinterpreted one of your commands and killed him against your wishes.
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝或阿莉亚可能误解了你的某条命令，违背你意愿杀了他。

original: FEris: *sigh*[p/] You're making this so tedious...
translation: FEris: *叹气* [p/]你开始令人生厌了……

original: FEris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: FEris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Well...[p/] What if you [i]forced[/i] Celeste to kill him?!
translation: Tyrion: 总、[p/][s/]总之……[p/]如果是你<u>迫使</u>塞莱斯特杀人呢？！

original: Tyrion: She signed that Contract already.[p/] So you had control of her.
translation: Tyrion: 她已经签了契约。[p/]此时你可以控制她。

original: Tyrion: The Contract states that she needed to kill Pierce "of her own volition and agency".
translation: Tyrion: 契约里说她必须“要在自主前提下”杀害皮尔斯。

original: FEris: ...Do you honestly think I would make a foolish mistake like that?
translation: FEris: ……你真以为我会犯这么愚蠢的错误？

original: FEris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: FEris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What if someone [i]else[/i] killed Garrick Pierce on accident?
translation: Tyrion: 如、[p/][s/]如果是<u>其他人</u>意外杀害了加里克·皮尔斯呢？

original: Tyrion: Maybe a member of the Kingsguard who survived and entered the Prayer Room.
translation: Tyrion: 也许国王卫队的某个骑士躲过一劫，进入了祷告室。

original: FEris: *cackle* [p/][s/]Try again, Tyrion!
translation: FEris: *咯咯笑* [p/][s/]再试一遍吧，提利昂！

original: FEris: And while I'm at it.
translation: FEris: 既然说到这儿了。

original: FEris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: FEris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No...
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不……

original: FEris: Do you understand now?
translation: FEris: 你现在明白了？

original: FEris: I can refute [i]any[/i] possible explanation you may have for Pierce's death.
translation: FEris: 你能想到的<u>任何</u>皮尔斯之死的解释都会被我驳斥。

original: FEris: But the truth is, Tyrion.
translation: FEris: 提利昂，事实是这样的。

original: FEris: So says the Word of Asmodeus.
translation: FEris: 阿斯摩蒂斯之言如是说。

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No...
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不……

original: FEris: Have you given up?
translation: FEris: 你已经放弃了？

original: FEris: Have I finally extinguished the light of hope within you?
translation: FEris: 我终于掐灭了最后一点希望之火？

original: Tyrion: I can't believe it...
translation: Tyrion: 难以置信……

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: I can't believe you [i]fell[/i] for that.
translation: Tyrion: 难以置信你会<u>上当</u>。

original: FEris: ...What?
translation: FEris: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: You've never thrown consecutive declarations at me like that before.
translation: Tyrion: 之前你从来没有这样连续宣告过。

original: Tyrion: It's because I'm getting close, isn't it?
translation: Tyrion:  我已经接近真相了，是不是？

original: FEris: ...
translation: FEris: ……

original: Tyrion: You can freely manipulate Celeste's memories of what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 你可以随意篡改塞莱斯特当天的记忆。

original: Tyrion: And I don't have any evidence that implies what [i]actually[/i] transpired in the Prayer Room.
translation: Tyrion: 我没有证据表明那天祷告室里<u>事实上</u>发生过什么。

original: Tyrion: ...The only person who could tell me that was [i]you[/i].
translation: Tyrion: ……唯一能给我解惑的人就是<u>你</u>。

original: FEris: What?!
translation: FEris: 什么？！

original: Tyrion: You thought you could overwhelm me by shooting down all my theories.
translation: Tyrion: 你以为否定我的所有推论就能击垮我。

original: Tyrion: ...But all you did was tell me the [i]exact[/i] state of the room when Garrick Pierce died.
translation: Tyrion: ……但你的反驳恰恰帮我推断出了皮尔斯死时祷告室的<u>准确</u>情况。

original: Tyrion: And now I can figure out what [i]actually[/i] happened.
translation: Tyrion: 现在我能推理出<u>事实上</u>发生的事。

original: FEris: W-[p/][s/]Wait...
translation: FEris: 等、[p/][s/]等等……

original: No...[p/] By her own admission, she,[p/] Celeste,[p/] Aria,[p/] and Beatrice were the only people in that room.
translation: 不对……[p/]她自己也承认，[p/]室内的人只有塞莱斯特，[p/]阿莉亚，[p/]比亚特丽丝和她。

original: She admitted that neither she,[p/] Aria,[p/] nor Beatrice killed Pierce.
translation: 她也承认杀害皮尔斯的不是她自己，[p/]阿莉亚，[p/]或比亚特丽丝。

original: And she only said that Pierce's death "occurred because of Celeste's actions".
translation: 她只说过皮尔斯的死“源自塞莱斯特的行动”。

original: If she really wanted to defeat you,[p/] she would have simply declared that "Celeste brought about Pierce's demise."
translation: 如果真心想打败你，[p/]她本可以简单宣告“塞莱斯特夺走了皮尔斯的性命”。

original: But she didn't.[p/] That implies that Celeste [i]wasn't[/i] the one who killed him, either.
translation: 但她没有。[p/]意味着塞莱斯特也<u>不是</u>杀害皮尔斯的人。

original: ...That only leaves one person.
translation: ……只剩下一个人了。

original: Tyrion: Eris Illmater.[p/] Empress of Discord.
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯·伊尔马特。[p/]无序女皇。

original: FEris: N-[p/]No...[p/][s/] S-[p/][s/]Stop this!
translation: FEris: 不、[p/]不……[p/][s/]停、[p/][s/]停下！

original: Tyrion: I'm not sure what would possibly drive him to do something like that...
translation: Tyrion: 我不确定他这么做是因为什么……

original: Tyrion: But when he was in the Prayer Room,[p/] Garrick Pierce chose to take his own life...
translation: Tyrion: 但加里克·皮尔斯在祷告室里亲手结束了自己的生命……

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: You know what that means, don't you?
translation: Tyrion: 你明白这代表什么吧？

original: FEris: ...!
translation: FEris: ……！

original: Tyrion: But for the sake of it,[p/] I'll state it in a way that makes it [i]abundantly[/i] clear.
translation: Tyrion: 但为了不留质疑空间，[p/]我就再<u>明确</u>阐述一遍吧。

original: FEris: STOP THIS![p/][s/] STOP THIS [i]RIGHT NOW[/i]!
translation: FEris: <size=1.5em>住手！[p/][s/]<u>现在立刻</u>住手！</size>

original: Tyrion: ...So says the Word of Horus.
translation: Tyrion: ……荷鲁斯之言如是说。

original: Tyrion: The conditions of your Contract were impossible for Celeste to fulfill.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特不可能满足契约里的条件。

original: Tyrion: [i]That[/i] renders it [i]logically[/i] invalid.
translation: Tyrion: <u>因此</u>契约在<u>逻辑上</u>无效。

original: Tyrion: ...That's checkmate, Eris.
translation: Tyrion: ……将军，厄莉斯。

original: FEris: YOU FILTHY LITTLE-!
translation: FEris: <size=1.5em>你这个小混——！</size>

original: Lucio: You're back?!
translation: Lucio: 你回来了？！

original: Lucio: Does this mean you-?!
translation: Lucio: 就是说你——？！

original: Tyrion: I successfully nullified Celeste's Blood Contract.
translation: Tyrion: 我成功让塞莱斯特的血契无效化了。

original: You look in your satchel and check the place where you've been keeping her Contract.
translation: 你看向自己之前放在包里的血契。

original: You only find a pile of ash.[p/] It appears that it's completely disintegrated.
translation: 只剩下了一堆灰烬。[p/]契约看起来已经完全解体。

original: Rath: But you're still alive, how-?
translation: Rath: 你怎么还活着——？

original: Eris: You!
translation: Eris: 你！

original: At first,[p/] you think she's glaring at you...[p/] But then you realize...
translation: 一开始，[p/]你以为她是在瞪着自己……[p/]但你突然意识到……

original: Celeste: ...Me?
translation: Celeste: ……我？

original: Eris: You little [i]bitch[/i]!
translation: Eris: 你这个小<u>婊子</u>！

original: Eris: I [i]could[/i] have accepted losing to a heavensborn...
translation: Eris: 我<u>可以</u>接受输给天诞之物……

original: Eris: But you?!
translation: Eris: 但输给你？！

original: Celeste: ...What are you talking about?!
translation: Celeste: ……你说什么呢？！

original: Celeste: [i]Tyrion's[/i] the one that beat you.
translation: Celeste: 打败你的人是<u>提利昂</u>。

original: Celeste: ...Wait.
translation: Celeste: ……等等。

original: Celeste: Wait,[p/][s/] I remember what really happened now!
translation: Celeste: 等等，[p/][s/]我回忆起发生的事了！

original: Celeste: Tyrion![p/][s/] Tyrion, please wake up!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂！[p/][s/]提利昂，求你醒醒！

original: Celeste: Y-[p/][s/]You can't-![p/][s/] You can't die!
translation: Celeste: 你、[p/][s/]你不能——！[p/][s/]你不能死！

original: Eris: ...It appears that he's [i]quite[/i] dead.
translation: Eris: ……我看他是<u>一口气</u>都没了。

original: Celeste: You-!
translation: Celeste: 你——！

original: Eris: You should be more careful, Celeste.
translation: Eris: 塞莱斯特，你应该更小心点。

original: Eris: You might hurt someone if you swing that dangerous thing around.
translation: Eris: 乱挥这么危险的东西会伤人的。

original: Celeste: I was right about you all along!
translation: Celeste: 我没看错你！

original: Celeste: I should have [i]never[/i] trusted you!
translation: Celeste: 我<u>根本不该</u>相信你！

original: Eris: I like your enthusiasm.
translation: Eris: 我很欣赏你的激情。

original: Eris: ...But there's still something you can do to save him.
translation: Eris: ……但你还有机会救他。

original: Garrick: W-[p/][s/]What...?[p/] What is this?
translation: Garrick: 什、[p/][s/]什么……？[p/]什么机会？

original: Celeste: ...Do you feel that pit of dread in your chest?
translation: Celeste: ……你心中有感觉到恐惧吗？

original: Celeste: It's the [i]same[/i] fear my dad felt after you [i]stabbed[/i] him!
translation: Celeste: 这正是我爸爸<u>被你捅了以后</u>的感觉！

original: Garrick: ...
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Eris: And with his life,[p/] you'll have your [i]beloved[/i] Tyrion back.
translation: Eris: 用他的命可以换你<u>心爱的</u>提利昂回来。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Eris: ...What are you waiting for?
translation: Eris: ……你还在等什么？

original: Eris: End him, Celeste.
translation: Eris: 了结他，塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: I...
translation: Celeste: 我……

original: Celeste: I can't.
translation: Celeste: 我做不到。

original: Garrick: ...What?
translation: Garrick: ……什么？

original: Eris: ...What are you talking about?
translation: Eris: ……你在说什么？

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] He...[p/] wouldn't want this.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]他……[p/]不会希望我这么做的。

original: Eris: *sigh*[p/] He never [i]has[/i] to know, Celeste.
translation: Eris: *叹气* [p/]他根本<u>不需要</u>知道，塞莱斯特。

original: Eris: I can protect you from his Eye of Horus.
translation: Eris: 我可以保护你不受荷鲁斯之眼窥视。

original: Celeste: That doesn't matter!
translation: Celeste: 不是这个问题！

original: Celeste: I can't do it...[p/] It's just...
translation: Celeste: 我做不到……[p/]我只是……

original: Eris: This man literally [i]killed[/i] your adoptive father.
translation: Eris: 这个人可是亲手<u>杀害了</u>你的养父。

original: Eris: Not to mention he's a dead man walking.
translation: Eris: 更别提他就快被处决了。

original: Eris: You've lived a [i]lifetime[/i] of killing people.
translation: Eris: 你<u>这一生</u>都在杀人。

original: Eris: What's one more person?
translation: Eris: 多杀一个有什么问题？

original: Celeste: I...
translation: Celeste: 我……

original: Garrick: I won't suffer your self-righteous pity, bastard.
translation: Garrick: 野种，我不需要你自视清高的怜悯。

original: Celeste: Don't misunderstand me.
translation: Celeste: 别误会。

original: Celeste: Right now,[p/][s/] I want [i]nothing[/i] more than to end your worthless life.
translation: Celeste: 此时此刻，[p/][s/]我<u>最渴望的</u>就是终结你这毫无价值的一生。

original: Celeste: ...But Tyrion's ideals are what saved me.
translation: Celeste: ……但提利昂的理想拯救了我。

original: Celeste: That part of him is so wonderful...[p/] and so beautiful.
translation: Celeste: 他的这一点太优秀了……[p/]太美好了。

original: Celeste: I could never betray those ideals,[p/] not even if it's to save him.
translation: Celeste: 我永远不会背叛他的理想，[p/]即使是为了救他也不会。

original: Eris: ...You're actually serious, aren't you?
translation: Eris: ……你来真的啊？

original: Eris: You'd seriously [i]sacrifice[/i] him to honor his idiotic "ideals"?!
translation: Eris: 你要为了那些愚蠢的“理想”<u>牺牲</u>他本人？！

original: Celeste: I won't do it.[p/] I'm not going to sign that Contract.
translation: Celeste: 我不会签订契约的。[p/]我不会这么做。

original: Garrick: ...Contract?
translation: Garrick: ……契约？

original: Garrick: Ah...[p/] I see now.
translation: Garrick: 啊……[p/]我现在懂了。

original: Eris: ...What?
translation: Eris: ……什么？

original: Garrick: So [i]you're[/i] his little consort, aren't you?
translation: Garrick: <u>你就是</u>那个跟他勾搭在一起的人吧？

original: Garrick: ...[b]Figaqua[/b].
translation: Garrick: ……[b]Figaqua[/b]。

original: Celeste: Damn it...!
translation: Celeste: 该死……！

original: Eris: W-[p/][s/]Wait![p/][s/] G-[p/][s/]Get out of the way, you idiot!
translation: Eris: 等、[p/][s/]等等！[p/][s/]闪、[p/][s/]闪开啊，你个蠢货！

original: Celeste: Drop the weapon, Pierce![p/][s/] Don't be stupid!
translation: Celeste: 皮尔斯，放下武器！[p/][s/]不要做傻事！

original: Garrick: The only stupid one here is you, bastard!
translation: Garrick: 这里只有你在做傻事，野种！

original: Garrick: You should have known from the beginning!
translation: Garrick: 你一开始就该知道的！

original: Garrick: No matter [i]what[/i] you chose,[p/][s/] they were [i]never[/i] going to let me live!
translation: Garrick: 不管你<u>怎么选择</u>，[p/][s/]他都<u>不会</u>让我活下去！

original: Celeste: ..."They"?
translation: Celeste: ……“他”？

original: Garrick: But if I'm fated to die,[p/] then it's going to be on [i]my[/i] own terms!
translation: Garrick: 如果注定一死，[p/]那还不如按照<u>我自己的</u>意愿去死！

original: Celeste: Wait![p/][s/] Stop!
translation: Celeste: 等等！[p/][s/]住手！

original: Garrick: I'll...[p/] see you all...[p/] in hell...
translation: Garrick: 我们……[p/]地狱……[p/]再会……

original: Celeste: Damn it!
translation: Celeste: 可恶！

original: Celeste: [b]Menas[/b].
translation: Celeste: [b]Menas[/b].

original: Eris: ...!
translation: Eris: ……！

original: Eris: Are you trying to [i]heal[/i] him?!
translation: Eris: 你在尝试给他<u>疗伤</u>？！

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: It's too late...[p/] He aimed straight for his heart.
translation: Celeste: 来不及了……[p/]他瞄准了自己的心脏。

original: Eris: No...
translation: Eris: 不……

original: Eris: Come on, you waste of human flesh![p/][s/] Wake up!
translation: Eris: 我真服了你这个没用的人类！[p/][s/]起来！

original: Eris: I need you [i]alive[/i]!
translation: Eris: 我需要你<u>活着</u>！

original: Celeste: ...!
translation: Celeste: ……！

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Eris: ...!
translation: Eris: ……！

original: Eris: ...What the [i]hell[/i] did you just do?!
translation: Eris: ……你刚刚<u>干了什么</u>？！

original: Celeste: Pierce is dead and I signed your stupid Contract.
translation: Celeste: 皮尔斯死了，我也签了你的傻缺合同。

original: Celeste: Now bring Tyrion back!
translation: Celeste: 快复活提利昂！

original: Eris: No...
translation: Eris: 不……

original: Eris: No,[p/][s/] no,[p/][s/] no,[p/][s/] no,[p/][s/] NO!
translation: Eris: 不、[p/][s/]不、[p/][s/]不、[p/][s/]不、[p/][s/] <size=1.5em>不！</size>

original: Celeste: Pierce was dead anyways...[p/] So I thought I could catch her on a technicality.
translation: Celeste: 反正皮尔斯已经死了……[p/]我刚好可以利用她的漏洞。

original: Celeste: But I never realized what I [i]actually[/i] did.
translation: Celeste: 但我没有意识到自己<u>实际</u>干了什么。

original: Eris: You rendered my Blood Contract faulty!
translation: Eris: 你让我的血契变成一张废纸！

original: Eris: You ruined [i]everything[/i]!
translation: Eris: 你毁掉了<u>一切</u>！

original: Eris: ...And where do [i]you[/i] get off acting like you're [i]any[/i] better than them?!
translation: Eris: ……<u>你</u>又凭什么表现得像是<u>高人一等</u>？！

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Eris: "Ideals"?![p/][s/] "Righteousness"?!
translation: Eris: “理想”？！[p/][s/]“正义”？！

original: Eris: Don't give me that bullshit!
translation: Eris: 别放屁了！

original: Eris: I could have accepted losing to a heavensborn...
translation: Eris: 我可以接受输给天诞之物……

original: Eris: But [i]you're[/i] human![p/][s/] You're a goddamned [i]killer[/i]!
translation: Eris: 但<u>你</u>区区一个人类！[p/][s/]天杀的，还是一个<u>杀人犯</u>！

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Eris: All of you![p/][s/] [i]All[/i] of you are rotten to your [i]disgusting[/i] cores!
translation: Eris: 你们所有人！[p/][s/]<u>所有人</u>都<u>恶心</u>到了骨子里！

original: Eris: You would all tear out each other's throats if I gave you the [i]smallest[/i] reason to!
translation: Eris: 只需要我提供一点<u>微不足道</u>的理由，[p/]你们就会和彼此打个头破血流！

original: Eris: Tyrion is the [i]only[/i] person here with a trace of the celestials' self-righteous "morality"!
translation: Eris: 提利昂是这里<u>唯一</u>有那么一丝自以为是的天人“道德观”的人！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: If that's what you think of them,[p/] you really don't know [i]anything[/i] about humanity.
translation: Tyrion: 如果这就是你的想法，[p/]那你真是<u>一点</u>都不了解人类。

original: Tyrion: Celeste is far more than what you're saying.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特可没有你想得那么简单。

original: Tyrion: She's far more caring and empathic than I am.[p/] I could never even come close.
translation: Tyrion: 她比我更有关爱和同情他人的精神，[p/]我难以望其项背。

original: Celeste: I...
translation: Celeste: 我……

original: Tyrion: And it has nothing to do with whether [i]I'm[/i] a heavensborn or if [i]she's[/i] a human.
translation: Tyrion: 这与<u>我是</u>天诞之物，<u>她是</u>人类没有关系。

original: Tyrion: But...[p/] I think I understand [i]you[/i] a little more, Eris...
translation: Tyrion: 不过……[p/]我想我更理解<u>你</u>一点了，厄莉斯……

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Eris: Is that so?
translation: Eris: 是吗？

original: Tyrion: Let me ask you a question, Eris.
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯，让我问你一个问题。

original: Tyrion: Did you feel [i]any[/i] amount of satisfaction when you killed my mother?
translation: Tyrion: 你杀掉我母亲时有哪怕<u>一丁点</u>的满足感吗？

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Eris: So...[p/] You figured that out, did you?
translation: Eris: 所以……[p/]你已经明白了，是吧？

original: Tyrion: When you went on that little tirade about how much you enjoy killing heavensborn,[p/] I had some suspicions.
translation: Tyrion: 听到你说自己很享受杀害天诞之物时，[p/]我就开始怀疑了。

original: Eris: And how does it feel, Tyrion?
translation: Eris: 感觉怎样啊，提利昂？

original: Eris: The person who killed your mother,[p/] the person who ruined your [i]entire[/i] life is standing right in front of you.
translation: Eris: 杀了你母亲，[p/]毁掉你<u>一生</u>的人就站在你面前。

original: Eris: What do you have to say?
translation: Eris: 有没有什么要说的？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Eris: Nothing to say...?
translation: Eris: 没有……？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Eris: Say something, damn it!
translation: Eris: 你丫的倒是说点什么啊！

original: Tyrion: ...I think all I feel for you right now is pity.
translation: Tyrion: ……我现在只觉得可怜你。

original: Eris: Oh, [i]that's[/i] rich!
translation: Eris: 哎呦，<u>真是</u>高深！

original: Eris: [i]You[/i] pity [i]me[/i]?!
translation: Eris: <u>你</u>可怜<u>我</u>？！

original: Eris: Your existence is an infinitesimal moment in my eternal existence.
translation: Eris: 和像我一样的永恒存在比，你不过是时间长河里的一粒沙。

original: Tyrion: And yet you put [i]all[/i] of this effort into making [i]me[/i] suffer.
translation: Tyrion: 然而是你<u>费劲功夫</u>想让<u>我</u>受难。

original: Tyrion: Well...?[p/] Was it everything you imagined it would be?
translation: Tyrion: 那么……？[p/]事态发展和你的预想一致吗？

original: Tyrion: Did it satisfy you at all?
translation: Tyrion: 你满足了吗？

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Tyrion: I bet you didn't feel [i]anything[/i] when you killed my mother.
translation: Tyrion: 我敢说你杀掉我母亲时什么感觉<u>都没有</u>。

original: Tyrion: It was just another drop of evil into your empty soul.
translation: Tyrion: 只不过是给你那空虚灵魂里再加上一点邪恶而已。

original: Eris: I was...[p/] excited.[p/] I-[p/][s/]It was [i]far[/i] too simple.
translation: Eris: 我当时……[p/]很激动。[p/]实、[p/][s/]实在<u>太过</u>简单了。

original: Eris: I didn't [i]truly[/i] make her suffer.[p/] That's why I didn't-
translation: Eris: 我没能<u>真正</u>让她承受多少痛苦。[p/]所以我才没有——

original: Tyrion: Oh, is that right?
translation: Tyrion: 哦，是这样吗？

original: Tyrion: Well...[p/] What if you [i]did[/i] succeed in throwing me into despair?
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]那如果你<u>成功</u>让我陷入绝望呢？

original: Tyrion: Would you have felt [i]any[/i] sort of satisfaction?
translation: Tyrion: 你会有<u>任何</u>满足感吗？

original: Eris: Of course, I-
translation: Eris: 我当然——

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Tyrion: Demons can't tell lies, Eris.
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯，恶魔不能说谎。

original: Tyrion: You can't lie to us,[p/] and you can't lie to yourself.
translation: Tyrion: 你不能对我们说谎，[p/]也不能对自己说谎。

original: Eris: N-[p/][s/]No...![p/][s/] That can't-!
translation: Eris: 不、[p/][s/]不……！[p/][s/]这不可能——！

original: Tyrion: And [i]that's[/i] why I pity you.
translation: Tyrion: 我就是<u>因为这一点</u>可怜你。

original: Tyrion: You were fated to be evil from the moment of your creation, weren't you?
translation: Tyrion: 从被创造出来的那一刻起，你就注定邪恶吧？

original: Tyrion: That's why you hate humanity so much.[p/] You envy us.
translation: Tyrion: 所以你才会这么恨人类。[p/]你嫉妒我们。

original: Eris: ...[i]What[/i] did you just say?!
translation: Eris: ……你刚才说<u>什么</u>？！

original: Tyrion: You're envious of humanity.
translation: Tyrion: 你嫉妒人类。

original: Tyrion: You don't grow.[p/] You don't change.
translation: Tyrion: 你不会成长，[p/]不会改变。

original: Tyrion: You can't become a better version of yourself.
translation: Tyrion: 你没法成为更好的自己。

original: Tyrion: You're right.[p/] Your existence probably [i]will[/i] be eternal.
translation: Tyrion: 你说得没错。[p/]可能你确实<u>是</u>永恒存在。

original: Tyrion: You'll be eternally evil.
translation: Tyrion: 你会永远邪恶。

original: Tyrion: ...And you'll be eternally unsatisfied and eternally pitiful.
translation: Tyrion: ……也会永远无法满足，永远这么可怜。

original: Tyrion: [i]That's[/i] why you envy us,[p/] because you'll never be free from that fate.
translation: Tyrion: 你就是因为<u>这一点</u>才嫉妒我们。[p/]因为你永远无法摆脱这种命运。

original: Eris: That is completely-!
translation: Eris: 你说的根本——！

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Tyrion: You can't say it, can you?
translation: Tyrion: 说不出口吧？

original: Tyrion: You can't refute my claim,[p/] because it would be a lie.
translation: Tyrion: 你不能反驳我的论点，[p/]不然你就说谎了。

original: Eris: You-!
translation: Eris: 你丫——！

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Eris: ...You know what?[p/] Maybe you [i]are[/i] right.
translation: Eris: ……你猜怎么着？[p/]也许你<u>是</u>对的。

original: Eris: Maybe I'll [i]never[/i] be satisfied.
translation: Eris: 也许我<u>永远不会</u>满足。

original: Eris: Maybe I [i]won't[/i] feel any satisfaction from killing you.
translation: Eris: 也许杀了你也<u>无法</u>让我获得一丁点满足感。

original: Eris: ...But I'm still going to try!
translation: Eris: ……但我还是会尝试！

original: Rath: To think you would threaten violence in [i]my[/i] presence.
translation: Rath: 有<u>我</u>在场，你竟然还敢以暴力恐吓别人。

original: Rath: ...Arrogant witch.
translation: Rath: ……傲慢的魔女。

original: Lucio: Well...[p/] I suppose that solves [i]that[/i] business.
translation: Lucio: 嗯……[p/]我看<u>这件事</u>是解决了。

original: Lucio: Although...
translation: Lucio: 虽然……

original: Tyrion: ...She'll definitely be back one day.
translation: Tyrion: ……她总有一天会回来的。

original: Tyrion: And when she does,[p/] I'll be ready.
translation: Tyrion: 但那时我会做好准备。

original: Rath: ...For now,[p/] let's be satisfied that we've finally discovered what happened.
translation: Rath: ……至少目前有一点值得庆幸，[p/]我们终于弄清楚了实际发生的事。

original: Tyrion: ...Oh, right.
translation: Tyrion: ……噢，对了。

original: Tyrion: About that...
translation: Tyrion: 这个嘛……

original: Lucio: Are you serious?!
translation: Lucio: 你逗我呢吧？！

original: Lucio: After all [i]that[/i],[p/] we [i]still[/i] don't know who the Patron is?!
translation: Lucio: 闹了<u>这么久</u>，[p/]我们<u>还是</u>不知道签约人是谁？！

original: Rath: ...At this point,[p/] I'm just glad Ms. McCoy wasn't the true mastermind behind this.
translation: Rath: ……至少现在，[p/]我很高兴麦考伊女士不是真正的罪魁祸首。

original: Tyrion: Speaking of which,[p/] now that I've nullified her Contract,[p/] Celeste should finally have her true memories back.
translation: Tyrion: 说到这个，[p/]现在塞莱斯特的合同已经无效化了。[p/]她应该已经取回了真实记忆。

original: Celeste: Ugh...[p/] I [i]do[/i] remember what happened.
translation: Celeste: 呜呃……[p/]我<u>的确</u>记得发生了什么。

original: Celeste: But it's still really fuzzy.
translation: Celeste: 但还是很模糊。

original: Celeste: I've really been trying to remember what was on Aria's Contract when I caught a glimpse of it.
translation: Celeste: 我当时瞟了一眼阿莉亚的合同，[p/]刚才也一直在尝试回忆起其中内容。

original: Celeste: But I think [i]that's[/i] the memory Eris manipulated the most.
translation: Celeste: 但我认为<u>这里</u>是厄莉斯篡改记忆最厉害的部分。

original: Rath: It's possible that she will need some time to fully recover from the Empress's demonic influence.
translation: Rath: 她可能还需要一点时间从女皇的影响中恢复。

original: Lucio: But we don't [i]have[/i] that kind of time.
translation: Lucio: 但我们<u>没有</u>这么多时间了。

original: Lucio: That damned demon led us around for the entire morning.
translation: Lucio: 那个可恨的恶魔耍得我们团团转了一上午。

original: Lucio: Not to mention that we've lost nearly an hour due to Cuthbert disputing that Contract.
translation: Lucio: 更不用说为了让卡斯伯特对契约提出异议，[p/]我们浪费了快一个小时。

original: Lucio: It's just past noon.
translation: Lucio: 现在已过中午。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] We have less than three hours before [i]every[/i] magical trace at the crime scene disappears.
translation: Tyrion: 是的……[p/]距离犯罪现场的<u>所有</u>魔法痕迹消失只剩不到三小时。

original: Tyrion: Could you try testifying?
translation: Tyrion: 你能不能试试作证？

original: Tyrion: Maybe reviewing everything will help jog your memory.
translation: Tyrion: 回顾发生的一切也许可以帮你找回记忆。

original: Celeste: O-[p/]Okay...[p/] I'll do my best.
translation: Celeste: 好、[p/]好的……[p/]我会尽力。

original: Tyrion: I see your house is still filled with chandeliers...
translation: Tyrion: 你家还是这么多吊灯……

original: Liafal: Yes.[p/] I've been meaning to redecorate the manor.
translation: Liafal: 对。[p/]我早就想重新装修庄园了。

original: Liafal: I've always my father's aesthetics to be somewhat tacky.
translation: Liafal: 我一直觉得父亲的审美有点俗气。

original: Tyrion: It's a fireplace.[p/] It's probably used to keep the Study warm during the winter.
translation: Tyrion: 一个壁炉。[p/]应该是用来在冬天给书房供暖。

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of a man with a dog.
translation: Tyrion: 一幅牵狗男人的画。

original: Liafal: That's David Ding,[p/] from House Ding.[p/] They're one of the branch families of House Frega.
translation: Liafal: 画里的人是来自丁家的 David Ding。[p/]丁家是弗雷加的分家之一。

original: Liafal: He was a dog breeder with a bit of an obsession with the dogs he owned.
translation: Liafal: 他是个犬类饲育员，很痴迷自己拥有的狗。

original: Liafal: As someone with a canine familiar,[p/] I feel a sort of kinship with him.
translation: Liafal: 作为拥有犬类使魔的人，[p/]我对他有亲近感。

original: Tracker: Tracker like fellow dog.
translation: Tracker: 追追喜欢这条狗。

original: Tracker: He looks like the loyal type.
translation: Tracker: 他看起来忠于主人。

original: You're not exactly sure [i]how[/i] he's inferring that.[p/] But you suppose you can't disagree with him.
translation: 你不太清楚这是<u>怎么</u>看出来的。[p/]但你也不会质疑追追。

original: Tyrion: It's a bookshelf.[p/] It was filled with fake books the last time we were here.
translation: Tyrion: 一个书架。[p/]上次我们来的时候装满了假书。

original: Celeste: Some of the books are actually real this time.
translation: Celeste: 这次有一部分书是真的。

original: Tyrion: It's a window with a view of the outside.
translation: Tyrion: 可以看到外面的窗户。

original: Tyrion: It's various books about economics and political theory.
translation: Tyrion: 各种关于经济和政治理论的书。

original: Tyrion: It looks like they haven't been disturbed since Beatrice's trial.
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝的审理以后好像就没被动过。

original: Liafal: ...I've been meaning to put those away.
translation: Liafal: ……我本打算把这些收起来的。

original: Liafal: But I still feel uneasy about disturbing my father's books.
translation: Liafal: 但随便动父亲的藏书还是会让我不安。

original: Tyrion: It's a desk where the head of House Frega would sit.
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加一族首领用的桌子。

original: Liafal: I'm still getting used to it.
translation: Liafal: 我还在习惯这种感觉。

original: Liafal: This chair always felt too big for me.
translation: Liafal: 这椅子对我来说太大了。

original: Tyrion: Laefe.[p/] I'm sure you know why I'm here...
translation: Tyrion: 拉菲。[p/]你一定清楚我来这儿的原因……

original: Tyrion: But I just want to preface this by saying that I highly doubt you were behind this.
translation: Tyrion: 但我想先声明，我不觉得你是幕后黑手。

original: Liafal: No...[p/] I perfectly understand.
translation: Liafal: 没事……[p/]我完全理解。

original: Liafal: Frankly,[p/] I'm also at a loss.[p/] I have no idea who did this.
translation: Liafal: 坦白说，[p/]我还很茫然。[p/]我不知道是谁干了这些。

original: Miriam: What are you talking about?!
translation: Miriam: 你在说什么？！

original: Miriam: It was clearly that [i]criminal[/i]: The Eyetaker!
translation: Miriam: 明显是那个<u>恶徒</u>，夺眼者！

original: Miriam: Why don't you go interrogate [i]him[/i]?!
translation: Miriam: 你为什么不去审问<u>他</u>？！

original: Tyrion: Make no mistake.[p/] We fully intend to.
translation: Tyrion: 别误会。[p/]我们正有此意。

original: Tyrion: ...But I'd like to cover everyone else before I confront him.
translation: Tyrion: ……但我想在对上他之前先和其他人谈过。

original: Liafal: Let him be, Miriam.
translation: Liafal: 别针对他了，米莉亚姆。

original: Miriam: B-[p/][s/]But,[p/][s/] it's [i]his[/i] fault that Beatrice is-!
translation: Miriam: 但、[p/][s/]但是，[p/][s/]因为<u>他</u>比亚特丽丝才会——！

original: Liafal: Our sister knew what she was doing when she gave her testimony.
translation: Liafal: 我们的姐姐作证时知道自己在干什么。

original: Liafal: Don't insult her bravery by blaming Mr. Cuthbert for what happened.
translation: Liafal: 你怪罪卡斯伯特先生也是在侮辱姐姐的勇气。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Liafal: Anyways,[p/] Mr. Cuthbert has shown many times that he's acting in good faith.
translation: Liafal: 总之，[p/]卡斯伯特先生已经多次证明他的行动是出于善意。

original: Liafal: ...And he's capable of convicting the criminals that even [i]we[/i] can't see.
translation: Liafal: ……他也有能力指控连<u>我们</u>都发现不了的罪犯。

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Tyrion: You mentioned Beatrice before.
translation: Tyrion: 你之前提到了比亚特丽丝。

original: Tyrion: ...Did something happen?
translation: Tyrion: ……发生什么事了吗？

original: Liafal: It happened right after she gave her testimony this morning.
translation: Liafal: 是在她今早作证之后。

original: Liafal: She fell unconscious shortly after she left the Scaled Lord's Lair.
translation: Liafal: 她在离开鳞甲领主的巢穴不久后就失去了意识。

original: Liafal: She hasn't woken up since then.[p/] And Marrunath has gone missing.
translation: Liafal: 之后她一直没有醒来。[p/]马鲁纳斯也失踪了。

original: Tyrion: What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: Lazarick: It must have been the Empress of Discord.
translation: Lazarick: 一定是无序女皇搞的鬼。

original: Lazarick: After you manifested Lady Steelwind's Blood Contract,[p/] we all realized why she was acting so strangely.
translation: Lazarick: 你展示斯蒂尔文德小姐的血契之后，[p/]我们才理解为什么她举止奇怪。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] If it weren't for her,[p/] I would've never considered trying to issue a Divine Edict.
translation: Tyrion: 是了……[p/]要不是因为她，[p/]我都不会想到要发出神谕。

original: Liafal: She sacrificed herself to save Lady Steelwind.
translation: Liafal: 她为了救斯蒂尔文德小姐牺牲自己。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Miriam: I-[p/][s/]It seems our esteemed sister put her trust in you, commoner.
translation: Miriam: 看、[p/][s/]看起来我们尊敬的姐姐很信任你啊，平民。

original: Liafal: So we will do the same.
translation: Liafal: 我们也会这么做。

original: Liafal: If there's anything we can do to help you,[p/] please ask.
translation: Liafal: 如果有任何我们能帮上忙的事，[p/]请尽管开口。

original: Tyrion: I appreciate your trust.[p/] All of you.
translation: Tyrion: 我很感谢你们大家的信任。

original: Tyrion: But I have to ask...[p/] Where were you all between 2:00 PM and 3:00 PM that day?
translation: Tyrion: 但我还是得问……[p/]那天下午 2:00-3:00 之间你们在哪里？

original: Liafal: Luckily,[p/] we were all together.
translation: Liafal: 很幸运，[p/]我们一直在一起。

original: Lazarick: Me,[p/] Laefe,[p/] Miriam,[p/] Beatrice,[p/] and her friend were all in the garden before 2:00 PM.
translation: Lazarick: 我，[p/]拉菲，[p/]米莉亚姆，[p/]比亚特丽丝，[p/]以及她的朋友下午 2:00 之前都在花园里。

original: Liafal: But at around 2:00 PM,[p/] my sister and Ms. Illmater both went missing.
translation: Liafal: 但在下午 2:00 左右，[p/]我的姐姐与伊尔马特女士失踪了。

original: Miriam: I can't believe we trusted [i]her[/i] to take care of our sister.
translation: Miriam: 不敢相信我们会让<u>她</u>来照顾姐姐。

original: Liafal: Hush now, Miriam.
translation: Liafal: 适可而止，米莉亚姆。

original: Liafal: If the Empress of Discord took control of her,[p/] there was hardly anything Ms. Illmater could do to stop it.
translation: Liafal: 无序女皇要是控制了她，[p/]伊尔马特女士也没法进行反抗的。

original: Liafal: I really [i]do[/i] hope she's okay.
translation: Liafal: 我<u>真的</u>希望她没事。

original: Liafal: She's been missing since the massacre.
translation: Liafal: 屠杀以来她就失去了踪迹。

original: Tyrion: You mentioned that you all went to search for her.[p/] Did you see anything?
translation: Tyrion: 你提到你们一行人一起去寻找她了。[p/]途中看见什么了吗？

original: Liafal: No.[p/] We were originally planning to search the cathedral grounds.
translation: Liafal: 没有。[p/]我们本来打算在大教堂内搜索。

original: Liafal: But when we arrived at the Nave,[p/] we found Aster trapped in a [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Liafal: 但抵达中殿时，[p/]我们得知阿斯特被[b]坚牢术[/b]所困。

original: Tyrion: Did any of you lose track of each other during that time?
translation: Tyrion: 这段时间里你们中有人和队伍分开吗？

original: Lazarick: No...[p/] We stayed together for the entire time.
translation: Lazarick: 没有……[p/]我们几个一直待在一起。

original: Lazarick: But we [i]did[/i] consider splitting up to cover more ground.
translation: Lazarick: 但我们<u>确实</u>考虑过分散行动以扩大搜索面积。

original: Liafal: But the Kingsguard found us and asked us to stay where we were.
translation: Liafal: 但国王卫队让我们留在原地。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] I suppose that makes sense.
translation: Tyrion: 这样……[p/]确实说得通。

original: Tyrion: And did you see Eris at all when this happened?
translation: Tyrion: 这期间你们有见过厄莉斯吗？

original: Liafal: No...[p/] We never saw her.
translation: Liafal: 不……[p/]我们完全没见过她。

original: Tyrion: She went missing at the same time that Beatrice did...
translation: Tyrion: 她和比亚特丽丝在同一时间失踪了……

original: Tyrion: That's...[p/] [i]really[/i] suspicious.
translation: Tyrion: 这……[p/]<u>真的</u>很可疑。

original: Liafal: You don't think-?
translation: Liafal: 你是想说——？

original: Tyrion: It's definitely possible she was involved in this somehow...
translation: Tyrion: 她很有可能牵涉其中……

original: Tyrion: Not to mention,[p/] the Eyetaker is one of our suspects.[p/] And [i]she's[/i] his daughter.
translation: Tyrion: 更不要说，[p/]<u>她的</u>父亲夺眼者是嫌疑人之一。

original: Miriam: She's his [i]what[/i]?!
translation: Miriam: 她的<u>父亲</u>？！

original: Tyrion: ...You didn't know?
translation: Tyrion: ……你不知道啊？

original: Tyrion: I'd have thought that Beatrice would've told you.
translation: Tyrion: 我以为比亚特丽丝会告诉你们。

original: Liafal: No...[p/] She didn't mention that at all.
translation: Liafal: 不……[p/]她完全没提过。

original: Hm...[p/] It looks like Eris has a lot to answer for.
translation: 嗯……[p/]看来有很多问题需要厄莉斯解答。

original: If you can even [i]find[/i] her, that is...
translation: 不过你得先能<u>找到</u>她……

original: Liafal: I envy your bravery, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Liafal: 我很羡慕你的勇敢，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Liafal: In the face of demons and dragons,[p/] you still seem quite calm.
translation: Liafal: 即使面对恶魔与龙，[p/]你依然不失镇静。

original: Tyrion: Regardless of who's involved,[p/] this is the same as any other trial.
translation: Tyrion: 不管有谁参与，[p/]这和其他审理都没什么不同。

original: Tyrion: Man, king, or god...[p/] I'll save Aria,[p/] no matter what it takes.
translation: Tyrion: 人、王、亦或是神……[p/]不管要付出什么，[p/]我都会救出阿莉亚。

original: Liafal: I can't believe someone did this to Aria.
translation: Liafal: 很难相信有人会这样对阿莉亚。

original: Liafal: I've had enough of these demons...[p/] They just violate the wills of those they've enslaved.
translation: Liafal: 我受够这些恶魔了……[p/]他们会肆意违背奴役的意愿。

original: Liafal: It's absolutely abhorrent.
translation: Liafal: 属实令人发指。

original: Tyrion: No matter what happens...[p/] I'll save her from this fate.
translation: Tyrion: 不管发生什么……[p/]我都不会让她走向这种命运。

original: Liafal: For everyone's sake,[p/] I hope you're right.
translation: Liafal: 为了大家，[p/]我希望你成功。

original: Liafal: I wasn't sure what to make of Ms. Illmater at first.
translation: Liafal: 我一开始不知道该如何看待伊尔马特女士。

original: Liafal: But she was a friend to Beatrice during those five years...
translation: Liafal: 但这五年里她和比亚特丽丝是朋友……

original: Liafal: So I [i]want[/i] to trust her.
translation: Liafal: 我<u>想要</u>信任她。

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Liafal: She attends the Academy.[p/] Isn't that right, Miriam?
translation: Liafal: 她也在帝国学院就读。[p/]没错吧，米莉亚姆？

original: Miriam: Yeah...[p/] But I never really got close to her.
translation: Miriam: 是的……[p/]但我们不算熟悉。

original: Miriam: She had a reputation for doing things to people.
translation: Miriam: 都说她喜欢对人动手动脚。

original: Miriam: I was always too scared to approach her.
translation: Miriam: 我害怕得不敢接近她。

original: Liafal: I see... [mind="As much as I hate to admit it, I feel the same."/]
translation: Liafal: 我明白了…… [mind="虽然不愿承认，但我也有同感。"/]

original: Tyrion: Why [i]are[/i] you here, Lord Asclepius?
translation: Tyrion: 你为什么<u>在</u>这里，阿斯克勒庇俄斯勋爵？

original: Liafal: We were discussing plans to lift the ban on studying [b]necromancy[/b] at the Imperial Academy.
translation: Liafal: 我们在讨论有关解禁帝国学院[b]死灵术[/b]课程的计划。

original: Liafal: As the head of House Frega,[p/] I inherited my father's position on the board.
translation: Liafal: 作为弗雷加家族的首领，[p/]我也继承了父亲在董事会里的位置。

original: Tyrion: Oh![p/][s/] That's great!
translation: Tyrion: 噢！[p/][s/]那很棒啊！

original: Lazarick: I appreciate the enthusiasm.[p/] But we should still approach this carefully.
translation: Lazarick: 感谢你的热情。[p/]但我们依然需要小心对待此事。

original: Tyrion: Really?[p/] I thought [i]you[/i] of all people would be excited for this.
translation: Tyrion: 真的吗？[p/]我还以为<u>你</u>应该最为激动呢。

original: Lazarick: The kingdom's ban on [b]necromancy[/b] was harsh,[p/] but it was somewhat justified.
translation: Lazarick: 王国对[b]死灵术[/b]的禁令很苛刻，[p/]但这也有正当理由。

original: Lazarick: The study of something like this has to be regulated and closely monitored.
translation: Lazarick: 这一类研究学习应该被密切管控。

original: Lazarick: The last thing I want is to create another mad necromancer.
translation: Lazarick: 我最不想看到的，[p/]就是再出现一个疯癫的死灵法师。

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Tyrion: I don't know if I have any right to say this...[p/] But I'm sorry about what happened to Beatrice.
translation: Tyrion: 不知道我有没有资格这么说……[p/]但我对比亚特丽丝的事深感遗憾。

original: Liafal: No...[p/] For better or for worse,[p/] she's always done what she wanted.
translation: Liafal: 没事……[p/]不论是好是坏，[p/]她做的一直都是自己想做的。

original: Liafal: She knew what she was doing.[p/] And she was well aware of the potential consequences.
translation: Liafal: 她知道自己在做什么，[p/]也清楚可能的后果。

original: Liafal: I just wish there was something I could do for her.
translation: Liafal: 我只是希望有什么自己能为她做的。

original: Tyrion: ...Have you ever spoken to Beatrice's familiar?
translation: Tyrion: ……你与比亚特丽丝的使魔说过话吗？

original: Tracker: Tracker [i]hate[/i] flying rat.
translation: Tracker: 追追<u>痛恨</u>会飞的老鼠。

original: Tracker: He always says mean things to everyone.
translation: Tracker: 老鼠天天说别人坏话。

original: Tracker: He's a [i]terrible[/i] pet.
translation: Tracker: <u>糟糕</u>的宠物。

original: Despite his size,[p/] he's not exactly a pet though.
translation: 虽然袖珍，[p/]但马鲁纳斯倒也不算是宠物。

original: Liafal: I hope His Majesty is okay.
translation: Liafal: 我希望国王陛下没事。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] Someone basically used his former fiancée [i]and[/i] his current fiancée to commit mass murder.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]有人利用他的前未婚妻<u>和</u>现未婚妻实施屠杀。

original: Miriam: Despite being royal,[p/] he's always had a soft heart.
translation: Miriam: 虽然出身皇家，[p/]但他一直很善良。

original: Miriam: I'm sure this whole ordeal is affecting him the most.
translation: Miriam: 他肯定是被这次事件影响最深的人。

original: Tyrion: Have any of you ever seen this symbol before?
translation: Tyrion: 你们有人见过这个符号吗？

original: Liafal: ...No.[p/] I can't say I have.
translation: Liafal: ……我没有见过。

original: Lazarick: Me neither...
translation: Lazarick: 我也没有……

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Miriam: I think I've seen it at the Imperial Academy before.
translation: Miriam: 我觉得我在帝国学院看到过。

original: Tyrion: What...?[p/] Where?
translation: Tyrion: 什么……？[p/]在哪里？

original: Miriam: It was scratched onto the desk in the Imperial Library.
translation: Miriam: 帝国图书馆的桌子上刻着这个符号。

original: Miriam: But it was only there for a day.[p/] The faculty probably noticed it and removed it.
translation: Miriam: 但符号只存在了一天。[p/]可能被教职工移除了吧。

original: Hm...[p/] Well, that hardly points you in any direction.
translation: 嗯……[p/]哎，这没什么帮助。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about this, Lady Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加小姐，你能告诉我些什么吗？

original: Liafal: My apologies.[p/] I don't think I'll be of much help with that.
translation: Liafal: 抱歉。[p/]我恐怕帮不上忙。

original: You arrive at Frega Manor,[p/] hoping to speak with Laefe and Miriam.
translation: 你抵达了弗雷加庄园，[p/]希望能与拉菲和米莉亚姆交谈。

original: After some asking around,[p/] one of the servants mentions that they appear to be entertaining guests in the Study.
translation: 在周围打听了一下之后，[p/]侍从之一提到，她们正在书房接待客人。

original: You normally wouldn't interrupt them.
translation: 一般你不会打扰她们。

original: But you've already eaten up a lot of time traveling here.
translation: 但来这儿的路途已经耗费你不少时间。

original: Whatever they're discussing can wait.
translation: 她们可以之后再讨论。

original: Tracker: ARF[p/][s/] ARF[p/][s/] ARF[p/][s/] ARF!
translation: Tracker: <size=1.5em>汪 [p/][s/]汪 [p/][s/]汪 [p/][s/]汪 [p/][s/]汪！</size>

original: Celeste: A-[p/][s/]Ah!
translation: Celeste: 哎、[p/][s/]哎呀！

original: As you enter the Study,[p/] Tracker runs up to you and begins barking.
translation: 进入书房时，[p/]追追跑到你身边狂吠。

original: But once he sees who you are,[p/] he calms down.
translation: 一看清楚你是谁，[p/]他就冷静了下来。

original: Tracker: Oh.[p/] Hello, friends.
translation: Tracker: 噢。[p/]你好，朋友们。

original: Tracker: Sorry for borks.[p/] Tracker thought he smell something...[p/] bad.
translation: Tracker: 吼你们对不起。[p/]追追以为闻到了……[p/]坏东西。

original: Liafal: Oh, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Liafal: 噢，卡斯伯特先生。

original: You scan the room and see that Miriam is there too.
translation: 你扫视屋内，发现米莉亚姆也在。

original: ...And they appear to be speaking with Lord Asclepius.
translation: ……她们似乎正在与阿斯克勒庇俄斯勋爵交谈。

original: Tyrion: Sorry for barging in, Laefe.
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉打扰你们，拉菲。

original: Liafal: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] It's no problem at all.
translation: Liafal: 不、[p/][s/]不……[p/][s/]完全没有问题。

original: Her emotions imply that she already knows why you're here.
translation: 情感表明她已经知道你为何来此。

original: Tyrion: I'll skip the pleasantries...
translation: Tyrion: 我就不说客套话了……

original: Tyrion: Do you mind if I ask you a few questions about what happened?
translation: Tyrion: 你介意我们就发生了什么事情问几个问题吗？

original: Liafal: Of course...[p/] I'll do anything to help with Lady Steelwind's...[p/] situation.
translation: Liafal: 当然不……[p/]我会尽可能帮助斯蒂尔文德小姐。

original: Lazarick: ...Should I leave?
translation: Lazarick: ……我是不是该告辞？

original: Liafal: No...[p/] You were there with me when everything happened.
translation: Liafal: 不……[p/]事件发生时你也和我在一起。

original: Liafal: ...And your testimony will substantiate my alibi.
translation: Liafal: ……你的证言可以巩固我的不在场证明。

original: Lazarick: ...
translation: Lazarick: ……

original: Tyrion: I suppose I'll stop beating around the bush.
translation: Tyrion: 那我就直言不讳了。

original: Tyrion: ...Have any of you made a Blood Contract with a demon lately?
translation: Tyrion: ……你们之中有人最近与恶魔签过血契吗？

original: Miriam: How dare you?! [mind="This arrogant little peasant!"/]
translation: Miriam: 你怎么敢？！ [mind="这个傲慢的小贱民！"/]

original: Liafal: ...No,[p/] I understand where he's coming from. [mind="I [i]want[/i] to understand... But the very idea is infuriating..."/]
translation: Liafal: ……没事，[p/]我理解他为什么这么做。[mind="我想<u>理解</u>……但这还是让人愤怒……"/]

original: Liafal: Of everyone present,[p/] our sister was the only person with [i]known[/i] ties to a demon.
translation: Liafal: 在场所有人里，[p/]唯一<u>已知</u>与恶魔有联系的就是我们的姐姐。

original: Liafal: ...If she were to share that secret with anyone,[p/] it would've been with us.
translation: Liafal: ……她最有可能与之分享这一秘密的人就是我们。

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: You didn't catch any incriminating thoughts from them through the Eye.
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼没有发现任何可能成为罪证的想法。

original: But you've been misled by it before...
translation: 但你之前也被误导过……

original: Tyrion: Nevertheless,[p/] we still have no idea who the Patron is.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我们还是不知道签约人是谁。

original: Lazarick: I was actually meaning to ask you during the trial.
translation: Lazarick: 审理中我其实就想问你。

original: Lazarick: Can't you just use this "Divine Edict" of yours to figure out who the Patron is?
translation: Lazarick: 你就不能用那个“神谕”找出签约人身份吗？

original: Tyrion: No.[p/] To manifest a Blood Contract,[p/] I need the title of the demon and the name of the human they made that contract with.
translation: Tyrion: 不行。[p/]要展示血契，[p/]我需要恶魔的头衔与签约之人的名字。

original: Lazarick: I understand that,[p/] but why not just apply brute force?
translation: Lazarick: 这我明白，[p/]那为什么不采用暴力破解法？

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Lazarick: Due to the King's funeral,[p/] the Kingsguard has a detailed list of everyone who was present during the massacre.
translation: Lazarick: 由于国王的葬礼，[p/]国王卫队有一份记载了屠杀发生时所有在场人士的名单。

original: Lazarick: Whoever this Patron is,[p/] they were working together with the Empress of Discord.
translation: Lazarick: 不管这个签约人是谁，[p/]他都在与无序女皇合作。

original: Lazarick: That must mean they made a Blood Contract with her, yes?
translation: Lazarick: 所以和签约人签订血契的也肯定是无序女皇吧？

original: Tyrion: ...That's right!
translation: Tyrion: ……对啊！

original: Tyrion: I could just keep issuing Divine Edicts until a Blood Contract appears!
translation: Tyrion: 我可以在血契出现前重复发出神谕！

original: Celeste: W-[p/][s/]Wait...[p/] I-[p/][s/]Is that safe?!
translation: Celeste: 等、[p/][s/]等下……[p/]这、[p/][s/]这安全吗？！

original: Tyrion: There's only one way to find out.
translation: Tyrion: 只有试试看了。

original: You take out your notes and begin looking at your list of suspects.
translation: 你拿出笔记，看向嫌疑人列表。

original: You might be at this for a while.[p/] So you might as well go in order.
translation: 这要花上一些时间。[p/]最好按顺序来试。

original: You clear your throat in preparation.
translation: 你清了清嗓子。

original: Tyrion: Empress of Discord![p/][s/] Wherever you may hide!
translation: Tyrion: 无序女皇！[p/][s/]不管你藏身何处！

original: Tyrion: Release thy guards and manifest your Blood Contract with Aster de Wyverngarde!
translation: Tyrion: 放下防备，展示你和阿斯特·维文加德的血契！

original: Tyrion: AGGGGGGGGGH!
translation: Tyrion: <size=1.5em>啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！</size>

original: Celeste: ...Tyrion?![p/][s/] What's wrong?!
translation: Celeste: ……提利昂？！[p/][s/]你怎么了？！

original: You collapse to the ground as you suddenly find yourself overcome in immense pain.
translation: 你突然被强烈的痛苦包围，瘫倒在地。

original: Miriam: W-[p/][s/]What...?!
translation: Miriam: 什、[p/][s/]什么……？！

original: Miriam: What's happening to him?!
translation: Miriam: 他出什么事了？！

original: Liafal: Lazarick![p/][s/] Use your magic to heal him!
translation: Liafal: 拉扎瑞克！[p/][s/]用你的魔法治疗他！

original: Lazarick: R-[p/][s/]Right!
translation: Lazarick: 好、[p/][s/]好的！

original: Eris: Oh, you silly, silly boy.
translation: Eris: 哎哟，你这个小笨蛋。

original: Eris: You may be half-human.[p/] But you can't just go around declaring [i]lies[/i] like that.
translation: Eris: 虽然是个半人类，[p/]但你也不能随便宣告<u>谎言</u>。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Eris: *sigh*[p/] And I was [i]really[/i] looking forward to bringing you to the end of this.
translation: Eris: *叹气* [p/]我本来还<u>挺期待</u>让你走向末路。

original: Eris: I haven't even [i]started[/i] to have my fun yet.
translation: Eris: 好戏<u>还没开始</u>呢。

original: Tyrion: Who...[p/] Who are you?
translation: Tyrion: 你……[p/]你是谁？

original: Eris: Actually...[p/] I suppose [i]that[/i] contract is still in effect.
translation: Eris: 其实……[p/]我猜<u>那份</u>契约还有效。

original: Eris: I guess my hands are tied.[p/] I'll save you,[p/] just this once.
translation: Eris: 看来我无法不从。[p/]只有这次，[p/]我会救你。

original: Celeste: ...rion...
translation: Celeste: ……利昂……

original: Celeste: Tyrion![p/][s/] Please, wake up!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂！[p/][s/]求你了，快醒来！

original: Tyrion: ...Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: ……塞莱斯特？

original: Celeste: Y-[p/][s/]You're okay!
translation: Celeste: 你、[p/][s/]你没事！

original: You most certainly don't [i]feel[/i] "okay".
translation: 你完全<u>不觉得</u>自己“没事”。

original: You can feel every part of your body aching.
translation: 你全身上下每一处都在隐隐作痛。

original: It's painful for you to even sit up like this.
translation: 就连这么坐起来都使你痛苦不堪。

original: Tracker: Are you okay, friend?
translation: Tracker: 你没事吧，朋友？

original: Tyrion: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯、[p/][s/]嗯……

original: Tyrion: What...[p/] happened?
translation: Tyrion: 怎么……[p/]回事？

original: Lazarick: ...
translation: Lazarick: ……

original: Lazarick: You died.
translation: Lazarick: 你死了。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么？

original: Lazarick: I've never brought anyone back from something like that.
translation: Lazarick: 我从没成功救过陷入那种危机的人。

original: Lazarick: That was my strongest spell too.[p/] You have no idea how lucky you are.
translation: Lazarick: 我用的也是自己最强力的法术。[p/]你都不知道自己有多幸运。

original: Lazarick: If [i]I[/i] wasn't here,[p/] who knows what might've happened...
translation: Lazarick: 如果<u>我</u>不在，[p/]谁知道会怎么样……

original: Tyrion: I don't understand...
translation: Tyrion: 我不明白……

original: Tyrion: The last thing I remember was issuing my Divine Edict...
translation: Tyrion: 我能想起来的最后一件事就是发出神谕……

original: Tyrion: Wait...
translation: Tyrion: 等等……

original: Liafal: Was [i]that[/i] the cause?
translation: Liafal: <u>那</u>就是原因？

original: Tyrion: But I've done it before without any problems.[p/] I [i]just[/i] used it this morning.
translation: Tyrion: 但我以前发出神谕时没有问题啊。[p/]我今早还<u>刚刚</u>用过。

original: No...[p/] That pain came [i]after[/i] you attempted to issue a Divine Edict.
translation: 不……[p/]痛苦是在你尝试发出神谕<u>之后</u>产生的。

original: You started at the top of your list of suspects.[p/]
translation: 你从嫌疑人列表最上方试起。[p/]

original: Which means you tried to manifest the Blood Contract between the Empress of Discord and Aster.
translation: 也就是说你尝试展示无序女皇与阿斯特的血契。

original: Tyrion: ...It [i]might[/i] be because Aster [i]doesn't[/i] have a Blood Contract with the Empress.
translation: Tyrion: ……<u>也许</u>是因为阿斯特与女皇<u>没有</u>签约血契。

original: Tyrion: If demons are unable to lie,[p/] the same might hold true for angels as well.
translation: Tyrion: 如果恶魔不能说谎，[p/]天使可能也受到同样的规则限制。

original: Tyrion: The Divine Edict is clearly some sort of divine magic.
translation: Tyrion: 神谕很明显是某种神圣魔法。

original: Tyrion: So asking for a Blood Contract that doesn't exist might be considered a lie.
translation: Tyrion: 要求展示不存在的血契可能会被判断为说谎。

original: Lazarick: S-[p/][s/]Sorry...[p/] It's my fault for suggesting it.
translation: Lazarick: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉……[p/]我不该这么建议的。

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] I was being reckless.
translation: Tyrion: 没有……[p/]是我太鲁莽了。

original: Celeste: Please be more careful...
translation: Celeste: 求你小心点……

original: Celeste: I don't think my heart can take this.
translation: Celeste: 我的心脏承受不了。

original: Tyrion: Well...[p/] At least we know [i]Aster[/i] wasn't behind this...
translation: Tyrion: 哎……[p/]至少我们知道了幕后黑手不是<u>阿斯特</u>……

original: Celeste: He was the most obvious one!
translation: Celeste: 最不可能的就是他啊！

original: Either way,[p/] you should still make note of this.
translation: 不管怎样，[p/]你还是应该把这一点记下来。

original: Tyrion: Ugh...[p/] Anyways,[p/] it's clear that I can't just issue these edicts without thinking.
translation: Tyrion: 呜呃……[p/]总之，[p/]我不能不过大脑就随便发出神谕。

original: Tyrion: I'll just have to wait until I'm certain of the Patron's identity.
translation: Tyrion: 必须等到我确认签约人身份之后才行。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...Just please be careful.
translation: Celeste: ……我只求你小心。

original: Anyways,[p/] it looks like you've found everything you can here.
translation: 总之，[p/]你应该已经找全所有有用的线索了。

original: Perhaps you should MOVE somewhere else.
translation: 你应该 <size=1.5em>移动</size> 到其他地方。
