original: Tyrion: What goes through the mind of such a tortured creature?
translation: Tyrion: 这受尽折磨的生物平常会思考什么呢？

original: Celeste: ...What is with you and this statue?
translation: Celeste: ……你跟这雕像认识？

original: Tyrion: I don't know...[p/] But I can feel its emotions as if they were my own.
translation: Tyrion: 不认识……[p/]但我能感知到他的情绪。

original: Celeste: It's an inanimate object, Tyrion!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂，这都不是个生物！

original: Aster: You said that you two were investigating the murders.
translation: Aster: 你说你们两个在调查这些谋杀案。

original: Aster: You weren't planning to defend Ms. Steelwind, were you?
translation: Aster: 你们是打算为斯蒂尔文德女士辩护吗？

original: Tyrion: If she would have me.
translation: Tyrion: 如果她允许。

original: Tyrion: She may be a competent prosecutor.[p/] But I have far more experience defending clients.
translation: Tyrion: 她作为检察官实力强悍，[p/]但辩护这方面我更有经验。

original: Aster: Unfortunately,[p/] I think the situation is more complicated than that.
translation: Aster: 不幸的是，[p/]我认为现况要更加复杂。

original: Tyrion: What do you mean?
translation: Tyrion: 你是什么意思？

original: Aster: Several House leaders died today.
translation: Aster: 今天多位家族领主死了。

original: Aster: We can't release this information to the public.
translation: Aster: 我们不能把这些信息公之于众。

original: Aster: Not after the news of William Frega's death has already spread.
translation: Aster: 至少不是在威廉·弗雷加之死已经传开的情况下。

original: Aster: In the course of two months,[p/] we've lost not one,[p/] but [i]three[/i] members of the Pillar Families.
translation: Aster: 两个月的时间里，[p/]我们失去了整整<u>三位</u>四大支柱家族的领主。

original: Tyrion: But the trial [i]has[/i] to happen soon.[p/] Or else the magical traces left will disappear.
translation: Tyrion: 但审理<u>必须</u>马上开始。[p/]不然魔法痕迹会消失的。

original: Aster: From what I've heard,[p/] we [i]will[/i] be holding a trial.
translation: Aster: 就我所知，[p/]审理是<u>会</u>举行的。

original: Aster: But it will be handled privately and internally.
translation: Aster: 但将是私下在内部举行。

original: Aster: ...And I'm sorry to say that,[p/] you won't be permitted to serve in such a trial.
translation: Aster: ……很抱歉这么说，[p/]但你不会被允许参加这种审理。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] A majority of the nobility hates me after all...
translation: Tyrion: 确实……[p/]毕竟恨我的贵族已经有一大把了……

original: Tyrion: ...You wouldn't be able to pull some strings, would you Aster?
translation: Tyrion: ……阿斯特你能不能帮我想想办法？

original: Aster: I-[p/][s/] I'm sorry.[p/] I'd like nothing more than to give you the opportunity to represent her.
translation: Aster: 我、[p/][s/]我很抱歉。[p/]我也很想给你机会为她辩护。

original: Aster: But I clearly have a personal attachment to this case.
translation: Aster: 但我显然与这案子利益相关。

original: Aster: If I try to tip the trial in her favour,[p/] it will only harm her chances more.
translation: Aster: 即使我尝试让审理对她有利，[p/]也只会帮倒忙。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] I see what you mean.
translation: Tyrion: 也是……[p/]我明白你的意思。

original: Tyrion: But even if we can't help her during the trial,[p/] we can still investigate the crimes on her behalf.
translation: Tyrion: 但即使不能在审理期间帮助她，[p/]我们也还是可以代表她调查案件。

original: Aster: ...Yes.[p/] I would really appreciate that.
translation: Aster: ……对。[p/]能这么做的话我会很感激。

original: Aster: If new evidence is found,[p/] perhaps we can exonerate Ms. Steelwind of the charges against her.
translation: Aster: 如果找到了新证据，[p/]也许我们能为斯蒂尔文德女士沉冤昭雪。

original: Tyrion: After everything that's happened,[p/] I really need to know.
translation: Tyrion: 发生这么多以后，[p/]我很想知道一件事。

original: Tyrion: Why were so many nobles gathered in one place anyways?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么会有那么多贵族聚在一起？

original: Tyrion: All four of the pillar families were present.
translation: Tyrion: 四大支柱家族的成员都有出席。

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: Tyrion: I understand if you don't want to tell me.
translation: Tyrion: 如果你不想说我也理解。

original: Tyrion: But this information could be vital in figuring out what really happened.
translation: Tyrion: 但这也许会是找出真相的关键线索。

original: Aster: ...No.[p/] I see your point.
translation: Aster: ……没事。[p/]我理解。

original: Aster: ...The truth is we all gathered to mourn the death of my father:[p/] King Olivier de Wyverngarde IX.
translation: Aster: ……我们聚在那里是为了悼念我的父亲，先王奥利维尔·维文加德九世。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/][s/] The king is [i]dead[/i]?!
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/][s/]国王<u>死了</u>？！

original: Aster: Yes.[p/] We wanted to avoid releasing this information to the public so close to the death of William Frega.
translation: Aster: 是的。[p/]威廉·弗雷加的死刚发生不久，我们不想立刻公布这一消息。

original: Aster: My father has been ill for quite some time.[p/] So we were prepared for this.
translation: Aster: 我的父亲已经抱病在床很长时间。[p/]所以我们也有心理准备。

original: Aster: ...Or at least,[p/] I [i]thought[/i] I was.
translation: Aster: ……或者说，[p/]我<u>以为</u>自己有。

original: Aster: I also lost my mother when I was quite young...
translation: Aster: 我很小的时候就失去了母亲……

original: Aster: But it's still all a little hard to take in.
translation: Aster: 但失去亲人还是会让人难受。

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry...[p/] You have my condolences.
translation: Tyrion: 我很遗憾……[p/]请节哀顺变。

original: Aster: Thank you.
translation: Aster: 谢谢你。

original: Celeste: But if King Olivier is dead...[p/] That would make you-
translation: Celeste: 但如果奥利维尔王死了……[p/]那你就会是——

original: Aster: Yes.[p/] You currently stand before [i]King[/i] Aster de Wyverngarde:[p/] ruler of our kingdom.
translation: Aster: 是的。[p/]你面前的是阿斯特·维文加德<u>国王</u>，[p/]我国的新统治者。

original: Considering everything that's happened,[p/] he seems less than thrilled about that.
translation: 考虑到发生了什么，[p/]他似乎对此并不激动。

original: Tyrion: I suppose that explains why all of these nobles were gathered.
translation: Tyrion: 我想这就是贵族齐聚一堂的原因。

original: Aster: *sigh*[p/] They came under the guise of paying their respects.
translation: Aster: *叹气* [p/]他们装作是为了悼念先王前来。

original: Aster: But it's clear they all wanted to get closer to the [i]new[/i] King of Wyverngarde.
translation: Aster: 但他们的目的明显是为了接近<u>新任</u>维文加德国王。

original: Aster: I think the Fregas were the only ones who genuinely came to give their condolences.
translation: Aster: 弗雷加一族是唯一真心为悼念而来的人。

original: Tyrion: Speaking of the Fregas...[p/] I think you need to know.
translation: Tyrion: 说到弗雷加一族……[p/]有一件事得告诉你。

original: Tyrion: I [i]saw[/i] Beatrice before I was knocked out.
translation: Tyrion: 我在昏过去之前<u>看见了</u>比亚特丽丝。

original: Tyrion: I think [i]she[/i] may have been the one that killed Garrick Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 我认为<u>她</u>可能就是杀害加里克·皮尔斯的真凶。

original: Aster: ... [mind="Why would she be there?!"/]
translation: Aster: …… [mind="为什么她会在那儿？！"/]

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry.[p/] I know she's your friend.
translation: Tyrion: 很抱歉。[p/]我知道她是你的朋友。

original: Tyrion: ...But we already know she's not above committing murder.
translation: Tyrion: ……但我们也已经知道她有杀人的前科。

original: Aster: I-[p/][s/]I see.
translation: Aster: 我、[p/][s/]我明白了。

original: Aster: I suppose if [i]you're[/i] saying it,[p/] it must be so.
translation: Aster: 如果<u>你</u>都在这么说，那一定是真的。

original: Aster: ...But what possible reason would she have to be involved in something like this?
translation: Aster: ……可她有什么理由要参与这种事呢？

original: Tyrion: I'm not sure yet.[p/] But I plan to find that out.
translation: Tyrion: 我现在还不确定。[p/]但我会找出原因的。

original: Tyrion: By the way,[p/] where were [i]you[/i] during the murders?
translation: Tyrion: 顺便问一下，[p/]谋杀发生时<u>你</u>在哪里？

original: Tyrion: I remember you left with Steelwind when Celeste and I arrived at the Cathedral.
translation: Tyrion: 记得我和塞莱斯特抵达大教堂时，你和斯蒂尔文德一起离开了。

original: Aster: Ah, yes.[p/] Steelwind and I left to speak with High Speaker Archeus in his quarters.
translation: Aster: 啊，是的。[p/]斯蒂尔文德和我去了大主教阿契厄斯的住处和他谈话。

original: Tyrion: What was your meeting about?
translation: Tyrion: 你们谈的内容是？

original: Aster: ...It was actually about our wedding.
translation: Aster: ……是关于我们的婚礼。

original: Aster: With my father's death,[p/] Lord Steelwind wanted to finally make our union official.
translation: Aster: 我父亲已死，[p/]斯蒂尔文德勋爵希望让我们正式结为连理。

original: Tyrion: Oh...!
translation: Tyrion: 噢……！

original: Tyrion: I [i]would[/i] congratulate you two,[p/] but considering the circumstances-...
translation: Tyrion: 虽然我<u>很想</u>恭喜你们两个，[p/]但考虑到现况——

original: Aster: I understand.[p/] And I appreciate your words nonetheless.
translation: Aster: 我理解。[p/]我也很感谢你的祝福。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] how long did this meeting last?
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]你们的面会持续了多久？

original: Aster: I believe we spoke with him until 1:40 PM.
translation: Aster: 我们和他一直谈到下午 1:40。

original: Tyrion: ...But von Sanctus died at 2:05 PM.
translation: Tyrion: ……但冯·桑克图斯的死亡时间是下午 2:05。

original: Tyrion: That means that she began her rampage less than half an hour after that meeting.
translation: Tyrion: 意味着她在会议结束之后半小时不到就开始了自己的狂暴行为。

original: Tyrion: Was there anything off about her behaviour?
translation: Tyrion: 她当时举止有什么奇怪的地方吗？

original: Aster: Now that you mention it,[p/] something about her demeanor changed.
translation: Aster: 你这么一提，[p/]她的行动确实有些古怪。

original: Aster: We were speaking of the wedding when she abruptly left.
translation: Aster: 她在我们谈论婚礼中途突然离场。

original: Aster: I asked her where she was going,[p/] but she ignored me.
translation: Aster: 我问她要去哪里，[p/]但被无视了。

original: Tyrion: ...That sounds similar to what happened when Celeste fought her.
translation: Tyrion: ……听起来和塞莱斯特与她搏斗时的样子大差不差。

original: Tyrion: There's no way she was affected by Mageblight...
translation: Tyrion: 她不可能感染法师之疫……

original: Aster: I honestly didn't think much of it at the time.
translation: Aster: 我当时没想那么多。

original: Aster: I'm quite used to her giving me the cold shoulder.
translation: Aster: 我已经习惯她对我冷眼相待了。

original: Celeste: ...Right.
translation: Celeste: ……是。

original: It's possible that the "Steelwind" the witnesses saw wasn't actually real.
translation: 目击者看到的“斯蒂尔文德”可能是个假货。

original: Does that mean the "Steelwind" that attended the meeting was [i]also[/i] a fake?
translation: 那参加面会的“斯蒂尔文德”会不会<u>也是</u>假的？

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] what happened after your meeting with the High Speaker?
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]你们与大主教的面会之后怎么了？

original: Tyrion: Did you see Steelwind after that?
translation: Tyrion: 你在那之后见过斯蒂尔文德吗？

original: Aster: Actually,[p/] [i]I[/i] found myself caught up in something else entirely.
translation: Aster: 事实上，[p/]<u>我</u>自己也遇到了大麻烦。

original: Aster: At 2:00 PM,[p/] I went to pay my respects at my father's coffin.
translation: Aster: 下午 2:00，[p/]我去父亲的遗棺那里悼念他。

original: Aster: But apparently,[p/] someone had set a magical trap there.
translation: Aster: 但那里被人设下了魔法陷阱。

original: Celeste: ...What?!
translation: Celeste: ……什么？！

original: Aster: It was a [b]Glyph of Contingency[/b].
translation: Aster: 是[b]有备无患[/b]法术。

original: Celeste: I have...[p/] heard of that spell.
translation: Celeste: 我……[p/]听说过这种法术。

original: Celeste: It's like a trap you can set.[p/] And you can infuse [i]any[/i] spell into it.
translation: Celeste: 你可以在这种法术里输入一个<u>任意</u>法术，[p/]借此设下陷阱。

original: Tyrion: But it requires a second,[p/] "contingent" spell to [i]place[/i] that trap.
translation: Tyrion: 也就意味着陷阱里<u>有</u>一个“以备不时之需”的法术。

original: Tyrion: Which spell was it?
translation: Tyrion: 这个法术是？

original: Aster: It was a [b]Force Cage[/b]...[p/] targeting [i]me[/i].
translation: Aster: 是[b]坚牢术[/b]……[p/]专门针对<u>我</u>的。

original: Celeste: ...Was the murderer trying to attack Aster too?
translation: Celeste: ……凶手也想攻击阿斯特吗？

original: Tyrion: I don't think so...[p/] They would have used a more lethal spell if they wanted to.
translation: Tyrion: 我不觉得……[p/]不然他们就会在陷阱里设下更为致命的法术了。

original: Tyrion: But from the sounds of it,[p/] [b]Force Cage[/b] can't be dispelled.
translation: Tyrion: 从描述看来，[p/][b]坚牢术[/b]无法被驱散。

original: Tyrion: So Aster would have been trapped inside of it for that full hour.
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特在里面被关了整整一个小时。

original: Aster: We think the murderer used this as a distraction.
translation: Aster: 我们认为这是凶手的调虎离山之计。

original: Aster: Because of that trap,[p/] the Kingsguard consolidated most of their attention and forces on my location.
translation: Aster: 由于这个陷阱，[p/]国王卫队将大部分力量集中在了我的位置。

original: Aster: As a result,[p/] there were fewer people guarding von Sanctus, Sibyl, and Pierce.
translation: Aster: 结果就是，[p/]可以保卫冯·桑克图斯，希比尔和皮尔斯的人变少了。

original: Aster: And the ones that [i]were[/i] there all fell comatose.
translation: Aster: 能保卫他们的人最终也<u>都</u>陷入昏迷。

original: Aster: They can't tell us what happened to them.
translation: Aster: 也因此无法告诉我们发生了什么。

original: Aster: This whole situation is quite a mess.
translation: Aster: 整个局面都是一团乱。

original: Aster: I do consider myself lucky that [i]you're[/i] here, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aster: <u>你</u>在这里让我感到庆幸，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: I appreciate your trust.[p/] But I still can't make sense of what I've found so far.
translation: Tyrion: 我对你的信任表示感激。[p/]但我目前还无法解读自己发现的线索背后有什么意义。

original: Aster: Well, if anyone can find out what happened,[p/] it's you.
translation: Aster: 哎，能找出真相的人只有你了。

original: Aster: I'm glad you were with Mr. Cuthbert when the assailant struck, Ms. McCoy.
translation: Aster: 我也很高兴袭击发生时你和卡斯伯特先生在一起，麦考伊女士。

original: Aster: Who knows what would have happened if you weren't there...
translation: Aster: 我都不敢想象如果你不在，事情会怎样发展……

original: Celeste: No...[p/] I failed completely.
translation: Celeste: 不……[p/]我彻头彻尾失败了。

original: Celeste: I let the murderer get past me.[p/] They could have [i]killed[/i] Tyrion.
translation: Celeste: 我让凶手逃离了我。[p/]提利昂当时有可能<u>被杀</u>。

original: Tyrion: You can't keep blaming yourself for what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 你不能把发生的事都怪在自己身上。

original: Tyrion: And we're both safe now.[p/] That's what matters.
translation: Tyrion: 重要的是我们现在都安全了。

original: Celeste: Yeah...
translation: Celeste: 是啊……

original: Aster: I can't believe Ms. Steelwind is being blamed for this.
translation: Aster: 我不敢相信他们会把这怪到斯蒂尔文德女士身上。

original: Aster: Although,[p/] I can't fault the Kingsguard for that.
translation: Aster: 虽然我也不能因此指责国王卫队。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] There were several witnesses who saw her.[p/]
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]好几名目击者看到了她。[p/]

original: Tyrion: And Celeste's testimony shows it wasn't someone [i]else[/i] magically disguised as her.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特的证言也表明，并不是<u>其他人</u>用魔法伪装成她的样子。

original: Aster: I hope she's doing okay.
translation: Aster: 我希望她没事。

original: Tyrion: Is [b]Glyph of Contingency[/b] common for mages to know?
translation: Tyrion: 会[b]有备无患[/b]的法师很多吗？

original: Aster: No.[p/] It's extremely useful.[p/] But it's also very advanced.
translation: Aster: 不。[p/]这法术很有用。[p/]但也十分高深。

original: Aster: It essentially involves casting two spells at the same time.
translation: Aster: 简单来说，施法者需要同时施展两个法术。

original: Tyrion: So whoever set that trap was a powerful mage...
translation: Tyrion: 所以设下陷阱的肯定是个强力法师……

original: Celeste: But considering the people who were here,[p/] [i]that[/i] hardly narrows it down.
translation: Celeste: 但考虑到在场的人，[p/]<u>这一点</u>也没法缩小范围。

original: Aster: Lloyd von Sanctus is actually dead...
translation: Aster: 洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯死了……

original: Aster: And I just saw him this morning too.
translation: Aster: 我今早才见过他。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] Despite my feelings about him,[p/] no one deserves to be killed in cold blood.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]虽然我不喜欢他，[p/]但没人该被那样残忍地杀害。

original: Aster: If there's [i]some[/i] silver lining,[p/] it's that he can no longer harm people with his negligence.
translation: Aster: 要说有<u>什么</u>积极之处的话，[p/]就是他再也不能祸害民众了。

original: He must still be thinking about what happened to Justin Waye.
translation: 他大概还在想贾斯汀·维耶的事。

original: Aster: I can't believe someone killed Lady Sibyl.
translation: Aster: 不敢相信有人杀了希比尔小姐。

original: Tyrion: Did you know her well?
translation: Tyrion: 你很了解她？

original: Aster: Quite well.[p/] We had many debates about how her family ran the judicial system.
translation: Aster: 相当了解。[p/]就希比尔家该如何运营司法体系这点，我们辩论过多次。

original: Aster: I found them quite...[p/] frustrating.
translation: Aster: 那些辩论都很……[p/]令人沮丧。

original: Tyrion: ...After speaking to her,[p/] I can kind of understand what you mean.
translation: Tyrion: ……和她交谈过后，[p/]我多少理解你的意思。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about this, Aster?
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特，你怎么看？

original: Aster: My apologies, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] I don't have much to say about that.
translation: Aster: 很抱歉，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]我没有什么能说的。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: ...It's just you,[p/] Celeste,[p/] and the statue.[p/] The horrible statue.
translation: ……这里只有你，[p/]塞莱斯特，[p/]雕像。[p/]可怕的雕像。

original: Tyrion: ...I don't feel safe here.
translation: Tyrion: ……我觉得这里不安全。

original: Celeste: Why is that statue freaking you out so much?
translation: Celeste: 你怎么这么害怕一个雕像啊？

original: Celeste: That pegasus is [i]literally[/i] a celestial like you!
translation: Celeste: 这天马<u>可是</u>你的天界老乡！

original: Tyrion: I don't know.[p/] But I can feel its suffering through the Eye.
translation: Tyrion: 我不知道。[p/]但我能通过荷鲁斯之眼感受到它在承受痛苦。

original: Celeste: It's an [i]inanimate[/i] object, Tyrion!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂，这都<u>不是个生物</u>！

original: Tyrion: ...Let's MOVE somewhere else.
translation: Tyrion: ……我们 <size=1.5em>移动</size> 到其他地方吧。

original: Celeste: Alright.[p/] Whatever it takes to get you to stop acting so weird.
translation: Celeste: 好吧。[p/]只要能让你别这么举止可疑就行。

original: You arrive back at the cathedral's garden and come across that accursed statue again.
translation: 你们回到了大教堂的花园，又遇上了那受诅咒的雕像。

original: Tyrion: ...It's staring into my soul.
translation: Tyrion: ……这雕像盯得我肝颤。

original: Celeste: Then stop looking at it!
translation: Celeste: 那你不要看它了！

original: As you move your attention away from the grotesque sculpture,[p/] you spot the crown prince.
translation: 把视线从可怖的雕像上移开后，[p/]你看到了王储殿下。

original: He's sitting on a bench,[p/] guarded by some knights from the Kingsguard.
translation: 他正坐在长椅上，身边有数名国王卫队的骑士保卫。

original: His brow is furrowed,[p/] and he seems to be deep in thought.
translation: 他眉头紧皱，[p/]看起来陷入沉思。

original: Aster: O-[p/][s/]Oh, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] And Ms. McCoy too.
translation: Aster: 噢、[p/]噢，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]还有麦考伊女士。

original: Aster: What are you still doing here?
translation: Aster: 你们怎么还在这儿？

original: Tyrion: We're trying to investigate what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 我们在调查案件详情。

original: Tyrion: We were looking around when we just happened to find you here.
translation: Tyrion: 四处搜查的过程中恰好在这里遇到了你。

original: Aster: I see...
translation: Aster: 原来如此……

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Are you okay?
translation: Tyrion: ……你没事吧？

original: Aster: Yes...[p/] I was just thinking how unfortunate this ordeal has been.
translation: Aster: 没事……[p/]我只是在想这整起事件多么不幸。

original: Aster: I do hope Ms. Steelwind is taking this well.
translation: Aster: 我希望斯蒂尔文德女士没事。

original: Right...[p/] She is his fiancée after all.
translation: 是啊……[p/]毕竟她是他的未婚妻。

original: He must be extremely worried about her.
translation: 他肯定非常担心她。

original: Tyrion: We're trying to find out what exactly happened.
translation: Tyrion: 我们在试图弄清楚发生了什么。

original: Tyrion: Do you mind if we ask you some questions?
translation: Tyrion: 介意回答我们几个问题吗？

original: Aster: I...[p/] see.[p/] Well, I'll do whatever I can to help.
translation: Aster: 我……[p/]明白了。[p/]好的，我会尽力帮忙。

original: ...And yet [i]another[/i] inexplicable event is added to the list.
translation: ……现在<u>又多了一个</u>未解之谜。

original: After everything you've learned,[p/] you highly doubt that Steelwind was affected by Mageblight.
translation: 根据现在你所了解的内容，[p/]斯蒂尔文德不太可能感染了法师之疫。

original: So someone must be behind what happened...[p/] But who?
translation: 罪魁祸首一定另有其人……[p/]但会是谁？

original: Anyways,[p/] it seems he's told you everything he knows.
translation: 总之，[p/]他应该已经把知道的一切都告诉你了。

original: He probably didn't witness much after he was trapped by that [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: 被[b]坚牢术[/b]困住以后他也应该看不到多少东西。

original: You should MOVE somewhere else and follow your other leads.
translation: 你应该 <size=1.5em>移动</size> 到别处，追查其他线索。

original: Tyrion: This statue...
translation: Tyrion: 这雕像……

original: Tyrion: What [i]is[/i] this thing, by the way?
translation: Tyrion: 这到底<u>是</u>什么啊？

original: Tyrion: You called it a "pegasus" earlier.
translation: Tyrion: 你之前管这叫“天马”。

original: Beatrice: It's a creature of divine origin.
translation: Beatrice: 是来自神圣领域的生物。

original: Beatrice: Many people believe that the angels of the Upper Planes rode these creatures into battle.
translation: Beatrice: 很多人相信上层位面的天使会骑着这些生物征战沙场。

original: Tyrion: I see...
translation: Tyrion: 我明白了……

original: Beatrice: Do you feel some kinship to it?
translation: Beatrice: 你对它有亲近感吗？

original: Tyrion: ...I can only feel its suffering.
translation: Tyrion: ……我只能感受到它在受苦。

original: Celeste: What?
translation: Celeste: 什么？

original: Tyrion: Its face is contorted into an expression of pure agony.
translation: Tyrion: 它的面部表情因极度痛苦而扭曲。

original: Tyrion: It screams out in terror.[p/] Yet no one can hear its pleas for mercy.
translation: Tyrion: 它因恐惧而发出哀嚎。[p/]但没人能听见他乞求慈悲。

original: Tracker: Queen...[p/] I think he's broken.
translation: Tracker: 女皇……[p/]我觉得他疯掉了。

original: Tyrion: Someone ignorant of its plight has placed some sort of vain party hat upon its head.
translation: Tyrion: 不知它身处何种困境的人给它戴了一顶派对帽。

original: Tyrion: It's as if they are mocking its torment.[p/] Like some kind of demon torturing a poor soul in the fields of Avernus.
translation: Tyrion: 仿佛是在嘲讽它所受的折磨。[p/]就像是恶魔在地狱第一层阿佛纳斯折磨可怜的灵魂。

original: Celeste: What are you even saying...?
translation: Celeste: 你说什么玩意儿呢……？

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry...
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉……

original: Tyrion: I need to take a moment to think about what I've just witnessed here.
translation: Tyrion: 我需要花时间好好消化一下自己看到的东西。

original: Tyrion: We all should.
translation: Tyrion: 我们都应该这么做。

original: Celeste: Alright, Tyrion.[p/] You go do that.
translation: Celeste: 好吧，提利昂。[p/]随你吧。

original: Tyrion: So...[p/] You seem to be doing well...[p/] All things considered.
translation: Tyrion: 那么……[p/]虽然发生了这么多事……[p/]但你看起来过得不错。

original: Beatrice: You mean how a [i]demon[/i] now has ownership of my soul?
translation: Beatrice: 你是指我的灵魂被<u>恶魔</u>所有这一点“不错”？

original: Tyrion: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...[p/] [i]that[/i].
translation: Tyrion: 呃、[p/][s/]对……[p/]<u>这一点</u>。

original: Miriam: How can you be so calm about this?!
translation: Miriam: 你怎么能这么冷静？！

original: Liafal: I must agree with Miriam.[p/] It's a little unnerving how nonchalantly you're treating this.
translation: Liafal: 我不得不赞同米莉亚姆。[p/]你若无其事的态度有点吓人了。

original: Beatrice: I suppose it's the knowledge that everything is out of my hands now.
translation: Beatrice: 可能是因为我知道事情已经超出我的掌控吧。

original: Beatrice: There's something peaceful about it.
translation: Beatrice: 反而使我冷静下来。

original: Eris: ...[i]That's[/i] certainly a positive way to look at it.
translation: Eris: ……<u>这</u>确实是种乐观的态度。

original: Tyrion: You know...[p/] My offer still stands.[p/] I can try to help you.
translation: Tyrion: 记得吗……[p/]我的提议依然有效。[p/]我可以帮你。

original: Beatrice: At the risk of your [i]own[/i] life?
translation: Beatrice: 以<u>你自己的</u>生命冒险？

original: Tyrion: I...
translation: Tyrion: 我……

original: Beatrice: ...Which part of the contract would you dispute anyways?
translation: Beatrice: ……你要对契约的哪一部分提出异议？

original: The Divine Edict made you aware of every element in her Blood Contract.
translation: 神谕让你能够了解她的血契内容。

original: There was very little room for interpretation.[p/] It was airtight.
translation: 内容严谨，[p/]没有多少解读空间。

original: Beatrice: ...The demon I signed that contract with was very meticulous about the details.
translation: Beatrice: ……与我签约的恶魔非常注重细节。

original: Beatrice: I've spent the last five years looking for any possible loopholes.
translation: Beatrice: 我过去五年都一直在尝试找出漏洞。

original: Beatrice: But I didn't find anything substantial I could use.
translation: Beatrice: 但没有找到任何我可以利用的地方。

original: Beatrice: I don't even think disputing it is possible.
translation: Beatrice: 我不觉得提出异议有成功的可能。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...I'm sorry.
translation: Tyrion: ……抱歉。

original: Beatrice: Don't be.[p/] You defeated me.[p/] I won't suffer your pity.
translation: Beatrice: 不用。[p/]你打败了我。[p/]不需要可怜我。

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Tyrion: I feel like we always end up randomly meeting like this, Eris.
translation: Tyrion: 感觉我们的碰面总是这么突然，厄莉斯。

original: Tyrion: What brings you here?
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么在这儿？

original: Eris: I requested to accompany Beatrice to this...[p/] event.
translation: Eris: 我要求陪同比亚特丽丝参加这个……[p/]活动。

original: Eris: After all,[p/] I don't have many opportunities to enter a church like this.
translation: Eris: 毕竟我很少有机会进入这样的教堂。

original: Beatrice: ...I can imagine.
translation: Beatrice: ……能想象。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: By the way,[p/] is your father still-?
translation: Tyrion: 另外，[p/]你的爸爸还是——？

original: Eris: Oh,[p/] if you're worried about him,[p/] we've already had a conversation about you.
translation: Eris: 噢，[p/]如果你担心的是他，[p/]我们之前已经谈过你的事了。

original: Eris: I don't think he'll be accosting you any time soon.
translation: Eris: 他不会再来骚扰你了。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...[p/] Thank you.
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……[p/]谢谢你。

original: Celeste: ...That seems too good to be true.
translation: Celeste: ……好得不像真的。

original: Celeste: How'd you pull something like [i]that[/i] off?
translation: Celeste: 你是怎么做到<u>这种</u>事的？

original: Eris: He may look like a hardened criminal,[p/] but he's always had a soft spot for his family.
translation: Eris: 他看起来可能是个凶狠暴徒，[p/]但他心里一直很重视家人。

original: Eris: He also owed me.[p/] And I have a way of making people see things my way.
translation: Eris: 也是他欠我的。[p/]我有法子让人们从我的角度出发看问题。

original: Beatrice: She's right about that...
translation: Beatrice: 这点她说得没错……

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] If [i]you're[/i] here,[p/] does that mean Marrunath is also...?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]如果<u>你</u>在这里，[p/]那马鲁纳斯也……？

original: Beatrice: Oh, heavens no.[p/] There's no way they'd let me bring him [i]here[/i] of all places.
translation: Beatrice: 哦，当然不可能。[p/]他们不可能允许我把他带到<u>这里</u>来的。

original: Beatrice: I left him at the entrance with the Kingsguard.
translation: Beatrice: 我把他留在入口的国王卫队那里了。

original: Beatrice: If he tries to escape,[p/] that knight over there is ordered to kill me.
translation: Beatrice: 如果他试图逃跑的话，[p/]那边的骑士就会立刻杀了我。

original: She gestures towards a knight that's silently watching the sisters from afar.
translation: 她用手指了指在远处静静地看着弗雷加姐妹们的骑士。

original: Tyrion: You're...[p/] surprisingly calm about this.
translation: Tyrion: 你可真是……[p/]惊人的冷静。

original: Beatrice: Please.[p/] I regularly deal with demons.[p/] [i]This[/i] is nothing in comparison to that.
translation: Beatrice: 拜托，[p/]平时我可都是和恶魔打交道的。[p/]<u>这点程度</u>算不了什么。

original: Liafal: ...You really haven't changed.
translation: Liafal: ……你还真是老样子。

original: Beatrice: I suppose not.
translation: Beatrice: 那是当然。

original: Tyrion: Wait, does that mean you can't see right now?
translation: Tyrion: 等下，那不就意味着你现在看不见了？

original: Tyrion: How did you know which statue I was looking at?
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么知道我在看那座雕像的？

original: Beatrice: It was a lucky guess.
translation: Beatrice: 只是我碰巧猜对了而已。

original: Beatrice: ...That grotesque statue certainly makes an impression on you.
translation: Beatrice: ……那奇形怪状的雕像肯定会给你留下十分深刻的印象。

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ……

original: Beatrice: Oh,[p/] Marrunath just spoke with me.
translation: Beatrice: 哦，[p/]马鲁纳斯刚刚告诉我。

original: Beatrice: He wanted me to let you know that he can smell your "celestial stink" from the entrance.
translation: Beatrice: 他想让我告诉你，他在入口就能闻到你身上那“天使般的恶臭”。

original: Tyrion: ...Love you too, Marrunath.
translation: Tyrion: ……我也爱你，马鲁纳斯。

original: Beatrice: ...Oh,[p/] wow.
translation: Beatrice: ……哦，[p/]哇哦。

original: Beatrice: I probably shouldn't repeat his response to [i]that[/i].
translation: Beatrice: 我最好还是别转述他对<u>你那句话</u>的回应。

original: Tyrion: By the way,[p/] you seem to know a lot more about these things than I do.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]在这些方面你似乎比我要懂得多。

original: Tyrion: What exactly [i]is[/i] a "heavensborn"?
translation: Tyrion: “天诞之物”到底<u>是</u>什么？

original: Beatrice: What?[p/] Did you seriously not know?
translation: Beatrice: 什么？[p/]你真不知道？

original: Beatrice: But you know how to issue a Divine Edict.[p/] That's a very advanced technique.
translation: Beatrice: 但你知道如何使用神谕。[p/]那可是个非常高级的技术。

original: Tyrion: It sort of...[p/] came to me in the moment...
translation: Tyrion: 当时是……[p/]突然就想到的……

original: Eris: ...What?
translation: Eris: ……什么？

original: Beatrice: Anyways,[p/] I'm [i]quite[/i] surprised you don't know about your lineage.
translation: Beatrice: 总之，[p/]我<u>确实</u>对你不知道自己血脉这件事很震惊。

original: Tyrion: Perhaps my [i]mother[/i] knew.[p/] But I lost her when I was really young.
translation: Tyrion: 或许我<u>母亲</u>知道，[p/]但她在我很小的时候就已经不在了。

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Beatrice: I see...[p/] You have my condolences.
translation: Beatrice: 我明白了……[p/]请节哀顺变。

original: Beatrice: But to answer your question,[p/] a heavensborn is a human whose bloodline has been touched by the gods.
translation: Beatrice: 但先回答你的问题，[p/]天诞之物是指受神明接触过血脉的人类一族。

original: Tyrion: Gods?[p/] You mean like the Scaled Lord?
translation: Tyrion: 神明？[p/]你是指像鳞甲领主这一类的？

original: Beatrice: No.[p/] I'm speaking of the [i]actual[/i] gods.
translation: Beatrice: 不。[p/]我是指<u>真正</u>的神。

original: Liafal: Beatrice![p/][s/] You can't say that here!
translation: Liafal: 比亚特丽丝！[p/][s/]你不能在这儿这么说！

original: Beatrice: Oh, come off it.[p/] What's the Church going to do?[p/] [i]Arrest[/i] me?
translation: Beatrice: 唉，得了吧。[p/]教会要把我怎么样？[p/]<u>逮捕</u>我？

original: Beatrice: Anyways,[p/] your blood has been touched by the celestials of the Upper Planes.
translation: Beatrice: 言归正传，[p/]你的血脉曾被上层的天人触及。

original: Beatrice: ...Much like [i]my[/i] soul is bound to the Abyssal Hells.[p/] Your soul is consecrated and tied to the heavens.
translation: Beatrice: ……就像<u>我的</u>灵魂被深渊地狱所束缚住一样，[p/]你的灵魂经过升华且与天堂紧紧相连。

original: Tyrion: The heavens...?
translation: Tyrion: 天堂……？

original: Is [i]that[/i] why you're able to use the Eye of Horus?[p/] Is it some kind of... [i]angelic[/i] power?
translation: 难不成你能使用荷鲁斯之眼就是因为<u>这个</u>？[p/]是某种<u>天使般</u>的力量？

original: Beatrice: Make no mistake, though.
translation: Beatrice: 不过你可别搞错了。

original: Beatrice: If you find yourself under the wrong circumstances,[p/] even [i]you[/i] can be sent to Hell.
translation: Beatrice: 如果处于某种不利的情况，[p/]就算是<u>你</u>也会被打入地狱。

original: Tyrion: The Church of Bahamut is prominent in Wyverngarde,[p/] but this is the first time I've heard of the celestial gods.
translation: Tyrion: 虽说巴哈姆特教会在维文加德境内十分有名，[p/]但这是我第一次听说天神的事。

original: Beatrice: Ah,[p/] that makes sense.
translation: Beatrice: 啊，[p/]那不无道理。

original: Beatrice: It's probably because of Wyverngarde's bloody history with the Theocracy of Lumina.
translation: Beatrice: 大概是因为维文加德的血腥建国史与卢米那神权息息相关。

original: Tyrion: The theocracy?[p/] Aren't they the nation east of us?
translation: Tyrion: 神权？[p/]你说我们东边那个国家？

original: Beatrice: Yes.[p/] The luminites worship the celestial gods,[p/] while [i]our[/i] people worship the ancient dragons.
translation: Beatrice: 是的。[p/]卢米那人崇拜天界神祇，[p/]<u>我们</u>则是崇拜古龙。

original: Beatrice: A few centuries ago,[p/] our nation was locked in a bitter war with the luminites.
translation: Beatrice: 几个世纪之前，[p/]我国和卢米那国打过仗。

original: Beatrice: Even now,[p/] the crown sees the celestial religions as a threat to our draconic culture.
translation: Beatrice: 即使至今，[p/]皇家依然认为天界宗教对我们的龙族信仰是个威胁。

original: Beatrice: The church has done its best to wipe out any religions that worship the Celestials.
translation: Beatrice: 教会竭尽全力抹杀了任何崇拜天界的宗教。

original: Tyrion: I see...
translation: Tyrion: 我知道了。

original: Celeste: But if your bloodline is blessed by the celestials,[p/] does that mean that our kids will [i]also[/i] be heavensborn?
translation: Celeste: 那如果说你的血脉受过天神的眷顾，[p/]是不是意味着我们的孩子<u>也</u>会是个天诞之物？

original: Tyrion: I suppose so.[p/] I think my mother was also a-...
translation: Tyrion: 应该是。[p/]我觉得我母亲应该也……

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] What did you just say?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]你刚说什么？

original: Celeste: [i]Your[/i] kids.[p/][s/] I asked if "[i]your[/i] kids" will be heavensborn.
translation: Celeste: <u>你的</u>孩子。[p/][s/]我是说“<u>你的</u>孩子”会不会也会是天诞之物。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I must have misheard you then.
translation: Tyrion: 哦、[p/]哦……[p/]那我一定是听错了。

original: Miriam: Wow...
translation: Miriam: 哇哦……

original: Beatrice: ...If only you were [i]always[/i] this easy to lie to.
translation: Beatrice: ……要是你<u>总是</u>那么好骗就好了。

original: Beatrice: You seem to be doing well, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Beatrice: 你看起来很有精神真是太好了，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Beatrice: ...Why are you looking at me like this?
translation: Beatrice: ……干嘛这样看着我？

original: Tyrion: ...Are you seriously not angry at me?
translation: Tyrion: ……你真的不生我的气吗？

original: Beatrice: At this point,[p/] what would my rage accomplish?
translation: Beatrice: 此时此刻，[p/]我为什么要生气？

original: Beatrice: You defeated me despite my best efforts.[p/] I suppose I respect you for that.
translation: Beatrice: 你击败了拼尽全力的我。[p/]我觉得我应该尊重你。

original: It sort of makes sense.[p/] But it's still a little unnerving how civil she's being.
translation: 有点道理，[p/]但她彬彬有礼的样子还是让你有点紧张。

original: Beatrice: *sigh*[p/] It seems that after all these years,[p/] Miriam still hasn't matured.
translation: Beatrice: *叹气* [p/]看起来这么多年过去了，[p/]米莉亚姆还没长大。

original: Miriam: ...What?!
translation: Miriam: ……什么？！

original: Beatrice: Oh, come now.[p/] You won't make any friends with that pompous attitude of yours.
translation: Beatrice: 唉，别这样。[p/]这么傲慢是交不到朋友的。

original: Miriam: I don't [i]need[/i] friends.
translation: Miriam: 我不<u>需要</u>朋友。

original: Miriam: [i]I'm[/i] a Frega,[p/] what need would I have for such things?
translation: Miriam: <u>我是</u>弗雷加家的人，[p/]还需要什么？

original: Beatrice: You're a noblewoman.[p/] Your skills and intellect are worthless if you can't win over political allies.
translation: Beatrice: 你是贵族的一员。[p/]但如果没办法赢得其他政治盟友的信任，你的一切才能和智慧都一文不值。

original: Beatrice: You will always have weaknesses.[p/] You need allies who can cover them and support you.
translation: Beatrice: 你永远都会有弱点。[p/]你需要能在背后支持你并补齐弱点的盟友。

original: Miriam: ...Like you and that demon?
translation: Miriam: ……就像你和那只恶魔一样？

original: Beatrice: ...Yes.[p/] That's [i]exactly[/i] what I mean.
translation: Beatrice: ……对的。[p/]<u>正是</u>如此。

original: Liafal: P-[p/][s/]Perhaps we should talk about something else.
translation: Liafal: 或、[p/][s/]或许我们该聊点别的。

original: Beatrice: Laefe.[p/] Are you really against marrying Jaiden von Sanctus?
translation: Beatrice: 拉菲。[p/]你是真的很不愿意与杰登·冯·桑克图斯结婚吗？

original: Liafal: Absolutely![p/][s/] That man is an ignorant know-it-all!
translation: Liafal: 当然不愿意！[p/][s/]那男人就是个什么都不知道还不懂装懂的呆瓜！

original: Beatrice: But with Aster taken,[p/] there aren't many other suitors capable of strengthening House Frega.
translation: Beatrice: 但在阿斯特被排除在外的情况下，[p/]已经没有什么能让弗雷加家进一步强大的人选了。

original: Liafal: I just...[p/] [i]can't[/i] marry someone that I don't love.
translation: Liafal: 我就是……[p/]<u>没办法</u>与我不爱的人结婚。

original: Beatrice: I see...[p/] Well, I won't push you then.
translation: Beatrice: 我明白了……[p/]好吧，我不会再逼你了。

original: Beatrice: But I want to make sure you're taken care of when I'm gone.
translation: Beatrice: 但我必须确保我不在了也能有人照顾你。

original: Miriam: Stop talking like that![p/][s/] It's as if you're [i]planning[/i] on dying!
translation: Miriam: 不许说这种话！[p/][s/]搞得好像你<u>一心</u>想死一样！

original: Miriam: You're [i]not[/i] leaving us again!
translation: Miriam: <u>不许</u>再离我们而去了！

original: Liafal: Miriam...
translation: Liafal: 米莉亚姆……

original: Miriam: I-[p/][s/]I'm sorry...[p/] I don't know what came over me.
translation: Miriam: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉……[p/]我不知道我刚刚是怎么了。

original: Beatrice: ...My apologies.[p/] Perhaps I shouldn't have said that.
translation: Beatrice: ……是我的错。[p/]我不该那样说的。

original: Beatrice: ...I hope Aster is okay.[p/] He was never emotionally strong.
translation: Beatrice: ……希望阿斯特没事。[p/]他在情感上没那么坚强。

original: Tyrion: ...What do you mean?
translation: Tyrion: ……这是什么意思？

original: Beatrice: Wait...[p/] Do you [i]not[/i] know why we're all gathered here?
translation: Beatrice: 等下……[p/]你<u>不</u>知道我们为什么聚在这吗？

original: Tyrion: ...I wanted to ask but-.
translation: Tyrion: ……我想问的，但——

original: Beatrice: I'm sorry, then.[p/] It's not my place to tell you.
translation: Beatrice: 我很抱歉，[p/]但由我来告诉你不太合适。

original: Why [i]are[/i] they all gathered here?
translation: 为什么他们<u>都</u>聚在这？

original: Beatrice: I wonder.[p/] Is Aria still a complete mess when she's around Aster?
translation: Beatrice: 话说回来，[p/]阿莉亚在阿斯特面前还是会手足无措？

original: Celeste: Yep.
translation: Celeste: 没错。

original: Beatrice: ...I [i]want[/i] to be happy for her.
translation: Beatrice: ……我<u>想</u>为她高兴。

original: Beatrice: Even when we were engaged,[p/] she was completely infatuated with him.
translation: Beatrice: 即使我们当时已经订婚了，[p/]她还是彻彻底底地迷恋着他。

original: Celeste: [i]That[/i] sounds...[p/] awkward.
translation: Celeste: <u>那</u>听起来……[p/]挺尴尬的。

original: Beatrice: I do hope she can learn to be happy with him.
translation: Beatrice: 我确实希望和他在一起时她能更开心点。

original: Beatrice: ...Have you spoken with Tymora since the trial?
translation: Beatrice: ……自那次庭审后你有和泰摩拉聊过吗？

original: Tyrion: ...No.[p/] I haven't.
translation: Tyrion: ……没有，[p/]还没聊过。

original: Beatrice: She really [i]does[/i] care for you.
translation: Beatrice: 她是<u>真的</u>关心你。

original: Beatrice: I remember.[p/] Even during the court case,[p/] she would speak of you constantly.
translation: Beatrice: 我记得，[p/]即使是在庭审过程中，[p/]她也经常提到你。

original: Tyrion: ...Could we talk about something else?
translation: Tyrion: ……我们能换个话题吗？

original: Beatrice: ...Of course,[p/] my apologies.
translation: Beatrice: ……当然可以，[p/]非常抱歉。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about this, Beatrice?
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝，关于这个你知道些什么吗？

original: Beatrice: Sorry, I can't really say anything about that.
translation: Beatrice: 抱歉，我对此一无所知。

original: ...You find yourself in the Grand Cathedral's garden and stumble upon a strange statue.
translation: ……你发现自己身处大教堂的花园中，并偶然发现一座奇怪的雕像。

original: Celeste: Wow...[p/] [i]That's[/i] a little out of place.
translation: Celeste: 哇哦……[p/]<u>那雕像</u>有点突兀了。

original: Celeste: What even [i]is[/i] it?
translation: Celeste: 这到底<u>是</u>什么？

original: Beatrice: If my memory is correct,[p/] it's a pegasus.
translation: Beatrice: 如果我没记错的话，[p/]那是天马。

original: Celeste: Ah!
translation: Celeste: 啊！

original: Tracker: Hello, friends!
translation: Tracker: 朋友们，你们好！

original: As you inspect the...[p/] contemporary piece of artwork,[p/] you're startled by a familiar voice.
translation: 就在你欣赏这座……[p/]当代艺术品的时候，[p/]你被一个熟悉的声音吓了一跳。

original: ...And it looks like she's not alone either.
translation: ……而且她看来还不是一个人。

original: Along with Eris,[p/] she seems to be accompanied by both of her sisters.
translation: 除了厄莉斯，[p/]她的两个妹妹也在她身边陪着她。

original: Tyrion: B-[p/][s/]Beatrice![p/][s/] Aren't you supposed to be-!
translation: Tyrion: 比、[p/][s/]比亚特丽丝！[p/][s/]你不是应该——！

original: Beatrice: ...Dead?
translation: Beatrice: ……死掉了？

original: Tyrion: ...S-[p/][s/]Sorry...[p/] I wasn't trying to say-
translation: Tyrion: ……抱、[p/][s/]抱歉……[p/]我不是——

original: Beatrice: No.[p/] It's perfectly understandable.
translation: Beatrice: 没事。[p/]我完全理解。

original: Beatrice: [i]You[/i] of all people know what was on my Blood Contract.
translation: Beatrice: <u>你</u>最清楚我的血契内容。

original: Beatrice: But it appears the Lady of Discord isn't going to use me just yet.
translation: Beatrice: 但无序小姐好像还不打算利用我。

original: Beatrice: But it appears the Lady of Discord isn't going to kill me just yet.
translation: Beatrice: 但无序小姐好像还不打算杀了我。

original: Beatrice: Ugh...[p/] Do you [i]really[/i] have to do that?
translation: Beatrice: 唉……[p/]你<u>非得</u>这么做不可？

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Beatrice: ...Never mind.
translation: Beatrice: ……别介意。

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Right.
translation: Tyrion: ……好。

original: It's a little awkward speaking to the Frega sisters after everything that's happened.
translation: 事到如今和弗雷加姐妹谈话有点尴尬。

original: But they don't seem hostile.[p/] And all things considered,[p/] you prefer their company over Sibyl's.
translation: 但她们似乎没有敌意。[p/]再怎么说，[p/]这两个人也比希比尔好。

original: Although...[p/] you're still not sure how you feel about speaking with a murderer,[p/] especially one that [i]you[/i] indicted.
translation: 虽然……[p/]跟杀人犯谈话还是让你心情复杂，[p/]更别提跟一个被<u>你</u>起诉的杀人犯。

original: But Beatrice clearly knows more about demons and their kind than you do.
translation: 但明显比亚特丽丝要比你更了解那些恶魔。

original: You wonder if she knows anything about the "heavensborn".
translation: 你在想她会不会也知道关于“天诞之物”的事情。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] I'm a little curious about the Theocracy of Lumina...
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我有点好奇卢米那的神权……

original: Tyrion: If they worship celestials there,[p/] would I find [i]other[/i] heavensborn there?
translation: Tyrion: 如果那里的人崇尚天神，[p/]会不会也有<u>其他</u>天诞之物？

original: Beatrice: Heavensborn aren't that common [i]there[/i] either.
translation: Beatrice: 天诞之物在<u>那边</u>也不常见。

original: Beatrice: Frankly,[p/] I'm surprised there's even [i]one[/i] heavensborn living in Wyverngarde.
translation: Beatrice: 坦白讲，[p/]维文加德会出现哪怕<u>一个</u>天诞之物都让我十分惊讶。

original: Beatrice: How did your bloodline even find its way here?
translation: Beatrice: 你的血脉是怎么来到这里的？

original: Tyrion: ...I suppose I don't really know.
translation: Tyrion: ……我也没有头绪。

original: Tyrion: My mother never told me much about our ancestry.
translation: Tyrion: 母亲从没对我讲过多少祖先的事。

original: Beatrice: That makes sense...[p/] If the Church of Bahamut knew what you were,[p/] they would have definitely hunted you down.
translation: Beatrice: 也有道理……[p/]如果巴哈姆特教会知道你们的存在，[p/]肯定会来追杀你们。

original: Great...[p/] The last thing you need is [i]another[/i] faction that wants to kill you.
translation: 好极了……[p/]你可不需要<u>再多一个</u>要追杀自己的党派。

original: Beatrice: Anyways,[p/] travel into and out of Wyverngarde is technically illegal.
translation: Beatrice: 总之，[p/]出入维文加德国境严格意义来说是违法的。

original: Beatrice: And I doubt Lord Steelwind would make an exemption for you.
translation: Beatrice: 斯蒂尔文德勋爵也不太可能为了你们网开一面。

original: Beatrice: After all,[p/] House Steelwind was essentially founded by veterans of the Great Luminite War.
translation: Beatrice: 毕竟斯蒂尔文德家的先祖也是参加过大圣战的老兵，他们因此受益。

original: Tracker: ..."Veteran"?
translation: Tracker: ……“受益”？

original: Tracker: ...Vet?!
translation: Tracker: ……兽医？！

original: Liafal: Oh no...[p/]
translation: Liafal: 哦不……[p/]

original: Tracker: No![p/][s/] I hate the vet![p/][s/] I'm not going!
translation: Tracker: 不要！[p/][s/]我讨厌兽医！[p/][s/]我不要去看兽医！

original: Tracker: You'll never take me alive!
translation: Tracker: 杀了我我也不去！

original: Tracker: [i]ARF ARF ARF ARF ARF[/i]!
translation: Tracker: <size=1.5em>汪 汪 汪 汪 汪！</size>

original: You all watch as Tracker frantically runs through the garden,[p/] barking loudly.
translation: 你们看着追追在花园里边乱跑边大吼。

original: Laefe chases after him as he runs towards a passing knight.
translation: 拉菲追着冲向一名路过骑士的追追。

original: Miriam: I should probably go help her.
translation: Miriam: 我最好去帮帮她。

original: Tyrion: It's almost 2:00 PM, anyways.[p/] We should head to the Prayer Room.
translation: Tyrion: 反正马上也要下午 2:00 了。[p/]我们应该去祷告室了。

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ……

original: Tyrion: Thank you for answering my questions, Beatrice.
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝，谢谢你回答我的问题。

original: Tyrion: Please let me know if there's anything I can do to help you with your...[p/] situation...
translation: Tyrion: 如果有任何我能帮到你的地方……[p/]请告诉我。

original: Beatrice: ...Of course.
translation: Beatrice: ……当然。

original: Tyrion: Let's go, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 我们走，塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: Right.
translation: Celeste: 好的。

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ……

original: Eris: Try not to look so down.[p/] It's almost time for the main event.
translation: Eris: 别这么低沉呀，[p/]重头戏马上就要开始了。

original: Beatrice: ...Why did you bring me here?
translation: Beatrice: ……你带我来这里干什么？

original: Eris: Oh,[p/] who knows?
translation: Eris: 噢，[p/]谁知道呢？

original: Beatrice: Whatever you're planning to make me do...[p/] Please.
translation: Beatrice: 不管你打算让我干什么……[p/]拜托。

original: Beatrice: [i]Please[/i] don't make me harm my sisters.
translation: Beatrice: <u>拜托你</u>不要让我伤害我的妹妹们。

original: Eris: You're in no position to make demands.
translation: Eris: 你可没有提出要求的权利。

original: Eris: You'll just have to see for yourself.
translation: Eris: 你只能在一边看着。

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ……

original: Beatrice: ...Stay safe, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Beatrice: ……注意安全，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Celeste: I've...[p/] killed people...
translation: Celeste: 我……[p/]杀过人……

original: Celeste: They were usually criminals or bandits.
translation: Celeste: 一般都是强盗劫匪。

original: Celeste: But it still frightened me how unaffected I was by their deaths.
translation: Celeste: 想起自己对死亡无动于衷，我还是会震惊一下。

original: Celeste: It always came so easily to me.[p/] I was good at it...[p/] a little [i]too[/i] good.
translation: Celeste: 杀人对我来说太容易了。[p/]我有点……[p/]优秀<u>过头</u>了。

original: Celeste: People told me that taking the lives of others would be hard.
translation: Celeste: 人们都说夺走他人性命会很难受。

original: Celeste: But I never felt that uneasiness...[p/] Not even once...
translation: Celeste: 但我从没觉得不适……[p/]一次都没有……

original: Celeste: It made me think that I was some kind of unfeeling monster...
translation: Celeste: 这让我觉得自己是什么无情的怪物……

original: Celeste: ...And maybe I [i]am[/i].
translation: Celeste: 也许……[p/]我<u>就是</u>。

original: Celeste: But the time I spent with you filled me with more happiness than I could have ever dreamed of.
translation: Celeste: 我做梦都没想过，[p/]和你在一起时会有这么开心。

original: Celeste: Instead of taking lives,[p/] I could save them alongside you.
translation: Celeste: 和你一起我不用致人死地，[p/]反而可以救人性命。

original: Celeste: It felt good to protect you.[p/] I felt needed when I knew you were relying on me.
translation: Celeste: 保护你的感觉很好。[p/]被你依靠让我感觉自己还是被需要的。

original: Celeste: It made me feel like I was actually worth something to someone.
translation: Celeste: 让我觉得在有些人心里我还是重要的。

original: Celeste: And whenever I saw the light in your eyes,[p/] it filled my heart with a warm feeling that I've never felt before.
translation: Celeste: 看见你眼睛里的光，[p/]我的心里也涌现从未感受过的温暖。

original: Celeste: ...But it was too good to be true, wasn't it?
translation: Celeste: ……好到不真实了，对吧？

original: Celeste: In the end,[p/] I failed you.
translation: Celeste: 到了最后，[p/]我辜负了你。

original: Celeste: I couldn't protect you.[p/] Just like I couldn't protect my father.
translation: Celeste: 我保护不了你。[p/]就像我保护不了自己的父亲。

original: Celeste: I don't understand...[p/] What did you ever see in someone like me...?
translation: Celeste: 我不明白……[p/]你从我身上看到了什么……？

original: Celeste: ...Tyrion?
translation: Celeste: ……提利昂？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Celeste: You still haven't gotten out of bed yet.[p/] It's almost noon.
translation: Celeste: 你现在都没起床。[p/]已经快中午了。

original: Tyrion: ...I think I just want to rest today.
translation: Tyrion: ……我今天想休息。

original: Celeste: ...You've been saying that for the last ten days.
translation: Celeste: ……同样的台词你已经说十天了。

original: Celeste: ...Someone is actually here to see you.
translation: Celeste: ……有人要见你。

original: Celeste: You should [i]really[/i] get out of bed.
translation: Celeste: 你<u>真的</u>应该起床了。

original: Tyrion: ...Is it Tymora?
translation: Tyrion: ……是泰摩拉吗？

original: Celeste: No.
translation: Celeste: 不是。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...I'm still not really in the mood.[p/] Can you just send them away?
translation: Tyrion: ……我没那个心情。[p/]你能不能赶他们走？

original: Aria: That's a bit rude,[p/] but I suppose I can overlook it this time.
translation: Aria: 这有点没礼貌了，[p/]但我这次就睁一只眼闭一只眼。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]Steelwind?!
translation: Tyrion: 斯、斯蒂尔文德？！

original: As the prosecutor enters your room,[p/] you immediately leap out of your bed.
translation: 看到走进你房间的检察官，你一下就从床上跳了下来。

original: You try to futilely clean your unkempt hair.[p/] But you're just making it worse.
translation: 你徒劳无功地试图整理自己杂乱的头发。[p/]但效果适得其反。

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion...![p/][s/] Pants!
translation: Celeste: 提、[p/][s/]提利昂……！[p/][s/]裤子！

original: Tyrion: R-[p/][s/]Right![p/][s/] Sorry!
translation: Tyrion: 对、[p/][s/]对啊！[p/][s/]抱歉！

original: Aria: ...We'll give you some time to ready yourself.
translation: Aria: ……我们在外面等着你穿戴整齐。

original: Aria: I knew he was in a rut...[p/] But I certainly didn't expect...[p/] [i]this[/i].
translation: Aria: 我知道他最近状况不好……[p/]但我没想到会是……[p/]<u>这样</u>。

original: Celeste: I know.[p/] I'm really worried about him.
translation: Celeste: 我懂。[p/]我真的很担心他。

original: Aria: I empathize with his situation,[p/] but it's been a month already.
translation: Aria: 我很同情他的处境，[p/]但这都一个月了。

original: Aria: Have you tried speaking with him?
translation: Aria: 你有试着和他谈过吗？

original: Aria: He [i]has[/i] opened up to you before.
translation: Aria: 他<u>之前</u>对你敞开心扉过。

original: Celeste: I did.[p/] But I think he's really broken up over what happened with Ruby.
translation: Celeste: 试过。[p/]但我觉得和鲁比之间的事对他打击很大。

original: Celeste: She's basically the closest thing he had to family.
translation: Celeste: 鲁比是他身边最接近家人的人。

original: Aria: I see...[p/] Perhaps he just needs more time.
translation: Aria: 我明白了……[p/]也许他只是需要更多时间。

original: After taking some time to make yourself presentable,[p/] you exit your room to greet the prosecutor properly.
translation: 花了点时间让你至少看起来过得去以后，[p/]你走出房门迎接检察官。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]Sorry about that...
translation: Tyrion: 刚、[p/]刚才的事很抱歉……

original: Aria: No,[p/] I suppose the fault is mine.[p/] I shouldn't have intruded.
translation: Aria: 没事，[p/]也是我的错。[p/]我不该中途打扰的。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] what brings you here?
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]什么风把你吹来了？

original: Tyrion: It's a bookshelf filled with several fantasy fiction novels.
translation: Tyrion: 摆着奇幻小说的书架。

original: Tyrion: There are a lot of books from a series that I've read.
translation: Tyrion: 不少书都出自我读过的一个系列。

original: Tyrion: I never got a chance to look at this painting the last time we were here.
translation: Tyrion: 之前来这里的时候，我没能细看这幅画。

original: Tyrion: He looks like some kind of crime lord.
translation: Tyrion: 他看起来像是个黑帮老大。

original: Knight: If I'm right,[p/] he was one of the [i]previous[/i] Eyetakers.
translation: Knight: 如果我没记错，[p/]他确实是<u>前代</u>夺眼者之一。

original: Knight: Back then,[p/] he had an even [i]tighter[/i] grip on the criminal underbelly of Ratholme.
translation: Knight: 那时候，[p/]他对瑞思霍姆的犯罪集团控制还要<u>更严</u>。

original: Knight: People used to call him "The Raging Storm".
translation: Knight: 人们管他叫“风暴”。

original: Tyrion: ...But isn't "Eyetaker" [i]already[/i] a nickname?
translation: Tyrion: ……可“夺眼者”不<u>已经</u>算一个外号了？

original: Knight: Look, sir.[p/] [i]I[/i] don't come up with these names.
translation: Knight: 先生，[p/]这些外号也不是<u>我</u>想的。

original: Tyrion: It looks like this fireplace hasn't been lit in a while.
translation: Tyrion: 壁炉有一阵子没被点燃过了。

original: Tyrion: But I can still see the burnt remnants of some documents.
translation: Tyrion: 但里面还有文件没烧尽的残留。

original: Tyrion: I can see the back alley entrance from this window.
translation: Tyrion: 从这扇窗户能看到后巷的入口。

original: Tyrion: The Eyetaker must have used this to get a good look at visitors.
translation: Tyrion: 夺眼者肯定能从这里看到来访者们。

original: Tyrion: It's the table that the Eyetaker sat at the last time you were here.
translation: Tyrion: 上次来这里时夺眼者用的桌子。

original: Tyrion: There's a thick layer of dust on it now.
translation: Tyrion: 上面已经积了一层厚厚的灰尘。

original: Tyrion: There are several fantasy novels stacked on the desk here.
translation: Tyrion: 桌子上叠了几部奇幻小说。

original: Tyrion: The Eyetaker must be a fan of the genre.
translation: Tyrion: 看来夺眼者喜欢读这种书。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: There's no one here...
translation: Celeste: 这里没人……

original: Tyrion: ...Damn it!
translation: Tyrion: ……该死！

original: Of [i]course[/i] he's not here.
translation: 他<u>当然</u>早就跑了。

original: You betrayed him and you [i]knew[/i] where his hideout was.
translation: 你背叛了他，也<u>知道</u>他藏身的地点。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You take a close look at the desk he was sitting at during your previous visit.
translation: 你仔细检查了之前来这里时他用的桌子。

original: There's a thick layer of dust on it.[p/]
translation: 上面已经积了一层厚厚的灰尘。[p/]

original: It doesn't look like anyone's been here for a while.
translation: 看起来有一段时间没人来过了。

original: He must have moved his operation elsewhere the day you convicted Beatrice.
translation: 他肯定是在你让比亚特丽丝被判有罪那天搬去了别的地方。

original: Celeste: *sigh*[p/] I guess there's no point in staying hidden anymore.
translation: Celeste: *叹气* [p/]我想也没有必要让他们藏着了。

original: You see Celeste toss the Kingsguard's runestone onto the ground.
translation: 你看见塞莱斯特把国王卫队的符石丢到地上。

original: A few seconds later,[p/] you hear the footfalls of soldiers rushing towards your location.
translation: 几秒之后，[p/]你听见士兵们的脚步声逐渐逼近。

original: Knight: Freeze in the name of the Wyverngarde-!
translation: Knight: 以维文加德之名命令你们不准动——！

original: You see him freeze as he scans the room and sees no one else there.
translation: 发现屋内空无一人后，他呆住了。

original: Knight: ...Be careful, sir.[p/][s/] They appear to have turned themselves invisible!
translation: Knight: ……先生，请小心。[p/][s/]他们让自己隐形了！

original: Tyrion: They're not [i]here[/i], you idiot!
translation: Tyrion: 你这个白痴，他们根本不在<u>这儿</u>！

original: Knight: ...Oh.
translation: Knight: ……哦。

original: You let out a frustrated sigh as you take a seat on a chair nearby.
translation: 你沮丧地叹了一口气，坐在旁边的椅子上。

original: A cloud of dust is launched into the air as you do so.
translation: 同时也扬起了一大团灰尘。

original: Tyrion: He had the last piece we needed...
translation: Tyrion: 他掌握有我们需要的关键线索……

original: Tyrion: None of the other suspects had the means nor the motive to do this.
translation: Tyrion: 其他嫌疑人都没有这么做的动机或手段。

original: Tyrion: But he's probably long gone by now...
translation: Tyrion: 但他现在已经跑得远远的了……

original: Tyrion: It's over.
translation: Tyrion: 都结束了。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: I'm sorry.
translation: Celeste: 我很抱歉。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Celeste: But you did everything you could, didn't you?
translation: Celeste: 但你也竭尽所能了，不是吗？

original: Tyrion: ...But it wasn't good enough.
translation: Tyrion: ……竭尽所能但还是力有不逮。

original: A part of you knew that it was a long shot.
translation: 你也知道希望渺茫。

original: If he were involved in this,[p/] he'd definitely keep his head down.
translation: 即使他真的参与此事，[p/]也一定会保持低调。

original: Tyrion: ...What do we do now?
translation: Tyrion: ……我们现在怎么办？

original: Tyrion: There [i]has[/i] to be someone who knows where he is.
translation: Tyrion: <u>一定</u>有人知道他在哪里。

original: Wait a minute...
translation: 等一下……

original: Tyrion: Actually...[p/] There is [i]one[/i] person who might know where he is.
translation: Tyrion: 其实……[p/]还有<u>一个人</u>可能知道他在哪儿。

original: Celeste: What do you-?
translation: Celeste: 你是指——？

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/] You don't mean...
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/]该不会是……

original: Tyrion: ...At this point,[p/] it's the only option we have.
translation: Tyrion: ……事到如今，[p/]我们也只有这个选择了。

original: Celeste: Are you sure?[p/] You two aren't exactly-
translation: Celeste: 你确定吗？[p/]你们两个可不太——

original: Tyrion: I know...[p/] But I can't let my personal feelings get in the way of saving Aria.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道……[p/]但不能让个人情感妨碍我们救出阿莉亚。

original: You're not looking forward to seeing her again...
translation: 你并不期待再见到她……

original: ...At least,[p/] that's what you keep telling yourself.
translation: ……至少，[p/]你一直是这么告诉自己的。

original: Ugh...[p/] You'll have to process these feelings later.
translation: 唉……[p/]之后再慢慢考虑这些吧。

original: You have a job to do.
translation: 该完成工作了。

original: Tyrion: There's a chalk outline where Pierce's body probably was.
translation: Tyrion: 地上有粉笔画出的尸体轮廓。

original: Tyrion: It looks like he was sitting against this altar when he died.
translation: Tyrion: 看起来皮尔斯死时靠着祭坛。

original: Tyrion: And the blood stain seems to imply that the fatal wound came from his chest.
translation: Tyrion: 血迹也表明他的致命伤位于胸部。

original: Tyrion: An autopsy report would really be helpful here...
translation: Tyrion: 要是有尸检报告就好了……

original: You should ask the commander for a copy of it the next time you see him.
translation: 下次见到指挥官，应该问他要一份复印件。

original: Celeste: There's...[p/] a trace of [b]necromancy[/b] on the ground here.
translation: Celeste: 地上有……[b]死灵术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Celeste: It's...[p/] probably from when I tried to heal you.
translation: Celeste: 可能……[p/]是我尝试治愈你时留下的。

original: Celeste: O-[p/]Oh![p/] There's a trace of [b]transmutation[/b] here.
translation: Celeste: 噢、[p/]噢！[p/]这里有[b]形变术[/b]留下的痕迹。

original: Celeste: It's all over the area around his body.
translation: Celeste: 他尸体附近的区域全是这种痕迹。

original: Tyrion: Interesting...[p/] Did the murderer wound him using a [b]transmutation[/b] spell?
translation: Tyrion: 有意思……[p/]凶手是用某种[b]形变术[/b]伤了他？

original: Celeste: There are traces of [b]conjuration[/b] magic all over the room.
translation: Celeste: 屋子里到处都是[b]召唤术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: That must have been left by Beatrice's [b]Sleep[/b] spell.
translation: Tyrion: 一定是比亚特丽丝的[b]睡眠术[/b]留下的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: There are lanterns hanging around the room.
translation: Tyrion: 屋里各处都挂着灯笼。

original: Tyrion: They're still lit.
translation: Tyrion: 灯笼依然亮着。

original: Tyrion: There are three stained glass windows.
translation: Tyrion: 有三扇彩色玻璃窗。

original: Tyrion: They look quite nice.
translation: Tyrion: 看起来很不错。

original: Tyrion: Let's review what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 我们回顾一下发生了什么。

original: Tyrion: Before Beatrice knocked me out,[p/] we heard a commotion outside and you went to investigate.
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝使我昏迷之前，[p/]我们听到外面有骚乱，你于是出门调查。

original: Tyrion: Can you tell me more about your fight with Steelwind?[p/] What was she like?
translation: Tyrion: 能不能详细说说你和斯蒂尔文德的搏斗？[p/]她当时什么样子？

original: Celeste: W-[p/]Well,[p/] she wasn't her usual self.[p/] It's like she was in some kind of daze.
translation: Celeste: 这、[p/]这个嘛，[p/]她和平常不同。[p/]看起来仿佛处于晕眩中。

original: Celeste: I...[p/] noticed it even before she attacked me.[p/] Something was wrong with her.
translation: Celeste: 我……[p/]在她攻击之前就注意到了。[p/]她有哪里不对劲。

original: Celeste: Oh, yeah...[p/] And she didn't even respond to me when I tried to talk to her.
translation: Celeste: 噢，对了……[p/]我试图和她交谈，但她没有理我。

original: Celeste: It's like she didn't even recognize me.
translation: Celeste: 仿佛她根本就不认识我。

original: Tyrion: But from what Lord Asclepius said,[p/] she would've been acting more erratically if she was affected by Mageblight.
translation: Tyrion: 但根据阿斯克勒庇俄斯勋爵所言，[p/]法师之疫感染者的表现应该会更加狂躁。

original: Tyrion: It's possible that you fought someone disguised as her.
translation: Tyrion: 和你搏斗的有可能是伪装成她的什么人。

original: Celeste: ...I guess that's possible.
translation: Celeste: ……我猜这也有可能。

original: Celeste: But [i]whoever[/i] they were,[p/] their magic was still extremely powerful.
translation: Celeste: 但不管那个人是<u>谁</u>，[p/]使用的魔法都非常强力。

original: Tyrion: ...And several members of the four Pillar Families were assembled here.
translation: Tyrion: ……四大支柱家族的几名成员也都在场。

original: Tyrion: It could have been one of them.
translation: Tyrion: 可能是他们中的一人。

original: Tyrion: We should speak with Commander White when we get the chance.
translation: Tyrion: 有机会的时候应该找怀特指挥官聊一聊。

original: Tyrion: The Grand Cathedral was closed from the public for...[p/] [i]whatever[/i] was happening here.
translation: Tyrion: 大教堂由于……[p/]发生了<u>某些事</u>而不对公众开放。

original: Tyrion: They probably have a list of everyone who was present when the murders happened.
translation: Tyrion: 他们应该有份记载了屠杀发生时所有在场人士的名单。

original: This means that whoever did this was one of the nobles that was here today.
translation: 意味着犯人就在今天在场的贵族之中。

original: Tyrion: Beatrice can cast [b]Invisibility[/b] so I doubt she'd [i]let[/i] you see her...
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝可以使用[b]隐形术[/b]，我不觉得她会<u>让</u>你看见……

original: Tyrion: But did you see her at any point when you were fighting Steelwind?
translation: Tyrion: 但你和斯蒂尔文德搏斗期间看见过她吗？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特？

original: Celeste: Sorry,[p/] I don't know.[p/] I was too focused on staying alive.
translation: Celeste: 抱歉，[p/]我不清楚。[p/]我光顾着保命了。

original: Tyrion: I've actually been meaning to ask you about that...
translation: Tyrion: 我刚好也想问你这一点……

original: Tyrion: Aren't you [i]really[/i] strong?
translation: Tyrion: 你不是<u>特别</u>厉害吗？

original: Tyrion: I've never even seen you break a sweat in a fight before.
translation: Tyrion: 以前你战斗的时候一滴汗都没流过。

original: Celeste: Well...[p/] She was [i]really[/i] tough.[p/] It was terrifying, honestly.
translation: Celeste: 这个……[p/]她<u>非常</u>强悍。[p/]强到可怕。

original: Celeste: It was mainly her magic...[p/] I've never fought someone with spells that powerful before.
translation: Celeste: 主要是她的魔法……[p/]我从没和能施展如此强力法术的人战斗过。

original: Tyrion: ...She didn't hurt you, did she?
translation: Tyrion: ……她没有伤到你吧？

original: Celeste: No.[p/] But it got pretty close.
translation: Celeste: 没有。[p/]但就差一点。

original: Celeste: ...I think she realized that she couldn't beat me.[p/] So she just ran past me and into the Prayer Room.
translation: Celeste: ……我觉得她意识到打不过我，[p/]就越过我直接冲进祷告室。

original: Tyrion: ...So her [i]real[/i] target was Pierce...[p/] But why?
translation: Tyrion: ……所以她<u>真正的</u>目标是皮尔斯……[p/]但为什么？

original: Tyrion: Did you see the moment she murdered Pierce?
translation: Tyrion: 你有看见她杀害皮尔斯的瞬间吗？

original: Celeste: N-[p/]No...[p/] When I arrived at the Prayer Room,[p/] I saw you and Steelwind unconscious on the ground.
translation: Celeste: 没、没有……[p/]我抵达祷告室时，[p/]只看见了倒在地上失去意识的你和斯蒂尔文德。

original: Celeste: And Pierce was already dead.
translation: Celeste: 皮尔斯已经死了。

original: Tyrion: And I'm assuming you didn't see Beatrice anywhere?
translation: Tyrion: 我猜你也没看见比亚特丽丝？

original: Celeste: ...No.[p/] She wasn't there when I arrived.
translation: Celeste: ……没有。[p/]我抵达时她不在那里。

original: How did she leave the Prayer Room without Celeste noticing?
translation: 她是怎么躲过塞莱斯特并离开祷告室的？

original: Did she turn herself invisible?
translation: 她隐身了吗？

original: Tyrion: We showed up at the Prayer Room for the meeting at 1:50 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 我们在下午 1:50 抵达祷告室，准备与皮尔斯会面。

original: Tyrion: Then we interrogated Pierce for about half an hour.
translation: Tyrion: 之后我们花了半小时审问皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: That's when we heard that commotion outside.[p/] And you went to investigate it.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是在这时我们听到外面有骚乱，[p/]你于是出门调查。

original: Celeste: Right...
translation: Celeste: 是的……

original: Tyrion: And I think Beatrice knocked me and Pierce out ten minutes after that.
translation: Tyrion: 十分钟之后，比亚特丽丝弄昏了我和皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: How long did you fight Steelwind before she pushed past you?
translation: Tyrion: 你和斯蒂尔文德打了多久才被她逃掉？

original: Celeste: ...We definitely fought for a while.[p/] It must have been at least... twenty minutes.
translation: Celeste: ……我们打了有一阵。[p/]大概至少……二十分钟。

original: Celeste: ...After that,[p/] she gave up on fighting me and ran into the Prayer Room.
translation: Celeste: ……这之后，[p/]她不再和我搏斗，直接跑进了祷告室。

original: Tyrion: ...Which means that Beatrice somehow got into the room [i]during[/i] your fight.
translation: Tyrion: ……也就是说比亚特丽丝在你们战斗的<u>途中</u>进了祷告室。

original: Tyrion: That discounts my theory of [i]her[/i] disguising herself as Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 看来伪装成斯蒂尔文德的人不是<u>她</u>。

original: :You regained consciousness at 3:12 PM.[p/] That means that you were knocked out for more than forty minutes.
translation: :你下午 3:12 恢复了意识。[p/]也就是说你昏迷了超过 40 分钟。

original: There are still a lot of unknowns about what happened.
translation: 这次事件还有很多未解之谜。

original: You'll need all the pieces if you want to put this puzzle together.
translation: 想要解开谜团，就必须获得所有可能的线索。

original: Celeste: ...Are you sure you're okay?
translation: Celeste: ……你确定自己没事吗？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I'm only a little drowsy from that [b]Sleep[/b] spell.
translation: Tyrion: 是的……[p/]只是因为[b]睡眠术[/b]的影响有点困。

original: Celeste: ...You shouldn't push yourself if you feel tired.
translation: Celeste: ……你不应该在疲劳的情况下工作。

original: Celeste: I'm sure the Kingsguard are fully capable of investigating what happened.
translation: Celeste: 国王卫队肯定能调查清楚发生了什么。

original: She has a point.[p/] But considering who the victims were,[p/] whoever orchestrated this must be high on the political hierarchy.
translation: 她说得有道理。[p/]但考虑到受害者的身份，[p/]幕后黑手一定也是政界金字塔顶层的人。

original: Any of the nobles here could have done this.[p/] The only person you can trust now is Celeste.
translation: 在场的任何贵族都可能是凶手。[p/]你现在能相信的人只有塞莱斯特。

original: Tyrion: Hey...[p/] Are you okay?
translation: Tyrion: 嘿……[p/]你没事吧？

original: Celeste: ...What do you mean?
translation: Celeste: ……什么意思？

original: Tyrion: You've been a little...[p/] tense since the murders.
translation: Tyrion: 谋杀开始后你一直有点……[p/]精神紧绷。

original: Celeste: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: You try to lighten the mood a bit.
translation: 你尝试缓解气氛。

original: Tyrion: ...Were you worried about me?
translation: Tyrion: ……难道是在担心我？

original: Celeste: I was.
translation: Celeste: 是的。

original: Celeste: When I saw you lying next to Pierce's body,[p/] I thought you were...
translation: Celeste: 看到你倒在皮尔斯的尸体旁边，[p/]我还以为你也……

original: Tyrion: ...O-[p/][s/]Oh.[p/] S-[p/]Sorry.
translation: Tyrion: ……噢、[p/][s/]噢。抱、[p/][s/]抱歉。

original: Tyrion: I didn't mean to worry you so much.
translation: Tyrion: 我没想害你这么担心。

original: Tyrion: But I'm okay now.[p/] I'm not hurt.
translation: Tyrion: 但我现在没事了，[p/]也没有受伤。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] I know.
translation: Celeste: 是……[p/]我知道。

original: Celeste: I know Steelwind would never do something like this...[p/] But I [i]saw[/i] her.
translation: Celeste: 我知道斯蒂尔文德绝不会做这种事……[p/]但我<u>看见</u>她了。

original: Celeste: Even if she wasn't her usual self,[p/] her attacks were definitely real.
translation: Celeste: 即使和平常的样子不同，[p/]她的攻击也是毫不留情。

original: Celeste: I don't know what to believe anymore.
translation: Celeste: 我不知道该相信什么了。

original: Tyrion: All the more reason for us to get to the bottom of this.
translation: Tyrion: 那我们更有理由追根究底解明真相了。

original: Tyrion: I can't believe after everything he did,[p/] Pierce is just...[p/] gone.
translation: Tyrion: 不敢相信做了这么多坏事之后，[p/]皮尔斯就这样……[p/]死了。

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry we couldn't get the answers you were looking for.
translation: Tyrion: 很抱歉我们没能获得你想要的答案。

original: Tyrion: Hopefully,[p/] something else turns up.
translation: Tyrion: 希望还会出现其他线索。

original: Celeste: I honestly don't care about that anymore.
translation: Celeste: 其实我不在乎了。

original: Celeste: I'm just glad you're alive and safe.
translation: Celeste: 你还安全活着我就很高兴了。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about this?
translation: Tyrion: 你能告诉我些什么吗？

original: Celeste: S-[p/][s/]Sorry...[p/] I don't think I'll be of much help with that.
translation: Celeste: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉……[p/]我应该帮不上什么忙。

original: Anyways,[p/] it looks like you've found everything you can here.
translation: 总之，[p/]你应该已经找全所有有用的线索了。

original: You should MOVE and take a closer look at the other crime scenes.
translation: 你应该 <size=1.5em>移动</size> 到别的犯罪现场看看。

original: You arrive at the Prayer Room.[p/] It's now swarming with knights from the Inquisition.
translation: 你到达了祷告室。[p/]这里现在全是裁判所的骑士。

original: You find yourself staring at the chalk outline of where Pierce's body once was.
translation: 你盯着皮尔斯的尸体轮廓。

original: You can't help but feel a little uneasy.
translation: 控制不住地感到一丝不安。

original: You've been to plenty of crime scenes before.[p/] But even if you [i]were[/i] unconscious,[p/] you were here when the murder happened.
translation: 你去过不少犯罪现场。[p/]虽然<u>当时</u>失去了意识，[p/]但谋杀发生时你确实在场。

original: It's a little unnerving knowing how close you came to death.
translation: 知道自己曾这么接近死亡还是挺吓人的。

original: Celeste: ...Are you okay?
translation: Celeste: ……你没事吧？

original: Tyrion: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...
translation: Tyrion: 没、[p/][s/]没事……

original: But now's not the time for an existential crisis...[p/] Steelwind's future counts on you figuring out what happened.
translation: 现在不是被存在危机困扰的时候……[p/]你需要为了斯蒂尔文德的未来找出真相。

original: You still don't know what happened after you fell unconscious.
translation: 你还是不知道自己失去意识后发生了什么。

original: The Inquisition believes that Steelwind broke into this room,[p/] knocked you and Pierce out,[p/] and then killed him.
translation: 裁判所认为斯蒂尔文德闯入房间，[p/]击晕了你们二人，[p/]然后杀掉了皮尔斯。

original: But you remember it clearly...[p/] you [i]saw[/i] Beatrice before you lost consciousness.
translation: 但你清楚记得……[p/]自己失去意识前<u>看到了</u>比亚特丽丝。

original: There's more at play here than you realize.
translation: 一定还有更多你没发现的事。

original: Celeste also fought Steelwind after Beatrice knocked you out.
translation: 比亚特丽丝使你昏迷之后，塞莱斯特和斯蒂尔文德搏斗过。

original: Perhaps she can tell you more about how she was acting.
translation: 也许她能告诉你当时斯蒂尔文德是什么样子。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about this, Beatrice?
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝，关于这个你知道些什么吗？

original: Beatrice: Sorry, I can't really say anything about that.
translation: Beatrice: 抱歉，我对此一无所知。

original: Tyrion: Are you ready?
translation: Tyrion: 你准备好了吗？

original: Celeste: Yeah...
translation: Celeste: 好了……

original: Celeste: At least...[p/] I [i]hope[/i] so.
translation: Celeste: 至少……[p/]我<u>希望</u>如此。

original: Tyrion: If it becomes too much for you,[p/] don't hesitate to leave.
translation: Tyrion: 如果很难承受，[p/]你可以离开。

original: Tyrion: I only need a few moments to look into his mind.
translation: Tyrion: 我只需要几秒钟来读取他的意识。

original: Celeste: No.[p/] [i]I'm[/i] the one who asked you to do this.
translation: Celeste: 不。[p/]是<u>我</u>麻烦你做这些的。

original: Celeste: And I'm not going to leave you alone with him.
translation: Celeste: 我不会让你一个人面对他。

original: Tyrion: Alright...[p/] If that's what you want.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]如果你希望如此。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Tyrion?
translation: Celeste: 提利昂？

original: Tyrion: ...Yeah?
translation: Tyrion: ……我在？

original: Celeste: Thank you for doing this.[p/] It really means a lot to me.
translation: Celeste: 谢谢你愿意这么做。[p/]对我意义重大。

original: Tyrion: Of course.[p/] This will finally give you the answers you've been looking for.
translation: Tyrion: 别客气。[p/]你也终于能获得一直寻找的答案了。

original: Celeste: It's not just that.[p/] You've done so much for me since I met you.
translation: Celeste: 不只是这件事。[p/]遇见你以来你为我做了太多事。

original: Celeste: You got me acquitted.[p/] You helped me work through my grief for my dad.
translation: Celeste: 你让我无罪释放。[p/]帮我走出失去父亲的悲伤。

original: Celeste: It feels like I can never repay that.
translation: Celeste: 你的恩情我无以为报。

original: Tyrion: What are you talking about?
translation: Tyrion: 说什么呢？

original: Tyrion: For the past few months,[p/] all I've been [i]doing[/i] is relying on you.
translation: Tyrion: 这几个月里，[p/]一直是我<u>在</u>依靠你。

original: Tyrion: I genuinely don't know what I'd do if you weren't a part of my life.
translation: Tyrion: 如果生命中没有你，我都不知道自己会怎么样。

original: Celeste: ... [mind="I should tell him..."/]
translation: Celeste: …… [mind="我应该告诉他……"/]

original: Tyrion: ...Tell me what?
translation: Tyrion: ……告诉我什么？

original: Celeste: Agh![p/][s/] Get out of my head!
translation: Celeste: 啊呀！[p/][s/]不要读我的心！

original: Tyrion: You're [i]really[/i] bad at guarding your mind.
translation: Tyrion: 是你自己<u>不擅长</u>保护这些想法。

original: Tyrion: You know you can tell me anything, right?
translation: Tyrion: 对我你可以无话不谈的，知道吧？

original: Celeste: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Celeste: A-[p/][s/]Ah![p/][s/] Aria?!
translation: Celeste: 哎、[p/][s/]哎呀！[p/][s/]阿莉亚？！

original: Celeste: How long have you been standing there?!
translation: Celeste: 你在那儿站多久了？！

original: Aria: W-[p/][s/]Well...[p/] I knew you'd be here around this time.
translation: Aria: 这、[p/][s/]这个……[p/]我知道这个时间你们会在这里。

original: Aria: I wanted to wish you luck...
translation: Aria: 我想祝你们好运……

original: Aria: But then you two seemed to be in the middle of...[p/] something.
translation: Aria: 但你们俩好像……[p/]正忙。

original: Aria: ...I didn't want to interrupt.
translation: Aria: ……我不想打扰你们。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Aria: D-[p/][s/]Don't stop on my account.
translation: Aria: 别、[p/][s/]别在意我。

original: Aria: I-[p/][s/]I'll just get out of your way.
translation: Aria: 我、[p/][s/]我会给你们独处的空间。

original: As she awkwardly skitters away,[p/] you see something fall out of her pocket.
translation: 在她尴尬地试图溜之大吉时，[p/]你看到她口袋里掉了什么东西。

original: Celeste: Oh, Aria![p/][s/] You dropped your runestone.
translation: Celeste: 噢、阿莉亚！[p/][s/]你的符石掉了。

original: As Celeste picks up the runestone,[p/] she accidentally activates it.
translation: 塞莱斯特捡起符石时不小心将之激活。

original: An image of a piece of evidence appears for a brief moment,[p/] but Aria quickly hides it.
translation: 某件证据的图像出现了一瞬，[p/]但阿莉亚迅速把它隐藏了起来。

original: ...But not before Celeste sneaks a peek at it.
translation: ……但塞莱斯特已经看到内容了。

original: Aria: O-[p/][s/]Oh...
translation: Aria: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...Oh, I see.
translation: Celeste: ……噢，我懂了。

original: Tyrion: Celeste... Don't just invade her privacy like that.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……不要这么侵犯她的个人隐私。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Celeste: Don't be like that.[p/] I'm really happy for you.
translation: Celeste: 别这样嘛。[p/]我真的为你高兴。

original: Aria: T-[p/][s/]Thank you...
translation: Aria: 谢、[p/][s/]谢谢你……

original: Aria: Um...[p/] Good luck...
translation: Aria: 呃……[p/]祝你们好运……

original: ...A part of you [i]really[/i] wants to know what she saw.
translation: ……你心里有一部分<u>很想</u>知道她看见了什么。

original: But [i]one[/i] of you has to exercise some self-restraint.
translation: 但你们俩里至少有<u>一个人</u>得克制自己。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] let's go meet with him.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我们去见他吧。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] Let's do this. [mind="I can tell him after."/]
translation: Celeste: 是啊……[p/]我们走吧。 [mind="我可以之后再告诉他。"/]

original: Garrick: Ah...[p/] You've finally arrived...
translation: Garrick: 啊……[p/]你终于到了……

original: Garrick: I suppose this means you've finally decided-
translation: Garrick: 看来你已经下了决心——

original: Garrick: Wait...[p/][s/] [i]You[/i] two?
translation: Garrick: 等等……[p/][s/]<u>你们</u>两个？

original: Celeste: We got your letter.
translation: Celeste: 我们收到了你的信。

original: Garrick: Letter?[p/][s/] What letter?!
translation: Garrick: 信？[p/][s/]什么信？！

original: Tyrion: You...[p/] sent us a letter, Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 你……[p/]寄的信。皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: It said that you knew who Celeste's parents were.
translation: Tyrion: 信里说你知道塞莱斯特的父母是谁。

original: Garrick: I [i]did[/i] send that letter,[p/] but not to [i]you[/i] two.
translation: Garrick: 我<u>确实</u>寄了信，[p/]但不是给<u>你们</u>。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: I don't like this.
translation: Celeste: 我感觉不妙。

original: Eris: ...And so the [i]final[/i] act begins.
translation: Eris: ……<u>最后</u>一幕终于开始。

original: Eris: I've been waiting for this.
translation: Eris: 我等的就是这一刻。

original: Lloyd: What the hell are you doing?!
translation: Lloyd: 你在搞什么鬼？！

original: Lloyd: Have you gone mad?!
translation: Lloyd: 你疯了吗？！

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Lloyd: N-[p/][s/]No...![p/][s/] What are you doing?!
translation: Lloyd: 不、[p/][s/]不……！[p/][s/]你干什么？！

original: Lloyd: Stop!
translation: Lloyd: 住手！

original: Coraline: L-[p/][s/]Lady Steelwind...?!
translation: Coraline: 斯、[p/][s/]斯蒂尔文德小姐……？！

original: Coraline: What are you-?!
translation: Coraline: 你这是——？！

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Coraline: Is [i]this[/i] also the will of the Cosmic Balance...?
translation: Coraline: 难道<u>这</u>也是宇宙平衡的意愿……？

original: Celeste: Come on![p/][s/] Just tell us the truth, Pierce!
translation: Celeste: 拜托！[p/][s/]把真相告诉我们，皮尔斯！

original: Garrick: You are the [i]last[/i] person I would give this information to!
translation: Garrick: 我<u>最</u>不想告诉的人就是你！

original: He's getting more and more stressed.
translation: 他越来越紧张了。

original: Just a little more and you'll-
translation: 只差一点你就——

original: As you interrogate him,[p/] you suddenly hear a loud crash outside the room.
translation: 审问他的途中，[p/]你突然听到外面传来巨大的撞击声。

original: Tyrion: What was that?!
translation: Tyrion: 刚才是怎么回事？！

original: Celeste: ...I'm going to take a look and see what's going on.
translation: Celeste: ……我去外面看看怎么回事。

original: Garrick: What?![p/][s/] Are you just going to [i]leave[/i] us here?!
translation: Garrick: 什么？！[p/][s/]你要把我们两个<u>留在</u>这儿？！

original: Tyrion: H-[p/][s/]He's right.[p/] We don't know what's going on.
translation: Tyrion: 他、[p/][s/]他说得对。[p/]我们不知道这是怎么回事。

original: Tyrion: We should stay together.
translation: Tyrion: 我们应该待在一起。

original: Celeste: Don't worry.[p/] There were two guards outside.[p/] And they're from the Kingsguard.
translation: Celeste: 别担心，[p/]外面有两个国王卫队的人看着。

original: Celeste: You'll be fine.
translation: Celeste: 你们很安全。

original: Tyrion: ...That's not what I'm worried about.
translation: Tyrion: ……我不是担心这个。

original: Tyrion: But...[p/] I'll trust your judgment.
translation: Tyrion: 但是……[p/]我会相信你的判断。

original: Garrick: What?!
translation: Garrick: 什么？！

original: It's been almost ten minutes since Celeste went to investigate the noise.
translation: 塞莱斯特出去调查噪音已经过了十分钟。

original: Pierce seems extremely on edge.
translation: 皮尔斯看起来极度焦躁。

original: He's sitting at one of the tables and impatiently tapping its surface with his finger.
translation: 他站在一张桌子旁，不耐烦地用手指敲击桌面。

original: Tyrion: So,[p/] you never intended to send that letter to me.
translation: Tyrion: 所以，[p/]你从没打算把那封信寄给我。

original: Tyrion: Who [i]did[/i] you send it to, then?
translation: Tyrion: 那你<u>寄给了</u>谁？

original: Garrick: Oh,[p/] as if I would ever tell [i]you[/i] that.
translation: Garrick: 嚯，[p/]说得像我会告诉<u>你</u>一样。

original: Luckily for you,[p/] he [i]should[/i] have accumulated enough stress by now.
translation: 你很幸运，[p/]他现在<u>应该</u>已经积攒了足够多的压力。

original: Garrick: W-[p/][s/]What?[p/] Why are you looking at me like that?
translation: Garrick: 什、[p/][s/]什么？[p/]为什么这么看着我？

original: Tyrion: Even if I wasn't the intended recipient,[p/] you said that you [i]knew[/i] who Celeste's biological parents are.
translation: Tyrion: 就算收信人不是我，[p/]你也确实提到自己<u>知道</u>塞莱斯特的亲生父母是谁。

original: Tyrion: Who are they?
translation: Tyrion: 他们是谁？

original: Garrick: A-[p/][s/]Are you seriously focused on that [i]now[/i]?! [mind="It's far too important. It's my only bargaining chip."/]
translation: Garrick: 你、[p/][s/]你<u>现在</u>还在想这些？！ [mind="这太重要了。是我唯一的筹码。"/]

original: Tyrion: Answer the question, Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 回答问题，皮尔斯。

original: Garrick: ...What was that?
translation: Garrick: ……什么动静？

original: Beatrice: [b]Somniah[/b].
translation: Beatrice: [b]Somniah[/b].

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What...?[p/] What is this?
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么……？[p/]这是什么？

original: A blue luminous vapor enters the room.[p/] As soon as it makes contact with you,[p/] you suddenly feel extremely fatigued.
translation: 一股散发着蓝色荧光的气体窜进了房间。[p/]你一接触到这股气体，[p/]就突然感到极度疲劳。

original: Garrick: Damn it![p/][s/] It's a [b]Sleep[/b] spell!
translation: Garrick: 该死！[p/][s/]是[b]睡眠术[/b]！

original: Garrick: I-[p/][s/]I...[p/] I miscalculated...
translation: Garrick: 我、[p/][s/]我……[p/]我失算了……

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] If they got here,[p/] that means...
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不……[p/]如果那些人在这儿，[p/]就意味着……

original: Tyrion: Ce...[p/]leste...
translation: Tyrion: 塞……[p/]莱斯特……

original: You try your hardest to stay conscious,[p/] but the spell is too powerful.
translation: 你拼命尝试保持意识清醒，[p/]但法术效力太强了。

original: You feel your body slowly dropping to the ground.
translation: 你感到自己的身体慢慢倒在地上。

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No...
