translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不……

original: Tyrion: Bea...[p/]trice?
translation: Tyrion: 比亚……[p/]特丽丝？

original: Celeste: ...rion.
translation: Celeste: ……利昂。

original: Celeste: ...Tyrion...!
translation: Celeste: ……提利昂……！

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: ...Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: ……塞莱斯特？

original: Celeste: Tyrion![p/][s/] I'm so sorry![p/][s/] I should have listened to you!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂！[p/][s/]真对不起！[p/][s/]我本该听你的！

original: Celeste: I should have never left you alone with him![p/] I-!
translation: Celeste: 我不该留你和他一个人！[p/]我——！

original: Tyrion: Hey, it's okay...
translation: Tyrion: 嘿，没事的……

original: Tears are streaming down her eyes.[p/] She was clearly worried about you.
translation: 她正泪如泉涌，[p/]明显非常担心你。

original: You try your best to comfort her as you look around the room.
translation: 你尽可能尝试安抚她，并环顾四周。

original: Tyrion: What...[p/] happened?
translation: Tyrion: 怎么……[p/]回事？

original: How long were you knocked out?
translation: 你昏迷了多久？

original: As you look around you see several other people with you.
translation: 你发现身边还有几个人。

original: Commander White is leading a group of knights.[p/] They all have their weapons drawn and pointed at someone.
translation: 怀特指挥官带领着一队骑士。[p/]他们都把自己的武器指向某人。

original: It's...[p/][s/] Prosecutor Steelwind?!
translation: 是……[p/][s/]斯蒂尔文德检察官？！

original: Aster: Commander.[p/] I understand your position.[p/] But there [i]has[/i] to be another explanation.
translation: Aster: 指挥官。[p/]我理解你的处境。[p/]但<u>一定</u>还有其他解释。

original: Orym: Look, Your Majesty.[p/][s/] I get where you're coming from.
translation: Orym: 听好，国王陛下。[p/][s/]我理解你的理由。

original: Orym: But from what the witnesses have told us,[p/] it [i]has[/i] to be a case of Mageblight.
translation: Orym: 但根据目击证言，[p/]这次案件<u>一定</u>是法师之疫导致。

original: You look around the room and see a pool of blood at the end of one of the tables.
translation: 你环顾四周，看见有张桌子旁有一滩血迹。

original: Tyrion: Celeste...?[p/] Where's Pierce?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……？[p/]皮尔斯在哪儿？

original: Celeste: Tyrion...
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……

original: Orym: I don't know how to tell you this, kid,[p/] but...
translation: Orym: 小子，我不知道怎么跟你讲，[p/]但是……

original: Orym: Garrick Pierce is dead.
translation: Orym: 加里克·皮尔斯死了。

original: Tyrion: What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: Orym: We're honestly surprised that [i]you're[/i] okay.
translation: Orym: 说实话，<u>你</u>没事让我们很惊讶。

original: Tyrion: ...But who-?
translation: Tyrion: ……但谁——？

original: You look at the knights who all have their weapons pointed at the prosecutor.
translation: 你看向将武器指向检察官的骑士们。

original: Tyrion: Wait a minute...
translation: Tyrion: 等下……

original: Tyrion: You think [i]Steelwind[/i] did this?!
translation: Tyrion: 你们觉得是<u>斯蒂尔文德</u>干的？！

original: Aster: It wasn't just Lord Pierce, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aster: 卡斯伯特先生，死的不只是皮尔斯勋爵。

original: Aster: We also found the bodies of Lord von Sanctus and Lady Sibyl.
translation: Aster: 我们还发现了冯·桑克图斯勋爵和希比尔小姐的尸体。

original: Aster: Not to mention a bunch of the Kingsguard have gone comatose.
translation: Aster: 更别提还有一群国王卫队的成员陷入昏迷。

original: Tyrion: ...Comatose?
translation: Tyrion: ……昏迷？

original: Orym: I don't want to believe it,[p/] but...
translation: Orym: 我也不愿相信，[p/]但是……

original: Orym: Several people saw Steelwind acting off at the scenes of [i]each[/i] of the murders.
translation: Orym: <u>每件</u>谋杀案现场都有人目睹斯蒂尔文德的身影。

original: Aster: We also found her unconscious here.
translation: Aster: 我们也是在这里发现了失去意识的她。

original: Aster: ...And Pierce's body was lying next to her.
translation: Aster: ……皮尔斯的尸体就躺在她旁边。

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No![p/][s/] It wasn't her!
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不！[p/][s/]不是她干的！

original: Tyrion: I [i]saw[/i] Beatrice before I passed out![p/][s/] [i]She[/i] was the one that knocked us out!
translation: Tyrion: 我昏过去之前<u>看见了</u>比亚特丽丝！[p/][s/]<u>她</u>才是让我们昏迷的人！

original: Aster: Beatrice...?!
translation: Aster: 比亚特丽丝……？！

original: Orym: ...What the [i]hell[/i] is going on?
translation: Orym: ……<u>见了鬼了</u>这怎么回事？

original: Aria: Commander White,[p/][s/] you need to put me in a holding cell!
translation: Aria: 怀特指挥官，[p/][s/]你得把我关进牢房！

original: Aria: It needs to be one with an [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b]!
translation: Aria: 必须是有[b]抗魔力场[/b]的牢房！

original: Orym: What?!
translation: Orym: 什么？！

original: Aria: I'm a danger to everyone here.[p/] We need to go [i]now[/i]!
translation: Aria: 我对这里的所有人都有威胁。[p/]我们<u>现在</u>就得出发！

original: Tyrion: ...What are you talking about?
translation: Tyrion: ……你在说什么？

original: Aria: [i]Now[/i] is not the time![p/][s/] Do it, commander!
translation: Aria: <u>现在</u>不是时候！[p/][s/]指挥官，动手！

original: Orym: R-[p/][s/]Right.
translation: Orym: 明、[p/][s/]明白。

original: You watch as the Inquisition arrest Steelwind and escort her out of the room.
translation: 你看着裁判所逮捕斯蒂尔文德，将她护送出房间。

original: Tyrion: Damn it...[p/] What [i]happened[/i]?
translation: Tyrion: 该死……[p/]<u>发生了</u>什么？

original: Aster: I know you have many questions, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] But we should make sure that you're okay.
translation: Aster: 卡斯伯特先生，我知道你有很多问题想问。[p/]但我们应该先确认你平安无事。

original: Celeste: Yeah.[p/] There's a necromancer in the Nave.
translation: Celeste: 是的。[p/]中殿那边有个死灵法师。

original: They have a point...[p/] You have no idea what happened while you were asleep.
translation: 他们说得也有道理……[p/]你完全不知道自己昏迷时发生了什么。

original: You follow their suggestion...[p/] But not before making a note of the current time.
translation: 你听从了他们的建议……[p/]但还是先记录了此刻的时间。

original: :It's 3:12 PM.
Lazarick: ...
translation: Lazarick: ……

original: Lazarick: Nothing seems to be out of the ordinary.[p/] Except-...
translation: Lazarick: 看起来没有异常。[p/]除了——

original: Celeste: What?![p/][s/] What's wrong with him?!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！[p/][s/]他怎么了吗？！

original: Lazarick: *sigh*[p/] If you would just let me [i]finish[/i]...
translation: Lazarick: *叹气* [p/]你等我<u>说完</u>……

original: Lazarick: ...there appears to be a trace of [b]necromancy[/b] on you, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Lazarick: ……你身上留有某种[b]死灵术[/b]的痕迹，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: [b]Necromancy[/b]...?
translation: Tyrion: [b]死灵术[/b]……？

original: Lazarick: It's probably nothing.[p/] Did your assistant cast any spells on you?
translation: Lazarick: 应该没什么大不了的。[p/]你的助手有向你施过什么法术吗？

original: Celeste: O-[p/][s/]Oh, right.[p/][s/] I used healing magic on him when I found him unconscious.
translation: Celeste: 哦、[p/][s/]哦，确实有。[p/][s/]在发现他失去意识后，我施放了治疗魔法。

original: Lazarick: Ah,[p/] I expected as much.[p/] But it never hurts to make sure.
translation: Lazarick: 啊，[p/]我就猜是这样。[p/]但多确认一下总不会是坏事。

original: Lazarick: Anyways,[p/] nothing seems out of the ordinary.[p/] You're quite healthy.
translation: Lazarick: 不管怎样，[p/]看起来没有异常。[p/]你很健康。

original: Lazarick: You should be fine to go about your business,[p/] but please speak with me again if you experience anything out of the ordinary.
translation: Lazarick: 你应该可以继续工作了，[p/]不过如果感觉异常请再跟我说。

original: Tyrion: T-[p/][s/]Thank you...![p/] Um-
translation: Tyrion: 谢、[p/][s/]谢谢……！[p/]呃……

original: Lazarick: I am Lord Lazarick Asclepius,[p/] of House Asclepius.
translation: Lazarick: 我是拉扎瑞克·阿斯克勒庇俄斯勋爵，[p/]来自阿斯克勒庇俄斯家族。

original: Lazarick: And there are no thanks needed.[p/] My apprentice apparently owes you a lot.
translation: Lazarick: 不需要感谢。[p/]我徒弟欠你不少。

original: Tyrion: "Apprentice"...?
translation: Tyrion: “徒弟”……？

original: Lazarick: Wallace Nightgrave.[p/] I believe he was one of your clients a few months ago.
translation: Lazarick: 华莱士·奈特格雷夫。[p/]我记得在几个月前，他曾是你的委托人。

original: Tyrion: Oh, right.[p/] Steelwind [i]did[/i] mention that she introduced you two.
translation: Tyrion: 哦，对。[p/]斯蒂尔文德<u>之前</u>说过她有介绍你们两个认识。

original: Tyrion: Speaking of Steelwind...
translation: Tyrion: 说到斯蒂尔文德……

original: Tyrion: I really find it hard to believe that she did this.
translation: Tyrion: 我还是不相信会是她做的这些事。

original: Lazarick: Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] Mageblight isn't exactly a [i]benign[/i] condition.
translation: Lazarick: 卡斯伯特先生。[p/]法师之疫并不是什么<u>温和的</u>疾病。

original: Lazarick: When it takes hold of a mage,[p/] it doesn't matter [i]what[/i] kind of person they are.
translation: Lazarick: 一旦感染，[p/]法师原来是<u>什么</u>样的人都没有影响了。

original: Lazarick: Violent behavior is almost always a result of the delirium it puts them in.
translation: Lazarick: 法师之疫导致精神错乱的后果通常都包含暴力行为。

original: Lazarick: It's unfortunate.[p/] But mages have to be held responsible when cases like this happen.
translation: Lazarick: 很不幸。[p/]法师们必须为这种情况负责。

original: Tyrion: ...[i]Unless[/i] someone is framing her.
translation: Tyrion: ……<u>除非</u>是有人在陷害她。

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion...[p/] I...
translation: Celeste: 提、[p/][s/]提利昂……[p/]我……

original: Celeste: I fought her...
translation: Celeste: 我和她搏斗过……

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: Do you remember back when we heard that weird sound?[p/] I went outside to see what was going on.
translation: Celeste: 你还记得我们听到奇怪声音的时候吗？[p/]我当时出去调查了。

original: Celeste: I saw her outside.[p/] And the guards there were all unconscious.
translation: Celeste: 我在外面看到她了。[p/]那里的国王卫队全都不省人事。

original: Celeste: I tried to ask her what was going on.[p/] But she didn't say anything.[p/] She just attacked me.
translation: Celeste: 我试图问她发生了什么。[p/]但她一句话也不说就向我袭来。

original: Lazarick: Hm...[p/] What was her emotional state like?
translation: Lazarick: 嗯……[p/]她当时的情绪状态如何？

original: Celeste: O-[p/][s/]Oh...
translation: Celeste: 哦、[p/][s/]哦……

original: Celeste: W-[p/][s/]Well,[p/] she was pretty cold and emotionless.
translation: Celeste: 那、[p/][s/]那个，[p/]她当时非常冷漠，毫无感情。

original: Celeste: It almost looked like she was sleepwalking.
translation: Celeste: 就像是在梦游一样。

original: Lazarick: That's...[p/] [i]actually[/i] pretty strange.
translation: Lazarick: 这……[p/]<u>确实</u>很奇怪。

original: Tyrion: What do you mean?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么这么说？

original: Lazarick: When someone is affected by Mageblight,[p/] they enter a state of extreme psychosis.
translation: Lazarick: 如果感染了法师之疫，[p/]患者会进入一种极度精神错乱的状态。

original: Lazarick: Psychotic episodes like that raise the affected mage's paranoia to ridiculous levels.
translation: Lazarick: 这种精神错乱会让法师出现严重程度的被害妄想。

original: Lazarick: [i]That's[/i] why these cases almost always end up in violence.
translation: Lazarick: <u>这就是</u>为什么那些案例往往以暴力收场。

original: Lazarick: If she was affected by Mageblight,[p/] she shouldn't have looked anywhere [i]near[/i] as calm as you're describing.
translation: Lazarick: 如果她真是被法师之疫影响，[p/]就不该有任何你提到的<u>接近</u>镇静的表现。

original: Celeste: Hm...
translation: Celeste: 唔……

original: Lazarick: You...[p/] might be onto something, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Lazarick: 你……[p/]可能说的有道理，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: If what you're saying is true,[p/] there [i]has[/i] to be more to this.
translation: Tyrion: 如果真像你说的那样，[p/]这件事<u>肯定</u>另有隐情。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...You're planning to defend her, aren't you?
translation: Celeste: ……你打算为她辩护，对吧？

original: Tyrion: At the very least,[p/] we need to find out what actually happened...
translation: Tyrion: 至少，[p/]我们需要搞清楚到底发生了什么……

original: Tyrion: I feel like there's more to this than we're seeing.
translation: Tyrion: 我感觉事情远比我们看到的复杂。

original: Celeste: ...But you saw her, right?
translation: Celeste: ……但你也看到她了，不是吗？

original: Aria: Commander White,[p/][s/] you need to put me in a holding cell!
translation: Aria: 怀特指挥官，[p/][s/]你得把我关进牢房！

original: Aria: It needs to be one with an [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b]!
translation: Aria: 必须是有[b]抗魔力场[/b]的牢房！

original: Orym: What?!
translation: Orym: 什么？！

original: Aria: I'm a danger to everyone here.[p/] We need to go [i]now[/i]!
translation: Aria: 我对这里的所有人都有威胁。[p/]我们<u>现在</u>就得出发！

original: Celeste: She [i]wanted[/i] them to arrest her.
translation: Celeste: 她<u>想要</u>被逮捕。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] It's as if she thought she was a danger to others...
translation: Tyrion: 没错……[p/]就像是她已经认定自己会对别人造成威胁……

original: Tyrion: Regardless of what really happened,[p/] [i]she[/i] clearly believes that she was responsible for this.
translation: Tyrion: 不管到底发生了什么，[p/]<u>她</u>显然认定了自己应该对此负责。

original: But there's no way that she'd do something like this.
translation: 但她不可能做出这种事。

original: Something else is happening here.[p/] And you [i]will[/i] get to the bottom of this.
translation: 一定还有隐情。[p/]而你<u>会</u>找到真相。

original: You're not sure where each of the murders occurred.[p/] But the Inquisition should be able to tell you more about that.
translation: 你不确定每一起案件的发生地点。[p/]但裁判所应该能告诉你相关情报。

original: You'll also need to speak with Steelwind.
translation: 你也需要跟斯蒂尔文德谈谈。

original: If she really [i]was[/i] affected by Mageblight,[p/] she should be able to remember what may have caused it.
translation: 如果她确实<u>是</u>被法师之疫影响，[p/]她应该能记起相关原因。

original: But anyways,[p/] the Prayer Room is the room you're most familiar with.
translation: 但无论如何，[p/]祷告室是你最熟悉的地方。

original: You'll probably want to start there.
translation: 你最好从那里开始调查。

original: Tyrion: I can see several commoner houses from here.
translation: Tyrion: 我能从这里看到几所平民的房子。

original: Tyrion: If I squint really hard,[p/] I can probably see my house from here.
translation: Tyrion: 如果眯着眼努力看，[p/]应该也能从这里看到我自己的家。

original: Tyrion: It's the city courthouse.
translation: Tyrion: 市法院。

original: Tyrion: Every trial I've been a part of has been held in this building.
translation: Tyrion: 我参加过的每次庭审都在这里举行。

original: Tyrion: ...Excluding the current trial, obviously.
translation: Tyrion: ……当然是除了这次庭审。

original: Tyrion: It's one of the many offices of Von Sanctus Industries.
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯工业的办公楼之一。

original: Tyrion: ...With the death of Lloyd,[p/] I'm sure his business will be thrown into chaos for a while.
translation: Tyrion: ……洛伊德死后，[p/]他的商业帝国应该也会陷入混乱一阵。

original: Tyrion: It's a shop selling various wares.
translation: Tyrion: 售卖各种杂货的店铺。

original: Tyrion: The items they sell are more suited for adventurers.
translation: Tyrion: 这里的商品更适合冒险者购买。

original: Tyrion: So I've never really gone there myself.
translation: Tyrion: 所以我自己没怎么去过。

original: Tyrion: There's a great view of the city from this ledge.
translation: Tyrion: 从这里能一赏城市美景。

original: Tyrion: I frequently go there whenever I need to think something over.
translation: Tyrion: 我需要思考什么事的时候经常会来这里。

original: Tyrion: This nagging feeling won't go away.[p/] It's really annoying.
translation: Tyrion: 这种如芒在背的感觉一直挥之不去，[p/]很烦人。

original: Tyrion: It's like when you know a word to describe something but can't remember what it actually is.
translation: Tyrion: 就像是你知道可以用来描述什么东西的某个词，但就是记不起来具体说法。

original: Celeste: ...Don't push yourself too hard, okay?
translation: Celeste: ……别逼自己太紧，好吗？

original: Celeste: If you feel tired,[p/] don't be embarrassed to take a break.
translation: Celeste: 如果感觉疲劳，[p/]不要耻于暂时休息。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I'll try not to exert myself too much.
translation: Tyrion: 好……[p/]我会努力不要太压榨自己。

original: Tyrion: Where do you think we should go next?
translation: Tyrion: 你觉得我们之后该去哪儿？

original: Celeste: I'm not sure...
translation: Celeste: 我不确定……

original: Tyrion: ...Is everything okay?
translation: Tyrion: ……你还好吗？

original: Celeste: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...[p/] I guess I'm just a little overwhelmed by everything that's happened.
translation: Celeste: 好、[p/][s/]好啊……[p/]可能只是发生的事情太多，让我有点无措。

original: Using the Kingsguard's teleportation network,[p/] you arrive back in Ratholme.
translation: 你利用国王卫队的传送通路回到了瑞思霍姆。

original: Due to Celeste's insistence,[p/] you're being escorted by a division of the Kingsguard.
translation: 由于塞莱斯特坚持，[p/]一整队国王卫队正护送你们。

original: They definitely make you look out of place.
translation: 导致你们显得格格不入。

original: As you walk through the city,[p/] you draw strange looks from nearly everyone who sees you.
translation: 穿过市区时，[p/]周围的人都用奇怪的眼光看着你们。

original: Knight: Sir...[p/] Where will we be heading first?
translation: Knight: 先生……[p/]我们要先去哪里？

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...[p/] Uh...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……[p/]呃……

original: It's a little strange giving orders to knights.
translation: 对骑士们下令有点怪。

original: It's definitely going to take some getting used to.
translation: 是一种需要时间习惯的感觉。

original: Tyrion: Hm...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……

original: Celeste: What's wrong?
translation: Celeste: 怎么了？

original: Tyrion: There's definitely something I'm fundamentally missing...[p/] But what?
translation: Tyrion: 我一定是错过了什么根本性的东西……[p/]但究竟是什么？

original: Celeste: ...Just don't push yourself too hard, okay?
translation: Celeste: ……别逼自己太紧，好吗？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I'll try to pace myself.
translation: Tyrion: 好……[p/]我会努力放缓步调。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] we should speak with each of the suspects and confirm their alibis.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我们应该开始与嫌疑人逐个交谈，确认他们的不在场证明。

original: Tyrion: That might help me finally put things together.
translation: Tyrion: 也许这能帮助我推理。

original: Knight: Each of the nobles has returned to their respective homes.
translation: Knight: 贵族们都已经返回各自住处。

original: Knight: But our teleportation network should help you travel around Wyverngarde.
translation: Knight: 但我们的传送通路可以帮你们在维文加德境内移动。

original: Tyrion: It's starting to get dark outside.
translation: Tyrion: 外面天已经开始黑了。

original: Tyrion: We don't have much time left...
translation: Tyrion: 留给我们的时间不多了……

original: It's Ruby's desk.[p/] It's made out of pure mahogany.
translation: 鲁比的桌子，[p/]纯桃花心木制成。

original: As much as you hate to admit it,[p/] the Eyetaker clearly pays her really well.
translation: 虽然不愿承认，[p/]但夺眼者支付的薪资不低。

original: ...But there's obviously a cost to that.
translation: ……虽然挣这些钱也有代价。

original: Tyrion: ...I always wondered how you could afford these things...
translation: Tyrion: ……我一直在想你怎么能花得起这个钱……

original: Tyrion: I guess I finally know now.
translation: Tyrion: ……现在我终于明白了。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: It's a chair for guests.
translation: 一张给客人用的椅子。

original: You used to sit here for hours while Ruby would do the paperwork for her clients.
translation: 你以前会连续几小时坐在这里，等鲁比完成委托人的文书工作。

original: You used to sit here for hours while Tymora would do the paperwork for her clients.
translation: 你以前会连续几小时坐在这里，等泰摩拉完成委托人的文书工作。

original: It's a bookshelf.[p/] There are several books about law and national history.
translation: 一个书架。[p/]上面摆着关于法律与国家历史的书籍。

original: You read a lot of these books front to back while studying to be an attorney.
translation: 为了考取律师资格，很多书你之前都从头到尾读过一遍。

original: It's a seat for Ruby's clients.
translation: 给鲁比的委托人用的座位。

original: It's a seat for Tymora's clients.
translation: 给泰摩拉的委托人用的座位。

original: It looks extremely comfortable.[p/] But she never let you sit in them when you were a child.
translation: 看起来非常舒适。[p/]但由于她不允许，你小时候从没坐在上面过。

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of a...[p/] noblewoman?
translation: Tyrion: 这幅画上的是……[p/]贵族女性？

original: Ruby: Not quite.[p/] That's Eliza Tantivy.
translation: Ruby: 不全对。[p/]这是 Eliza Tantivy。

original: Ruby: She was a commonfolk professor at the Imperial Academy.
translation: Ruby: 她是平民出身的帝国学院教授。

original: Ruby: And this portrait was commissioned by one of her noble patrons.
translation: Ruby: 这幅画像是她的贵族赞助人之一委托绘制。

original: Ruby: It really just shows off their wealth, though.
translation: Ruby: 不过确实只是在展示他们的财力。

original: Ruby: It doesn't celebrate anything noteworthy.
translation: Ruby: 没有什么其他值得一提的纪念意义。

original: Tyrion: ...Why do you have this then?
translation: Tyrion: ……那你干嘛还留着这幅画？

original: Ruby: ...I like her.[p/] And she's a good reminder that the commonfolk are just as competent as the nobility.
translation: Ruby: ……我很喜欢她。[p/]她也能证明平民和贵族的竞争力基本没有差距。

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of some sort of pirate.
translation: Tyrion: 一幅关于某个海盗的画像。

original: Ruby: He was a pirate that was famous for ruthlessly destroying the ships of anyone who stood in his way.
translation: Ruby: 他是个以无情摧毁任何拦路船只而出名的海盗。

original: Ruby: During the Great Luminite war,[p/] the Wyverngarde Crown hired him as a privateer to protect Aurinax from the Theocracy's navy.
translation: Ruby: 大圣战期间，[p/]维文加德皇室雇佣他为私兵，从神权的海军手中保护欧奥耐克斯。

original: Tyrion: He sailed near my hometown?
translation: Tyrion: 他在我家乡附近航行？

original: Ruby: During the Great War,[p/] Aurinax was a vital foothold for Wyverngarde's navy.
translation: Ruby: 大圣战期间，[p/]欧奥耐克斯是维文加德海军的重要据点。

original: Ruby: Unfortunately,[p/] he was captured by the Theocracy and executed for his crimes.
translation: Ruby: 不幸的是，[p/]他被神权抓获，因罪被处死。

original: Ruby: But I hear he gave them the runaround for eight years before he was captured.
translation: Ruby: 但我听说在被捕获之前，他与神权斗智斗勇足足八年。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: ...Is Celeste okay?
translation: Ruby: ……塞莱斯特还好吗？

original: Ruby: She seems a bit on edge right now.
translation: Ruby: 她现在看起来有点紧张。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I think she's just been overprotective lately.
translation: Tyrion: 是……[p/]她只是最近有点过度保护我了。

original: Tyrion: I don't really blame her...[p/] I [i]did[/i] almost die a few times in the last few days.
translation: Tyrion: 我也不怪她……[p/]我最近<u>确实</u>好几次都差点死了。

original: Ruby: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Ruby: 什、什么？！

original: Tyrion: ...It's a long story.
translation: Tyrion: ……说来话长。

original: Tyrion: And I don't think I'm even allowed to talk about it.[p/] Especially not with you.
translation: Tyrion: 我也不觉得自己可以谈论这些。[p/]尤其不能和你谈。

original: That last part came out with a little more disdain than you intended.
translation: 后半部分的语气比你想得更轻蔑一些。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You take a deep breath.
translation: 你深吸一口气。

original: Tyrion: ...I received your letters.
translation: Tyrion: ……我收到了你的信。

original: Ruby: O-[p/][s/]Oh...[p/] Did you-?
translation: Ruby: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……[p/]那你——？

original: Tyrion: ...I haven't gotten the chance to read them yet.
translation: Tyrion: ……我还没读过那些信。

original: Ruby: Of course...[p/] Whenever you're not busy.
translation: Ruby: 当然……[p/]等你有空的时候再说。

original: This is...[p/] [i]really[/i] awkward.
translation: 这……[p/]<u>真的</u>很尴尬。

original: But you were going to have this conversation sooner or later.
translation: 但你们迟早要好好谈谈。

original: Perhaps it would be best to just be direct.
translation: 也许直言不讳才是最好的选择。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora...
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士……

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] trusted you.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]信任过你。

original: Ruby: ...!
translation: Ruby: ……！

original: Ruby: ...I know.
translation: Ruby: ……我知道。

original: Tyrion: I trusted you.
translation: Tyrion: 我信任过你。

original: Tyrion: I told you [i]everything[/i] about myself.
translation: Tyrion: 我把<u>所有</u>关于自己的事情都告诉了你。

original: Tyrion: I put all of my hopes into you.
translation: Tyrion: 我将所有希望寄托于你。

original: Tyrion: And you...[p/] [i]lied[/i] to me.
translation: Tyrion: 可你……[p/]对我<u>撒了谎</u>。

original: Tyrion: You told a [i]criminal[/i] about the Eye of Horus.
translation: Tyrion: 你把荷鲁斯之眼的事告诉了一个<u>罪犯</u>。

original: Tyrion: It took me years before I was comfortable enough to tell [i]you[/i] about it.[p/] And you [i]knew[/i] that.
translation: Tyrion: 我做了好几年心理准备，才敢告诉<u>你</u>这件事。[p/]你也<u>清楚</u>这一点。

original: Ruby: I...
translation: Ruby: 我……

original: Tyrion: ...Why did you even adopt me?
translation: Tyrion: ……你一开始为什么领养我？

original: Tyrion: You could have just left me in Aurinax and moved on with your life.
translation: Tyrion: 你本可以把我留在欧奥耐克斯，然后继续自己的人生。

original: Tyrion: Why would you pull me into this?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么要把我卷入这些事？

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: It sounds like she's trying to look for an answer.[p/] But nothing comes to her.
translation: 她似乎是在试图回答，[p/]但没有想出任何答案。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: I've started thinking about what my life could have been like.
translation: Tyrion: 我开始思考自己的人生原本会如何发展。

original: Tyrion: I could have done so many things.[p/] I might have been able to move on from losing my mother.
translation: Tyrion: 我有那么多事可以做。[p/]也许还能走出失去母亲的阴影。

original: Tyrion: But you adopted me...[p/] You made my entire life focused around that [i]one[/i] moment.
translation: Tyrion: 但你领养了我……[p/]你让我的整个人生都聚焦于<u>那一瞬</u>。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: I had a son once...[p/] [i]Before[/i] you,[p/] I mean.
translation: Ruby: 我曾经有个儿子……[p/]我是说，[p/]在你<u>之前</u>。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Ruby: I wasn't [i]always[/i] a city-person.[p/]
translation: Ruby: 我并非<u>一直</u>住在城里。[p/]

original: Ruby: I used to live in an old farm town,[p/] just like McCoy's.
translation: Ruby: 我曾经住在农家里，[p/]就像麦考伊家一样。

original: Ruby: My son and I used to run an old tea shop,[p/] just the two of us.
translation: Ruby: 我和儿子经营着一家老茶叶店，[p/]员工只有我们两个。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/][s/] [i]You[/i] ran a tea shop?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/][s/]<u>你</u>卖过茶？

original: Ruby: I know...[p/] It's ridiculous now that I think about it.
translation: Ruby: 我知道……[p/]现在回想起来挺荒唐的。

original: Ruby: But I was really happy back then.
translation: Ruby: 但那时我真的很开心。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Tyrion: What...[p/] happened?
translation: Tyrion: 出了……[p/]什么事？

original: Ruby: One night,[p/] a local nobleman had too much to drink at the local tavern.
translation: Ruby: 有天晚上，[p/]当地有个贵族在酒馆喝多了。

original: Ruby: He barged into our shop and started destroying it with his magic.
translation: Ruby: 他闯进我们的商店，开始用魔法肆意搞破坏。

original: Ruby: My son tried to stop him...[p/] But...
translation: Ruby: 我儿子试图阻止他……[p/]但是……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ruby: ...The Inquisition swept that entire case under the rug,[p/] [i]obviously[/i].
translation: Ruby: ……<u>显而易见</u>，[p/]裁判所把整个案件都掩盖了。

original: Ruby: They said that the nobleman felt "threatened" and acted in self-defense.
translation: Ruby: 他们说那个贵族感到“有威胁”，属于正当防卫。

original: She...[p/] never told you about this before.
translation: 她……[p/]以前从没告诉你这件事。

original: Tyrion: ...What was his name?
translation: Tyrion: ……他叫什么名字？

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: It was Ryan.
translation: Ruby: 他叫莱恩。

original: Tyrion: ...Oh.
translation: Tyrion: ……噢。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: What did you do after Ryan died?
translation: Tyrion: 莱恩死后你做了什么？

original: Ruby: I thought long and hard about what I wanted to do.
translation: Ruby: 我仔细思考了很久自己想做什么。

original: Ruby: I was hurt and blinded by rage.
translation: Ruby: 我很受伤，被愤怒冲昏了头脑。

original: Ruby: So I decided I would take justice into my own hands.
translation: Ruby: 于是我决定自己执行正义。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] You didn't-
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]你该不会——

original: Ruby: No...[p/] At the time,[p/] I thought that killing him would be too easy.
translation: Ruby: 不……[p/]那个时候，[p/]我觉得死亡太便宜他了。

original: Ruby: I broke into his manor,[p/] and found [i]every[/i] incriminating document I could find.
translation: Ruby: 我闯入他的庄园，[p/]找到了<u>每一份</u>会让他获罪的文件。

original: Ruby: I found everything,[p/] from records of illegitimate children,[p/] to plots he was making against other noble houses.
translation: Ruby: 从私生子女到针对其他贵族的阴谋，[p/]我挖出了他家里的一切文件。

original: Ruby: I released [i]everything[/i] to the public.[p/] It absolutely ruined him.
translation: Ruby: 然后我把<u>这一切</u>都公之于众。[p/]让他毁于一旦。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ruby: That's when I realized that there [i]was[/i] a way to make them pay.
translation: Ruby: 也就是这时，我意识到<u>确实有</u>一种方法能让他们付出代价。

original: Ruby: You didn't have to harm or kill anyone.
translation: Ruby: 这个方法不需要伤人或者杀人。

original: Ruby: You could just beat them at their own game.
translation: Ruby: 只需要以其人之道还治其人之身。

original: Ruby: You could use the rules and laws [i]they[/i] made against them.
translation: Ruby: 你可以用<u>他们</u>制订的法律法规反将一军。

original: Tyrion: ...Just like an attorney.
translation: Tyrion: ……就像律师一样。

original: Ruby: Yeah...[p/] Just like an attorney.
translation: Ruby: 对……[p/]就像律师一样。

original: Ruby: When I realized that,[p/] I moved to the city and started studying law.
translation: Ruby: 意识到这一点后，[p/]我搬到城里，开始学习法律。

original: Ruby: I read every book there was to read about Wyverngarde's laws.[p/] And I learned how to work the system.
translation: Ruby: 有关维文加德法律的书都被我翻了个遍。[p/]同时我也学会如何利用体系。

original: Ruby: I started representing clients who were clearly being framed by the nobility.
translation: Ruby: 我开始替明显是被贵族陷害的委托人们辩护。

original: Ruby: But I really didn't care about saving them.
translation: Ruby: 但我在乎的并不是拯救他们。

original: Ruby: I just wanted to see the look on each noble's face when I implicated them with "irrefutable" evidence.
translation: Ruby: 我只是想看到，[p/]当我用“不可辩驳”的证据让他们认罪伏法时，那些贵族脸上的表情。

original: Ruby: But it got more difficult.
translation: Ruby: 但难度越来越高。

original: Ruby: As I started punching higher,[p/] the nobles got smarter and more influential.
translation: Ruby: 越是身处上层的贵族，[p/]影响力越大，也越聪明。

original: Ruby: I continued to acquit my clients.[p/] But the trials got closer and closer each time.
translation: Ruby: 我依然能让委托人获得无罪判决。[p/]但审理每次都愈发惊险。

original: Ruby: But I was arrogant.[p/] And I felt invincible.
translation: Ruby: 但我很傲慢，[p/]感觉自己无人能敌。

original: Ruby: I thought that no matter what happened,[p/] justice would prevail.
translation: Ruby: 我以为不管发生什么，[p/]正义都会笑到最后。

original: Ruby: ...And then your mother's case happened.
translation: Ruby: ……紧接着就是你母亲的案子。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ruby: I've never met someone that remarkable before.
translation: Ruby: 我从没遇见过这么卓越的人。

original: Ruby: She had this way of making you feel happy...[p/] no matter what kind of mood you were in.
translation: Ruby: 不管你当时是什么心情……[p/]她都有办法让你开心起来。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I remember.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]我也记得。

original: Ruby: But I failed her.[p/] And I failed you.
translation: Ruby: 但我辜负了她。[p/]也辜负了你。

original: Tyrion: ...Ms. Tymora.[p/] I never [i]once[/i] blamed you for what happened.
translation: Tyrion: ……泰摩拉女士。[p/]我<u>从来没有</u>把发生的事怪在你身上。

original: Ruby: I know.[p/] But that doesn't change the fact that I [i]couldn't[/i] acquit her.
translation: Ruby: 我知道。[p/]但这改变不了我<u>没能</u>证明她无罪的事实。

original: Ruby: She was executed because I didn't do enough.
translation: Ruby: 她是因为我能力不够才被处决的。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ruby: When you asked me to train you to be an attorney,[p/] I was blinded by my desperation.
translation: Ruby: 你要我把你培养成律师时，[p/]我被自己的急迫迷了双眼。

original: Ruby: I felt so alone and helpless.
translation: Ruby: 我感到孤独无助。

original: Ruby: I wanted someone,[p/] [i]anyone[/i] to carry this burden with me.
translation: Ruby: 我想要什么人，[p/]<u>任何人</u>，[p/]来和我一起承受这重担。

original: Ruby: So how pathetic must [i]I[/i] have been?[p/] That I'd look for that in a grieving ten-year-old child.
translation: Ruby: <u>我</u>当时是有多可悲啊？[p/]居然要让一个正在承受丧母之痛的十岁孩童经受这些。

original: Tyrion: I...
translation: Tyrion: 我……

original: Ruby: When I looked at you,[p/] all I wanted to see was myself.
translation: Ruby: 看着你的时候，[p/]可能我只是想看见自己。

original: Ruby: I saw a hurt and broken person who wanted revenge on the nobility.
translation: Ruby: 我看到了一个伤痕累累，满心要对贵族复仇的人。

original: Ruby: But I was too self-centered to realize that you were [i]nothing[/i] like me.
translation: Ruby: 但我当时太过自我中心，没有意识到你和我<u>完全不同</u>。

original: Ruby: You [i]care[/i] about people.[p/] And you cared more about saving your clients than harming the nobility.
translation: Ruby: 你<u>关心</u>他人。[p/]比起伤害贵族，你更在乎拯救自己的委托人。

original: Ruby: I think I knew all along,[p/] but I just refused to see it.
translation: Ruby: 我觉得自己一直都明白，[p/]只是拒绝承认而已。

original: Ruby: ...Maybe you were right about me.
translation: Ruby: ……也许你对我的评价没有错。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Ruby: Maybe I was just using you to make myself feel better.
translation: Ruby: 也许我只是在利用你，让我自己好过一些。

original: Ruby: I took you from your home and forced you to dedicate your life to [i]my[/i] dream.
translation: Ruby: 我让你背井离乡，逼你用自己的人生来实现<u>我的</u>梦想。

original: Ruby: Maybe I never really cared.
translation: Ruby: 也许我真的从没在乎过。

original: Ruby: If I [i]did[/i] care about you,[p/] I would have never pulled you into a life like this.
translation: Ruby: 如果我<u>在乎过</u>你，[p/]就不会让你走这样的人生道路。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ruby: I'm sorry.[p/] And I can't begin to apologize for doing that to you.
translation: Ruby: 对不起。[p/]我知道道歉多少遍都没有用。

original: The Eye shows that her feelings are genuine.
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼证明她的感情真诚。

original: ...But does that even matter at this point?
translation: ……但事到如今还有什么意义？

original: Tyrion: I...
translation: Tyrion: 我……

original: Tyrion: I've been thinking long and hard about this...
translation: Tyrion: 我仔细思考了很久……

original: Tyrion: I [i]want[/i] to forgive you, Ms. Tymora.[p/] But I don't know if I can.
translation: Tyrion: 我<u>想要</u>原谅你，泰摩拉女士。[p/]但我不知道自己能否做到。

original: Ruby: ...I don't blame you.
translation: Ruby: ……我不会怪你。

original: Tyrion: ...But I want to try.
translation: Tyrion: ……但我想尝试。

original: Ruby: ...!
translation: Ruby: ……！

original: Ruby: I...
translation: Ruby: 我……

original: She looks away from you for a moment as she wipes a single tear.
translation: 她把视线偏开了一瞬，擦去一滴眼泪。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora...
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士……

original: Ruby: No...[p/] Don't call me that.
translation: Ruby: 不……[p/]不要这么叫我。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Ruby: If you can truly find it in your heart to forgive me,[p/] I want things to be different this time.
translation: Ruby: 如果你真的愿意原谅我，[p/]我希望这次能做出改变。

original: Ruby: I'm not your superior nor your mentor anymore.
translation: Ruby: 我不再是你的上级或导师。

original: Ruby: We're equals now.
translation: Ruby: 我们平起平坐。

original: Ruby: So call me by my first name.
translation: Ruby: 用名字称呼我就好。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh, okay.[p/] Um...[p/] Ruby.
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢，好的。[p/]呃……[p/]鲁比。

original: Saying it feels really strange after all these years...
translation: 这么多年后这么叫感觉怪怪的……

original: ...But you hope you can get used to it.
translation: ……但你希望自己能习惯这种感觉。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/][s/]Right...[p/] I almost forgot the entire reason why I came here...
translation: Tyrion: 对、[p/][s/]对了……[p/]我差点儿忘了自己来这儿的理由……

original: Ruby: What is it?
translation: Ruby: 什么理由？

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] didn't [i]just[/i] come here to reconcile.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]<u>不只是</u>来修复关系的。

original: Tyrion: I actually need your help with something.
translation: Tyrion: 其实我有点事需要你帮忙。

original: Ruby: ...Okay?
translation: Ruby: ……好的？

original: Tyrion: I need you to help me speak to the Eyetaker.
translation: Tyrion: 我需要你帮我联系上夺眼者。

original: Ruby: Tyrion...
translation: Ruby: 提利昂……

original: Tyrion: I know...[p/] Considering the circumstances,[p/] it would probably strain your partnership with him even more.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道……[p/]考虑到现况，[p/]这么做大概会让你和他的合伙关系更紧张。

original: Ruby: Tyrion.
translation: Ruby: 提利昂。

original: Tyrion: But if you just tell me where he is,[p/] I'll do my best to make sure it doesn't get traced back to you.
translation: Tyrion: 但你只需要告诉我他身在何处，[p/]我会尽可能确保你不会被查出来。

original: Ruby: Tyrion.[p/] The Eyetaker is dead.
translation: Ruby: 提利昂。[p/]夺眼者死了。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Ruby: He died right after you convicted Beatrice.
translation: Ruby: 你让比亚特丽丝被判有罪之后他就死了。

original: Ruby: He was lynched by a mob of civilians.
translation: Ruby: 他被一群暴民用了私刑。

original: Tyrion: What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: Ruby: Everyone's saying that it was some sort of retaliation from House Frega.
translation: Ruby: 大家都说这是弗雷加家的报复手段。

original: Ruby: Didn't you notice that he didn't send anyone after you?
translation: Ruby: 没发现他没派人来追杀你吗？

original: Tyrion: But Eris said-!
translation: Tyrion: 但是厄莉斯说——！

original: This isn't really the time to PRESENT things to her.
translation: 现在不是 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 证物的时候。

original: And you can't really tell her about the case anyways.
translation: 反正你也不能告诉她案件详情。

original: You arrive at the office of Tymora's law firm.
translation: 你抵达了泰摩拉法律事务所的办公室。

original: According to Aria,[p/] Tymora is still practicing.
translation: 据阿莉亚所言，[p/]泰摩拉仍在从业。

original: So it looks like she hasn't gone into hiding like the Eyetaker apparently did.
translation: 看来她没有像夺眼者一样藏起来。

original: And if anyone knows where he currently is,[p/] she will.
translation: 她也是最有可能知道夺眼者身在何处的人。

original: You bring your hand up to knock on the door,[p/] but you stop for a moment.
translation: 你抬起手准备敲门，[p/]但停顿了一瞬。

original: Knight: ...Sir?
translation: Knight: ……先生？

original: After everything that's happened,[p/] you still don't feel ready to face her.
translation: 虽然发生了这么多，[p/]你还是没准备好和她再会。

original: For the past month,[p/] all those things you said to her keep replaying in your mind.
translation: 过去一个月里，[p/]你一直在反复回想自己对她说过的那些话。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: You feel the familiar warmth of Celeste's hand again.
translation: 你感到塞莱斯特手上熟悉的温暖。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You take a deep breath and steel your resolve.
translation: 你深吸一口气，下定决心。

original: You knock on the door.
translation: 你敲响了门。

original: Every moment of silence thereafter fills you with anxiety and dread.
translation: 之后的每秒寂静都在增添你的不安与焦虑。

original: Ruby: *sigh*[p/] I'm sorry for the inconvenience.
translation: Ruby: *叹气* [p/]我对带来不便深感抱歉。

original: Ruby: But I'm not currently accepting clients at-
translation: Ruby: 但我现在暂时不接受委托——

original: Ruby: ...!
translation: Ruby: ……！

original: Ruby: C-[p/][s/]Cuthbert...?
translation: Ruby: 卡、[p/][s/]卡斯伯特……？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: She looks completely frozen for a while.
translation: 她僵住了一小会儿。

original: But her gaze narrows as she notices the legion of knights escorting you.
translation: 看到身后护送你的骑士，她眯起了眼睛。

original: Ruby: Are you...[p/] here to arrest me?
translation: Ruby: 你是来……[p/]逮捕我的？

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No...![p/][s/] Of course, not![p/][s/] I-
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不是……！[p/][s/]当然不是！[p/][s/]我——

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Ugh...[p/] Can we come in?
translation: Tyrion: 呃……[p/]我们能进去说吗？

original: Ruby: Y-[p/][s/]Yes...[p/] Of course.
translation: Ruby: 好、[p/][s/]好的……[p/]没问题。

original: You take a seat inside the office,[p/] but you can't really think of anything to say.
translation: 你在办公室里找了张椅子坐下，[p/]但想不出要说什么。

original: ...And the knights aren't really helping to alleviate the tension.
translation: ……在场的骑士也导致气氛一直很紧张。

original: Tyrion: ...Hey, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: ……嘿，塞莱斯特。

original: Tyrion: Could you take the knights outside and do a perimeter of the building?
translation: Tyrion: 你能带骑士去外面，绕着这栋大楼待命吗？

original: Celeste: What?[p/] But-
translation: Celeste: 什么？[p/]但是——

original: Celeste: ...Are you sure?
translation: Celeste: ……你确定吗？

original: Tyrion: I am.
translation: Tyrion: 我确定。

original: Celeste: B-[p/][s/]But what if something happens?
translation: Celeste: 但、[p/][s/]但万一发生什么事呢？

original: Tyrion: Celeste...[p/] We're in a populated building in the capital city of Wyverngarde.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……[p/]我们身处维文加德首都满是人的大楼里。

original: Tyrion: I think I'll be fine.
translation: Tyrion: 我会没事的。

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] But...
translation: Celeste: 不、[p/]不是……[p/]但是……

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Celeste: S-[p/][s/]Sorry...[p/] You're right...
translation: Celeste: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉……[p/]你说得对……

original: Celeste: I'll just-...
translation: Celeste: 那我就——

original: With a motion of her hand,[p/] the knights follow her out of the office.
translation: 她摆了摆手，骑士们都跟着她出了办公室。

original: Right before she leaves she waits at the door and looks at you for a while.
translation: 离开之前，她停在门口看了你一会儿。

original: ...But after a while,[p/] she realizes how long she's been staring and quickly closes the door.
translation: ……但这之后，[p/]她意识到自己已经盯了你很久，迅速关上了门。

original: ...Now then.[p/] Let's get this over with.
translation: ……那么，[p/]是时候了。

original: Wait a minute...
translation: 等一下……

original: Tyrion: By the way,[p/] is your father still-?
translation: Tyrion: 另外，[p/]你的爸爸还是——？

original: Eris: Oh,[p/] if you're worried about him,[p/] we've already had a conversation about you.
translation: Eris: 噢，[p/]如果你担心的是他，[p/]我们之前已经谈过你的事了。

original: Eris: I don't think he'll be accosting you any time soon.
translation: Eris: 他不会再来骚扰你了。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...[p/] Thank you.
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……[p/]谢谢你。

original: Tyrion: Then why would Eris say that...?
translation: Tyrion: 那厄莉斯为什么会说这种话……？

original: Ruby: ...Eris?[p/] Who's Eris?
translation: Ruby: ……厄莉斯？[p/]厄莉斯是谁？

original: Tyrion: What?[p/] You've [i]met[/i] her before.
translation: Tyrion: 啊？[p/]你以前<u>见过</u>她。

original: Tyrion: She has long black hair and she wears a black dress.
translation: Tyrion: 她有一头黑色长发，穿黑裙子。

original: Tyrion: ...I suppose she really likes black.
translation: Tyrion: ……看起来就是一身黑。

original: Tyrion: B-[p/][s/]But anyways,[p/] she's the Eyetaker's daughter.
translation: Tyrion: 但、[p/][s/]但总之，[p/]她是夺眼者的女儿。

original: Ruby: Tyrion...[p/] The Eyetaker's daughter has [i]red[/i] hair.
translation: Ruby: 提利昂……[p/]夺眼者的女儿是<u>红</u>头发。

original: Tyrion: What?[p/][s/] She was [i]there[/i] when we spoke to him during Beatrice's trial.
translation: Tyrion: 什么？[p/][s/]比亚特丽丝的审理期间，我们和夺眼者对话时她也<u>在场</u>。

original: Ruby: ...That's right.
translation: Ruby: ……是的。

original: Ruby: What are you talking about?
translation: Ruby: 你在说什么呢？

original: Ruby: She was never [i]at[/i] that meeting.
translation: Ruby: 她根本<u>不在</u>。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: What is going on?[p/] She was [i]clearly[/i] there.
translation: 怎么回事？[p/]她<u>显而易见</u>在场。

original: If it weren't for her intervention,[p/] the Eyetaker would've attacked at that very moment.
translation: 要不是她的介入，[p/]夺眼者那时就会发起攻击了。

original: Why are you remembering things differently?
translation: 难道你们两个的记忆有区别？

original: Rath: I'm sorry, Lucio...
translation: Rath: 我很抱歉，卢西奥……

original: Rath: But whoever this "Patron" is,[p/] they have full ownership of her mind.
translation: Rath: 但不管这个“签约人”是谁，[p/]她的意识都完全被这个人掌控。

original: Rath: They could have easily commanded her to forget signing the contract in the first place.
translation: Rath: 签约人可以轻而易举命令她忘掉签订契约一事。

original: Rath: That's probably [i]why[/i] she can't remember what happened during the massacre.
translation: Rath: 这也很可能就是她没有屠杀期间记忆的<u>原因</u>。

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Tyrion: No...
translation: Tyrion: 不……

original: Ruby: Tyrion?[p/] What's wrong?
translation: Ruby: 提利昂？[p/]怎么了？

original: Ruby: Why are you looking at me like that?
translation: Ruby: 为什么要这么看着我？

original: A part of you really hopes that you're wrong about this...
translation: 你心里希望自己是错的……

original: No...[p/] Ruby doesn't remember that Eris was at that meeting.
translation: 不……[p/]鲁比不记得厄莉斯也参加了会面。

original: That doesn't make sense.[p/] [i]Eris[/i] was the one who got you out of that situation in the first place.
translation: 这不合情理。[p/]<u>厄莉斯</u>是帮助你脱离险境的人。

original: ...There's only one reason why she wouldn't remember.
translation: ……她会想不起来只有一个原因。

original: That's the only explanation you can think of...[p/][s/] But why?!
translation: 也是你唯一能想到的解释……[p/][s/]但为什么？！

original: ...Her memories seem intact,[p/] [i]except[/i] for her memories of Eris.
translation: ……她的记忆看起来很完整，[p/]<u>除了</u>有关厄莉斯的部分。

original: Since her disappearance,[p/] you've highly suspected that she was involved in this.
translation: 自她消失以来，[p/]你就一直怀疑厄莉斯与事件有关。

original: Not only was she at the scene of the crime,[p/] she went missing at the same time that Beatrice did.
translation: 她不仅身处犯罪现场，还与比亚特丽丝同一时间失踪。

original: But you never thought to ask one question.
translation: 但你一直没想过要问某一个问题。

original: No...[p/] Ruby signed a Blood Contract with a demon.
translation: 不对……[p/]鲁比和某个恶魔签约了血契。

original: And that demon changed Ruby's memories of Eris Illmater.
translation: 那个恶魔还篡改了鲁比关于厄莉斯·伊尔马特的记忆。

original: Eris Illmater was present at the crime scene during the massacre.
translation: 厄莉斯·伊尔马特屠杀期间也在犯罪现场。

original: And in addition to that,[p/] she's been missing since everything happened.
translation: 除此之外，[p/]她还在事件发生后失踪。

original: A flood of memories come back to you.
translation: 海量的记忆浮现于脑海之中。

original: Lucio: Warriors such as I must hone and develop our senses to survive in battle.
translation: Lucio: 但我这样的战士必须时刻磨砺感知能力，才能在战场生还。

original: Lucio: Eventually,[p/] we develop the ability to sense enemies and anticipate danger.
translation: Lucio: 最终，[p/]我们拥有了可以感知暗敌与察觉危险的能力。

original: Lucio: I'd heard that such senses are heightened when in the presence of "extraplanar" entities.
translation: Lucio: 我听说这种能力在“跨位面”体存在时更为强化。

original: Lucio: I thought those stories were complete hogwash until I met you and Beatrice Frega's familiar.
translation: Lucio: 遇到你和比亚特丽丝·弗雷加的使魔之前，[p/]我都以为这只是天方夜谭。

original: CELESTE: Tyrion.[p/] I’ve fought literal monsters and barely escaped with my life.
translation: CELESTE: 提利昂。[p/]我与字面意义上的怪物们战斗过，好不容易才捡回一条命。

original: CELESTE: But when I’m near Eris,[p/] none of those creatures come even close.
translation: CELESTE: 但我在厄莉斯附近的时候，[p/]那些怪物与她相比甚至不值一提。

original: CELESTE: I get this…[p/] feeling.[p/] It's like I’m in front of a predator that I couldn’t ever hope to beat.
translation: CELESTE: 我就是有这种……[p/]感觉。[p/]就好像站在一个根本没希望打败的捕食者面前。

original: CELESTE: Every instinct I have tells me to run whenever she’s close by.
translation: CELESTE: 只要她在附近时，我的所有直觉都在说快跑。

original: Liafal: I-[p/][s/]I'm terribly sorry![p/][s/] He's not usually like this.
translation: Liafal: 我、[p/][s/]我真的很抱歉！[p/][s/]他平常不会这样。

original: Eris: Ah, it's to be expected.
translation: Eris: 啊，意料之中。

original: ERIS: I'm not sure why but animals have always disliked me.
translation: ERIS: 我也不确定动物们为什么一般都不喜欢我。

original: There's still very little you know about demons.
translation: 你对恶魔依然知之甚少。

original: So what's to say that one can't take the appearance of a human?
translation: 他们也有可能伪装成人类。

original: But it's still a long shot.
translation: 虽然希望渺茫。

original: ...But there [i]is[/i] one way to find out for sure.
translation: ……但还<u>有</u>一个办法找出答案。

original: Ruby: Tyrion, talk to me.[p/] What's wrong?
translation: Ruby: 提利昂，跟我说话呀。[p/]怎么了？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Ruby...[p/] I'm about to do something stupid...
translation: Tyrion: 鲁比……[p/]我即将做些很蠢的事……

original: Tyrion: If I fall unconscious,[p/] I need you to call Celeste and tell her to contact Lord Asclepius or the Archduke.
translation: Tyrion: 如果我失去意识了，[p/]请你叫来塞莱斯特，让她联络阿斯克勒庇俄斯勋爵或大公爵。

original: Ruby: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Ruby: 什、什么？！

original: If you're wrong about this,[p/] there's no way either of them will get here in time.
translation: 如果你是错的，[p/]这两个人都不可能及时赶到。

original: ...But it's already late and the trial resumes tomorrow.
translation: ……但时间已晚，审理明天还会继续。

original: You can't waste any more time traveling to either of their locations.
translation: 你现在分秒必争，没时间去他们其中一个人所在的位置。

original: Tyrion: Eris Illmater![p/][s/] Wherever and [i]whatever[/i] you are!
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯·伊尔马特！[p/][s/]不管你在哪里，是<u>什么</u>！

original: Tyrion: By the Eye of Horus,[p/][s/] I issue upon you a divine edict!
translation: Tyrion: 借荷鲁斯之眼之力，[p/][s/]我对你发出神谕！

original: Tyrion: Release thy guards and manifest your Blood Contract with Ruby Tymora!
translation: Tyrion: 放下防备，展示你和鲁比·泰摩拉的血契！

original: Eris: So...[p/] You finally figured it out, my dearest Tyrion.
translation: Eris: 所以……[p/]你终于明白了，我亲爱的提利昂。

original: Tyrion: This entire time...[p/][s/] I've been chasing [i]you[/i].
translation: Tyrion: 我一直……[p/][s/]一直在追查<u>你</u>。

original: Eris: You have...[p/] It's been so entertaining watching you scramble around.
translation: Eris: 的确……[p/]看你四处乱窜太有娱乐效果了。

original: Tyrion: You've been making contracts with people across Wyverngarde.
translation: Tyrion: 你在维文加德各处与人签订契约。

original: Tyrion: You took control of Aria [i]and[/i] Beatrice.
translation: Tyrion: 你控制了阿莉亚<u>和</u>比亚特丽丝。

original: Tyrion: But...[p/] Why?![p/][s/] Why would you want to do any of this?!
translation: Tyrion: 但是……[p/]为什么？！[p/][s/]为什么你会想做这些？！

original: Eris: Oh,[p/] I can't possibly reveal [i]all[/i] my secrets.
translation: Eris: 喔，[p/]我可不能把自己的秘密对你<u>和盘托出</u>。

original: Eris: This isn't the proper stage to have our final battle.
translation: Eris: 现在还不是最后一战的阶段。

original: Tyrion: You...
translation: Tyrion: 你……

original: Eris: But I suppose that you've come this far.
translation: Eris: 但既然你都查到这里了。

original: Eris: So how about I give you a little gift?
translation: Eris: 不如我给你一份小礼物吧？

original: Ruby: What was that...?
translation: Ruby: 那是什么……？

original: Tyrion: Ruby...[p/] Eris Illmater is a demon...
translation: Tyrion: 鲁比……[p/]厄莉斯·伊尔马特是个恶魔……

original: Tyrion: And she's not just [i]any[/i] demon.[p/] She's the Empress of Discord.
translation: Tyrion: 她不是<u>普通的</u>恶魔。[p/]她是无序女皇。

original: Tyrion: ...And [i]you[/i] signed a Blood Contract with her.
translation: Tyrion: ……<u>你</u>和她签了血契。

original: Tyrion: [i]That's[/i] why you can't remember anything about her.
translation: Tyrion: <u>所以</u>你才不记得关于她的任何事。

original: Ruby: What?!
translation: Ruby: 什么？！

original: Ruby: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion![p/] I-I...
translation: Ruby: 提、[p/][s/]提利昂！[p/]我、我……

original: Ruby: I swear on my life that I didn't know anything about this!
translation: Ruby: 我对天发誓自己什么都不知道！

original: Tyrion: I know...[p/] She probably tricked you into signing this.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道……[p/]她很可能是用计让你签约。

original: Tyrion: Just like she tricked Aria.
translation: Tyrion: 就像骗阿莉亚那样。

original: Ruby: "Aria"?![p/][s/] What does the prosecutor have to do with this?!
translation: Ruby: “阿莉亚”？！[p/][s/]检察官和这些有什么关系？！

original: Celeste: Come on, you two.
translation: Celeste: 好了，你们俩。

original: Celeste: I know things are kind of tense,[p/] but there's no need to-.
translation: Celeste: 我知道你们关系比较紧张，[p/]但也没有必要——

original: Celeste: ...What are you holding?
translation: Celeste: ……你拿着什么？

original: Celeste: I-[p/][s/]Is that a Blood Contract?!
translation: Celeste: 是、[p/][s/]是血契吗？！

original: Tyrion: Celeste...[p/] Eris is the Empress of Discord.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……[p/]厄莉斯就是无序女皇。

original: Celeste: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Celeste: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Tyrion: It was [i]her[/i] the entire time!
translation: Tyrion: 一直都是<u>她</u>！

original: Tyrion: She [i]tricked[/i] Aria into signing a Blood Contract with her.
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯<u>欺骗</u>阿莉亚与她签约血契。

original: Tyrion: And she probably controlled her [i]and[/i] Beatrice to orchestrate the entire massacre!
translation: Tyrion: 大概率也是她控制阿莉亚<u>和</u>比亚特丽丝实施屠杀！

original: Ruby: What?!
translation: Ruby: 什么？！

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion![p/][s/] This is crazy!
translation: Celeste: 提、[p/][s/]提利昂！[p/][s/]这太疯狂了！

original: Celeste: I-[p/][s/]I know I was scared of her that [i]one[/i] time.
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/][s/]我之前确实<u>有一次</u>很害怕她。

original: Celeste: But how could [i]Eris[/i] be a demon?![p/][s/] She looks nothing [i]like[/i] Marrunath!
translation: Celeste: 但<u>厄莉斯</u>怎么可能是恶魔？！[p/][s/]她和马鲁纳斯<u>一点也不像</u>！

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Tyrion: I know how unbelievable it is.[p/] But I used my Divine Edict with her name.
translation: Tyrion: 我明白这有多难以置信。[p/]但我用她的名字发出了神谕。

original: Tyrion: That wouldn't have worked unless she [i]was[/i] a demon.
translation: Tyrion: 只有她<u>是</u>恶魔的情况下才可能成功。

original: Celeste: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...[p/] I guess I can't disagree with that.
translation: Celeste: 好、[p/][s/]好的……[p/]这一点我没法争辩。

original: Knight: ...We'll need to contact the Grand General immediately.
translation: Knight: ……我们需要立刻联系大将军。

original: Tyrion: Ugh...[p/] But if she's really a demon,[p/] is it even possible to arrest her?
translation: Tyrion: 呃……[p/]可如果她真的是恶魔，[p/]那还有可能逮捕她吗？

original: It's already been a day.
translation: 已经过去一天了。

original: For someone like her,[p/] that would be [i]more[/i] than enough time to skip town.
translation: 对她那种人来说，[p/]这些时间用来逃离城镇已经<u>绰绰有余</u>。

original: Tyrion: We'll need to speak with the Scaled-[p/] the Archduke about this.
translation: Tyrion: 我们需要和鳞甲……[p/]大公爵探讨此事。

original: Tyrion: Thank you...[p/] Ruby.
translation: Tyrion: 谢谢你……[p/]鲁比。

original: Tyrion: You've helped us more than you could ever know.
translation: Tyrion: 你对我们的帮助远超你的想象。

original: Ruby: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah, of course...
translation: Ruby: 不、[p/][s/]不用客气……

original: Tyrion: Celeste,[p/] let's meet up with everyone.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，[p/]我们去找大家吧。

original: Tyrion: We'll need to discuss our next course of action.
translation: Tyrion: 我们需要讨论下一步行动。

original: Celeste: Right...
translation: Celeste: 对……

original: You're about to leave Ruby's office when she stops you.
translation: 正要离开鲁比的办公室时，她拦住了你们。

original: Ruby: Tyrion...
translation: Ruby: 提利昂……

original: Ruby: Have you been using the Eye of Horus lately?
translation: Ruby: 你最近用过荷鲁斯之眼吗？

original: Tyrion: Uh...[p/] Yeah.
translation: Tyrion: 呃……[p/]用过。

original: Tyrion: I can't say much about what I'm doing right now.
translation: Tyrion: 我现在做的事不能透露详情。

original: Tyrion: But I [i]am[/i] in the middle of a case.
translation: Tyrion: 但我<u>正在</u>调查某个案子。

original: Ruby: It's just that...
translation: Ruby: 我只是……

original: Tyrion: ...What's wrong?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么了？

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: Never mind...[p/] I don't think it's my place to say anything.
translation: Ruby: 别在意……[p/]我知道自己没资格说这些。

original: Ruby: I think I'm just being my usual paranoid self.
translation: Ruby: 大概只是我的被害妄想。

original: Ruby: [i]I'm[/i] not the one with the ability to read minds anyways.
translation: Ruby: 毕竟<u>我</u>没有读心能力。

original: Ruby: So if [i]you're[/i] not seeing it,[p/] it's probably nothing.
translation: Ruby: 如果<u>你</u>都没看见，那应该没事。

original: Tyrion: ...Okay?
translation: Tyrion: ……好的？

original: Ruby: ...I know you can't tell me about what you're doing.
translation: Ruby: ……我知道你不能透露具体内容。

original: Ruby: And I have no idea what could possibly involve the Kingsguard,[p/] Steelwind, [i]and[/i] the Empress of Discord.
translation: Ruby: 我也不知道什么事会同时涉及国王卫队，[p/]斯蒂尔文德，<u>还有</u>无序女皇。

original: Ruby: But...[p/] Just stay safe, okay?
translation: Ruby: 但……[p/]注意安全，好吗？

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: You're...[p/] the only family I have left.
translation: Ruby: 你是……[p/]我仅剩的家人了。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: I will.[p/] I promise.
translation: Tyrion: 会的，[p/]我保证。

original: Ruby: ...Thank you.
translation: Ruby: ……谢谢你。

original: You've finally found the lead you've been looking for.
translation: 你终于找到了苦苦寻找的线索。

original: But you're not sure where this will take you...
translation: 但你不确定这会让你走向何方……

original: Knowing what you know now,[p/] you're almost a little afraid of what might happen.
translation: 了解这些以后，[p/]你几乎都有点害怕事态会如何进展。

original: Who [i]is[/i] Eris?
translation: 厄莉斯<u>是</u>谁？

original: Why would she go to the trouble of orchestrating [i]any[/i] of this?
translation: 她为什么要费工夫策划<u>这些事</u>？

original: She not only impersonated the Eyetaker's daughter.[p/] She also pretended to be your friend.
translation: 她不仅冒充夺眼者的女儿，[p/]还假装成你的朋友。

original: What's [i]her[/i] goal in all of this?
translation: <u>她的</u>目的是什么？

original: ...Hopefully,[p/] tomorrow will finally bring you the answers you're looking for.
translation: ……希望明天的审理可以带来答案。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Eris: Is something wrong, commander?
translation: Eris: 怎么了，指挥官？

original: Orym: ...Don't play dumb with me.
translation: Orym: ……别跟我装傻。

original: Orym: They told me what you [i]really[/i] are.
translation: Orym: 他们告诉我你的<u>真实</u>身份了。

original: Orym: What's your game, demon?
translation: Orym: 你搞什么鬼，恶魔？

original: Orym: Why would you just deliver yourself to our doorstep?
translation: Orym: 为什么要自己送上门来？

original: Eris: Oh, Orym.[p/] I've put far too much work into this story to [i]miss[/i] the final act.
translation: Eris: 喔唷，奥蒙。[p/]我准备了这么多，可不能<u>错过</u>好戏的最后一幕。

original: Eris: I can't wait to see how this ends.
translation: Eris: 我等不及看事情怎么收场了。

original: Orym: You [i]killed[/i] three people and enslaved an innocent girl!
translation: Orym: 你<u>杀了</u>三个人，还奴役了一个无辜的女孩！

original: Orym: Is this all some kind of game to you?!
translation: Orym: 你把这些当游戏吗？！

original: Eris: That's [i]exactly[/i] what this is to me.
translation: Eris: 我<u>正是</u>这么想的。

original: Eris: I'll admit...[p/] Looking back,[p/] it [i]does[/i] feel a bit derivative.
translation: Eris: 我承认……[p/]现在看来，[p/]这<u>确实</u>有点抄袭的嫌疑。

original: Eris: But I think I've done enough to differentiate myself from those that came before.
translation: Eris: 但我也已经很努力把自己和前人的事迹区分开来了。

original: Eris: It's a shame about the timing of it all though...
translation: Eris: 时间点确实有点可惜吧……

original: Orym: ...You're god damn insane.
translation: Orym: ……天杀的，你真是个疯子。

original: Eris: [i]That[/i] took you long enough to notice.
translation: Eris: 你怎么这么久才注意到<u>这一点</u>呀。

original: Eris: I guess the oafish Inquisition Commander [i]does[/i] have some observational skills after all.
translation: Eris: 看来裁判所的傻大个指挥官还是<u>有点</u>观察力的嘛。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Orym: ...Whatever.[p/] You just better not try anything.
translation: Orym: ……随你便。[p/]最好别耍什么花招。

original: Eris: You know I can't lie.[p/] So I'll reassure you.
translation: Eris: 你知道我不能说谎呀。[p/]那我给你吃颗定心丸。

original: Eris: I [i]promise[/i].[p/] I won't harm anyone...
translation: Eris: 我<u>保证</u>，[p/]自己不会伤害任何人……

original: Eris: ...while I'm in this prison.
translation: Eris: ……至少在这监狱里时不会。

original: Orym: Ugh...
translation: Orym: 唉……

original: Eris: We're finally approaching the climax, Tyrion.
translation: Eris: 我们终于要迎来戏剧高潮了，提利昂。

original: Eris: No more DEDUCTIONS.[p/] No more TALKING.
translation: Eris: 不会再有 <size=1.5em>推理</size>，也不会再有 <size=1.5em>对话</size>。

original: Eris: No more god-awful teasing when we both [i]know[/i] who was [i]really[/i] behind this.
translation: Eris: 不会再有那些烦人的吊人胃口环节——因为我们都已经<u>知道</u>谁是<u>真正的</u>幕后黑手。

original: Eris: It's just [i]me[/i][p/] and you.
translation: Eris: 只有<u>我</u>[p/]和你。

original: Celeste: Oh.[p/] Remember when I helped you move this bed from the flea market?
translation: Celeste: 噢。[p/]还记得我帮你从跳蚤市场把这张床搬回来吗？

original: Tyrion: R-[p/]Right...
translation: Tyrion: 记、[p/]记得……

original: You recall her doing most,[p/] if not all,[p/] of the work.
translation: 你记得她几乎包揽了全部工作。

original: You didn't even know that carrying a bed singlehandedly was humanly possible...
translation: 这之前你都不知道人类可以单手扛床……

original: Celeste: It's starting to get brighter outside.
translation: Celeste: 外面已经开始天亮了。

original: Celeste: I guess summer is finally here.
translation: Celeste: 看来到夏天了。

original: Tyrion: Really?[p/] I didn't even notice.
translation: Tyrion: 真的？[p/]我都没注意。

original: Tyrion: It's a shelf containing a lot of memorabilia I've collected over the years.
translation: Tyrion: 一个架子，上面装满了我这些年收集的纪念品。

original: Celeste: It's mostly just books though.
translation: Celeste: 但上面基本都是书。

original: Tyrion: ...I like books.
translation: Tyrion: ……我喜欢书。

original: It's a fantasy novel that you've been reading through.
translation: 是一本你正在读的奇幻小说。

original: Recently,[p/] you've had a lot of time to read through your collection.
translation: 最近你的时间不少，可以品读自己的收藏。

original: Celeste: Did you read that mystery novel I lent you?
translation: Celeste: 你读过我借给你的悬疑小说吗？

original: Tyrion: I [i]did[/i], but...[p/] I kind of guessed the twist from the beginning...
translation: Tyrion: 我<u>读了</u>，但是……[p/]我一开始就猜到怎么回事了……

original: Celeste: ...What?![p/][s/] How?!
translation: Celeste: ……什么？！[p/][s/]怎么做到的？！

original: Tyrion: The author called a lot of attention to the vials she dropped.
translation: Tyrion: 作者着重笔墨描写了她掉落的小瓶。

original: Tyrion: It was pretty obvious the nurse accidentally switched them.
translation: Tyrion: 护士意外调换了小瓶这一点很明显。

original: Celeste: Ugh...[p/] I guess fiction can't beat a [i]real[/i] murder investigation for you.
translation: Celeste: 唔呃……[p/]看来你比起虚构还是喜欢<u>真实</u>的谋杀调查。

original: It's a stairway leading to the second story of your home.
translation: 通向你家二层的楼梯。

original: ...You haven't cleaned up the upper floor in a while.
translation: ……你有一阵子没打扫过二层了。

original: So, it would probably be best to make sure Steelwind doesn't wander up there.
translation: 所以，最好别让斯蒂尔文德上楼。

original: Aria: Are you doing well, Mr. Cuthbert?[p/] You seem-
translation: Aria: 你还好吗，卡斯伯特先生？[p/]你看起来——

original: Tyrion: I'm fine.
translation: Tyrion: 我还好。

original: Aria: ...Of course.
translation: Aria: ……当然。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Aria: I just couldn't help but notice your absence.
translation: Aria: 我很难不注意到你的缺席。

original: Aria: You haven't taken any other clients since Beatrice's trial.
translation: Aria: 比亚特丽丝的审理以来，你没有接过任何委托人。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: I'm going to be honest.
translation: Tyrion: 我跟你说实话吧。

original: Tyrion: I'm not even sure if I [i]want[/i] to be a defense attorney anymore.
translation: Tyrion: 我现在都不确定自己还<u>想不想</u>继续当辩护律师。

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: I've spent my whole life training to be one...
translation: Tyrion: 我一生都在接受相关培训……

original: Tyrion: But I was only doing it because someone [i]else[/i] told me to.
translation: Tyrion: 但这只是因为<u>别人</u>告诉我要这么做。

original: Aria: Did you not enjoy it?[p/] You [i]are[/i] very skilled at it.
translation: Aria: 你不喜欢当律师吗？[p/]你的技巧非常娴熟。

original: Tyrion: I don't know...
translation: Tyrion: 我不知道……

original: Tyrion: I've been trying to take some time to think about everything.
translation: Tyrion: 我一直在尝试抽空理一理这些事。

original: ...But you still haven't found any answers.
translation: ……但你还是没有找到任何答案。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: Have you considered becoming a prosecutor?
translation: Aria: 你考虑过当检察官吗？

original: Aria: Your time as my stand-in made it clear that you have the ability to.
translation: Aria: 顶替我工作那一次证明你明显有这个实力。

original: Tyrion: ...A prosecutor.
translation: Tyrion: ……检察官。

original: You would have never even considered that a year ago...
translation: 一年前你绝对不会这么想……

original: But you understand now...[p/] There [i]are[/i] criminals who need to be brought to justice.
translation: 但现在你明白了……[p/]确实<u>存在</u>需要认罪伏法的罪犯。

original: And despite how difficult she is to face,[p/] Steelwind never engages in outright corruption like the other prosecutors of the Crown.
translation: 虽然她是个难以应付的对手，[p/]但斯蒂尔文德和其他皇家检察官不同，从没有沾染贪污腐败。

original: If you follow her example,[p/] you could fight injustice that way...
translation: 如果以她为榜样，[p/]你也能从以这种方式抗击不公正……

original: ...But even if you did that,[p/] you'd just be following someone [i]else's[/i] footsteps.[p/] Just like before...
translation: ……但即使你这么做了，[p/]也只是在跟随<u>别人的</u>脚步。[p/]和以前一样……

original: Tyrion: ...I'll think about it.
translation: Tyrion: ……我会考虑的。

original: Aria: Please do.[p/] At this point,[p/] I could use all the help I can find.
translation: Aria: 请务必考虑一下。[p/]现如今，[p/]我需要一切可能的帮助。

original: Tyrion: Have your injuries been healing well?
translation: Tyrion: 你的伤恢复状况挺好的？

original: Aria: Yes.[p/] Nightgrave's skill in [b]necromancy[/b] is quite remarkable.
translation: Aria: 是的，[p/]奈特格雷夫在[b]死灵术[/b]方面的造诣令人惊诧。

original: Aria: I'm glad I introduced him to House Asclepius.
translation: Aria: 很高兴我把他介绍给了阿斯克勒庇俄斯家。

original: Tyrion: ...Asclepius?
translation: Tyrion: ……阿斯克勒庇俄斯？

original: Aria: House Asclepius specializes in the study of [b]necromancy[/b].
translation: Aria: 阿斯克勒庇俄斯家专门研究[b]死灵术[/b]。

original: Aria: After Nightgrave's expulsion from the academy,[p/] I thought it was only right that he be allowed to continue his studies.
translation: Aria: 在奈特格雷夫被学院开除后，[p/]我认为不能让他就这样断了学业。

original: Celeste: Right.[p/] He mentioned that he owed you a favour.
translation: Celeste: 对了。[p/]他说过自己欠你一个人情。

original: Aria: It was only logical.[p/] It would be a waste to let someone of his talents fade into obscurity.
translation: Aria: 这样才合理。[p/]不能就这么让像他这样天赋异禀的人泯然众人。

original: You're glad Wallace was able to continue his studies.
translation: 你很高兴华莱士能继续进行学习。

original: He clearly wants to use his talents to better society.
translation: 他明显是为了利用自己的才能造福社会。

original: ...He's definitely in a better place than you are right now.
translation: ……至少他的现况明显比你好多了。

original: Tyrion: Even so...[p/] Should you still be moving around like this?
translation: Tyrion: 即使如此……[p/]你真的可以这样四处移动吗？

original: Tyrion: You should take some time off to recover.
translation: Tyrion: 你应该好好休养一段时间。

original: Aria: As much as I would like to,[p/] there's been a recent uptick in cases of Mageblight lately.
translation: Aria: 虽然我也想休息，[p/]但最近法师之疫的事件激增。

original: Mageblight...[p/] You recall hearing about that many times.
translation: 法师之疫……[p/]这个名词你听过很多遍。

original: If a mage exceeds their stamina by overusing their magic,[p/] it starts to affect their mind and send them into a violent frenzy.
translation: 如果法师过度使用魔法，耗尽了自己的精力，[p/]意识就会受到影响，陷入狂暴状态。

original: Aria: To make matters worse,[p/] the nobility has been trying to suppress information about these incidents.
translation: Aria: 更糟的是，[p/]贵族开始尝试封锁这些事件的信息。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] It's not a good look whenever a mage goes on a murderous rampage.
translation: Tyrion: 是的……[p/]法师开始狂暴杀戮可不是什么美景。

original: Aria: I was actually surprised to see you here, Celeste.
translation: Aria: 在这儿见到你其实也让我很惊讶，塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: Well...[p/] I can't just leave him alone anymore.[p/] He ticked off a criminal overlord.
translation: Celeste: 这个嘛……[p/]我不能让他单独行动了。[p/]他惹了个黑帮老大。

original: Celeste: They're definitely going to send someone after him. [mind="...And he can't really take care of himself right now."/]
translation: Celeste: 他们肯定会派人追杀提利昂的。[mind="……他现在也没法照顾好自己。"/]

original: Tyrion: ...Celeste.[p/] Your thoughts are leaking.
translation: Tyrion: ……塞莱斯特。[p/]你的想法流露出来了。

original: Celeste: Hey...[p/] Get out of my head.
translation: Celeste: 喂……[p/]不要读我的心。

original: Aria: ...What?
translation: Aria: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: ...It's nothing.
translation: Tyrion: ……没什么。

original: Aria: I [i]am[/i] surprised, though.[p/] Not many people slight the Eyetaker and live.
translation: Aria: 但我<u>确实</u>很惊讶。[p/]少有见过夺眼者还能活着回来的人。

original: Aria: He's known for taking swift retaliation against his enemies.
translation: Aria: 他以迅速报复敌人而出名。

original: Celeste: We're hoping he's laying low after his plan with Beatrice fell through.
translation: Celeste: 我们希望他是因为涉及比亚特丽丝的计划失败，而暂时低调行事。

original: Aria: That [i]does[/i] match with the reports I've read.
translation: Aria: 这<u>确实</u>和我读过的报告相符。

original: Aria: Supposedly,[p/] he's been absent from many of his enterprises.
translation: Aria: 坊间传闻说，[p/]他缺席了很多自己的生意。

original: Either way...[p/] You're not looking forward to dealing with him.
translation: 总之……[p/]你并不期待再对上他。

original: It's bad enough that you're already on the nobility's bad side.
translation: 站在贵族的对立面已经够糟糕了。

original: Celeste: ...By the way, Tyrion.[p/] Ruby sent another letter.
translation: Celeste: ……对了，提利昂。[p/]鲁比又寄了一封信。

original: Celeste: Do you want to-?
translation: Celeste: 你想不想——？

original: Tyrion: ...Put it with the rest.
translation: Tyrion: ……和其他的放一起吧。

original: Celeste: R-[p/]Right...
translation: Celeste: 好、[p/]好的……

original: Aria: ...Have you spoken to her since the trial?
translation: Aria: ……你们审理之后谈过吗？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Aria: I see...[p/] That [i]does[/i] explain her recent mood.
translation: Aria: 我明白了……[p/]<u>难怪</u>她最近这个情绪。

original: Celeste: Right.[p/] You two probably see each other a lot.
translation: Celeste: 也对。[p/]你们俩应该经常见面。

original: Aria: I've prosecuted a few of her clients recently.
translation: Aria: 我最近起诉了几个她的委托人。

original: Aria: But it's clear she's not nearly as threatening as before.
translation: Aria: 但她的威胁程度明显不如以往。

original: Tyrion: ...Could we talk about something else?
translation: Tyrion: ……我们能换个话题吗？

original: Aria: Of course.[p/] My apologies.
translation: Aria: 当然。[p/]我很抱歉。

original: Aria: Are you doing well, Mr. Cuthbert?[p/] You seem...
translation: Aria: 你还好吗，卡斯伯特先生？[p/]你看起来……

original: Tyrion: I'm fine.[p/] Why wouldn't I be?
translation: Tyrion: 我很好。[p/]为什么会不好？

original: Aria: ...Of course.
translation: Aria: ……当然。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Aria: It's just that you haven't taken any other clients since Beatrice's trial.
translation: Aria: 只是自比亚特丽丝的审理以来，你还没有接过任何委托人。

original: Tyrion: I'm going to be honest.[p/] I'm not even sure if I [i]want[/i] to be a defense attorney anymore.
translation: Tyrion: 我跟你说实话吧。[p/]我现在都不确定自己还<u>想不想</u>继续当辩护律师。

original: Celeste: What?
translation: Celeste: 什么？

original: Tyrion: I've been following this path for so long...[p/] But I was only doing it because someone else told me to.
translation: Tyrion: 我走这条路很久了……[p/]但这只是因为别人告诉我要这么做。

original: Aria: Did you not enjoy it?[p/] As much as I hate to admit it,[p/] you were very skilled at it.
translation: Aria: 你不喜欢当律师吗？[p/]虽然不愿承认，[p/]但你的技巧非常娴熟。

original: Tyrion: I don't know anymore.[p/] That's why I've been taking some time to think about my life.
translation: Tyrion: 我已经不确定了。[p/]所以我在花时间考虑自己的人生。

original: Tyrion: ...But I still haven't found any answers.
translation: Tyrion: ……但我还是没找到任何答案。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: Have you considered becoming a prosecutor?
translation: Aria: 你考虑过当检察官吗？

original: Aria: Your time as my stand-in showed that you definitely have the ability to.
translation: Aria: 顶替我工作那一次证明你肯定有这个实力。

original: Tyrion: ...A prosecutor.
translation: Tyrion: ……检察官。

original: The idea would have been laughable a year ago...
translation: 一年前这个想法只会让你发笑……

original: But now you know that there are criminals who need to be brought to justice.
translation: 但现在你清楚，确实存在需要被绳之以法的罪犯。

original: It's definitely intriguing.[p/] At the very least,[p/] you don't have any other options.
translation: 这个想法很有吸引力。[p/]退一万步说，[p/]你也没有其他选择。

original: Tyrion: ...I'll think about it.
translation: Tyrion: ……我会考虑的。

original: Aria: Please do.[p/] I could use all the help I can get.
translation: Aria: 请务必考虑一下。[p/]现如今，[p/]我需要一切可能的帮助。

original: Tyrion: Have your injuries been healing well?
translation: Tyrion: 你的伤恢复状况挺好的？

original: Aria: Yes.[p/] Nightgrave's skill in [b]necromancy[/b] is quite remarkable.
translation: Aria: 是的，[p/]奈特格雷夫在[b]死灵术[/b]方面的造诣令人惊诧。

original: Aria: I'm glad I introduced him to Lord Asclepius.
translation: Aria: 很高兴我把他介绍给了阿斯克勒庇俄斯勋爵。

original: Tyrion: Lord Asclepius?
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯克勒庇俄斯勋爵？

original: Aria: House Asclepius specializes in [b]necromancy[/b] magic.
translation: Aria: 阿斯克勒庇俄斯家专门研究[b]死灵术[/b]。

original: Aria: After his expulsion from the academy,[p/] I thought it was only right that he be allowed to continue his studies.
translation: Aria: 在奈特格雷夫被学院开除后，[p/]我认为不能让他就这样断了学业。

original: Celeste: Right.[p/] He mentioned that he owed you a favor.
translation: Celeste: 对了。[p/]他说过自己欠你一个人情。

original: Aria: It was only logical.[p/] It would be a waste to let someone of his talents fade into obscurity.
translation: Aria: 这样才合理。[p/]不能就这么让像他这样天赋异禀的人泯然众人。

original: Aria: I was actually surprised to see you here, Celeste.
translation: Aria: 在这儿见到你其实也让我很惊讶，塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: Well...[p/] I can't just leave him alone anymore.[p/] He ticked off a criminal overlord.
translation: Celeste: 这个嘛……[p/]我不能让他单独行动了。[p/]他惹了个黑帮老大。

original: Celeste: They're definitely going to send someone after him. [mind="...And he can't really take care of himself right now."/]
translation: Celeste: 他们肯定会派人追杀提利昂的。[mind="……他现在也没法照顾好自己。"/]

original: Tyrion: ...Celeste.[p/] Your thoughts are leaking.
translation: Tyrion: ……塞莱斯特。[p/]你的想法流露出来了。

original: Celeste: Hey...[p/] Get out of my head.
translation: Celeste: 喂……[p/]不要读我的心。

original: Aria: ...What?
translation: Aria: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: ...It's nothing.
translation: Tyrion: ……没什么。

original: Aria: I [i]am[/i] surprised, though.[p/] Not many people slight the Eyetaker and live.
translation: Aria: 但我<u>确实</u>很惊讶。[p/]少有见过夺眼者还能活着回来的人。

original: Aria: He's known for taking swift retaliation against his enemies.
translation: Aria: 他以迅速报复敌人而出名。

original: Celeste: We're hoping he's laying low after his plan with Beatrice fell through.
translation: Celeste: 我们希望他是因为涉及比亚特丽丝的计划失败，而暂时低调行事。

original: Aria: That [i]does[/i] match with the reports I've read.
translation: Aria: 这<u>确实</u>和我读过的报告相符。

original: Aria: Supposedly,[p/] he's been absent from many of his enterprises.
translation: Aria: 坊间传闻说，[p/]他缺席了很多自己的生意。

original: Celeste: ...By the way, Tyrion.[p/] Ruby sent another letter.
translation: Celeste: ……对了，提利昂。[p/]鲁比又寄了一封信。

original: Celeste: Do you want to-?
translation: Celeste: 你想不想——？

original: Tyrion: ...Put it with the rest.
translation: Tyrion: ……和其他的放一起吧。

original: Celeste: R-[p/]Right...
translation: Celeste: 好、[p/]好的……

original: Aria: ...Have you spoken to her since the trial?
translation: Aria: ……你们审理之后谈过吗？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Aria: I see...[p/] That [i]does[/i] explain her recent mood.
translation: Aria: 我明白了……[p/]<u>难怪</u>她最近这个情绪。

original: Celeste: Right.[p/] You two probably see each other a lot.
translation: Celeste: 也对。[p/]你们俩应该经常见面。

original: Aria: I've prosecuted a few of her clients recently.
translation: Aria: 我最近起诉了几个她的委托人。

original: Aria: But it's clear she's not nearly as threatening as before.
translation: Aria: 但她的威胁程度明显不如以往。

original: Tyrion: ...Could we talk about something else?
translation: Tyrion: ……我们能换个话题吗？

original: Aria: Of course.[p/] My apologies.
translation: Aria: 当然。[p/]我很抱歉。

original: Aria: ...Why are you showing this to me?
translation: Aria: ……你为什么给我看这个？

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]Sorry.[p/] Force of habit.
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/]抱歉。[p/]习惯使然。

original: Celeste: Oh![p/] The tea's ready.
translation: Celeste: 噢！[p/]茶好了。

original: Aria: Oh,[p/] thank you.[p/] Some tea sounds lovely right now.
translation: Aria: 噢，[p/]谢谢你。[p/]喝点茶听起来不错。

original: Celeste: R-[p/]Right...[p/] I was [i]totally[/i] making it for you guys.
translation: Celeste: 是、[p/]是呀……[p/]我<u>当然</u>是为你们煮的。

original: She walks to the cabinet in your kitchen.[p/] And she takes out two more tea cups.
translation: 她走向厨房的橱柜，[p/]从中拿出两个茶杯。

original: Celeste: You guys better enjoy this.[p/] These are my last bags of-
translation: Celeste: 你们最好珍惜着喝，[p/]这可是我最后一包——

original: Celeste: W-[p/][s/]Woah!
translation: Celeste: 哇、[p/][s/]哇啊！

original: As she walks over to you,[p/] she slips on a scroll case that you left on the floor.
translation: 走向你们时，[p/]她被你放在地板上的卷轴箱绊倒了。

original: She regains her balance,[p/] but the teacups slip out of her hands.[p/] The boiling liquid is airborne and is heading right toward your face.
translation: 她找回了平衡，[p/]但茶杯已经从手中滑落。[p/]沸腾的液体直直朝你的脸袭来。

original: Celeste: [b]Figaqua[/b]!
translation: Celeste: [b]Figaqua[/b]!

original: Celeste reacts immediately and points her index finger at the tea.
translation: 塞莱斯特立刻反应过来，将食指指向茶水。

original: Her magic takes hold,[p/] and the tea freezes just inches from your face.
translation: 她的魔力赶得正好，[p/]茶水在你的脸前方几厘米处冻结。

original: She breathes a sigh of relief,[p/] and she brings the tea back into their cups.
translation: 她安下心来，长出一口气，[p/]将茶水放回杯子里。

original: Celeste: You really need to clean this place.
translation: Celeste: 你真得好好打扫一下这里了。

original: Celeste: I'm your bodyguard,[p/] not your maid.
translation: Celeste: 我是你的护卫，[p/]不是女仆。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/][s/]Right.[p/] Sorry about that...
translation: Tyrion: 好、[p/]好的。[p/]很抱歉……

original: Aria: That was [b]Shape Liquid[/b], wasn't it?
translation: Aria: 那是[b]形变液体[/b]，对吧？

original: Celeste: Yeah...
translation: Celeste: 是的……

original: Tyrion: Oh...[p/] I never expected you to-
translation: Tyrion: 噢……[p/]我从没想过你会——

original: Celeste: I know...[p/] But it's just too convenient [i]not[/i] to have.
translation: Celeste: 我知道……[p/]但这个法术太方便了，不用<u>可惜</u>。

original: She's really opened her mind about learning new spells.
translation: 她对学习新法术的态度更开放了。

original: You remember when you first met her.
translation: 你回忆起第一次遇见她的时候。

original: Back then,[p/] she only knew how to cast [b]Mage Blade[/b].
translation: 当时，[p/]她还只知道怎么施展[b]法术剑刃[/b]。

original: She hated magic back then...[p/] You never imagined how diverse her repertoire would become.
translation: 她当时还痛恨魔法……[p/]你从没想象过她的技能树会变得这么丰富。

original: Celeste: ...[i]Another[/i] visitor?
translation: Celeste: ……<u>又一个</u>客人？

original: Tyrion: I'm already up.[p/] I'll check it.
translation: Tyrion: 反正我也起来了。[p/]我去看看。

original: Celeste: Well [i]whoever[/i] they are,[p/] I'm not giving up any more of my Lotus Tea.
translation: Celeste: 哎不管是<u>谁</u>，[p/]我都不会再让出自己的莲茶了。

original: You open the door and don't see anyone.[p/] But there's a letter in your mailbox.
translation: 你打开了门，但谁也没看见。[p/]信箱里倒是有封信。

original: You take a closer look at the envelope.[p/] It's sealed with candle wax.
translation: 你仔细检查了信封。[p/]信封被火漆印章封了起来。

original: There's a crest on it...[p/][s/] It's the insignia of House Pierce!
translation: 上面有个纹章……[p/][s/]是皮尔斯家的纹章！

original: You quickly open the letter and read it.
translation: 你迅速打开信读了起来。

original: Despite supposedly being written by a noble,[p/] the paper has been torn in half.[p/] But the message is clear.
translation: 虽然理应是贵族写就，[p/]信纸却被撕成了两半。[p/]但上面的信息很明确。

original: Garrick: [i]I hope you understand...[p/] I would've never contacted you unless I had no other choice.[/i]
translation: Garrick: “我希望你理解……[p/]除非别无选择，我不会主动联系你。

original: Garrick: [i]I know the truth behind McCoy's [i]true[/i] parentage.[p/] And I'm aware of how vital this information is to you.[/i]
translation: Garrick: “我知道麦考伊<u>真正</u>血统背后的事实了。[p/]我也知道这一信息对你多么重要。

original: Garrick: [i]As you know,[p/] my execution is scheduled for next month.[p/] And I'm running out of time.[/i]
translation: Garrick: “你也知道，[p/]我下个月就要被执行死刑了。[p/]留给我的时间不多了。

original: Garrick: [i]I want to trade this information with you.[p/] In exchange,[p/] you [b]will[/b] grant me my freedom.[/i]
translation: Garrick: “我想和你做个交易，[p/]作为交换，你[b]要[/b]保我自由。

original: Garrick: [i]Meet me in the private Prayer Room within the Grand Cathedral of the Scaled Lord at 2:00 PM...[/i]
translation: Garrick: “下午两点，鳞甲领主大教堂的私人祷告室内见……

original: Garrick: [i]You [b]will[/b] save me from my fate,[p/] or else[/i]
translation: Garrick: 你[b]会[/b]把我从宿命中救出来的，不然”

original: Tyrion: ...What?!
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？！

original: Celeste: If he thinks for a second that we'd even [i]think[/i] of helping him-!
translation: Celeste: 他<u>怎么敢</u>以为我们会愿意帮——！

original: Tyrion: I know how you feel.[p/] But aren't these the answers you've been looking for?
translation: Tyrion: 我明白你的感受。[p/]但这不正是你在寻找的答案吗？

original: Celeste: I don't care![p/][s/] We're [i]not[/i] going to help him!
translation: Celeste: 我不在乎！[p/][s/]我们<u>不会</u>帮他！

original: Tyrion: That was never an option.[p/] But there's clearly more to this.
translation: Tyrion: 我们没有这个选项。[p/]但事情明显还有隐情。

original: Aria: ...I agree.[p/] How was he able to find out in the first place?
translation: Aria: ……我同意。[p/]他一开始是怎么找出答案的？

original: Aria: The truth is, Celeste...[p/] I've also been looking into your parentage.
translation: Aria: 事实是，塞莱斯特……[p/]我也在调查你的亲生父母。

original: Celeste: What?!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！

original: Celeste: Why didn't you say anything?!
translation: Celeste: 你怎么什么都没说？！

original: Aria: I'm sorry.[p/] But I didn't want to raise your hopes.
translation: Aria: 对不起。[p/]但我不想给你虚无缥缈的希望。

original: Aria: And I was apparently right to do so.[p/] I couldn't find [i]any[/i] information regarding your birth.
translation: Aria: 这似乎也是正确的决定，[p/]我找不到<u>任何</u>有关你诞生的信息。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: So if [i]you[/i] couldn't find anything,[p/] how was [i]Pierce[/i] able to?
translation: Tyrion: 如果连<u>你</u>都一无所获，[p/]<u>皮尔斯</u>是怎么成功的？

original: Aria: House Pierce is low on the political hierarchy.[p/] He doesn't have access to the resources I do.
translation: Aria: 皮尔斯家在政界地位不高。[p/]我拥有的资源远超于他。

original: Aria: He [i]does[/i] own the land the McCoy Tavern is on.
translation: Aria: 他<u>确实</u>拥有麦考伊酒馆所在的土地。
