original: Aria: But frankly,[p/] this whole situation is quite suspect.
translation: Aria: 但坦白讲，[p/]这整件事都很可疑。

original: Tyrion: And why would he ask for [i]my[/i] help?[p/] [i]I[/i] was the one who indicted him in the first place.
translation: Tyrion: 而且他为什么要寻求<u>我的</u>帮助？[p/]<u>我</u>可是当时让他被判有罪的人。

original: Tyrion: Even if I [i]did[/i] agree to help him,[p/] it would be nearly impossible for me to get him an acquittal.
translation: Tyrion: 即使我<u>真的</u>同意帮他，[p/]我也基本不可能让他脱罪。

original: Aria: He must be desperate.
translation: Aria: 他一定很急迫。

original: Aria: His execution is scheduled for next month, after all.
translation: Aria: 毕竟他的死刑执行日就定在下个月。

original: Aria: It's possible that he reached out to Tymora as well.
translation: Aria: 他有可能也向泰摩拉寻求了帮助。

original: Aria: Still...[p/] I can't believe he'd set up a meeting at the Grand Cathedral, [i]today[/i] of all days.
translation: Aria: 但我还是……[p/]无法相信他会选择在大教堂会面，还偏偏是<u>今天</u>。

original: Tyrion: ...Why?[p/] What's happening there?
translation: Tyrion: ……为什么？[p/]那里发生了什么？

original: Aria: I'm sorry...[p/] But it's not my place to tell you.
translation: Aria: 我很抱歉……[p/]但这不是由我来告诉你的事。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Aria,[p/] can I talk with Tyrion alone for a minute?
translation: Celeste: 阿莉亚，[p/]能不能让我和提利昂单独交谈一下？

original: Aria: Of course.[p/] I'm sure you have much to discuss.
translation: Aria: 当然了。[p/]我明白你们有很多要讨论的。

original: Aria: I actually also have business at the Cathedral today. [mind="I can't believe he'd use that as an opportunity."/]
translation: Aria: 我今天其实也有事要去大教堂。 [mind="不敢相信他会利用<u>这件事</u>。"/]

original: Aria: I'll be taking my leave.
translation: Aria: 我就先告辞了。

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry...[p/] I'm sure this is just bringing up bad memories for you.
translation: Tyrion: 我很抱歉……[p/]我知道这一定会让你想起不好的回忆。

original: Celeste: ...We should meet with him.
translation: Celeste: ……我们应该去见他。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: We're not going to help him, obviously.[p/] But I had an idea.
translation: Celeste: 我们当然不是去帮他。[p/]但我有个主意。

original: Celeste: He's probably really scared of his execution, right?[p/] And he's desperate enough to ask [i]you[/i] for help.
translation: Celeste: 他应该很害怕被处刑，对吧？[p/]害怕到都要寻求<u>你的</u>帮助。

original: Tyrion: I suppose that's true...
translation: Tyrion: 我猜没错……

original: Celeste: So...[p/] Think about how stressed he would be if you showed up and refused to help him.
translation: Celeste: 所以……[p/]如果你出现在他面前，却又拒绝帮忙的话，想想他的压力会有多大？

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Tyrion: I could use the Eye of Horus on him.
translation: Tyrion: 我就可以对他使用荷鲁斯之眼。

original: Celeste: We can get the info we need without having to give him [i]anything[/i].
translation: Celeste: 我们可以不给他<u>任何东西</u>，就获得需要的信息。

original: Tyrion: ...But are you really okay with this?[p/] You'll have to see him again.
translation: Tyrion: ……但你真的没关系吗？[p/]你不得不再见到他。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] I'll manage.
translation: Celeste: 没事……[p/]我会挺过来的。

original: Celeste: And it'll be worth it if we can finally get the answers I'm looking for.
translation: Celeste: 如果能获得我们想要的答案，这么做也值得。

original: You've already gotten her hopes up,[p/] but there's no guarantee that he actually knows the truth.
translation: 你已经让她燃起了希望，[p/]但也不保证皮尔斯就真的知道真相。

original: He could just be bluffing to get you to help him.
translation: 他可能只是为了让你帮助他而虚张声势。

original: ...But if he [i]does[/i] know.[p/] You can't just ignore this.
translation: ……但如果他<u>确实</u>知道，[p/]也不能就这么放过机会。

original: You need to verify his claims yourself.
translation: 你得自己去验证他的说法。

original: Celeste: So [i]this[/i] is the Grand Cathedral of the Scaled Lord.
translation: Celeste: 所以<u>这里</u>就是鳞甲领主大教堂。

original: Tyrion: Have you never been here before?
translation: Tyrion: 你以前从没来过这里？

original: Tyrion: I thought you spent a lot of time in Ratholme.
translation: Tyrion: 我记得你在瑞思霍姆待了很久。

original: Celeste: The Church of Bahamut wasn't that popular in my hometown.[p/] And I've never been the religious type.
translation: Celeste: 巴哈姆特教会在我的故乡人气没有那么高。[p/]我也向来不是那么虔诚的人。

original: Celeste: What about you?
translation: Celeste: 你呢？

original: Tyrion: It never really caught on with me.
translation: Tyrion: 我一直没什么兴趣。

original: Tyrion: ...And apparently my roots are more celestial than draconic.
translation: Tyrion: ……我的血统比起龙似乎更接近天界。

original: Celeste: Yeah.[p/] I guess that makes sense. [mind="He certainly has the looks for it..."/]
translation: Celeste: 也是，[p/]你说得有道理。[mind="他的外貌确实很像来自天界……"/]

original: Tyrion: ...Your thoughts are leaking again.
translation: Tyrion: ……你的想法又流露出来了。

original: Celeste: Can you stop?
translation: Celeste: 能不能别这样？

original: Tyrion: I can't exactly turn it off, you know.
translation: Tyrion: 你知道，我也没法把能力关掉啊。

original: Tyrion: Do those mental exercises I taught you.
translation: Tyrion: 试试我教你那些精神训练。

original: Celeste: Ugh...
translation: Celeste: 唉……

original: As you approach the Grand Cathedral,[p/] you see a large blockade guarded by legions of the Kingsguard.
translation: 接近大教堂时，[p/]你看到了由大批国王卫队成员把守的大型封锁线。

original: Celeste: It's closed off...[p/] Is there some kind of event going on?
translation: Celeste: 这里不开放了……[p/]是有什么活动吗？

original: You recall Steelwind mentioning that she was heading here as well.
translation: 你回忆起斯蒂尔文德说她也有事要来这里。

original: The nobility must be using the cathedral grounds for something.
translation: 一定是贵族在利用教堂干什么事。

original: It might explain why Pierce wanted to meet you here.[p/] It's probably secluded from prying eyes today.
translation: 也能解释为什么皮尔斯想在此与你见面。[p/]今天这里应该不用担心隔墙有耳。

original: Knight: ...Tyrion Cuthbert?
translation: Knight: ……提利昂·卡斯伯特？

original: As you approach the blockade,[p/] one of the knights notices you.
translation: 接近封锁区时，[p/]有一名骑士注意到了你。

original: He glances at you and Celeste.
translation: 他瞟了一眼你和塞莱斯特。

original: Knight: ...We've been expecting you.
translation: Knight: ……我们等候多时了。

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] see.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]明白了。

original: You exchange glances with Celeste.[p/] But you both enter the cathedral grounds.
translation: 你和塞莱斯特交换了一个眼神。[p/]两人都进入了教堂。

original: The main building is massive...[p/] yet mostly empty.
translation: 教堂主建筑十分宏伟……但大部分区域空空荡荡。

original: You only see a few people within,[p/] and most of them are quite familiar.
translation: 你只在里面看见了几个人，[p/]大部分还都很熟悉。

original: You spot Laefe and Miriam as you head further into the room.
translation: 你往房间深处走去，看见了拉菲和米莉亚姆。

original: They both avoid eye contact with you.[p/] But it doesn't seem to be [i]purely[/i] out of resentment.
translation: 两人都避免与你目光交汇，[p/]但看起来<u>不单单是</u>出于怨恨。

original: As soon as they see you,[p/] they move their conversation elsewhere.
translation: 两人一看见你，[p/]就立刻改去其他地方交谈。

original: It's clear they still have mixed feelings about how you convicted their sister.
translation: 很显然，她们对你这个指控了姐姐的人依然感情复杂。

original: In another corner of the room,[p/] you spot Lloyd von Sanctus speaking with another individual.
translation: 房间另一个角落里，[p/]你看到洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯正与某人交谈。

original: She seems to be someone of equal social standing.
translation: 她看起来和冯·桑克图斯社会地位相当。

original: You feel like you've seen her somewhere before.[p/] But you can't quite remember where.
translation: 你感觉自己之前在哪里见过她，[p/]但想不起来具体是哪儿。

original: As soon as you enter the room,[p/] von Sanctus flashes a quick look of disdain at you.
translation: 你一进房间，[p/]冯·桑克图斯就抛来鄙夷的眼神。

original: You see him slowly move his conversation out of the room as well.
translation: 你看到他也慢慢移动去其他房间谈话。

original: And finally,[p/] you see Lucio Steelwind speaking with his daughter.
translation: 最后，[p/]你看到了正与女儿交谈的卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德。

original: ...along with the two princes.
translation: ……旁边还有两位王子。

original: They seem to speaking with another individual that you haven't met before.
translation: 他们正和一个你没见过的人交谈。

original: When he notices you,[p/] his gaze narrows.[p/] And he stares at the two of you warily.
translation: 注意到你时，[p/]那个人眯起了眼睛。[p/]他谨慎地上下打量着你们两个。

original: Aster, especially, seems surprised to see you here.
translation: 阿斯特对你们在此一事最为惊讶。

original: He and Lucio ask the prosecutor something.[p/] But you can't quite hear their conversation.
translation: 他和卢西奥问了检察官什么事，[p/]但你听不太清他们的对话。

original: When she responds,[p/] Aster raises his eyebrows and Lucio's expression darkens.
translation: 阿莉亚回应后，[p/]阿斯特挑起了眉毛，卢西奥的表情阴沉下来。

original: What's going on here?
translation: 到底怎么回事？

original: Celeste: This is a little awkward.
translation: Celeste: 这可有点尴尬。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……

original: Tyrion: But we have some time before our meeting with Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 但我们去见皮尔斯之前还有点时间。

original: Tyrion: ...You want to do some sightseeing?
translation: Tyrion: ……你想看看风景吗？

original: Celeste: Oh?[p/] Are you asking me out?
translation: Celeste: 哎呀？[p/]你在邀我出门？

original: Tyrion: We are [i]literally[/i] already out.
translation: Tyrion: 我们<u>已经</u>出门了。

original: Celeste: Sure.[p/] Why not?
translation: Celeste: 好啊，[p/]没问题。

original: Celeste: I picked up this map from the entrance.[p/] We can use it to navigate through the area.
translation: Celeste: 我在入口拿了这张地图。[p/]可以用它来导航。

original: Celeste: I'm also a little interested in what all these nobles are doing here.
translation: Celeste: 我也有点感兴趣这些贵族都在这里干嘛。

original: It [i]is[/i] strange.[p/] Perhaps someone can tell you more.
translation: <u>确实</u>很奇怪，[p/]也许其中有人能给你提供信息。

translation: Player: 你看到了什么？

original: MBeatrice: I was with my sisters and my...[p/] guide,[p/] Eris Illmater.
translation: MBeatrice: 我当时和妹妹们以及……[p/]向导，[p/]厄莉斯·伊尔马特在一起。

original: MBeatrice: I was speaking with them in the garden,[p/] when I suddenly felt ill and lost consciousness.
translation: MBeatrice: 我们在花园里交谈，[p/]然后我突然感觉不适，失去了意识。

original: MBeatrice: When I woke up,[p/] my sisters found me.[p/] They said that I had gone missing for over an hour.
translation: MBeatrice: 醒来以后，[p/]妹妹们找到了我。[p/]她们说我失踪超过一小时了。

original: MBeatrice: I was confused.[p/] But when I later heard what happened,[p/] I realized that someone must have taken control of my body.
translation: MBeatrice: 我很困惑。[p/]但我之后听说了发生的事，[p/]也意识到有人操控了我的身体。

original: MBeatrice: I have no memories of what happened.[p/] And from what I understand,[p/] the same thing happened to Aria.
translation: MBeatrice: 我不记得发生了什么。[p/]但我听说阿莉亚也有相同遭遇。

original: MBeatrice: And to make matters worse,[p/] there's [i]nothing[/i] that indicates who may have controlled our actions.
translation: MBeatrice: 更麻烦的是，[p/]<u>没有</u>任何线索能指明幕后黑手。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Orym: It all started when we received a report from the Kingsguard.[p/] The prosecutor attacked Prince Alaric and a fire had broken out in the Common Room.
translation: Orym: 一切都要从我们收到国王卫队报告时说起。[p/]检察官攻击了阿拉里克王子，公共休息室还着火了。

original: Orym: We weren't sure what the deal with Steelwind was.[p/] So we went to the Common Room to put out the fire.
translation: Orym: 我们不确定斯蒂尔文德那边怎么回事。[p/]就先去公共休息室帮忙灭火。

original: Orym: When we got there,[p/] we noticed a bunch of unconscious knights in front of the Prayer Room.
translation: Orym: 但我们抵达时，[p/]发现一群卫兵昏倒在祷告室前。

original: Orym: We went to the Prayer Room.[p/] That's when we found Steelwind and Cuthbert unconscious next to Pierce's dead body.
translation: Orym: 我们就先去了祷告室。[p/]在那里我们发现了皮尔斯的尸体，以及旁边失去意识的斯蒂尔文德和卡斯伯特。

original: Orym: We later found the bodies of von Sanctus and Sibyl too.[p/] That's when we realized that she offed all three of them.
translation: Orym: 之后我们也发现了冯·桑克图斯和希比尔的尸体。[p/]这时我们才意识到三个人都是被她杀害的。

original: Orym: Steelwind must have attacked von Sanctus in the Common Room and suffocated him somehow.
translation: Orym: 斯蒂尔文德肯定是在公共休息室攻击了冯·桑克图斯，使其窒息。

original: Orym: From the burns on his body,[p/] she must have hit him with a [b]Fire Bolt[/b] to keep him from getting away.[p/] He didn't have anything to defend himself with.
translation: Orym: 根据尸体上的烧伤，[p/]他应该先被[b]火焰箭[/b]击中，无法逃走。[p/]他也没有任何自卫手段。

original: Orym: Steelwind must have attacked Sibyl somewhere close to that balcony.[p/] And going by the autopsy report,[p/] she must have suffocated her somehow.
translation: Orym: 斯蒂尔文德肯定是在阳台附近攻击了希比尔。[p/]根据尸检报告，[p/]她用某种手段令其窒息。

original: Orym: We later discovered her body in Lake Galakrond.[p/] From the High Speaker's testimony,[p/] Steelwind must have dumped her body from the balcony above.
translation: Orym: 我们之后在迦拉克隆湖里发现了她的尸体。[p/]根据大主教的证言，[p/]斯蒂尔文德肯定是从正上方阳台处弃尸。

original: Orym: From McCoy's testimony,[p/] we know that Steelwind killed Pierce in the Prayer Room.
translation: Orym: 根据麦考伊的证言，[p/]斯蒂尔文德在祷告室杀了皮尔斯。

original: Orym: She probably didn't have time to suffocate him like the other two.[p/] So she must have improvised a weapon using [b]Shape Liquid[/b].
translation: Orym: 她大概没时间采取之前的窒息手段了。[p/]就临机应变，用[b]形变液体[/b]做了一把武器。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Theon: I was doing some paperwork in my quarters and I suppose I lost track of the time.[p/] My alarm went off and I realized that it was time for my afternoon prayers.
translation: Theon: 我在住所进行文书工作，忙到忘了时间。[p/]听到闹钟才想起来，该进行下午的祷告了。

original: Theon: I was in my quarters when my alarm went off at 2:10 PM.[p/] I realized that it was time for my afternoon prayers.
translation: Theon: 下午 2:10 闹钟响的时候，我在房间里。[p/]听见铃声才意识到该进行下午的祷告了。

original: Theon: I began heading to the Prayer Room when I spotted Lady Steelwind looking over the west-ward balcony.
translation: Theon: 我向着祷告室出发，发现斯蒂尔文德小姐正在西侧阳台往下看。

original: Theon: I began heading to the Prayer Room when I spotted Lady Steelwind looking over the west-ward balcony.[p/] This happened before 2:15 PM.
translation: Theon: 我向着祷告室出发，发现斯蒂尔文德小姐正在西侧阳台往下看。[p/]时间是下午 2:15 之前。

original: Theon: I tried to greet her but she didn't respond to me.[p/] That's when I noticed she was pushing something large over the balcony and into Lake Galakrond.
translation: Theon: 我向她打招呼，但被无视了。[p/]这时我发现，她正从阳台把什么大东西推入迦拉克隆湖。

original: Theon: It was still before 2:15 PM.[p/] Our encounter was short.[p/] That's when I noticed she was pushing something large over the balcony and into Lake Galakrond.
translation: Theon: 当时还没到下午 2:15。[p/]我们只短暂相遇。[p/]这时我发现，她正从阳台把什么大东西推入迦拉克隆湖。

original: Theon: I asked her what she was doing.[p/] But again,[p/] she ignored me and went towards the Prayer Room.
translation: Theon: 我问她在干什么。[p/]但她还是无视了我，[p/]转身向祷告室走去。

original: Theon: I only spent about two minutes trying to speak with her.[p/] But she ignored me and went towards the Prayer Room.[p/]
translation: Theon: 我花了大约两分钟尝试和她交谈。[p/]但她还是无视了我，[p/]转身向祷告室走去。

original: Theon: I thought nothing of it and made my way there as well.[p/] That's when the guards there turned me away.
translation: Theon: 我没多想，也向祷告室走过去。[p/]看守的卫兵把我拦下了。

original: Theon: I thought nothing of it and made my way there as well.[p/] That's when the guards there turned me away at 2:15 PM.
translation: Theon: 我没多想，也向祷告室走过去。[p/]下午 2:15 到达时，看守的卫兵把我拦下了。

original: Theon: I went back to my quarters to do my Prayers there.
translation: Theon: 我就折返回自己的房间祈祷。

original: Theon: I went back to my quarters to do my Prayers there.[p/] I was there until 3:15 PM.
translation: Theon: 我就折返回自己的房间祈祷。[p/]在那里一直等到下午 3:15。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Eris: It's true.[p/] I was the one who masterminded this.
translation: Eris: 没错。[p/]我就是幕后主使。

original: Eris: I knew about the King's funeral at the Grand Cathedral.[p/] So I forced Beatrice Frega to allow me to accompany her.
translation: Eris: 我知道国王的葬礼在大教堂举办。[p/]就强迫比亚特丽丝·弗雷加让我和她同行。

original: Eris: When I was there,[p/] I used my Contracts with Beatrice Frega and Aria Steelwind to compel them to act against their will.
translation: Eris: 到达之后，[p/]我利用了比亚特丽丝·弗雷加和阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德的契约，操控她们行动。

original: Eris: Through the actions of Beatrice Frega and Aria Steelwind,[p/] I facilitated the deaths of Lloyd von Sanctus,[p/] Coraline Sibyl,[p/] and Garrick Pierce.
translation: Eris: 通过比亚特丽丝·弗雷加和阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德的行动，[p/]我促成了洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯，[p/]卡洛琳·希比尔，[p/]加里克·皮尔斯的死亡。

original: Eris: I didn't really have a reason to kill [i]them[/i] specifically.[p/] I just needed Aria to kill my victims as quickly and efficiently as possible.
translation: Eris: 我要杀<u>他们</u>没有特定的理由。[p/]我只需要阿莉亚尽可能高效快速地杀掉我要杀的人。

original: Eris: My only motivation for my actions that day was to harm Tyrion Cuthbert's friends and make him suffer.
translation: Eris: 我唯一的动机就是要伤害提利昂·卡斯伯特的朋友，使他受尽痛苦。

original: Eris: And before you ask...[p/] Aside from my thralls,[p/] I was acting alone that day.[p/] I didn't follow direct [i]or[/i] indirect orders from anyone.
translation: Eris: 以免你再问……[p/]我那天都是独自一人行动。[p/]没有遵从任何直接<u>或</u>间接指令。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Celeste: The truth is that Eris rewrote your memories, Tyrion.[p/] You were actually knocked out at 1:45 PM.
translation: Celeste: 真相是厄莉斯修改了你的记忆，提利昂。[p/]你实际上在下午 1:45 昏迷。

original: Celeste: We went to the Prayer Room a lot earlier for our meeting,[p/] and that commotion we heard was actually Beatrice and Eris attacking the guards at 1:40 PM.
translation: Celeste: 我们进祷告室的时间远比会面早，[p/]听到的骚乱声其实是下午 1:40 比亚特丽丝和厄莉斯在攻击卫兵。

original: Celeste: They tricked me and slipped into the Prayer Room...[p/] After that,[p/] Beatrice...[p/] killed you.
translation: Celeste: 她们骗过我进了祷告室……[p/]这之后，[p/]比亚特丽丝……[p/]杀害了你。

original: Celeste: I didn't know what to do.[p/] That's when Eris told me she would resurrect you in exchange for killing Pierce.
translation: Celeste: 我不知道怎么办。[p/]这时厄莉斯跟我说，她能复活你，但我要杀掉皮尔斯。

original: Celeste: I know I shouldn't have done it.[p/] But I just wanted you back...[p/] I didn't care about what happened to me.
translation: Celeste: 我知道自己不应该这么做。[p/]但我只想让你回来……[p/]我不在乎自己会变成什么样。

original: Celeste: I didn't realize that she'd use "my eternal servitude" to take control of my body.[p/] She used me to trick Aria into signing [i]another[/i] Blood Contract.
translation: Celeste: 我没想到她会利用“永世服从”这点来操控我。[p/]她利用我骗阿莉亚签了<u>另一份</u>血契。

original: Celeste: After that...[p/] I followed through with [i]my[/i] end of the deal.[p/] I killed Pierce so that she would bring Tyrion back.
translation: Celeste: 在这之后……[p/]我按照契约里对<u>我</u>的要求行动。[p/]为了让提利昂复活，我杀了皮尔斯。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Celeste: I think I remember now.[p/] We went to meet with Pierce at 1:50 PM.[p/] And we heard that commotion outside at 2:20 PM.
translation: Celeste: 现在我想起来了。[p/]我们下午 1:50 去和皮尔斯见面。[p/]下午 2:20 听到外面的骚乱。

original: Celeste: I saw Aria attacking the guards there.[p/] And I fought her for about fifteen minutes before she broke past me.
translation: Celeste: 我看见阿莉亚在攻击卫兵。[p/]我和她打了大概 15 分钟，才被她逃走。

original: Celeste: When I followed her into the Prayer Room,[p/] I found her there with Beatrice and Eris.[p/] They knocked Aria,[p/] Tyrion,[p/] and Pierce unconscious.
translation: Celeste: 跟着她进入祷告室后，[p/]我发现比亚特丽丝和厄莉斯也在屋内。[p/]她们使阿莉亚、[p/]提利昂，[p/]还有皮尔斯失去了意识。

original: Celeste: ...I checked Tyrion's body and thought he was dead.[p/] But I realize now that Beatrice just cast [b]Feign Death[/b] on him.
translation: Celeste: ……我检查了提利昂，认为他死了。[p/]但现在想想，比亚特丽丝可能对他用了[b]假死[/b]。

original: Celeste: Anyways,[p/] Eris offered her deal to me.[p/] But I couldn't go through with killing Pierce...[p/] I think you know the rest.
translation: Celeste: 总之，[p/]厄莉斯向我提出交易。[p/]但我没法下手杀皮尔斯……[p/]后面的你们都知道了。

original: Celeste: A few minutes after Pierce died,[p/] Aster,[p/] the Inquisition,[p/] and the Kingsguard showed up to arrest Aria.
translation: Celeste: 皮尔斯死亡几分钟后，[p/]阿斯特、[p/]裁判所和国王卫队到场逮捕阿莉亚。

Player: Objection
